atk-s0302a:6_0: 1. Evaṃ me sutanti – nidānavagge paṭhamaṃ paṭiccasamuppādasuttaṃ. Tatrāyaṃ anupubbapadavaṇṇanā
atk-s0302a:6_1: – tatra kho bhagavā bhikkhū āmantesīti, ettha tatrāti desakālaparidīpanaṃ. Tañhi
atk-s0302a:6_2: “yaṃ samayaṃ viharati, tatra samaye, yasmiñca jetavane viharati, tatra jetavane”ti
atk-s0302a:6_3: dīpeti. Bhāsitabbayutte vā desakāle dīpeti. Na hi bhagavā ayutte dese kāle ca dhammaṃ
atk-s0302a:6_4: bhāsati. “Akālo kho tāva bāhiyā”tiādi cettha sādhakaṃ. Khoti padapūraṇamatte, avadhāraṇe
atk-s0302a:6_5: ādikālatthe vā nipāto. Bhagavāti lokagarudīpanaṃ. Bhikkhūti kathāsavanayuttapuggalavacanaṃ.
atk-s0302a:6_6: Apicettha “bhikkhakoti bhikkhu, bhikkhācariyaṃ ajjhūpagatoti bhikkhū”tiādinā nayena
atk-s0302a:6_7: vacanattho veditabbo. Āmantesīti ālapi, abhāsi, sambodhesi, ayamettha attho. Aññatra
atk-s0302a:6_8: pana ñāpanepi hoti. Yathāha – “āmantayāmi vo, bhikkhave, paṭivedayāmi vo, bhikkhave”ti.
atk-s0302a:6_9: Pakkosanepi. Yathāha – “ehi tvaṃ, bhikkhu, mama vacanena sāriputtaṃ āmantehī”ti.
atk-s0302a:6_11: Bhikkhanasīlatāguṇayuttopi hi bhikkhu, bhikkhanadhammatāguṇayuttopi bhikkhane sādhukāritāguṇayuttopīti
atk-s0302a:6_12: saddavidū maññanti. Tena ca tesaṃ bhikkhanasīlatādiguṇayogasiddhena vacanena hīnādhikajanasevitavuttiṃ
atk-s0302a:6_14: vacanena te attano abhimukhe karonto teneva kathetukamyatādīpakena nesaṃ vacanena
atk-s0302a:6_15: sotukamyataṃ janeti, teneva ca sambodhanatthena sādhukaṃ manasikārepi niyojeti. Sādhukaṃ
atk-s0302a:7_0: Aparesupi devamanussesu vijjamānesu kasmā bhikkhūyeva āmantesīti ce? Jeṭṭhaseṭṭhāsannasadāsannihitabhāvato.
atk-s0302a:7_1: Sabbaparisasādhāraṇā hi bhagavato dhammadesanā, parisāya jeṭṭhā bhikkhū paṭhamaṃ
atk-s0302a:7_2: uppannattā, seṭṭhā anagāriyabhāvaṃ ādiṃ katvā satthucariyānuvidhāyakattā sakalasāsanapaṭiggāhakattā
atk-s0302a:7_3: ca, āsannā tattha nisinnesu satthusantikattā, sadāsannihitā satthusantikāvacarattāti.
atk-s0302a:7_4: Apica te dhammadesanāya bhājanaṃ yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipattisabbhāvato. Visesato ca
atk-s0302a:7_5: ekacce bhikkhūyeva sandhāya ayaṃ desanāpīti evaṃ āmantesi.
atk-s0302a:8_0: Kimatthaṃ pana bhagavā dhammaṃ desento paṭhamaṃ bhikkhū āmantesi, na dhammameva desesīti?
atk-s0302a:8_1: Satijananatthaṃ. Bhikkhū aññaṃ cintentāpi vikkhittacittāpi dhammaṃ paccavekkhantāpi
atk-s0302a:8_2: kammaṭṭhānaṃ manasikarontāpi nisinnā honti. Te anāmantetvā dhamme desiyamāne “ayaṃ
atk-s0302a:8_3: desanā kiṃnidānā kiṃpaccayā katamāya aṭṭhuppattiyā desitā”ti sallakkhetuṃ asakkontā
atk-s0302a:8_4: duggahitaṃ vā gaṇheyyuṃ, na vā gaṇheyyuṃ, tena nesaṃ satijananatthaṃ bhagavā paṭhamaṃ
atk-s0302a:9_0: Bhadanteti gāravavacanametaṃ, satthuno paṭivacanadānaṃ vā. Apicettha “bhikkhavo”ti
atk-s0302a:9_1: vadamāno bhagavā bhikkhū ālapati. “Bhadante”ti vadamānā te bhagavantaṃ paccālapanti.
atk-s0302a:9_3: paṭivacanaṃ dāpeti, “bhadante”ti paṭivacanaṃ denti. Te bhikkhūti ye bhagavā āmantesi,
atk-s0302a:9_4: te. Bhagavato paccassosunti bhagavato āmantanaṃ patiassosuṃ, abhimukhā hutvā suṇiṃsu
atk-s0302a:9_5: sampaṭicchiṃsu paṭiggahesunti attho. Bhagavā etadavocāti, bhagavā etaṃ idāni vattabbaṃ
atk-s0302a:9_6: sakalasuttaṃ avoca. Ettāvatā yaṃ āyasmatā ānandena atthabyañjanasampannassa buddhānaṃ
atk-s0302a:10_0: Idāni paṭiccasamuppādaṃ votiādinā nayena bhagavatā nikkhittassa suttassa saṃvaṇṇanāya
atk-s0302a:10_1: okāso anuppatto. Sā panesā suttavaṇṇanā yasmā suttanikkhepaṃ vicāretvā vuccamānā
atk-s0302a:10_2: pākaṭā hoti, tasmā suttanikkhepaṃ tāva vicāressāma. Cattāro hi suttanikkhepā – attajjhāsayo,
atk-s0302a:10_3: parajjhāsayo, pucchāvasiko, aṭṭhuppattikoti. Tattha yāni suttāni bhagavā parehi anajjhiṭṭho
atk-s0302a:10_4: kevalaṃ attano ajjhāsayeneva katheti, seyyathidaṃ – dasabalasuttantahārako candopama-vīṇopama-sammappadhāna-iddhipāda-indriyabala-bojjhaṅgamaggaṅga-suttantahārakoti
atk-s0302a:11_0: Yāni pana “paripakkā kho rāhulassa vimuttiparipācanīyā dhammā. Yaṃnūnāhaṃ rāhulaṃ
atk-s0302a:11_1: uttariṃ āsavānaṃ khaye vineyya”nti evaṃ paresaṃ ajjhāsayaṃ khantiṃ nijjhānakkhamaṃ
atk-s0302a:11_2: manaṃ abhinīhāraṃ bujjhanabhāvañca apekkhitvā parajjhāsayavasena kathitāni, seyyathidaṃ
atk-s0302a:11_4: āsīvisopamasuttaṃ, dhātuvibhaṅgasuttanti, evamādīni, tesaṃ parajjhāsayo nikkhepo.
atk-s0302a:12_0: Bhagavantaṃ pana upasaṅkamitvā catasso parisā cattāro vaṇṇā nāgā supaṇṇā gandhabbā
atk-s0302a:12_1: asurā yakkhā mahārājāno tāvatiṃsādayo devā mahābrahmāti evamādayo “bojjhaṅgā bojjhaṅgāti,
atk-s0302a:12_2: bhante, vuccanti – nīvaraṇā nīvaraṇāti, bhante, vuccanti – ime nu kho, bhante, pañcupādānakkhandhā,
atk-s0302a:12_3: kiṃsūdha vittaṃ purisassa seṭṭha”ntiādinā nayena pañhaṃ pucchanti. Evaṃ puṭṭhena
atk-s0302a:12_4: bhagavatā yāni kathitāni bojjhaṅgasaṃyuttādīni, yāni vā panaññānipi devatāsaṃyutta,
atk-s0302a:12_5: mārasaṃyutta, brahmasaṃyutta, sakkapañha, cūḷavedalla, mahāvedalla, sāmaññaphalaāḷavaka,
atk-s0302a:13_0: Yāni pana tāni uppannaṃ kāraṇaṃ paṭicca kathitāni, seyyathidaṃ – dhammadāyādaṃ. Cūḷasīhanādasuttaṃ
atk-s0302a:14_0: Evametesu catūsu nikkhepesu imassa paṭiccasamuppādasuttassa parajjhāsayo nikkhepo.
atk-s0302a:14_1: Parapuggalajjhāsayavasena hidaṃ bhagavatā nikkhittaṃ. Katamesaṃ puggalānaṃ ajjhāsayavasenāti?
atk-s0302a:14_2: Ugghaṭitaññūnaṃ. Cattāro hi puggalā ugghaṭitaññū vipañcitaññū neyyo padaparamoti.
atk-s0302a:14_3: Tattha yassa puggalassa saha udāhaṭavelāya dhammābhisamayo hoti, ayaṃ vuccati puggalo
atk-s0302a:14_4: ugghaṭitaññū. Yassa puggalassa saṃkhittena bhāsitassa vitthārena atthe vibhajiyamāne
atk-s0302a:14_5: dhammābhisamayo hoti, ayaṃ vuccati puggalo vipañcitaññū. Yassa puggalassa uddesato
atk-s0302a:14_6: paripucchato yoniso manasikaroto, kalyāṇamitte sevato, bhajato, payirupāsato, anupubbena
atk-s0302a:14_7: dhammābhisamayo hoti, ayaṃ vuccati puggalo neyyo. Yassa puggalassa bahumpi suṇato,
atk-s0302a:14_8: bahumpi dhārayato, bahumpi vācayato na tāya jātiyā dhammābhisamayo hoti, ayaṃ vuccati
atk-s0302a:14_9: puggalo padaparamo. Iti imesu catūsu puggalesu ugghaṭitaññūpuggalānaṃ ajjhāsayavasena
atk-s0302a:15_0: Tadā kira pañcasatā janapadavāsikā bhikkhū sabbeva ekacarā dvicarā ticarā catucarā
atk-s0302a:15_1: pañcacarā sabhāgavuttino dhutaṅgadharā āraddhavīriyā yuttayogā vipassakā saṇhaṃ sukhumaṃ
atk-s0302a:15_2: suññataṃ paccayākāradesanaṃ patthayamānā sāyanhasamaye bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā,
atk-s0302a:15_3: vanditvā, rattakambalasāṇiyā parikkhipamānā viya desanaṃ paccāsīsamānā parivāretvā
atk-s0302a:15_4: nisīdiṃsu. Tesaṃ ajjhāsayavasena bhagavā idaṃ suttaṃ ārabhi. Yathā hi cheko cittakāro
atk-s0302a:15_5: aparikammakatabhittiṃ labhitvā, na āditova rūpaṃ samuṭṭhāpesi, mahāmattikalepādīhi
atk-s0302a:15_6: pana bhittiparikammaṃ tāva katvā, kataparikammāya bhittiyā rūpaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti, kataparikammaṃ
atk-s0302a:15_7: pana bhittiṃ labhitvā, bhittiparikammabyāpāraṃ akatvā, raṅgajātāni yojetvā, vaṭṭikaṃ
atk-s0302a:15_8: vā tūlikaṃ vā ādāya rūpameva samuṭṭhāpeti, evameva bhagavā akatābhinivesaṃ ādikammikakulaputtaṃ
atk-s0302a:15_9: labhitvā nāssa āditova arahattapadaṭṭhānaṃ saṇhaṃ sukhumaṃ suññataṃ vipassanālakkhaṇaṃ
atk-s0302a:16_0: “Tasmātiha tvaṃ, bhikkhu, ādimeva visodhehi kusalesu dhammesu. Ko cādi kusalānaṃ
atk-s0302a:16_1: dhammānaṃ? Sīlañca suvisuddhaṃ diṭṭhi ca ujukā. Yato kho te, bhikkhu, sīlañca suvisuddhaṃ
atk-s0302a:16_2: bhavissati diṭṭhi ca ujukā. Tato tvaṃ, bhikkhu, sīlaṃ nissāya sīle patiṭṭhāya cattāro
atk-s0302a:16_3: satipaṭṭhāne tividhena bhāveyyāsi. Katame cattāro? Idha tvaṃ, bhikkhu, ajjhattaṃ
atk-s0302a:16_4: vā kāye kāyānupassī viharāhi ātāpī sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ.
atk-s0302a:16_5: Bahiddhā vā kāye…pe… ajjhattabahiddhā vā kāye…pe… dhammesu dhammānupassī viharāhi
atk-s0302a:16_6: ātāpī sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ. Yato kho tvaṃ, bhikkhu, sīlaṃ
atk-s0302a:16_7: nissāya sīle patiṭṭhāya ime cattāro satipaṭṭhāne evaṃ tividhena bhāvessasi, tato
atk-s0302a:16_8: tuyhaṃ, bhikkhu, yā ratti vā divaso vā āgamissati, vuddhiyeva pāṭikaṅkhā kusalesu
atk-s0302a:17: Evaṃ ādikammikakulaputtassa sīlakathāya parikammaṃ kathetvā, arahattapadaṭṭhānaṃ saṇhaṃ sukhumaṃ suññataṃ vipassanālakkhaṇaṃ ācikkhati.
atk-s0302a:18_0: Parisuddhasīlaṃ pana āraddhavīriyaṃ yuttayogaṃ vipassakaṃ labhitvā, nāssa pubbabhāgapaṭipadaṃ
atk-s0302a:18_1: ācikkhati, ujukameva pana arahattapadaṭṭhānaṃ saṇhaṃ sukhumaṃ suññataṃ vipassanālakkhaṇaṃ
atk-s0302a:18_2: ācikkhati. Ime pañcasatā bhikkhū pubbabhāgapaṭipadaṃ parisodhetvā ṭhitā sudhantasuvaṇṇasadisā
atk-s0302a:18_3: suparimajjitamaṇikkhandhasannibhā, eko lokuttaramaggova nesaṃ anāgato. Iti tassāgamanatthāya
atk-s0302a:18_4: satthā tesaṃ ajjhāsayaṃ apekkhamāno idaṃ suttaṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0302a:19_0: Tattha paṭiccasamuppādanti paccayākāraṃ. Paccayākāro hi aññamaññaṃ paṭicca sahite
atk-s0302a:19_1: dhamme uppādeti. Tasmā paṭiccasamuppādoti vuccati. Ayamettha saṅkhepo, vitthāro pana
atk-s0302a:20_1: “Kacci pana vo anuruddhā samaggā sammodamānā”tiādīsu hi paccatte dissati. “Gacchatha,
atk-s0302a:20_2: bhikkhave, paṇāmemi vo”tiādīsu upayoge. “Na vo mama santike vatthabba”ntiādīsu karaṇe.
atk-s0302a:20_3: “Vanapatthapariyāyaṃ vo, bhikkhave, desessāmī”tiādīsu sampadāne. “Sabbesaṃ vo, sāriputta,
atk-s0302a:20_4: subhāsita”ntiādīsu sāmivacane. “Ye hi vo ariyā parisuddhakāyakammantā”tiādīsu padapūraṇamatte.
atk-s0302a:20_5: Idha panāyaṃ sampadāne daṭṭhabbo. Bhikkhaveti patissavena abhimukhībhūtānaṃ puna
atk-s0302a:20_6: ālapanaṃ. Desessāmīti desanāpaṭijānanaṃ. Taṃ suṇāthāti taṃ paṭiccasamuppādaṃ taṃ
atk-s0302a:21_0: Sādhukaṃ manasi karothāti ettha pana sādhukaṃ sādhūti ekatthametaṃ. Ayañca sādhusaddo
atk-s0302a:21_2: bhagavā saṃkhittena dhammaṃ desetū”tiādīsu hi āyācane dissati. “Sādhu, bhanteti kho
atk-s0302a:21_3: so bhikkhu bhagavato bhāsitaṃ abhinanditvā anumoditvā”tiādīsu sampaṭicchane. “Sādhu
atk-s0302a:24_0: Ādīsu sundare. “Tena hi, brāhmaṇa, sādhukaṃ suṇāhī”tiādīsu sādhukasaddoyeva daḷhīkamme
atk-s0302a:24_1: āṇattiyantipi vuccati. Idha panāyaṃ ettheva daḷhīkamme āṇattiyā ca attho veditabbo,
atk-s0302a:24_2: sundaratthepi vaṭṭati. Daḷhīkaraṇatthena hi “daḷhaṃ imaṃ dhammaṃ suṇātha, suggahitaṃ
atk-s0302a:24_3: gaṇhantā”, āṇattiatthena “mama āṇattiyā suṇātha” sundaratthena “sundaramimaṃ bhaddakaṃ
atk-s0302a:24_4: dhammaṃ suṇāthā”ti etaṃ dīpitaṃ hoti. Manasi karothāti āvajjetha. Samannāharathāti
atk-s0302a:24_5: attho. Avikkhittacittā hutvā nisāmetha, citte karothāti adhippāyo.
atk-s0302a:25_0: Idānettha taṃ suṇāthāti sotindriyavikkhepanivāraṇametaṃ. Sādhukaṃ manasi karothāti
atk-s0302a:25_2: pacchimaṃ atthavipallāsagāhanivāraṇaṃ. Purimena ca dhammassavane niyojeti, pacchimena
atk-s0302a:25_3: sutānaṃ dhammānaṃ dhāraṇūpaparikkhāsu. Purimena ca “sabyañjano ayaṃ dhammo, tasmā
atk-s0302a:25_4: savanīyo”ti dīpeti, pacchimena “sāttho, tasmā manasi kātabbo”ti. Sādhukapadaṃ vā
atk-s0302a:25_5: ubhayapadehi yojetvā, “yasmā ayaṃ dhammo dhammagambhīro ca desanāgambhīro ca, tasmā
atk-s0302a:25_6: suṇātha sādhukaṃ. Yasmā atthagambhīro ca paṭivedhagambhīro ca, tasmā sādhukaṃ manasi
atk-s0302a:25_7: karothā”ti evaṃ yojanā veditabbā. Bhāsissāmīti desessāmi. “Taṃ suṇāthā”ti ettha paṭiññātaṃ
atk-s0302a:25_8: desanaṃ saṃkhittatova na desessāmi, apica kho vitthāratopi naṃ bhāsissāmīti vuttaṃ
atk-s0302a:25_9: hoti. Saṅkhepavitthāravācakāni hi etāni padāni. Yathāha vaṅgīsatthero –
atk-s0302a:28: Evaṃ vutte ussāhajātā hutvā evaṃ, bhanteti kho te bhikkhū bhagavato paccassosuṃ satthu vacanaṃ sampaṭicchiṃsu, paṭiggahesunti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0302a:29_0: Atha nesaṃ bhagavā etadavoca – etaṃ idāni vattabbaṃ “katamo ca, bhikkhave, paṭiccasamuppādo”tiādiṃ
atk-s0302a:29_1: sakalaṃ suttaṃ avoca. Tattha katamo ca, bhikkhave, paṭiccasamuppādoti kathetukamyatāpucchā.
atk-s0302a:29_2: Pañcavidhā hi pucchā adiṭṭhajotanāpucchā diṭṭhasaṃsandanāpucchā vimaticchedanāpucchā
atk-s0302a:30_0: Katamā adiṭṭhajotanā pucchā ? Pakatiyā lakkhaṇaṃ aññātaṃ hoti adiṭṭhaṃ atulitaṃ atīritaṃ
atk-s0302a:30_1: avibhūtaṃ avibhāvitaṃ. Tassa ñāṇāya dassanāya tulanāya tīraṇāya vibhūtāya vibhāvanatthāya
atk-s0302a:31_0: Katamā diṭṭhasaṃsandanāpucchā? Pakatiyā lakkhaṇaṃ ñātaṃ hoti diṭṭhaṃ tulitaṃ tīritaṃ
atk-s0302a:31_1: vibhūtaṃ vibhāvitaṃ. So aññehi paṇḍitehi saddhiṃ saṃsandanatthāya pañhaṃ pucchati.
atk-s0302a:32_0: Katamā vimaticchedanāpucchā? Pakatiyā saṃsayapakkhando hoti vimatipakkhando dveḷhakajāto
atk-s0302a:32_1: – “evaṃ nu kho, na nu kho, kathaṃ nu kho”ti, so vimaticchedanatthāya pañhaṃ pucchati,
atk-s0302a:33_0: Katamā anumatipucchā? Bhagavā bhikkhūnaṃ anumatiyā pañhaṃ pucchati – “taṃ kiṃ maññatha,
atk-s0302a:33_1: bhikkhave, rūpaṃ niccaṃ vā aniccaṃ vā”ti, aniccaṃ, bhante. Yaṃ panāniccaṃ dukkhaṃ
atk-s0302a:33_2: vā taṃ sukhaṃ vāti, dukkhaṃ, bhante. Yaṃ panāniccaṃ dukkhaṃ vipariṇāmadhammaṃ, kallaṃ
atk-s0302a:33_3: nu taṃ samanupassituṃ – “etaṃ mama esohamasmi eso me attā”ti, no hetaṃ bhanteti. Ayaṃ anumatipucchā.
atk-s0302a:34: Katamā kathetukamyatāpucchā? Bhagavā bhikkhūnaṃ kathetukamyatāya pañhaṃ pucchati – “cattārome, bhikkhave, satipaṭṭhānā. Katame cattāro”ti? Ayaṃ kathetukamyatāpucchāti.
atk-s0302a:35_0: Tattha buddhānaṃ purimā tisso pucchā natthi. Kasmā? Buddhānañhi tīsu addhāsu kiñci
atk-s0302a:35_1: saṅkhataṃ addhāvimuttaṃ vā asaṅkhataṃ adiṭṭhaṃ ajotitaṃ atulitaṃ atīritaṃ avibhūtaṃ
atk-s0302a:35_2: avibhāvitaṃ nāma natthi. Tena nesaṃ adiṭṭhajotanāpucchā natthi. Yaṃ pana bhagavatā
atk-s0302a:35_3: attano ñāṇena paṭividdhaṃ, tassa aññena samaṇena vā brāhmaṇena vā devena vā mārena
atk-s0302a:35_4: vā brahmunā vā saddhiṃ saṃsandanakiccaṃ natthi. Tenassa diṭṭhasaṃsandanāpucchā natthi.
atk-s0302a:35_5: Yasmā panesa akathaṃkathī tiṇṇavicikiccho sabbadhammesu vihatasaṃsayo. Tenassa vimaticchedanāpucchā
atk-s0302a:35_6: natthi. Itarā pana dve pucchā bhagavato atthi. Tāsu ayaṃ kathetukamyatā pucchāti veditabbā.
atk-s0302a:36_0: Idāni tāva pucchāya puṭṭhaṃ paccayākāraṃ vibhajanto avijjāpaccayā, bhikkhave, saṅkhārātiādimāha.
atk-s0302a:36_1: Ettha ca yathā nāma “pitaraṃ kathessāmī”ti āraddho “tissassa pitā soṇassa pitā”ti
atk-s0302a:36_2: paṭhamataraṃ puttampi katheti, evameva bhagavā paccayaṃ kathetuṃ āraddho “avijjāpaccayā
atk-s0302a:36_3: saṅkhārā”tiādinā nayena saṅkhārādīnaṃ paccaye avijjādidhamme kathento paccayuppannampi
atk-s0302a:36_4: kathesi. Āhāravaggassa pana pariyosāne “paṭiccasamuppādañca vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi
atk-s0302a:36_5: paṭiccasamuppanne ca dhamme”ti ubhayaṃ ārabhitvā ubhayampi kathesi. Idāni avijjāpaccayā
atk-s0302a:36_6: saṅkhārātiādīsu pana avijjā ca sā paccayo cāti avijjāpaccayo. Tasmā avijjāpaccayā
atk-s0302a:36_7: saṅkhārā sambhavantīti iminā nayena attho veditabbo. Ayamettha saṅkhepo, vitthārena
atk-s0302a:36_8: pana sabbākārasampannā anulomapaṭiccasamuppādakathā visuddhimagge kathitā, tasmā
atk-s0302a:37_0: Paṭilomakathāyaṃ pana avijjāya tvevāti avijjāya tu eva. Asesavirāganirodhāti virāgasaṅkhātena
atk-s0302a:37_1: maggena asesanirodhā. Saṅkhāranirodhoti saṅkhārānaṃ anuppādanirodho hoti. Evaṃnirodhānaṃ
atk-s0302a:37_2: pana saṅkhārānaṃ nirodhā viññāṇādīnañca nirodhā nāmarūpādīni niruddhāniyeva hontīti
atk-s0302a:37_3: dassetuṃ saṅkhāranirodhā viññāṇanirodhotiādīni vatvā, evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa
atk-s0302a:37_4: nirodho hotīti āha. Tattha kevalassāti sakalassa, suddhassa vā, sattavirahitassāti
atk-s0302a:37_5: attho. Dukkhakkhandhassāti dukkharāsissa. Nirodho hotīti anuppādo hoti. Iti bhagavā
atk-s0302a:37_6: anulomato dvādasahi padehi vaṭṭakathaṃ kathetvā tameva vaṭṭaṃ vinivaṭṭetvā paṭilomato
atk-s0302a:37_7: dvādasahi padehi vivaṭṭaṃ kathento arahattena desanāya kūṭaṃ gaṇhi. Desanāpariyosāne
atk-s0302a:37_8: te pañcasatā āraddhavipassakā ugghaṭitaññūpuggalā sūriyarasmisamphuṭṭhāni paripākagatāni
atk-s0302a:37_9: padumāni viya saccāni bujjhitvā arahattaphale patiṭṭhahiṃsu.
atk-s0302a:38_0: Idamavoca bhagavāti idaṃ vaṭṭavivaṭṭavasena sakalasuttaṃ bhagavā avoca. Attamanā
atk-s0302a:38_1: te bhikkhūti tuṭṭhacittā te pañcasatā khīṇāsavā bhikkhū. Bhagavato bhāsitaṃ abhinandunti
atk-s0302a:38_3: bhāsato bhagavato vacanaṃ abhinandiṃsu, anumodiṃsu ceva sampaṭicchiṃsu cāti attho. Tenetaṃ vuccati –
atk-s0302a:43_0: 2. Dutiyepi vuttanayeneva suttanikkhepo veditabbo. Ayaṃ pana viseso – paṭhamaṃ ugghaṭitaññūpuggalānaṃ
atk-s0302a:43_1: vasena saṅkhepato dassitaṃ, idaṃ vipañcitaññūnaṃ vasena vitthāratoti. Imasmiñca pana
atk-s0302a:43_2: sutte catasso vallihārakapurisūpamā vattabbā, tā visuddhimagge vuttā eva. Yathā hi
atk-s0302a:43_3: vallihārako puriso valliyā aggaṃ disvā tadanusārena mūlaṃ pariyesanto taṃ disvā valliṃ
atk-s0302a:43_4: mūle chetvā ādāya kamme upaneyya, evaṃ bhagavā vitthāradesanaṃ desento paṭiccasamuppādassa
atk-s0302a:43_5: aggabhūtā jarāmaraṇā paṭṭhāya yāva mūlabhūtaṃ avijjāpadaṃ, tāva desanaṃ āharitvā
atk-s0302a:44_0: Tatrāyaṃ jarāmaraṇādīnaṃ vitthāradesanāya atthanicchayo – jarāmaraṇaniddese tāva
atk-s0302a:44_1: tesaṃ tesanti ayaṃ saṅkhepato anekesaṃ sattānaṃ sādhāraṇaniddesoti viññātabbo. Yā
atk-s0302a:44_2: devadattassa jarā, yā somadattassāti evañhi divasampi kathentassa neva sattā pariyādānaṃ
atk-s0302a:44_3: gacchanti. Imehi pana dvīhi padehi na koci satto apariyādinno hoti. Tasmā vuttaṃ,
atk-s0302a:44_4: “ayaṃ saṅkhepato anekesaṃ sattānaṃ sādhāraṇaniddeso”ti. Tamhi tamhīti ayaṃ gatijātivasena
atk-s0302a:44_5: anekesaṃ sattanikāyānaṃ sādhāraṇaniddeso. Sattanikāyeti sādhāraṇaniddesena niddiṭṭhassa
atk-s0302a:44_6: sarūpanidassanaṃ. Jarā jīraṇatātiādīsu pana jarāti sabhāvaniddeso. Jīraṇatāti ākāraniddeso.
atk-s0302a:44_7: Khaṇḍiccantiādayo tayo kālātikkame kiccaniddesā, pacchimā dve pakatiniddesā. Ayañhi
atk-s0302a:44_8: jarāti iminā padena sabhāvato dīpitā, tenassāyaṃ sabhāvaniddeso. Jīraṇatāti iminā
atk-s0302a:44_9: ākārato, tenassāyaṃ ākāraniddeso. Khaṇḍiccanti iminā kālātikkame dantanakhānaṃ khaṇḍitabhāvakaraṇakiccato.
atk-s0302a:44_10: Pāliccanti iminā kesalomānaṃ palitabhāvakaraṇakiccato. Valittacatāti iminā maṃsaṃ
atk-s0302a:44_11: milāpetvā tacavalibhāvakaraṇakiccato dīpitā. Tenassā ime khaṇḍiccantiādayo tayo kālātikkame
atk-s0302a:44_12: kiccaniddesā. Tehi imesaṃ vikārānaṃ dassanavasena pākaṭībhūtā pākaṭajarā dassitā.
atk-s0302a:44_13: Yatheva hi udakassa vā vātassa vā aggino vā tiṇarukkhādīnaṃ saṃbhaggapalibhaggatāya
atk-s0302a:44_14: vā jhāmatāya vā gatamaggo pākaṭo hoti, na ca so gatamaggo tāneva udakādīni, evameva
atk-s0302a:44_15: jarāya dantādīsu khaṇḍiccādivasena gatamaggo pākaṭo, cakkhuṃ ummīletvāpi gayhati
atk-s0302a:44_16: na ca khaṇḍiccādīneva jarā. Na hi jarā cakkhuviññeyyā hoti.
atk-s0302a:45_0: Āyuno saṃhāni indriyānaṃ paripākoti imehi pana padehi kālātikkameyeva abhibyattāya
atk-s0302a:45_2: pakatiniddesāti veditabbā. Tattha yasmā jaraṃ pattassa āyu hāyati, tasmā jarā “āyuno
atk-s0302a:45_3: saṃhānī”ti phalūpacārena vuttā. Yasmā ca daharakāle suppasannāni sukhumampi attano
atk-s0302a:45_4: visayaṃ sukheneva gaṇhanasamatthāni cakkhādīni indriyāni jaraṃ pattassa paripakkāni
atk-s0302a:45_5: āluḷitāni avisadāni, oḷārikampi attano visayaṃ gahetuṃ asamatthāni honti, tasmā “indriyānaṃ
atk-s0302a:46_0: Sā panāyaṃ evaṃ niddiṭṭhā sabbāpi jarā pākaṭā paṭicchannāti duvidhā hoti. Tattha
atk-s0302a:46_1: dantādīsu khaṇḍādibhāvadassanato rūpadhammesu jarā pākaṭajarā nāma, arūpadhammesu
atk-s0302a:46_2: pana jarā tādisassa vikārassa adassanato paṭicchannajarā nāma. Tattha yvāyaṃ khaṇḍādibhāvo
atk-s0302a:46_3: dissati, so tādisānaṃ dantādīnaṃ suviññeyyattā vaṇṇoyeva, taṃ cakkhunā disvā manodvārena
atk-s0302a:46_4: cintetvā “ime dantā jarāya pahaṭā”ti jaraṃ jānāti udakaṭṭhāne baddhāni gosīsādīni
atk-s0302a:46_5: oloketvā heṭṭhā udakassa atthibhāvaṃ jānanaṃ viya. Puna avīci savīcīti evampi duvidhā
atk-s0302a:46_6: hoti. Tattha maṇi-kanaka-rajata-pavāḷacandasūriyādīnaṃ viya mandadasakādīsu pāṇīnaṃ
atk-s0302a:46_7: viya ca pupphaphalapallavādīsu ca apāṇīnaṃ viya antarantarā vaṇṇavisesādīnaṃ duviññeyyattā
atk-s0302a:46_8: jarā avīcijarā nāma, nirantarajarāti attho. Tato aññesu pana yathāvuttesu antarantarā
atk-s0302a:46_9: vaṇṇavisesādīnaṃ suviññeyyattā jarā savīcijarā nāmāti veditabbā.
atk-s0302a:47_0: Ito paraṃ tesaṃ tesantiādi vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ. Cuti cavanatātiādīsu pana cutīti
atk-s0302a:47_3: ghaṭasseva bhinnassa bhinnānaṃ cutikkhandhānaṃ yena kenaci pariyāyena ṭhānābhāvaparidīpanaṃ.
atk-s0302a:47_4: Maccu maraṇanti maccusaṅkhātaṃ maraṇaṃ, tena samucchedamaraṇādīni nisedheti. Kālo
atk-s0302a:47_5: nāma antako, tassa kiriyā kālakiriyā. Evaṃ tena lokasammutiyā maraṇaṃ dīpeti.
atk-s0302a:48_0: Idāni paramatthena dīpetuṃ khandhānaṃ bhedotiādimāha. Paramatthena hi khandhāyeva
atk-s0302a:48_1: bhijjanti, na satto nāma koci marati. Khandhesu pana bhijjamānesu satto marati, bhinnesu
atk-s0302a:48_2: matoti vohāro hoti. Ettha ca catupañcavokāravasena khandhānaṃ bhedo, ekavokāravasena
atk-s0302a:48_3: kaḷevarassa nikkhepo. Catuvokāravasena ca khandhānaṃ bhedo, sesadvayavasena kaḷevarassa
atk-s0302a:48_4: nikkhepo veditabbo. Kasmā? Bhavadvayepi rūpakāyasaṅkhātassa kaḷevarassa sabbhāvato.
atk-s0302a:48_5: Atha vā yasmā cātumahārājikādīsu khandhā bhijjanteva, na kiñci nikkhipati, tasmā
atk-s0302a:48_6: tesaṃ vasena khandhānaṃ bhedo, manussādīsu kaḷevarassa nikkhepo. Ettha ca kaḷevarassa
atk-s0302a:48_7: nikkhepakāraṇato maraṇaṃ “kaḷevarassa nikkhepo”ti vuttanti evamattho daṭṭhabbo. Iti
atk-s0302a:48_8: ayañca jarā idañca maraṇaṃ, idaṃ vuccati, bhikkhaveti idaṃ ubhayampi ekato katvā
atk-s0302a:49_0: Jātiniddese jāti sañjātītiādīsu jāyanaṭṭhena jāti, sā aparipuṇṇāyatanavasena yuttā.
atk-s0302a:49_1: Sañjāyanaṭṭhena sañjāti, sā paripuṇṇāyatanavasena yuttā. Okkamanaṭṭhena okkanti,
atk-s0302a:49_2: sā aṇḍajajalābujavasena yuttā. Te hi aṇḍakosañca vatthikosañca okkamantā pavisantā
atk-s0302a:49_3: viya paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhanti. Abhinibbattanaṭṭhena abhinibbatti, sā saṃsedajaopapātikavasena
atk-s0302a:49_4: yuttā. Te hi pākaṭāyeva hutvā nibbattanti. Ayaṃ tāva vohāradesanā.
atk-s0302a:50_0: Idāni paramatthadesanā hoti. Khandhāyeva hi paramatthato pātubhavanti, na satto.
atk-s0302a:50_1: Tattha ca khandhānanti ekavokārabhave ekassa, catuvokārabhave catunnaṃ, pañcavokārabhave
atk-s0302a:50_2: pañcannampi gahaṇaṃ veditabbaṃ. Pātubhāvoti uppatti. Āyatanānanti ettha tatra tatra
atk-s0302a:50_3: uppajjamānāyatanavasena saṅgaho veditabbo. Paṭilābhoti santatiyaṃ pātubhāvoyeva.
atk-s0302a:50_4: Pātubhavantāneva hi tāni paṭiladdhāni nāma honti. Ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, jātīti
atk-s0302a:50_5: iminā padena vohārato paramatthato ca desitāya jātiyā nigamanaṃ karotīti.
atk-s0302a:51_0: Bhavaniddese kāmabhavoti kammabhavo ca upapattibhavo ca. Tattha kammabhavo nāma kāmabhavūpagakammameva.
atk-s0302a:51_1: Tañhi tattha upapattibhavassa kāraṇattā “sukho buddhānaṃ uppādo dukkho pāpassa uccayo”tiādīni
atk-s0302a:51_2: viya phalavohārena bhavoti vuttaṃ. Upapattibhavo nāma tena kammena nibbattaṃ upādiṇṇakkhandhapañcakaṃ.
atk-s0302a:51_3: Tañhi tattha bhavatīti katvā bhavoti vuttaṃ. Sabbathāpi idaṃ kammañca upapattiñca
atk-s0302a:52_0: Upādānaniddese kāmupādānantiādīsu vatthukāmaṃ upādiyanti etena, sayaṃ vā taṃ upādiyatīti
atk-s0302a:52_1: kāmupādānaṃ, kāmo ca so upādānañcāti kāmupādānaṃ. Upādānanti daḷhaggahaṇaṃ vuccati.
atk-s0302a:52_2: Daḷhattho hi ettha upasaddo upāyāsaupakaṭṭhādīsu viya. Pañcakāmaguṇikarāgassetaṃ
atk-s0302a:52_3: adhivacanaṃ. Ayamettha saṅkhepo. Vitthārato panetaṃ, “tattha katamaṃ kāmupādānaṃ?
atk-s0302a:53_0: Tathā diṭṭhi ca sā upādānañcāti diṭṭhupādānaṃ. Atha vā diṭṭhiṃ upādiyati, upādiyanti
atk-s0302a:53_1: vā etena diṭṭhinti diṭṭhupādānaṃ. Upādiyati hi purimadiṭṭhiṃ uttaradiṭṭhi, upādiyanti
atk-s0302a:53_2: ca tāya diṭṭhiṃ. Yathāha – “sassato attā ca loko ca idameva saccaṃ moghamañña”ntiādi.
atk-s0302a:53_4: saṅkhepo, vitthārato panetaṃ, “tattha katamaṃ diṭṭhupādānaṃ? Natthi dinna”nti vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0302a:54_0: Tathā sīlabbatamupādiyanti etena, sayaṃ vā taṃ upādiyati, sīlabbatañca taṃ upādānañcāti
atk-s0302a:54_1: vā sīlabbatupādānaṃ. Gosīlagovatādīni hi “evaṃ suddhī”ti abhinivesato sayameva upādānānīti.
atk-s0302a:54_2: Ayamettha saṅkhepo, vitthārato panetaṃ, “tattha katamaṃ sīlabbatupādānaṃ? Ito bahiddhā
atk-s0302a:55_0: Idāni vadanti etenāti vādo, upādiyanti etenāti upādānaṃ, kiṃ vadanti upādiyanti vā?
atk-s0302a:55_1: Attānaṃ. Attano vādupādānaṃ attavādupādānaṃ. Attavādamattameva vā attāti upādiyanti
atk-s0302a:55_2: etenāti attavādupādānaṃ. Vīsativatthukāya sakkāyadiṭṭhiyā etaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Ayamettha
atk-s0302a:55_3: saṅkhepo, vitthārato panetaṃ, “tattha katamaṃ attavādupādānaṃ? Idha assutavā puthujjano
atk-s0302a:56_0: Taṇhāniddese rūpataṇhā…pe… dhammataṇhāti etaṃ cakkhudvārādīsu javanavīthiyā pavattāya
atk-s0302a:56_1: taṇhāya “seṭṭhiputto brāhmaṇaputto”ti evamādīsu pitito nāmaṃ viya pitisadisārammaṇato
atk-s0302a:56_2: nāmaṃ. Ettha ca rūpārammaṇā taṇhā, rūpe taṇhāti rūpataṇhā. Sā kāmarāgabhāvena rūpaṃ
atk-s0302a:56_3: assādentī pavattamānā kāmataṇhā, sassatadiṭṭhisahagatarāgabhāvena “rūpaṃ niccaṃ dhuvaṃ
atk-s0302a:56_4: sassata”nti evaṃ assādentī pavattamānā bhavataṇhā, ucchedadiṭṭhisahagatarāgabhāvena
atk-s0302a:56_5: “rūpaṃ ucchijjati vinassati pecca na bhavatī”ti evaṃ assādentī pavattamānā vibhavataṇhāti
atk-s0302a:56_6: rūpataṇhā evaṃ tividhā hoti. Yathā ca rūpataṇhā, tathā saddataṇhādayopīti evaṃ tāni
atk-s0302a:56_7: aṭṭhārasa taṇhāvicaritāni honti. Tāni ajjhattarūpādīsu aṭṭhārasa, bahiddhārūpādīsu
atk-s0302a:56_8: aṭṭhārasāti chattiṃsa. Iti atītāni chattiṃsa, anāgatāni chattiṃsa, paccuppannāni
atk-s0302a:56_9: chattiṃsāti evaṃ aṭṭhasataṃ taṇhāvicaritāni honti. “Ajjhattikassa upādāya asmīti
atk-s0302a:56_10: hoti, itthasmīti hotī”ti vā evamādīni ajjhattikarūpādinissitāni aṭṭhārasa, “bāhirassa
atk-s0302a:56_11: upādāya iminā asmīti hoti, iminā itthasmīti hotī”ti vā evamādīni bāhirarūpādinissitāni
atk-s0302a:56_12: aṭṭhārasāti chattiṃsa, iti atītāni chattiṃsa, anāgatāni chattiṃsa, paccuppannāni
atk-s0302a:56_13: chattiṃsāti evampi aṭṭhasataṃ taṇhāvicaritāni honti. Puna saṅgahe kariyamāne rūpādīsu
atk-s0302a:56_14: ārammaṇesu chaḷeva taṇhākāyā tissoyeva kāmataṇhādayo hontīti. Evaṃ –
atk-s0302a:59_0: Vedanāniddese vedanākāyāti vedanāsamūhā. Cakkhusamphassajā vedanā…pe… manosamphassajāvedanāti
atk-s0302a:59_1: etaṃ “cakkhusamphassajāvedanā atthi kusalā, atthi akusalā, atthi abyākatā”ti evaṃ
atk-s0302a:59_3: mantāṇiputto”ti evamādīsu mātito nāmaṃ viya mātisadisato vatthuto nāmaṃ. Vacanattho
atk-s0302a:59_4: panettha – cakkhusamphassahetu jātā vedanā cakkhusamphassajā vedanāti. Eseva nayo
atk-s0302a:59_5: sabbattha. Ayaṃ tāvettha sabbasaṅgāhikā kathā. Vipākavasena pana cakkhudvāre dve
atk-s0302a:59_6: cakkhuviññāṇāni, dve manodhātuyo, tisso manoviññāṇadhātuyoti etāhi sampayuttavasena
atk-s0302a:59_7: vedanā veditabbā. Eseva nayo sotadvārādīsu. Manodvāre manoviññāṇadhātusampayuttāva.
atk-s0302a:60_0: Phassaniddese cakkhusamphassoti cakkhumhi samphasso. Esa nayo sabbattha. Cakkhusamphasso…pe…
atk-s0302a:60_1: kāyasamphassoti ettāvatā ca kusalākusalavipākā pañcavatthukā dasa phassā vuttā honti.
atk-s0302a:61: Saḷāyatananiddese cakkhāyatanantiādīsu yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ visuddhimagge khandhaniddese ceva āyatananiddese ca vuttameva.
atk-s0302a:62_0: Nāmarūpaniddese namanalakkhaṇaṃ nāmaṃ. Ruppanalakkhaṇaṃ rūpaṃ. Vibhajane panassa
atk-s0302a:62_1: vedanāti vedanākkhandho, saññāti saññākkhandho, cetanā phasso manasikāroti saṅkhārakkhandho
atk-s0302a:62_2: veditabbo. Kāmañca aññepi saṅkhārakkhandhasaṅgahitā dhammā santi, ime pana tayo sabbadubbalesupi
atk-s0302a:62_3: cittesu santi, tasmā etesaṃyeva vasenettha saṅkhārakkhandho dassito. Cattāro ca mahābhūtāti
atk-s0302a:62_4: ettha cattāroti gaṇanaparicchedo. Mahābhūtāti pathavīāpatejavāyānametaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
atk-s0302a:62_5: Yena pana kāraṇena tāni mahābhūtānīti vuccanti, yo cettha añño vinicchayanayo, so
atk-s0302a:62_6: sabbo visuddhimagge rūpakkhandhaniddese vutto. Catunnañca mahābhūtānaṃ upādāyāti
atk-s0302a:62_7: ettha pana catunnanti upayogatthe sāmivacanaṃ, cattāri mahābhūtānīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0302a:62_8: Upādāyāti upādiyitvā, gahetvāti attho. Nissāyātipi eke. “Vattamāna”nti ayañcettha
atk-s0302a:62_9: pāṭhaseso. Samūhatthe vā etaṃ sāmivacanaṃ, catunnaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ samūhaṃ upādāya
atk-s0302a:62_10: vattamānaṃ rūpanti ettha attho veditabbo. Evaṃ sabbathāpi yāni ca cattāri pathavīādīni
atk-s0302a:62_11: mahābhūtāni, yañca catunnaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ upādāya vattamānaṃ cakkhāyatanādibhedena
atk-s0302a:62_12: abhidhammapāḷiyameva vuttaṃ tevīsatividhaṃ rūpaṃ, taṃ sabbampi rūpanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0302a:63_0: Viññāṇaniddese cakkhuviññāṇanti cakkhumhi viññāṇaṃ, cakkhuto vā jātaṃ viññāṇanti
atk-s0302a:63_1: cakkhuviññāṇaṃ. Evaṃ sotaghānajivhākāyaviññāṇāni. Itaraṃ pana manoyeva viññāṇanti
atk-s0302a:64_0: Saṅkhāraniddese abhisaṅkharaṇalakkhaṇo saṅkhāro. Vibhajane panassa kāyasaṅkhāroti
atk-s0302a:64_1: kāyato pavattasaṅkhāro. Kāyadvāre copanavasena pavattānaṃ kāmāvacarakusalato aṭṭhannaṃ,
atk-s0302a:64_2: akusalato dvādasannanti vīsatiyā kāyasañcetanānametaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Vacīsaṅkhāroti
atk-s0302a:64_3: vacanato pavattasaṅkhāro, vacīdvāre vacanabhedavasena pavattānaṃ vīsatiyā eva vacīsañcetanānametaṃ
atk-s0302a:64_4: adhivacanaṃ. Cittasaṅkhāroti cittato pavattasaṅkhāro, kāyavacīdvāre copanaṃ akatvā
atk-s0302a:64_5: raho nisīditvā cintentassa pavattānaṃ lokiyakusalākusalavasena ekūnatiṃsamanosañcetanānametaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
atk-s0302a:65_0: Avijjāniddese dukkhe aññāṇanti dukkhasacce aññāṇaṃ, mohassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Esa nayo
atk-s0302a:65_1: dukkhasamudaye aññāṇantiādīsu. Tattha catūhi kāraṇehi dukkhe aññāṇaṃ veditabbaṃ antogadhato
atk-s0302a:65_2: vatthuto ārammaṇato paṭicchādanato ca. Tathā hi taṃ dukkhasaccapariyāpannattā dukkhe
atk-s0302a:65_4: ārammaṇaṃ, dukkhasaccaṃ etaṃ paṭicchādeti tassa yāthāvalakkhaṇapaṭivedhanivāraṇena
atk-s0302a:66_0: Dukkhasamudaye aññāṇaṃ tīhi kāraṇehi veditabbaṃ vatthuto ārammaṇato paṭicchādanato
atk-s0302a:66_1: ca. Nirodhe paṭipadāya ca aññāṇaṃ ekeneva kāraṇena veditabbaṃ paṭicchādanato. Nirodhapaṭipadānañhi
atk-s0302a:66_2: paṭicchādakameva aññāṇaṃ tesaṃ yāthāvalakkhaṇapaṭivedhanivāraṇena tesu ca ñāṇappavattiyā
atk-s0302a:66_3: appadānena. Na pana taṃ tattha antogadhaṃ tasmiṃ saccadvaye apariyāpannattā, na tassa
atk-s0302a:66_4: taṃ saccadvayaṃ vatthu asahajātattā, nārammaṇaṃ, tadārabbha appavattanato. Pacchimañhi
atk-s0302a:66_5: saccadvayaṃ gambhīrattā duddasaṃ, na tattha andhabhūtaṃ aññāṇaṃ pavattati. Purimaṃ
atk-s0302a:66_6: pana vacanīyattena sabhāvalakkhaṇassa duddasattā gambhīraṃ, tattha vipallāsagāhavasena pavattati.
atk-s0302a:67_0: Apica “dukkhe”ti ettāvatā saṅgahato vatthuto ārammaṇato kiccato ca avijjā dīpitā.
atk-s0302a:67_1: “Dukkhasamudaye”ti ettāvatā vatthuto ārammaṇato kiccato ca. “Dukkhanirodhe dukkhanirodhagāminiyā
atk-s0302a:67_2: paṭipadāyā”ti ettāvatā kiccato. Avisesato pana “aññāṇa”nti etena sabhāvato niddiṭṭhāti ñātabbā.
atk-s0302a:68_0: Iti kho, bhikkhaveti evaṃ kho, bhikkhave. Nirodho hotīti anuppādo hoti. Apicettha
atk-s0302a:68_1: sabbeheva tehi nirodhapadehi nibbānaṃ desitaṃ. Nibbānañhi āgamma te te dhammā nirujjhanti,
atk-s0302a:68_2: tasmā taṃ tesaṃ tesaṃ nirodhoti vuccati. Iti bhagavā imasmiṃ sutte dvādasahi padehi
atk-s0302a:68_3: vaṭṭavivaṭṭaṃ desento arahattanikūṭeneva desanaṃ niṭṭhapesi. Desanāpariyosāne vuttanayeneva
atk-s0302a:71_0: 3. Tatiye micchāpaṭipadanti ayaṃ tāva aniyyānikapaṭipadā. Nanu ca avijjāpaccayā puññābhisaṅkhāropi
atk-s0302a:71_1: atthi āneñjābhisaṅkhāropi, so kathaṃ micchāpaṭipadā hotīti. Vaṭṭasīsattā. Yañhi kiñci
atk-s0302a:71_2: bhavattayasaṅkhātaṃ vaṭṭaṃ patthetvā pavattitaṃ, antamaso pañcābhiññā aṭṭha vā pana
atk-s0302a:71_3: samāpattiyo, sabbaṃ taṃ vaṭṭapakkhiyaṃ vaṭṭasīsanti vaṭṭasīsattā micchāpaṭipadāva
atk-s0302a:71_4: hoti. Yaṃ pana kiñci vivaṭṭaṃ nibbānaṃ patthetvā pavattitaṃ, antamaso uḷuṅkayāgumattadānampi
atk-s0302a:71_5: paṇṇamuṭṭhidānamattampi, sabbaṃ taṃ vivaṭṭapakkhiyaṃ vivaṭṭanissitaṃ, vivaṭṭapakkhikattā
atk-s0302a:71_6: sammāpaṭipadāva hoti. Appamattakampi hi paṇṇamuṭṭhimattadānakusalaṃ vā hotu mahantaṃ
atk-s0302a:71_7: velāmadānādikusalaṃ vā, sace vaṭṭasampattiṃ patthetvā vaṭṭanissitavasena micchā ṭhapitaṃ
atk-s0302a:71_8: hoti, vaṭṭameva āharituṃ sakkoti, no vivaṭṭaṃ. “Idaṃ me dānaṃ āsavakkhayāvahaṃ hotū”ti
atk-s0302a:71_9: evaṃ pana vivaṭṭaṃ patthentena vivaṭṭavasena sammā ṭhapitaṃ arahattampi paccekabodhiñāṇampi
atk-s0302a:71_10: sabbaññutaññāṇampi dātuṃ sakkotiyeva, na arahattaṃ appatvā pariyosānaṃ gacchati.
atk-s0302a:71_11: Iti anulomavasena micchāpaṭipadā, paṭilomavasena sammāpaṭipadā desitāti veditabbā.
atk-s0302a:71_12: Nanu cettha paṭipadā pucchitā, nibbānaṃ bhājitaṃ, niyyātanepi paṭipadāva niyyātitā.
atk-s0302a:71_13: Na ca nibbānassa paṭipadāti nāmaṃ, savipassanānaṃ pana catunnaṃ maggānametaṃ nāmaṃ,
atk-s0302a:71_14: tasmā pucchāniyyātanehi padabhājanaṃ na sametīti. No na sameti, kasmā? Phalena paṭipadāya
atk-s0302a:71_15: dassitattā. Phalena hettha paṭipadā dassitā. “Avijjāya tveva asesavirāganirodhā saṅkhāranirodho”ti
atk-s0302a:71_16: etaṃ nirodhasaṅkhātaṃ nibbānaṃ yassā paṭipadāya phalaṃ, ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave,
atk-s0302a:71_17: sammāpaṭipadāti ayamettha attho. Imasmiñca atthe asesavirāganirodhāti ettha virāgo
atk-s0302a:71_18: nirodhasseva vevacanaṃ, asesavirāgā asesanirodhāti ayañhettha adhippāyo. Yena vā
atk-s0302a:71_19: virāgasaṅkhātena maggena asesanirodho hoti, taṃ dassetuṃ etaṃ padabhājanaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0302a:71_20: Evañhi sati sānubhāvā paṭipadā vibhattā hoti. Iti imasmimpi sutte vaṭṭavivaṭṭameva
atk-s0302a:73_0: 4. Catutthe vipassissāti tassa kira bodhisattassa yathā lokiyamanussānaṃ kiñcideva
atk-s0302a:73_1: passantānaṃ parittakammābhinibbattassa kammajapasādassa dubbalattā akkhīni vipphandanti,
atk-s0302a:73_2: na evaṃ vipphandiṃsu. Balavakammanibbattassa pana kammajapasādassa balavattā avipphandantehi
atk-s0302a:73_3: animisehi eva akkhīhi passi seyyathāpi devā tāvatiṃsā. Tena vuttaṃ – “animisanto
atk-s0302a:73_4: kumāro pekkhatīti kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa kumārassa ‘vipassī vipassī’tveva samaññā
atk-s0302a:73_5: udapādī”ti. Ayañhettha adhippāyo – antarantarā nimisajanitandhakāravirahena visuddhaṃ
atk-s0302a:73_6: passati, vivaṭehi vā akkhīhi passatīti vipassī. Ettha ca kiñcāpi pacchimabhavikānaṃ
atk-s0302a:73_7: sabbabodhisattānaṃ balavakammanibbattassa kammajapasādassa balavattā akkhīni na vipphandanti,
atk-s0302a:73_8: so pana bodhisatto eteneva nāmaṃ labhi.
atk-s0302a:74_0: Apica viceyya viceyya passatīti vipassī, vicinitvā vicinitvā passatīti attho. Ekadivasaṃ
atk-s0302a:74_1: kira vinicchayaṭṭhāne nisīditvā atthe anusāsantassa rañño alaṅkatapaṭiyattaṃ mahāpurisaṃ
atk-s0302a:74_2: āharitvā aṅke ṭhapayiṃsu. Tassa taṃ aṅke katvā palāḷayamānasseva amaccā sāmikaṃ assāmikaṃ
atk-s0302a:74_3: akaṃsu. Bodhisatto anattamanasaddaṃ nicchāresi. Rājā “kimetaṃ upadhārethā”ti āha.
atk-s0302a:74_4: Upadhārayamānā aññaṃ adisvā “aṭṭassa dubbinicchitattā evaṃ kataṃ bhavissatī”ti puna
atk-s0302a:74_5: sāmikameva sāmikaṃ katvā “ñatvā nu kho kumāro evaṃ karotī”ti? Vīmaṃsantā puna sāmikaṃ
atk-s0302a:74_6: assāmikamakaṃsu. Puna bodhisatto tatheva saddaṃ nicchāresi. Atha rājā “jānāti mahāpuriso”ti
atk-s0302a:74_7: tato paṭṭhāya appamatto ahosi. Tena vuttaṃ “viceyya viceyya kumāro atthe panāyati
atk-s0302a:74_8: ñāyenāti kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa kumārassa bhiyyosomattāya ‘vipassī vipassī’tveva samaññā udapādī”ti.
atk-s0302a:75_0: Bhagavatoti bhāgyasampannassa. Arahatoti rāgādiarīnaṃ hatattā, saṃsāracakkassa vā
atk-s0302a:75_1: arānaṃ hatattā, paccayānaṃ vā arahattā arahāti evaṃ guṇato uppannanāmadheyyassa.
atk-s0302a:75_2: Sammāsambuddhassāti sammā nayena hetunā sāmaṃ paccattapurisakārena cattāri saccāni
atk-s0302a:75_3: buddhassa. Pubbeva sambodhāti sambodho vuccati catūsu maggesu ñāṇaṃ, tato pubbeva.
atk-s0302a:75_4: Bodhisattasseva satoti ettha bodhīti ñāṇaṃ, bodhimā satto bodhisatto, ñāṇavā paññavā
atk-s0302a:75_5: paṇḍitoti attho. Purimabuddhānañhi pādamūle abhinīhārato paṭṭhāya paṇḍitova so satto,
atk-s0302a:75_6: na andhabāloti bodhisatto. Yathā vā udakato uggantvā ṭhitaṃ paripākagataṃ padumaṃ
atk-s0302a:75_7: sūriyarasmisamphassena avassaṃ bujjhissatīti bujjhanakapadumanti vuccati, evaṃ buddhānaṃ
atk-s0302a:75_8: santike byākaraṇassa laddhattā avassaṃ anantarāyena pāramiyo pūretvā bujjhissatīti
atk-s0302a:75_9: bujjhanakasattotipi bodhisatto. Yā ca esā catumaggañāṇasaṅkhātā bodhi, taṃ patthayamāno
atk-s0302a:75_10: pavattatīti bodhiyaṃ satto āsattotipi bodhisatto. Evaṃ guṇato uppannanāmavasena bodhisattasseva
atk-s0302a:75_11: sato. Kicchanti dukkhaṃ. Āpannoti anuppatto. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – aho ayaṃ sattaloko
atk-s0302a:75_12: dukkhaṃ anuppattoti. Cavati ca upapajjati cāti idaṃ aparāparaṃ cutipaṭisandhivasena
atk-s0302a:75_13: vuttaṃ. Nissaraṇanti nibbānaṃ. Tañhi jarāmaraṇadukkhato nissaṭattā tassa nissaraṇanti
atk-s0302a:75_14: vuccati. Kudāssu nāmāti katarasmiṃ nu kho kāle.
atk-s0302a:76_0: Yoniso manasikārāti upāyamanasikārena pathamanasikārena. Ahu paññāya abhisamayoti
atk-s0302a:76_1: paññāya saddhiṃ jarāmaraṇakāraṇassa abhisamayo samavāyo samāyogo ahosi, “jātipaccayā
atk-s0302a:76_2: jarāmaraṇa”nti idaṃ tena diṭṭhanti attho. Atha vā yoniso manasikārā ahu paññāyāti
atk-s0302a:76_3: yoniso manasikārena ca paññāya ca abhisamayo ahu. “Jātiyā kho sati jarāmaraṇa”nti,
atk-s0302a:76_4: evaṃ jarāmaraṇakāraṇassa paṭivedho ahosīti attho. Esa nayo sabbattha.
atk-s0302a:77_0: Iti hidanti evamidaṃ. Samudayo samudayoti ekādasasu ṭhānesu saṅkhārādīnaṃ samudayaṃ
atk-s0302a:77_1: sampiṇḍetvā niddisati. Pubbe ananussutesūti “avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārānaṃ samudayo hotī”ti.
atk-s0302a:77_2: Evaṃ ito pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu, catūsu vā ariyasaccadhammesu. Cakkhuntiādīni
atk-s0302a:77_3: ñāṇavevacanāneva. Ñāṇameva hettha dassanaṭṭhena cakkhu, ñātaṭṭhena ñāṇaṃ, pajānanaṭṭhena
atk-s0302a:77_4: paññā, paṭivedhanaṭṭhena vijjā, obhāsanaṭṭhena ālokoti vuttaṃ. Taṃ panetaṃ catūsu
atk-s0302a:77_5: saccesu lokiyalokuttaramissakaṃ niddiṭṭhanti veditabbaṃ. Nirodhavārepi imināva nayena
atk-s0302a:79_0: 5-10. Pañcamādīsu sikhissa, bhikkhavetiādīnaṃ padānaṃ “sikhissapi, bhikkhave”ti na
atk-s0302a:79_1: evaṃ yojetvā attho veditabbo. Kasmā? Ekāsane adesitattā. Nānāṭhānesu hi etāni desitāni,
atk-s0302a:79_2: attho pana sabbattha sadisoyeva. Sabbabodhisattānañhi bodhipallaṅke nisinnānaṃ na
atk-s0302a:79_3: añño samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā devo vā māro vā brahmā vā ācikkhati – “atīte bodhisattā
atk-s0302a:79_4: paccayākāraṃ sammasitvā buddhā jātā”ti. Yathā pana paṭhamakappikakāle deve vuṭṭhe
atk-s0302a:79_5: udakassa gatamaggeneva aparāparaṃ vuṭṭhiudakaṃ gacchati, evaṃ tehi tehi purimabuddhehi
atk-s0302a:79_6: gatamaggeneva pacchimā pacchimā gacchanti. Sabbabodhisattā hi ānāpānacatutthajjhānato
atk-s0302a:79_7: vuṭṭhāya paccayākāre ñāṇaṃ otāretvā taṃ anulomapaṭilomaṃ sammasitvā buddhā hontīti
atk-s0302a:79_8: paṭipāṭiyā sattasu suttesu buddhavipassanā nāma kathitāti.
atk-s0302a:83_0: 11. Āhāravaggassa paṭhame āhārāti paccayā. Paccayā hi āharanti attano phalaṃ, tasmā
atk-s0302a:83_1: āhārāti vuccanti. Bhūtānaṃ vā sattānantiādīsu bhūtāti jātā nibbattā. Sambhavesinoti
atk-s0302a:83_2: ye sambhavaṃ jātiṃ nibbattiṃ esanti gavesanti. Tattha catūsu yonīsu aṇḍajajalābujā
atk-s0302a:83_3: sattā yāva aṇḍakosaṃ vatthikosañca na bhindanti, tāva sambhavesino nāma, aṇḍakosaṃ
atk-s0302a:83_4: vatthikosañca bhinditvā bahi nikkhantā bhūtā nāma. Saṃsedajā opapātikā ca paṭhamacittakkhaṇe
atk-s0302a:83_5: sambhavesino nāma, dutiyacittakkhaṇato pabhuti bhūtā nāma. Yena vā iriyāpathena jāyanti,
atk-s0302a:83_6: yāva tato aññaṃ na pāpuṇanti, tāva sambhavesino nāma, tato paraṃ bhūtā nāma. Atha
atk-s0302a:83_7: vā bhūtāti jātā abhinibbattā, ye bhūtā abhinibbattāyeva, na puna bhavissantīti saṅkhaṃ
atk-s0302a:83_8: gacchanti, tesaṃ khīṇāsavānaṃ etaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Sambhavamesantīti sambhavesino. Appahīnabhavasaṃyojanattā
atk-s0302a:83_9: āyatimpi sambhavaṃ esantānaṃ sekkhaputhujjanānametaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Evaṃ sabbathāpi
atk-s0302a:83_10: imehi dvīhi padehi sabbasatte pariyādiyati. Vāsaddo cettha sampiṇḍanattho, tasmā
atk-s0302a:84_0: Ṭhitiyāti ṭhitatthaṃ. Anuggahāyāti anuggahatthaṃ. Vacanabhedoyeva cesa, attho pana
atk-s0302a:84_1: dvinnampi padānaṃ ekoyeva. Atha vā ṭhitiyāti tassa tassa sattassa uppannadhammānaṃ
atk-s0302a:84_2: anuppabandhavasena avicchedāya. Anuggahāyāti anuppannānaṃ uppādāya. Ubhopi cetāni
atk-s0302a:84_3: “bhūtānaṃ vā ṭhitiyā ceva anuggahāya ca, sambhavesīnaṃ vā ṭhitiyā ceva anuggahāya
atk-s0302a:85_0: Kabaḷīkāro āhāroti kabaḷaṃ katvā ajjhoharitabbako āhāro, odanakummāsādivatthukāya
atk-s0302a:85_1: ojāyetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Oḷāriko vā sukhumo vāti vatthuoḷārikatāya oḷāriko, sukhumatāya
atk-s0302a:85_2: sukhumo. Sabhāvena pana sukhumarūpapariyāpannattā kabaḷīkāro āhāro sukhumova hoti.
atk-s0302a:85_3: Sāpi cassa vatthuto oḷārikatā sukhumatā ca upādāyupādāya veditabbā. Kumbhīlānañhi
atk-s0302a:85_4: āhāraṃ upādāya morānaṃ āhāro sukhumo. Kumbhīlā kira pāsāṇe gilanti, te ca nesaṃ kucchippattā
atk-s0302a:85_5: vilīyanti. Morā sappavicchikādipāṇe khādanti. Morānaṃ pana āhāraṃ upādāya taracchānaṃ
atk-s0302a:85_6: āhāro sukhumo. Te kira tivassachaḍḍitāni visāṇāni ceva aṭṭhīni ca khādanti, tāni
atk-s0302a:85_7: ca nesaṃ kheḷena temitamattāneva kandamūlaṃ viya mudukāni honti. Taracchānaṃ āhāraṃ
atk-s0302a:85_8: upādāya hatthīnaṃ āhāro sukhumo. Te hi nānārukkhasākhādayo khādanti. Hatthīnaṃ āhārato
atk-s0302a:85_9: gavayagokaṇṇamigādīnaṃ āhāro sukhumo. Te kira nissārāni nānārukkhapaṇṇādīni khādanti.
atk-s0302a:85_10: Tesampi āhārato gunnaṃ āhāro sukhumo. Te allasukkhatiṇāni khādanti. Tesaṃ āhārato
atk-s0302a:85_11: sasānaṃ āhāro sukhumo. Sasānaṃ āhārato sakuṇānaṃ āhāro sukhumo. Sakuṇānaṃ āhārato
atk-s0302a:85_12: paccantavāsīnaṃ āhāro sukhumo. Paccantavāsīnaṃ āhārato gāmabhojakānaṃ āhāro sukhumo.
atk-s0302a:85_13: Gāmabhojakānaṃ āhārato rājarājamahāmattānaṃ āhāro sukhumo. Tesampi āhārato cakkavattino
atk-s0302a:85_14: āhāro sukhumo. Cakkavattino āhārato bhummānaṃ devānaṃ āhāro sukhumo. Bhummānaṃ devānaṃ
atk-s0302a:85_15: āhārato cātumahārājikānaṃ. Evaṃ yāva paranimmitavasavattīnaṃ āhārā vitthāretabbā.
atk-s0302a:86_0: Ettha ca oḷārike vatthusmiṃ ojā parittā hoti dubbalā, sukhume balavatī. Tathā hi
atk-s0302a:86_1: ekapattapūrampi yāguṃ pīto muhutteneva jighacchito hoti yaṃkiñcideva khāditukāmo,
atk-s0302a:86_2: sappiṃ pana pasatamattaṃ pivitvā divasaṃ abhottukāmo hoti. Tattha vatthu kammajatejasaṅkhātaṃ
atk-s0302a:86_3: parissayaṃ vinodeti, na pana sakkoti pāletuṃ. Ojā pana pāleti, na sakkoti parissayaṃ
atk-s0302a:86_4: vinodetuṃ. Dve pana ekato hutvā parissayañceva vinodenti pālenti cāti.
atk-s0302a:87_0: Phasso dutiyoti cakkhusamphassādi chabbidhopi phasso etesu catūsu āhāresu dutiyo
atk-s0302a:87_1: āhāroti veditabbo. Desanānayo eva cesa, tasmā iminā nāma kāraṇena dutiyo tatiyo cāti
atk-s0302a:87_2: idamettha na gavesitabbaṃ. Manosañcetanāti cetanāva vuccati. Viññāṇanti cittaṃ. Iti
atk-s0302a:87_3: bhagavā imasmiṃ ṭhāne upādiṇṇakaanupādiṇṇakavasena ekarāsiṃ katvā cattāro āhāre dassesi.
atk-s0302a:87_4: Kabaḷīkārāhāro hi upādiṇṇakopi atthi anupādiṇṇakopi, tathā phassādayo. Tattha sappādīhi
atk-s0302a:87_5: gilitānaṃ maṇḍūkādīnaṃ vasena upādiṇṇakakabaḷīkārāhāro daṭṭhabbo. Maṇḍūkādayo hi
atk-s0302a:87_6: sappādīhi gilitā antokucchigatāpi kiñci kālaṃ jīvantiyeva. Te yāva upādiṇṇakapakkhe
atk-s0302a:87_7: tiṭṭhanti, tāva āhāratthaṃ na sādhenti. Bhijjitvā pana anupādiṇṇakapakkhe ṭhitā sādhenti.
atk-s0302a:87_8: Tadāpi upādiṇṇakāhāroti vuccantīti. Idaṃ pana ācariyānaṃ na ruccatīti aṭṭhakathāyameva
atk-s0302a:87_9: paṭikkhipitvā idaṃ vuttaṃ – imesaṃ sattānaṃ khādantānampi akhādantānampi bhuñjantānampi
atk-s0302a:87_10: abhuñjantānampi paṭisandhicitteneva sahajātā kammajā ojā nāma atthi, sā yāvapi sattamā
atk-s0302a:87_11: divasā pāleti, ayameva upādiṇṇakakabaḷīkārāhāroti veditabbo. Tebhūmakavipākavasena
atk-s0302a:88_0: Etthāha – “yadi paccayaṭṭho āhāraṭṭho, atha kasmā aññesupi sattānaṃ paccayesu vijjamānesu
atk-s0302a:88_1: imeyeva cattāro vuttā”ti? Vuccate – ajjhattikasantatiyā visesapaccayattā. Visesapaccayo
atk-s0302a:88_2: hi kabaḷīkārāhārabhakkhānaṃ sattānaṃ rūpakāyassa kabaḷīkāro āhāro, nāmakāye vedanāya
atk-s0302a:88_3: phasso, viññāṇassa manosañcetanā, nāmarūpassa viññāṇaṃ. Yathāha – “seyyathāpi, bhikkhave,
atk-s0302a:88_4: ayaṃ kāyo āhāraṭṭhitiko āhāraṃ paṭicca tiṭṭhati, anāhāro no tiṭṭhati, tathā phassapaccayā
atk-s0302a:89: Ko panettha āhāro kiṃ āharatīti? Kabaḷīkārāhāro ojaṭṭhamakarūpāni āharati phassāhāro tisso vedanā, manosañcetanāhāro tayo bhave, viññāṇāhāro paṭisandhināmarūpanti.
atk-s0302a:90_0: Kathaṃ? Kabaḷīkārāhāro tāva mukhe ṭhapitamatteyeva aṭṭha rūpāni samuṭṭhāpeti, dantavicuṇṇitaṃ
atk-s0302a:90_1: pana ajjhohariyamānaṃ ekekaṃ sitthaṃ aṭṭhaṭṭharūpāni samuṭṭhāpetiyeva. Evaṃ kabaḷīkārāhāro
atk-s0302a:90_2: ojaṭṭhamakarūpāni āharati. Phassāhāro pana sukhavedanīyo phasso uppajjamānoyeva sukhaṃ
atk-s0302a:90_3: vedanaṃ āharati, dukkhavedanīyo dukkhaṃ, adukkhamasukhavedanīyo adukkhamasukhanti
atk-s0302a:90_4: evaṃ sabbathāpi phassāhāro tisso vedanā āharati.
atk-s0302a:91_0: Manosañcetanāhāro kāmabhavūpagaṃ kammaṃ kāmabhavaṃ āharati, rūpārūpabhavūpagāni taṃ
atk-s0302a:91_1: taṃ bhavaṃ. Evaṃ sabbathāpi manosañcetanāhāro tayo bhave āharati. Viññāṇāhāro pana
atk-s0302a:91_2: ye ca paṭisandhikkhaṇe taṃsampayuttakā tayo khandhā, yāni ca tisantativasena tiṃsa
atk-s0302a:91_3: rūpāni uppajjanti, sahajātādipaccayanayena tāni āharatīti vuccati. Evaṃ viññāṇāhāro
atk-s0302a:91_4: paṭisandhināmarūpaṃ āharatīti. Ettha ca “manosañcetanā tayo bhave āharatī”ti sāsavakusalākusalacetanāva
atk-s0302a:91_5: vuttā. “Viññāṇaṃ paṭisandhināmarūpaṃ āharatī”ti paṭisandhiviññāṇameva vuttaṃ. Avisesena
atk-s0302a:92_0: Etesu catūsu āhāresu kabaḷīkārāhāro upatthambhento āhārakiccaṃ sādheti, phasso phusantoyeva
atk-s0302a:92_1: manosañcetanā āyūhamānāva, viññāṇaṃ vijānantameva. Kathaṃ? Kabaḷīkārāhāro hi upatthambhentoyeva
atk-s0302a:92_2: kāyaṭṭhapanena sattānaṃ ṭhitiyā hoti. Kammajanitopi hi ayaṃ kāyo kabaḷīkārāhārena
atk-s0302a:92_3: upatthaddho dasapi vassāni vassasatampi yāva āyuparimāṇā tiṭṭhati. Yathā kiṃ? Yathā
atk-s0302a:92_4: mātuyā janitopi dārako dhātiyā thaññādīni pāyetvā posiyamāno ciraṃ tiṭṭhati, yathā
atk-s0302a:92_5: ca upatthambhena upatthambhitaṃ gehaṃ. Vuttampi cetaṃ –
atk-s0302a:93: “Yathā, mahārāja, gehe papatante aññena dārunā upatthambhitaṃ santaṃ eva taṃ gehaṃ na patati. Evameva kho, mahārāja, ayaṃ kāyo āhāraṭṭhitiko āhāraṃ paṭicca tiṭṭhatī”ti.
atk-s0302a:94: Evaṃ kabaḷīkāro āhāro upatthambhento āhārakiccaṃ sādheti.
atk-s0302a:95_0: Evaṃ sādhentopi ca kabaḷīkāro āhāro dvinnaṃ rūpasantatīnaṃ paccayo hoti āhārasamuṭṭhānassa
atk-s0302a:95_1: ca upādiṇṇakassa ca. Kammajānaṃ anupālako hutvā paccayo hoti, āhārasamuṭṭhānānaṃ
atk-s0302a:95_2: janako hutvāti. Phasso pana sukhādivatthubhūtaṃ ārammaṇaṃ phusantoyeva sukhādivedanāpavattanena
atk-s0302a:95_3: sattānaṃ ṭhitiyā hoti. Manosañcetanā kusalākusalakammavasena āyūhamānāyeva bhavamūlanipphādanato
atk-s0302a:95_4: sattānaṃ ṭhitiyā hoti. Viññāṇaṃ vijānantameva nāmarūpappavattanena sattānaṃ ṭhitiyā hotīti.
atk-s0302a:96_0: Evaṃ upatthambhanādivasena āhārakiccaṃ sādhayamānesu panetesu cattāri bhayāni daṭṭhabbāni.
atk-s0302a:96_1: Seyyathidaṃ – kabaḷīkārāhāre nikantiyeva bhayaṃ, phasse upagamanameva, manosañcetanāya
atk-s0302a:96_2: āyūhanameva, viññāṇe abhinipātoyeva bhayanti. Kiṃ kāraṇā? Kabaḷīkārāhāre hi nikantiṃ
atk-s0302a:96_3: katvā sītādīnaṃ purakkhatā sattā āhāratthāya muddāgaṇanādikammāni karontā anappakaṃ
atk-s0302a:96_4: dukkhaṃ nigacchanti. Ekacce ca imasmiṃ sāsane pabbajitvāpi vejjakammādikāya anesanāya
atk-s0302a:96_5: āhāraṃ pariyesantā diṭṭheva dhamme gārayhā honti, samparāyepi, “tassa saṅghāṭipi
atk-s0302a:96_6: ādittā sampajjalitā”tiādinā lakkhaṇasaṃyutte vuttanayena samaṇapetā honti. Iminā
atk-s0302a:96_7: tāva kāraṇena kabaḷīkāre āhāre nikanti eva bhayanti veditabbā.
atk-s0302a:97_0: Phassaṃ upagacchantāpi phassassādino paresaṃ rakkhitagopitesu dārādīsu bhaṇḍesu aparajjhanti,
atk-s0302a:97_1: te saha bhaṇḍena bhaṇḍasāmikā gahetvā khaṇḍākhaṇḍikaṃ vā chinditvā saṅkārakūṭe chaḍḍenti,
atk-s0302a:97_2: rañño vā niyyādenti. Tato te rājā vividhā kammakāraṇā kārāpeti. Kāyassa ca bhedā
atk-s0302a:97_3: duggati tesaṃ pāṭikaṅkhā hoti. Iti phassassādamūlakaṃ diṭṭhadhammikampi samparāyikampi
atk-s0302a:97_4: bhayaṃ sabbamāgatameva hoti. Iminā kāraṇena phassāhāre upagamanameva bhayanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0302a:98: Kusalākusalakammāyūhane pana tammūlakaṃ tīsu bhavesu bhayaṃ sabbaṃ āgatameva hoti. Iminā kāraṇena manosañcetanāhāre āyūhanameva bhayanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0302a:99_0: Paṭisandhiviññāṇañca yasmiṃ yasmiṃ ṭhāne abhinipatati, tasmiṃ tasmiṃ ṭhāne paṭisandhināmarūpaṃ
atk-s0302a:99_1: gahetvāva nibbattati. Tasmiñca nibbatte sabbabhayāni nibbattāniyeva honti tammūlakattāti
atk-s0302a:99_2: iminā kāraṇena viññāṇāhāre abhinipātoyeva bhayanti veditabboti.
atk-s0302a:100_0: Kiṃnidānātiādīsu nidānādīni sabbāneva kāraṇavevacanāni. Kāraṇañhi yasmā phalaṃ nideti,
atk-s0302a:100_1: “handa naṃ gaṇhathā”ti appeti viya, tasmā nidānanti vuccati. Yasmā taṃ tato samudeti
atk-s0302a:100_2: jāyati pabhavati, tasmā samudayo jāti pabhavoti vuccati. Ayaṃ panettha padattho –
atk-s0302a:100_3: kiṃnidānaṃ etesanti kiṃnidānā. Ko samudayo etesanti kiṃsamudayā. Kā jāti etesanti
atk-s0302a:100_4: kiṃjātikā. Ko pabhavo etesanti kiṃpabhavā. Yasmā pana tesaṃ taṇhā yathāvuttena atthena
atk-s0302a:100_5: nidānañceva samudayo ca jāti ca pabhavo ca, tasmā “taṇhānidānā”tiādimāha. Evaṃ sabbapadesu attho veditabbo.
atk-s0302a:101_0: Ettha ca ime cattāro āhārā taṇhānidānāti paṭisandhiṃ ādiṃ katvā attabhāvasaṅkhātānaṃ
atk-s0302a:101_1: āhārānaṃ purimataṇhānaṃ vasena nidānaṃ veditabbaṃ. Kathaṃ? Paṭisandhikkhaṇe tāva
atk-s0302a:101_2: paripuṇṇāyatanānaṃ sattānaṃ sattasantativasena, sesānaṃ tato ūnaūnasantativasena
atk-s0302a:101_3: uppannarūpabbhantaraṃ jātā ojā atthi, ayaṃ taṇhānidāno upādiṇṇakakabaḷīkārāhāro.
atk-s0302a:101_4: Paṭisandhicittasampayuttā pana phassacetanā sayañca cittaṃ viññāṇanti ime taṇhānidānā
atk-s0302a:101_6: āhārā. Yathā ca paṭisandhikā, evaṃ tato paraṃ paṭhamabhavaṅgacittakkhaṇādinibbattāpi veditabbā.
atk-s0302a:102_0: Yasmā pana bhagavā na kevalaṃ āhārānameva nidānaṃ jānāti, āhāranidānabhūtāya taṇhāyapi,
atk-s0302a:102_1: taṇhāya nidānānaṃ vedanādīnampi nidānaṃ jānātiyeva, tasmā taṇhā cāyaṃ, bhikkhave,
atk-s0302a:102_2: kiṃnidānātiādinā nayena vaṭṭaṃ dassetvā vivaṭṭaṃ dassesi. Imasmiñca pana ṭhāne bhagavā
atk-s0302a:102_3: atītābhimukhaṃ desanaṃ katvā atītena vaṭṭaṃ dasseti. Kathaṃ? Āhāravasena hi ayaṃ attabhāvo gahito.
atk-s0302a:103_1: yasmiṃ attabhāve ṭhatvā kammaṃ āyūhitaṃ, taṃ dassetuṃ vuttāni, avijjāsaṅkhārā tassattabhāvassa
atk-s0302a:103_2: janakaṃ kammaṃ. Iti dvīsu ṭhānesu attabhāvo, dvīsu tassa janakaṃ kammanti saṅkhepena
atk-s0302a:103_3: kammañceva kammavipākañcāti, dvepi dhamme dassentena atītābhimukhaṃ desanaṃ katvā
atk-s0302a:104_0: Tatrāyaṃ desanā anāgatassa adassitattā aparipuṇṇāti na daṭṭhabbā. Nayato pana paripuṇṇātveva
atk-s0302a:104_1: daṭṭhabbā. Yathā hi cakkhumā puriso udakapiṭṭhe nipannaṃ suṃsumāraṃ disvā tassa parabhāgaṃ
atk-s0302a:104_2: olokento gīvaṃ passeyya, orato piṭṭhiṃ, pariyosāne naṅguṭṭhamūlaṃ, heṭṭhā kucchiṃ
atk-s0302a:104_3: olokento pana udakagataṃ agganaṅguṭṭhañceva cattāro ca hatthapāde na passeyya, so
atk-s0302a:104_4: na ettāvatā “aparipuṇṇo suṃsumāro”ti gaṇhāti, nayato pana paripuṇṇotveva gaṇhāti,
atk-s0302a:105_0: Udakapiṭṭhe nipannasuṃsumāro viya hi tebhūmakavaṭṭaṃ. Tīre ṭhito cakkhumā puriso
atk-s0302a:105_1: viya yogāvacaro. Tena purisena udakapiṭṭhe suṃsumārassa diṭṭhakālo viya yoginā āhāravasena
atk-s0302a:105_2: imassattabhāvassa diṭṭhakālo. Parato gīvāya diṭṭhakālo viya imassattabhāvassa janikāya
atk-s0302a:105_3: taṇhāya diṭṭhakālo. Piṭṭhiyā diṭṭhakālo viya yasmiṃ attabhāve taṇhāsaṅkhātaṃ kammaṃ
atk-s0302a:105_4: kataṃ, vedanādivasena tassa diṭṭhakālo. Naṅguṭṭhamūlassa diṭṭhakālo viya tassattabhāvassa
atk-s0302a:105_5: janakānaṃ avijjāsaṅkhārānaṃ diṭṭhakālo. Heṭṭhā kucchiṃ olokentassa pana agganaṅguṭṭhañceva
atk-s0302a:105_6: cattāro ca hatthapāde adisvāpi “aparipuṇṇo suṃsumāro”ti agahetvā nayato paripuṇṇotveva
atk-s0302a:105_7: gahaṇaṃ viya yattha yattha paccayavaṭṭaṃ pāḷiyaṃ na āgataṃ, tattha tattha “desanā
atk-s0302a:105_8: aparipuṇṇā”ti agahetvā nayato paripuṇṇātveva gahaṇaṃ veditabbaṃ. Tattha ca āhārataṇhānaṃ
atk-s0302a:105_9: antare eko sandhi, taṇhāvedanānaṃ antare eko, viññāṇasaṅkhārānaṃ antare ekoti evaṃ
atk-s0302a:107_0: 12. Dutiye sambhavesīnaṃ vā anuggahāyāti imasmiṃyeva ṭhāne bhagavā desanaṃ niṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0302a:107_1: Kasmā? Diṭṭhigatikassa nisinnattā. Tassañhi parisati moḷiyaphagguno nāma bhikkhu
atk-s0302a:107_2: diṭṭhigatiko nisinno. Atha satthā cintesi – “ayaṃ uṭṭhahitvā maṃ pañhaṃ pucchissati,
atk-s0302a:107_3: athassāhaṃ vissajjessāmī”ti pucchāya okāsadānatthaṃ desanaṃ niṭṭhāpesi. Moḷiyaphaggunoti
atk-s0302a:112_0: Sā tassa gihikāle mahantā ahosi. Tenassa “moḷiyaphagguno”ti saṅkhā udapādi. Pabbajitampi
atk-s0302a:112_1: naṃ teneva nāmena sañjānanti. Etadavocāti desanānusandhiṃ ghaṭento etaṃ “ko nu kho,
atk-s0302a:112_2: bhante, viññāṇāhāraṃ āhāretī”ti vacanaṃ avoca. Tassattho – bhante, ko nāma so, yo
atk-s0302a:112_3: etaṃ viññāṇāhāraṃ khādati vā bhuñjati vāti?
atk-s0302a:113_0: Kasmā panāyaṃ itare tayo āhāre apucchitvā imameva pucchatīti? Jānāmīti laddhiyā.
atk-s0302a:113_1: So hi mahante piṇḍe katvāva kabaḷīkārāhāraṃ bhuñjante passati, tenassa taṃ jānāmīti
atk-s0302a:113_2: laddhi. Tittiravaṭṭakamorakukkuṭādayo pana mātusamphassena yāpente disvā “ete phassāhārena
atk-s0302a:113_3: yāpentī”ti tassa laddhi. Kacchapā pana attano utusamaye mahāsamuddato nikkhamitvā
atk-s0302a:113_4: samuddatīre vālikantare aṇḍāni ṭhapetvā vālikāya paṭicchādetvā mahāsamuddameva otaranti.
atk-s0302a:113_5: Tāni mātuanussaraṇavasena na pūtīni honti. Tāni manosañcetanāhārena yāpentīti tassa
atk-s0302a:113_6: laddhi. Kiñcāpi therassa ayaṃ laddhi, na pana etāya laddhiyā imaṃ pañhaṃ pucchati.
atk-s0302a:113_7: Diṭṭhigatiko hi ummattakasadiso. Yathā ummattako pacchiṃ gahetvā antaravīthiṃ otiṇṇo
atk-s0302a:113_8: gomayampi pāsāṇampi gūthampi khajjakhaṇḍampi taṃ taṃ manāpampi amanāpampi gahetvā
atk-s0302a:113_9: pacchiyaṃ pakkhipati. Evameva diṭṭhigatiko yuttampi ayuttampi pucchati. So “kasmā
atk-s0302a:113_10: imaṃ pucchasī”ti na niggahetabbo, pucchitapucchitaṭṭhāne pana gahaṇameva nisedhetabbaṃ.
atk-s0302a:113_11: Teneva naṃ bhagavā “kasmā evaṃ pucchasī”ti avatvā gahitagāhameva tassa mocetuṃ no
atk-s0302a:114_0: Tattha no kalloti ayutto. Āhāretīti ahaṃ na vadāmīti ahaṃ koci satto vā puggalo vā
atk-s0302a:114_1: āhāretīti na vadāmi. Āhāretīti cāhaṃ vadeyyanti yadi ahaṃ āhāretīti vadeyyaṃ. Tatrassa
atk-s0302a:114_2: kallo pañhoti tasmiṃ mayā evaṃ vutte ayaṃ pañho yutto bhaveyya. Kissa nu kho, bhante,
atk-s0302a:114_3: viññāṇāhāroti, bhante, ayaṃ viññāṇāhāro katamassa dhammassa paccayoti attho. Tatra
atk-s0302a:114_4: kallaṃ veyyākaraṇanti tasmiṃ evaṃ pucchite pañhe imaṃ veyyākaraṇaṃ yuttaṃ “viññāṇāhāro
atk-s0302a:114_5: āyatiṃ punabbhavābhinibbattiyā paccayo”ti. Ettha ca viññāṇāhāroti paṭisandhicittaṃ.
atk-s0302a:114_6: Āyatiṃ punabbhavābhinibbattīti teneva viññāṇena sahuppannanāmarūpaṃ. Tasmiṃ bhūte
atk-s0302a:114_7: sati saḷāyatananti tasmiṃ punabbhavābhinibbattisaṅkhāte nāmarūpe jāte sati saḷāyatanaṃ hotīti attho.
atk-s0302a:115_0: Saḷāyatanapaccayā phassoti idhāpi bhagavā uttari pañhassa okāsaṃ dento desanaṃ niṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0302a:115_1: Diṭṭhigatiko hi navapucchaṃ uppādetuṃ na sakkoti, niddiṭṭhaṃ niddiṭṭhaṃyeva pana
atk-s0302a:115_2: gaṇhitvā pucchati, tenassa bhagavā okāsaṃ adāsi. Attho panassa sabbapadesu vuttanayeneva
atk-s0302a:115_3: gahetabbo. “Ko nu kho, bhante, bhavatī”ti kasmā na pucchati? Diṭṭhigatikassa hi satto
atk-s0302a:115_4: nāma bhūto nibbattoyevāti laddhi, tasmā attano laddhiviruddhaṃ idanti na pucchati.
atk-s0302a:115_5: Apica idappaccayā idaṃ idappaccayā idanti bahūsu ṭhānesu kathitattā saññattiṃ upagato,
atk-s0302a:115_6: tenāpi na pucchati. Satthāpi “imassa bahuṃ pucchantassāpi titti natthi, tucchapucchameva
atk-s0302a:115_7: pucchatī”ti ito paṭṭhāya desanaṃ ekābaddhaṃ katvā desesi. Channaṃ tvevāti yato paṭṭhāya
atk-s0302a:115_8: desanāruḷhaṃ, tameva gahetvā desanaṃ vivaṭṭento evamāha. Imasmiṃ pana sutte viññāṇanāmarūpānaṃ
atk-s0302a:115_9: antare eko sandhi, vedanātaṇhānaṃ antare eko, bhavajātīnaṃ antare ekoti. Dutiyaṃ.
atk-s0302a:117_0: 13. Tatiye samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vāti saccāni paṭivijjhituṃ asamatthā bāhirakasamaṇabrāhmaṇā.
atk-s0302a:117_1: Jarāmaraṇaṃ nappajānantītiādīsu jarāmaraṇaṃ na jānanti dukkhasaccavasena, jarāmaraṇasamudayaṃ
atk-s0302a:117_2: na jānanti saha taṇhāya jāti jarāmaraṇassa samudayoti samudayasaccavasena, jarāmaraṇanirodhaṃ
atk-s0302a:117_3: na jānanti nirodhasaccavasena, paṭipadaṃ na jānanti maggasaccavasena. Jātiṃ na jānanti
atk-s0302a:117_4: dukkhasaccavasena, jātisamudayaṃ na jānanti saha taṇhāya bhavo jātisamudayoti samudayasaccavasena.
atk-s0302a:117_5: Evaṃ saha taṇhāya samudayaṃ yojetvā sabbapadesu catusaccavasena attho veditabbo.
atk-s0302a:117_6: Sāmaññatthaṃ vā brahmaññatthaṃ vāti ettha ariyamaggo sāmaññañceva brahmaññañca. Ubhayatthāpi
atk-s0302a:117_7: pana attho nāma ariyaphalaṃ veditabbaṃ. Iti bhagavā imasmiṃ sutte ekādasasu ṭhānesu
atk-s0302a:119_0: 14. Catutthe ime dhamme katame dhammeti ettakaṃ papañcaṃ katvā kathitaṃ, desanaṃ
atk-s0302a:119_1: paṭivijjhituṃ samatthānaṃ puggalānaṃ ajjhāsayena ime dhamme nappajānantītiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0302a:121_0: 15. Pañcame sammādiṭṭhi sammādiṭṭhīti yaṃ paṇḍitā devamanussā tesu tesu ṭhānesu sammādassanaṃ
atk-s0302a:121_1: vadanti, sabbampi taṃ dvīhi padehi saṅkhipitvā pucchati. Dvayanissitoti dve koṭṭhāse
atk-s0302a:121_2: nissito. Yebhuyyenāti iminā ṭhapetvā ariyapuggale sesamahājanaṃ dasseti. Atthitanti
atk-s0302a:121_3: sassataṃ. Natthitanti ucchedaṃ. Lokasamudayanti loko nāma saṅkhāraloko, tassa nibbatti.
atk-s0302a:121_4: Sammappaññāya passatoti sammāpaññā nāma savipassanā maggapaññā, tāya passantassāti
atk-s0302a:121_5: attho. Yā loke natthitāti saṅkhāraloke nibbattesu dhammesu paññāyantesveva yā natthīti
atk-s0302a:121_6: ucchedadiṭṭhi uppajjeyya, sā na hotīti attho. Lokanirodhanti saṅkhārānaṃ bhaṅgaṃ.
atk-s0302a:121_7: Yā loke atthitāti saṅkhāraloke bhijjamānesu dhammesu paññāyantesveva yā atthīti sassatadiṭṭhi
atk-s0302a:122_0: Apica lokasamudayanti anulomapaccayākāraṃ. Lokanirodhanti paṭilomapaccayākāraṃ. Lokanissaye
atk-s0302a:122_1: passantassāpi hi paccayānaṃ anucchedena paccayuppannassa anucchedaṃ passato yā natthīti
atk-s0302a:122_2: ucchedadiṭṭhi uppajjeyya, sā na hoti. Paccayanirodhaṃ passantassāpi paccayanirodhena
atk-s0302a:122_3: paccayuppannanirodhaṃ passato yā atthīti sassatadiṭṭhi uppajjeyya, sā na hotīti ayampettha attho.
atk-s0302a:123_0: Upayupādānābhinivesavinibandhoti upayehi ca upādānehi ca abhinivesehi ca vinibandho.
atk-s0302a:123_1: Tattha upayāti dve upayā taṇhupayo ca diṭṭhupayo ca. Upādānādīsupi eseva nayo. Taṇhādiṭṭhiyo
atk-s0302a:123_2: hi yasmā ahaṃ mamantiādīhi ākārehi tebhūmakadhamme upenti upagacchanti, tasmā upayāti
atk-s0302a:123_3: vuccanti. Yasmā pana te dhamme upādiyanti ceva abhinivisanti ca, tasmā upādānāti
atk-s0302a:123_4: ca abhinivesāti ca vuccanti. Tāhi cāyaṃ loko vinibandho. Tenāha “upayupādānābhinivesavinibandho”ti.
atk-s0302a:124_0: Tañcāyanti tañca upayupādānaṃ ayaṃ ariyasāvako. Cetaso adhiṭṭhānanti cittassa patiṭṭhānabhūtaṃ.
atk-s0302a:124_1: Abhinivesānusayanti abhinivesabhūtañca anusayabhūtañca. Taṇhādiṭṭhīsu hi akusalacittaṃ
atk-s0302a:124_2: patiṭṭhāti, tā ca tasmiṃ abhinivisanti ceva anusenti ca, tasmā tadubhayaṃ cetaso
atk-s0302a:124_3: adhiṭṭhānaṃ abhinivesānusayanti ca āha. Na upetīti na upagacchati. Na upādiyatīti
atk-s0302a:124_4: na gaṇhāti. Nādhiṭṭhātīti na adhiṭṭhāti, kinti? Attā meti. Dukkhamevāti pañcupādānakkhandhamattameva.
atk-s0302a:124_5: Na kaṅkhatīti “dukkhameva uppajjati, dukkhaṃ nirujjhati, na añño ettha satto nāma
atk-s0302a:124_6: atthī”ti kaṅkhaṃ na karoti. Na vicikicchatīti na vicikicchaṃ uppādeti.
atk-s0302a:125_0: Aparappaccayāti na parappaccayena, aññassa apattiyāyetvā attapaccakkhañāṇamevassa
atk-s0302a:125_1: ettha hotīti. Ettāvatā kho, kaccāna, sammādiṭṭhi hotīti evaṃ sattasaññāya pahīnattā
atk-s0302a:125_2: ettakena sammādassanaṃ nāma hotīti missakasammādiṭṭhiṃ āha. Ayameko antoti esa eko
atk-s0302a:125_3: nikūṭanto lāmakanto paṭhamakaṃ sassataṃ. Ayaṃ dutiyoti esa dutiyo sabbaṃ natthīti
atk-s0302a:125_4: uppajjanakadiṭṭhisaṅkhāto nikūṭanto lāmakanto dutiyako ucchedoti attho. Sesamettha
atk-s0302a:127_0: 16. Chaṭṭhe nibbidāyāti nibbindanatthāya. Virāgāyāti virajjanatthāya. Nirodhāyāti
atk-s0302a:127_1: nirujjhanatthāya. Paṭipanno hotīti ettha sīlato paṭṭhāya yāva arahattamaggā paṭipannoti
atk-s0302a:127_3: paṭipadaṃ paṭipanno. Anudhammabhūtanti anurūpasabhāvabhūtaṃ. Nibbidā virāgā nirodhāti
atk-s0302a:127_4: nibbidāya ceva virāgena ca nirodhena ca. Anupādā vimuttoti catūhi upādānehi kiñci
atk-s0302a:127_5: dhammaṃ anupādiyitvā vimutto. Diṭṭhadhammanibbānappattoti diṭṭheva dhamme nibbānappatto.
atk-s0302a:127_6: Alaṃ vacanāyāti, evaṃ vattabbataṃ arahati, yutto anucchavikoti attho. Evamettha ekena
atk-s0302a:127_7: nayena dhammakathikassa pucchā kathitā, dvīhi taṃ visesetvā sekkhāsekkhabhūmiyo niddiṭṭhāti. Chaṭṭhaṃ.
atk-s0302a:129_0: 17. Sattame acelo kassapoti liṅgena acelo niccelo, nāmena kassapo. Dūratovāti mahatā
atk-s0302a:129_1: bhikkhusaṅghena parivutaṃ āgacchantaṃ dūrato eva addasa. Kiñcideva desanti kiñcideva
atk-s0302a:129_2: kāraṇaṃ. Okāsanti pañhabyākaraṇassa khaṇaṃ kālaṃ. Antaragharanti “na pallatthikāya
atk-s0302a:129_3: antaraghare nisīdissāmī”ti ettha antonivesanaṃ antaragharaṃ. “Okkhittacakkhu antaraghare
atk-s0302a:129_4: gamissāmī”ti ettha indakhīlato paṭṭhāya antogāmo. Idhāpi ayameva adhippeto. Yadākaṅkhasīti yaṃ icchasi.
atk-s0302a:130_0: Kasmā pana bhagavā kathetukāmo yāvatatiyaṃ paṭikkhipīti? Gāravajananatthaṃ. Diṭṭhigatikā
atk-s0302a:130_1: hi khippaṃ kathiyamāne gāravaṃ na karonti, “samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ upasaṅkamitumpi pucchitumpi
atk-s0302a:130_2: sukaraṃ, pucchitamatteyeva kathetī”ti vacanampi na saddahanti. Dve tayo vāre paṭikkhitte
atk-s0302a:130_3: pana gāravaṃ karonti, “samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ upasaṅkamitumpi pañhaṃ pucchitumpi dukkara”nti
atk-s0302a:130_4: yāvatatiyaṃ yācite kathiyamānaṃ sussūsanti saddahanti. Iti bhagavā “ayaṃ sussūsissati
atk-s0302a:130_5: saddahissatī”ti yāvatatiyaṃ yācāpetvā kathesi. Apica yathā bhisakko telaṃ vā phāṇitaṃ
atk-s0302a:130_6: vā pacanto mudupākakharapākānaṃ pākakālaṃ āgamayamāno pākakālaṃ anatikkamitvāva otāreti.
atk-s0302a:130_7: Evaṃ bhagavā sattānaṃ ñāṇaparipākaṃ āgamayamāno “ettakena kālena imassa ñāṇaṃ paripākaṃ
atk-s0302a:131_0: Mā hevaṃ, kassapāti, kassapa, mā evaṃ bhaṇi. Sayaṃkataṃ dukkhanti hi vattuṃ na vaṭṭati,
atk-s0302a:131_1: attā nāma koci dukkhassa kārako natthīti dīpeti. Paratopi eseva nayo. Adhiccasamuppannanti
atk-s0302a:131_2: akāraṇena yadicchāya uppannaṃ. Iti puṭṭho samānoti kasmā evamāha? Evaṃ kirassa ahosi
atk-s0302a:131_4: ‘atthī’ti vadati. ‘Bhavaṃ gotamo dukkhaṃ na jānāti na passatī’ti puṭṭho ‘jānāmi khvāha’nti
atk-s0302a:131_5: vadati. Kiñci nu kho mayā virajjhitvā pucchito”ti mūlato paṭṭhāya attano pucchameva
atk-s0302a:131_6: sodhento evamāha. Ācikkhatu ca me, bhante, bhagavāti idha satthari sañjātagāravo
atk-s0302a:132_0: So karotītiādi, “sayaṃkataṃ dukkha”nti laddhiyā paṭisedhanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Ettha ca
atk-s0302a:132_1: satoti idaṃ bhummatthe sāmivacanaṃ, tasmā evamattho daṭṭhabbo – so karoti so paṭisaṃvedayatīti
atk-s0302a:132_2: kho, kassapa, ādimhiyeva evaṃ sati pacchā sayaṃkataṃ dukkhanti ayaṃ laddhi hoti.
atk-s0302a:132_3: Ettha ca dukkhanti vaṭṭadukkhaṃ adhippetaṃ. Iti vadanti etassa purimena ādisaddena
atk-s0302a:132_4: anantarena ca sassatasaddena sambandho hoti. “Dīpeti gaṇhātī”ti ayaṃ panettha pāṭhaseso.
atk-s0302a:132_5: Idañhi vuttaṃ hoti – iti evaṃ vadanto āditova sassataṃ dīpeti, sassataṃ gaṇhāti.
atk-s0302a:132_6: Kasmā? Tassa hi taṃ dassanaṃ etaṃ pareti, kārakañca vedakañca ekameva gaṇhantaṃ etaṃ
atk-s0302a:133_0: Añño karotītiādi pana “paraṃkataṃ dukkha”nti laddhiyā paṭisedhanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. “Ādito
atk-s0302a:133_1: sato”ti idaṃ pana idhāpi āharitabbaṃ. Ayañhettha attho – añño karoti añño paṭisaṃvediyatīti
atk-s0302a:133_2: kho pana, kassapa, ādimhiyeva evaṃ sati, pacchā “kārako idheva ucchijjati, tena kataṃ
atk-s0302a:133_3: añño paṭisaṃvediyatī”ti evaṃ uppannāya ucchedadiṭṭhiyā saddhiṃ sampayuttāya vedanāya
atk-s0302a:133_4: abhitunnassa viddhassa sato “paraṃkataṃ dukkha”nti ayaṃ laddhi hotīti. Iti vadantiādi
atk-s0302a:133_5: vuttanayeneva yojetabbaṃ. Tatrāyaṃ yojanā – evañca vadanto āditova ucchedaṃ dīpeti,
atk-s0302a:133_6: ucchedaṃ gaṇhāti. Kasmā? Tassa hi taṃ dassanaṃ etaṃ pareti, etaṃ ucchedaṃ upagacchatīti attho.
atk-s0302a:134_0: Ete teti ye sassatucchedasaṅkhāte ubho ante (anupagamma tathāgato dhammaṃ deseti,
atk-s0302a:134_1: ete te, kassapa, ubho ante) anupagamma pahāya anallīyitvā majjhena tathāgato dhammaṃ
atk-s0302a:134_2: deseti, majjhimāya paṭipadāya ṭhito desetīti attho. Kataraṃ dhammanti ce? Yadidaṃ
atk-s0302a:134_3: avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārāti. Ettha hi kāraṇato phalaṃ, kāraṇanirodhena cassa nirodho
atk-s0302a:134_4: dīpito, na koci kārako vā vedako vā niddiṭṭho. Ettāvatā sesapañhā paṭisedhitā honti.
atk-s0302a:134_5: Ubho ante anupagammāti iminā hi tatiyapañho paṭikkhitto. Avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārāti
atk-s0302a:134_6: iminā adhiccasamuppannatā ceva ajānanañca paṭikkhittanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0302a:135_0: Labheyyanti idaṃ so bhagavato santike bhikkhubhāvaṃ patthayamāno āha. Atha bhagavā
atk-s0302a:135_1: yonena khandhake titthiyaparivāso paññatto, yaṃ aññatitthiyapubbo sāmaṇerabhūmiyaṃ
atk-s0302a:135_2: ṭhito “ahaṃ, bhante, itthannāmo aññatitthiyapubbo imasmiṃ dhammavinaye ākaṅkhāmi
atk-s0302a:135_3: upasampadaṃ. Svāhaṃ, bhante, saṅghaṃ cattāro māse parivāsaṃ yācāmī”tiādinā nayena
atk-s0302a:135_4: samādiyitvā parivasati, taṃ sandhāya yo kho, kassapa, aññatitthiyapubbotiādimāha.
atk-s0302a:135_5: Tattha pabbajjanti vacanasiliṭṭhatāvasena vuttaṃ. Aparivasitvāyeva hi pabbajjaṃ labhati.
atk-s0302a:135_6: Upasampadatthikena pana nātikālena gāmappavesanādīni aṭṭha vattāni pūrentena parivasitabbaṃ.
atk-s0302a:135_7: Āraddhacittāti aṭṭhavattapūraṇena tuṭṭhacittā. Ayamettha saṅkhepo, vitthārato panesa
atk-s0302a:136_0: Apica mayāti ayamettha pāṭho, aññattha pana “apica metthā”ti. Puggalavemattatā viditāti
atk-s0302a:136_1: puggalanānattaṃ viditaṃ. “Ayaṃ puggalo parivāsāraho, ayaṃ na parivāsāraho”ti idaṃ
atk-s0302a:136_2: mayhaṃ pākaṭanti dasseti. Tato kassapo cintesi – “aho acchariyaṃ buddhasāsanaṃ, yattha
atk-s0302a:136_3: evaṃ ghaṃsitvā koṭṭetvā yuttameva gaṇhanti, ayuttaṃ chaḍḍentī”ti. Tato suṭṭhutaraṃ
atk-s0302a:136_4: pabbajjāya sañjātussāho sace, bhantetiādimāha. Atha bhagavā tassa tibbacchandataṃ
atk-s0302a:136_5: viditvā “na kassapo parivāsaṃ arahatī”ti aññataraṃ bhikkhuṃ āmantesi – “gaccha, bhikkhu,
atk-s0302a:136_6: kassapaṃ nahāpetvā pabbājetvā ānehī”ti. So tathā katvā taṃ pabbājetvā bhagavato santikaṃ
atk-s0302a:136_7: agamāsi. Bhagavā gaṇe nisīditvā upasampādesi. Tena vuttaṃ alattha kho acelo kassapo
atk-s0302a:136_8: bhagavato santike pabbajjaṃ, alattha upasampadanti. Acirūpasampannotiādi sesaṃ brāhmaṇasaṃyutte
atk-s0302a:138_0: 18. Aṭṭhame sā vedanātiādi “sayaṃkataṃ sukhadukkha”nti laddhiyā nisedhanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0302a:138_1: Etthāpi satoti bhummattheyeva sāmivacanaṃ. Tatrāyaṃ atthadīpanā – “sā vedanā, so
atk-s0302a:138_2: vediyatī”ti kho, timbaruka, ādimhiyeva evaṃ sati “sayaṃkataṃ sukhadukkha”nti ayaṃ
atk-s0302a:138_3: laddhi hoti. Evañhi sati vedanāya eva vedanā katā hoti. Evañca vadanto imissā vedanāya
atk-s0302a:138_4: pubbepi atthitaṃ anujānāti, sassataṃ dīpeti sassataṃ gaṇhāti. Kasmā? Tassa hi taṃ
atk-s0302a:138_5: dassanaṃ etaṃ pareti, etaṃ sassataṃ upagacchatīti attho. Purimañhi atthaṃ sandhāyevetaṃ
atk-s0302a:138_6: bhagavatā vuttaṃ bhavissati, tasmā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ taṃ yojetvāvassa attho dīpito. Evampāhaṃ
atk-s0302a:138_7: na vadāmīti ahaṃ “sā vedanā, so vediyatī”ti evampi na vadāmi. “Sayaṃkataṃ sukhadukkha”nti
atk-s0302a:139_0: Aññā vedanātiādi “paraṃkataṃ sukhadukkha”nti laddhiyā paṭisedhanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Idhāpi
atk-s0302a:139_1: ayaṃ atthayojanā –“aññā vedanā añño vediyatī”ti kho, timbaruka, ādimhiyeva evaṃ sati
atk-s0302a:139_2: pacchā yā purimapakkhe kārakavedanā, sā ucchinnā. Tāya pana kataṃ añño vediyatīti
atk-s0302a:139_3: evaṃ uppannāya ucchedadiṭṭhiyā saddhiṃ sampayuttāya vedanāya abhitunnassa sato “paraṃkataṃ
atk-s0302a:139_4: sukhadukkha”nti ayaṃ laddhi hoti. Evañca vadanto kārako ucchinno, aññena paṭisandhi
atk-s0302a:139_5: gahitāti ucchedaṃ dīpeti, ucchedaṃ gaṇhāti. Kasmā? Tassa hi taṃ dassanaṃ etaṃ pareti,
atk-s0302a:139_6: etaṃ ucchedaṃ upagacchatīti attho. Idhāpi hi imāni padāni aṭṭhakathāyaṃ āharitvā
atk-s0302a:139_7: yojitāneva. Imasmiṃ sutte vedanāsukhadukkhaṃ kathitaṃ. Tañca kho vipākasukhadukkhameva
atk-s0302a:141_0: 19. Navame avijjānīvaraṇassāti avijjāya nivāritassa. Evamayaṃ kāyo samudāgatoti evaṃ
atk-s0302a:141_1: avijjāya nivāritattā taṇhāya ca sampayuttattāyeva ayaṃ kāyo nibbatto. Ayañceva kāyoti
atk-s0302a:141_2: ayañcassa attano saviññāṇako kāyo. Bahiddhā ca nāmarūpanti bahiddhā ca paresaṃ saviññāṇako
atk-s0302a:141_3: kāyo. Attano ca parassa ca pañcahi khandhehi chahi āyatanehi cāpi ayaṃ attho dīpetabbova.
atk-s0302a:141_4: Itthetaṃ dvayanti evametaṃ dvayaṃ. Dvayaṃ paṭicca phassoti aññattha cakkhurūpādīni
atk-s0302a:141_5: dvayāni paṭicca cakkhusamphassādayo vuttā, idha pana ajjhattikabāhirāni āyatanāni.
atk-s0302a:141_6: Mahādvayaṃ nāma kiretaṃ. Saḷevāyatanānīti saḷeva phassāyatanāni phassakāraṇāni. Yehi
atk-s0302a:141_7: phuṭṭhoti yehi kāraṇabhūtehi āyatanehi uppannena phassena phuṭṭho. Aññatarenāti ettha
atk-s0302a:141_8: paripuṇṇavasena aññataratā veditabbā. Tatrāti tasmiṃ bālapaṇḍitānaṃ kāyanibbattanādimhi.
atk-s0302a:142_0: Bhagavaṃmūlakāti bhagavā mūlaṃ etesanti bhagavaṃmūlakā. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – ime, bhante,
atk-s0302a:142_1: amhākaṃ dhammā pubbe kassapasammāsambuddhena uppāditā, tasmiṃ parinibbute ekaṃ buddhantaraṃ
atk-s0302a:142_2: añño samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā ime dhamme uppādetuṃ samattho nāma nāhosi, bhagavatā pana
atk-s0302a:142_3: no ime dhammā uppāditā. Bhagavantañhi nissāya mayaṃ ime dhamme ājānāma paṭivijjhāmāti
atk-s0302a:142_4: evaṃ bhagavaṃmūlakā no, bhante, dhammāti. Bhagavaṃnettikāti bhagavā hi dhammānaṃ
atk-s0302a:142_5: netā vinetā anunetā, yathāsabhāvato pāṭiyekkaṃ pāṭiyekkaṃ nāmaṃ gahetvā dassetāti
atk-s0302a:142_6: dhammā bhagavaṃnettikā nāma honti. Bhagavaṃpaṭisaraṇāti catubhūmakadhammā sabbaññutaññāṇassa
atk-s0302a:142_7: āpāthaṃ āgacchamānā bhagavati paṭisaranti nāmāti bhagavaṃpaṭisaraṇā. Paṭisarantīti
atk-s0302a:142_8: samosaranti. Apica mahābodhimaṇḍe nisinnassa bhagavato paṭivedhavasena phasso āgacchati
atk-s0302a:142_9: “ahaṃ bhagavā kinnāmo”ti? Tvaṃ phusanaṭṭhena phasso nāma. Vedanā, saññā, saṅkhārā,
atk-s0302a:142_10: viññāṇaṃ āgacchati “ahaṃ bhagavā kinnāma”nti, tvaṃ vijānanaṭṭhena viññāṇaṃ nāmāti
atk-s0302a:142_11: evaṃ catubhūmakadhammānaṃ yathāsabhāvato pāṭiyekkaṃ pāṭiyekkaṃ nāmaṃ gaṇhanto bhagavā
atk-s0302a:142_12: dhamme paṭisaratīti bhagavaṃpaṭisaraṇā. Bhagavantaṃyeva paṭibhātūti bhagavatova etassa
atk-s0302a:142_13: bhāsitassa attho upaṭṭhātu, tumheyeva no kathetvā dethāti attho.
atk-s0302a:143_0: Sā ceva avijjāti ettha kiñcāpi sā avijjā ca taṇhā ca kammaṃ javāpetvā paṭisandhiṃ
atk-s0302a:143_1: ākaḍḍhitvā niruddhā, yathā pana ajjāpi yaṃ hiyyo bhesajjaṃ pītaṃ, tadeva bhojanaṃ
atk-s0302a:143_2: bhuñjāti sarikkhakattena tadevāti vuccati, evamidhāpi sā ceva avijjā sā ca taṇhāti
atk-s0302a:143_3: idampi sarikkhakattena vuttaṃ. Brahmacariyanti maggabrahmacariyaṃ. Dukkhakkhayāyāti
atk-s0302a:143_4: vaṭṭadukkhassa khayatthāya. Kāyūpago hotīti aññaṃ paṭisandhikāyaṃ upagantā hoti.
atk-s0302a:143_5: Yadidaṃ brahmacariyavāsoti yo ayaṃ maggabrahmacariyavāso, ayaṃ bālato paṇḍitassa
atk-s0302a:143_6: visesoti dasseti. Iti imasmiṃ sutte sabbopi sapaṭisandhiko puthujjano “bālo”ti, appaṭisandhiko
atk-s0302a:143_8: vā na vattabbā, bhajamānā pana paṇḍitapakkhaṃ bhajanti. Navamaṃ.
atk-s0302a:145_0: 20. Dasame paṭiccasamuppādañca vo bhikkhave, desessāmi paṭiccasamuppanne ca dhammeti
atk-s0302a:145_1: satthā imasmiṃ sutte paccaye ca paccayanibbatte ca sabhāvadhamme desessāmīti ubhayaṃ
atk-s0302a:145_2: ārabhi. Uppādā vā tathāgatānanti tathāgatānaṃ uppādepi, buddhesu uppannesu anuppannesupi
atk-s0302a:145_3: jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇaṃ, jātiyeva jarāmaraṇassa paccayo. Ṭhitāva sā dhātūti ṭhitova
atk-s0302a:145_4: so paccayasabhāvo, na kadāci jāti jarāmaraṇassa paccayo na hoti. Dhammaṭṭhitatā dhammaniyāmatāti
atk-s0302a:145_5: imehipi dvīhi paccayameva katheti. Paccayena hi paccayuppannā dhammā tiṭṭhanti, tasmā
atk-s0302a:145_6: paccayova “dhammaṭṭhitatā”ti vuccati. Paccayo dhamme niyameti, tasmā “dhammaniyāmatā”ti
atk-s0302a:145_7: vuccati. Idappaccayatāti imesaṃ jarāmaraṇādīnaṃ paccayā idappaccayā, idappaccayāva
atk-s0302a:145_8: idappaccayatā. Tanti taṃ paccayaṃ. Abhisambujjhatīti ñāṇena abhisambujjhati. Abhisametīti
atk-s0302a:145_9: ñāṇena abhisamāgacchati. Ācikkhatīti katheti. Desetīti dasseti. Paññāpetīti jānāpeti.
atk-s0302a:145_10: Paṭṭhapetīti ñāṇamukhe ṭhapeti. Vivaratīti vivaritvā dasseti. Vibhajatīti vibhāgato
atk-s0302a:145_11: dasseti. Uttānīkarotīti pākaṭaṃ karoti. Passathāti cāhāti passatha iti ca vadati.
atk-s0302a:146_0: Iti kho, bhikkhaveti evaṃ kho, bhikkhave. Yā tatrāti yā tesu “jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇa”ntiādīsu.
atk-s0302a:146_1: Tathatātiādīni paccayākārasseva vevacanāni. So tehi tehi paccayehi anūnādhikeheva
atk-s0302a:146_2: tassa tassa dhammassa sambhavato tathatāti, sāmaggiṃ upagatesu paccayesu muhuttampi
atk-s0302a:146_3: tato nibbattānaṃ dhammānaṃ asambhavābhāvato avitathatāti, aññadhammapaccayehi aññadhammānuppattito
atk-s0302a:146_4: anaññathatāti, jarāmaraṇādīnaṃ paccayato vā paccayasamūhato vā idappaccayatāti vutto.
atk-s0302a:146_5: Tatrāyaṃ vacanattho – imesaṃ paccayā idappaccayā, idappaccayā eva idappaccayatā,
atk-s0302a:146_6: idappaccayānaṃ vā samūho idappaccayatā. Lakkhaṇaṃ panettha saddasatthato veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0302a:147_0: Aniccanti hutvā abhāvaṭṭhena aniccaṃ. Ettha ca aniccanti na jarāmaraṇaṃ aniccaṃ,
atk-s0302a:147_1: aniccasabhāvānaṃ pana khandhānaṃ jarāmaraṇattā aniccaṃ nāma jātaṃ. Saṅkhatādīsupi
atk-s0302a:147_2: eseva nayo. Ettha ca saṅkhatanti paccayehi samāgantvā kataṃ. Paṭiccasamuppannanti
atk-s0302a:147_3: paccaye nissāya uppannaṃ. Khayadhammanti khayasabhāvaṃ. Vayadhammanti vigacchanakasabhāvaṃ.
atk-s0302a:147_5: vuttanayeneva aniccatā veditabbā. Janakapaccayānaṃ vā kiccānubhāvakkhaṇe diṭṭhattā
atk-s0302a:147_6: ekena pariyāyenettha aniccātiādīni yujjantiyeva. Bhavādayo aniccādisabhāvāyeva.
atk-s0302a:148_0: Sammappaññāyāti savipassanāya maggapaññāya. Pubbantanti purimaṃ atītanti attho. Ahosiṃ
atk-s0302a:148_1: nu khotiādīsu “ahosiṃ nu kho nanu kho”ti sassatākārañca adhiccasamuppattiākārañca
atk-s0302a:148_2: nissāya atīte attano vijjamānatañca avijjamānatañca kaṅkhati. Kiṃ kāraṇanti na vattabbaṃ,
atk-s0302a:148_3: ummattako viya bālaputhujjano yathā vā tathā vā pavattati. Kiṃ nu kho ahosinti jātiliṅgupapattiyo
atk-s0302a:148_5: aññataro”ti kaṅkhati. Kathaṃ nu khoti saṇṭhānākāraṃ nissāya “dīgho nu kho ahosiṃ
atk-s0302a:148_7: nissāya ‘kena nu kho kāraṇena ahosi’nti hetuto kaṅkhatī”ti vadanti. Kiṃ hutvā kiṃ
atk-s0302a:148_8: ahosinti jātiādīni nissāya “khattiyo hutvā nu kho brāhmaṇo ahosiṃ…pe… devo hutvā
atk-s0302a:148_9: manusso”ti attano paramparaṃ kaṅkhati. Sabbattheva pana addhānanti kālādhivacanametaṃ.
atk-s0302a:148_10: Aparantanti anāgataṃ antaṃ. Bhavissāmi nu kho nanu khoti sassatākārañca ucchedākārañca
atk-s0302a:148_11: nissāya anāgate attano vijjamānatañca avijjamānatañca kaṅkhati. Sesamettha vuttanayameva.
atk-s0302a:149_0: Etarahi vā paccuppannaṃ addhānanti idāni vā paṭisandhimādiṃ katvā cutipariyantaṃ
atk-s0302a:149_1: sabbampi vattamānakālaṃ gahetvā. Ajjhattaṃ kathaṃkathī bhavissatīti attano khandhesu
atk-s0302a:149_2: vicikicchī bhavissati. Ahaṃ nu khosmīti attano atthibhāvaṃ kaṅkhati. Yuttaṃ panetanti?
atk-s0302a:149_3: Yuttaṃ ayuttanti kā ettha cintā. Apicettha idaṃ vatthumpi udāharanti – cūḷamātāya
atk-s0302a:149_4: kira putto muṇḍo, mahāmātāya putto amuṇḍo, taṃ puttaṃ muṇḍesuṃ, so uṭṭhāya “ahaṃ
atk-s0302a:149_5: nu kho cūḷamātāya putto”ti cintesi. Evaṃ ahaṃ nu khosmīti kaṅkhā hoti. No nu khosmīti
atk-s0302a:149_6: attano natthibhāvaṃ kaṅkhati. Tatrāpi idaṃ vatthu – eko kira macche gaṇhanto udake
atk-s0302a:149_7: ciraṭṭhānena sītibhūtaṃ attano ūruṃ macchoti cintetvā pahari. Aparo susānapasse khettaṃ
atk-s0302a:149_8: rakkhanto bhīto saṅkuṭito sayi, so paṭibujjhitvā attano jaṇṇukāni dve yakkhāti cintetvā
atk-s0302a:149_9: pahari. Evaṃ no nu khosmīti kaṅkhati.
atk-s0302a:150_0: Kiṃ nu khosmīti khattiyova samāno attano khattiyabhāvaṃ kaṅkhati. Eseva nayo sesesupi.
atk-s0302a:150_1: Devo pana samāno devabhāvaṃ ajānanto nāma natthi, sopi pana “ahaṃ rūpī nu kho arūpī
atk-s0302a:150_2: nu kho”tiādinā nayena kaṅkhati. Khattiyādayo kasmā na jānantīti ce? Apaccakkhā tesaṃ
atk-s0302a:150_3: tattha tattha kule uppatti. Gahaṭṭhāpi ca potthalikādayo pabbajitasaññino, pabbajitāpi
atk-s0302a:150_4: “kuppaṃ nu kho me kamma”ntiādinā nayena gahaṭṭhasaññino. Manussāpi ca rājāno viya
atk-s0302a:150_5: attani devasaññino honti. Kathaṃ nu khosmīti vuttanayameva. Kevalañhettha abbhantare
atk-s0302a:150_6: jīvo nāma atthīti gahetvā tassa saṇṭhānākāraṃ nissāya “dīgho nu khosmi rassacaturassachaḷaṃsaaṭṭhaṃsasoḷasaṃsādīnaṃ
atk-s0302a:150_7: aññatarappakāro”ti kaṅkhanto kathaṃ nu khosmīti? Kaṅkhatīti veditabbo. Sarīrasaṇṭhānaṃ
atk-s0302a:150_8: pana paccuppannaṃ ajānanto nāma natthi. Kuto āgato so kuhiṃ gāmī bhavissatīti attabhāvassa
atk-s0302a:150_9: āgatigatiṭṭhānaṃ kaṅkhanto evaṃ kaṅkhati. Ariyasāvakassāti idha sotāpanno adhippeto,
atk-s0302a:156_0: 22. Dutiyaṃ bhagavatā attano ajjhāsayassa vasena vuttaṃ. Tattha dasabalasamannāgatoti
atk-s0302a:156_1: dasahi balehi samannāgato. Balañca nāmetaṃ duvidhaṃ kāyabalañca ñāṇabalañca. Tesu
atk-s0302a:156_2: tathāgatassa kāyabalaṃ hatthikulānusārena veditabbaṃ. Vuttañhetaṃ porāṇehi –
atk-s0302a:159_0: Imāni dasa hatthikulāni. Tattha kāḷāvakanti pakatihatthikulaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Yaṃ dasannaṃ
atk-s0302a:159_1: purisānaṃ kāyabalaṃ, taṃ ekassa kāḷāvakassa hatthino. Yaṃ dasannaṃ kāḷāvakānaṃ balaṃ,
atk-s0302a:159_2: taṃ ekassa gaṅgeyyassa. Yaṃ dasannaṃ gaṅgeyyānaṃ, taṃ ekassa paṇḍarassa. Yaṃ dasannaṃ
atk-s0302a:159_3: paṇḍarānaṃ, taṃ ekassa tambassa. Yaṃ dasannaṃ tambānaṃ, taṃ ekassa piṅgalassa. Yaṃ
atk-s0302a:159_4: dasannaṃ piṅgalānaṃ, taṃ ekassa gandhahatthino. Yaṃ dasannaṃ gandhahatthīnaṃ, taṃ
atk-s0302a:159_5: ekassa maṅgalassa. Yaṃ dasannaṃ maṅgalānaṃ, taṃ ekassa hemavatassa. Yaṃ dasannaṃ
atk-s0302a:159_6: hemavatānaṃ, taṃ ekassa uposathassa. Yaṃ dasannaṃ uposathānaṃ, taṃ ekassa chaddantassa.
atk-s0302a:159_7: Yaṃ dasannaṃ chaddantānaṃ, taṃ ekassa tathāgatassa. Nārāyanasaṅghātabalantipi idameva
atk-s0302a:159_8: vuccati. Tadetaṃ pakatihatthigaṇanāya hatthīnaṃ koṭisahassānaṃ, purisagaṇanāya dasannaṃ
atk-s0302a:159_9: purisakoṭisahassānaṃ balaṃ hoti. Idaṃ tāva tathāgatassa kāyabalaṃ. “Dasabalasamannāgato”ti
atk-s0302a:159_10: ettha pana etaṃ saṅgahaṃ na gacchati. Etañhi bāhirakaṃ lāmakaṃ tiracchānagatānaṃ
atk-s0302a:159_11: sīhādīnampi hoti. Etañhi nissāya dukkhapariññā vā samudayappahānaṃ vā maggabhāvanā
atk-s0302a:159_12: vā phalasacchikiriyā vā natthi. Aññaṃ pana dasasu ṭhānesu akampanatthena upatthambhanatthena
atk-s0302a:159_13: ca dasavidhaṃ ñāṇabalaṃ nāma atthi. Taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “dasabalasamannāgato”ti.
atk-s0302a:160_0: Katamaṃ pana tanti? Ṭhānāṭṭhānādīnaṃ yathābhūtaṃ jānanaṃ. Seyyathidaṃ – ṭhānañca
atk-s0302a:160_1: ṭhānato aṭṭhānañca aṭṭhānato jānanaṃ ekaṃ, atītānāgatapaccuppannānaṃ kammasamādānānaṃ
atk-s0302a:160_2: ṭhānaso hetuso yathābhūtaṃ vipākajānanaṃ ekaṃ, sabbatthagāminipaṭipadājānanaṃ ekaṃ,
atk-s0302a:160_5: saṃkilesavodānavuṭṭhānajānanaṃ ekaṃ, pubbenivāsajānanaṃ ekaṃ, sattānaṃ cutūpapātajānanaṃ
atk-s0302a:161_0: “Idha tathāgato ṭhānañca ṭhānato aṭṭhānañca aṭṭhānato yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti. Yampi
atk-s0302a:161_1: tathāgato ṭhānañca ṭhānato aṭṭhānañca aṭṭhānato yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti. Idampi tathāgatassa
atk-s0302a:161_2: tathāgatabalaṃ hoti, yaṃ balaṃ āgamma tathāgato āsabhaṃ ṭhānaṃ paṭijānāti, parisāsu
atk-s0302a:162: Ādinā nayena vitthārato āgatāneva. Atthavaṇṇanāpi nesaṃ vibhaṅgaṭṭhakathāyañceva papañcasūdaniyā ca majjhimaṭṭhakathāya sabbākārato vuttā. Sā tattha vuttanayeneva gahetabbā.
atk-s0302a:163_0: Catūhi ca vesārajjehīti ettha sārajjapaṭipakkhaṃ vesārajjaṃ, catūsu ṭhānesu vesārajjabhāvaṃ
atk-s0302a:163_2: te paṭijānato ime dhammā anabhisambuddhā”tiādīsu codanāvatthūsu. Tatrāyaṃ pāḷi –
