atk-s0302a:164_1: te paṭijānato ime dhammā anabhisambuddhā’ti tatra vata maṃ samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā
atk-s0302a:164_2: devo vā māro vā brahmā vā koci vā lokasmiṃ saha dhammena paṭicodessatīti nimittametaṃ,
atk-s0302a:164_3: bhikkhave, na samanupassāmi. Etamahaṃ, bhikkhave, nimittaṃ asamanupassanto khemappatto
atk-s0302a:164_4: abhayappatto vesārajjappatto viharāmi. ‘Khīṇāsavassa te paṭijānato ime āsavā aparikkhīṇā’ti
atk-s0302a:164_5: tatra vata maṃ…pe… ‘ye kho pana te antarāyikā dhammā vuttā, te paṭisevato nālaṃ antarāyāyā’ti
atk-s0302a:164_6: tatra vata maṃ…pe… ‘yassa kho pana te atthāya dhammo desito, so na niyyāti takkarassa
atk-s0302a:164_7: sammā dukkhakkhayāyā’ti tatra vata maṃ samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā…pe… vesārajjappatto viharāmī”ti.
atk-s0302a:165_0: Āsabhaṃ ṭhānanti seṭṭhaṭṭhānaṃ uttamaṭṭhānaṃ. Āsabhā vā pubbabuddhā, tesaṃ ṭhānanti
atk-s0302a:165_1: attho. Apica gavasatajeṭṭhako usabho, gavasahassajeṭṭhako vasabho, vajasatajeṭṭhako
atk-s0302a:165_2: vā usabho, vajasahassajeṭṭhako vasabho, sabbagavaseṭṭho sabbaparissayasaho seto pāsādiko
atk-s0302a:165_3: mahābhāravaho asanisatasaddehipi asampakampiyo nisabho, so idha usabhoti adhippeto.
atk-s0302a:165_4: Idampi hi tassa pariyāyavacanaṃ. Usabhassa idanti āsabhaṃ. Ṭhānanti catūhi pādehi
atk-s0302a:165_5: pathaviṃ uppīḷetvā avaṭṭhānaṃ. Idaṃ pana āsabhaṃ viyāti āsabhaṃ. Yatheva hi nisabhasaṅkhāto
atk-s0302a:165_6: usabho usabhabalena samannāgato catūhi pādehi pathaviṃ uppīḷetvā acalaṭṭhānena tiṭṭhati,
atk-s0302a:165_7: evaṃ tathāgatopi dasahi tathāgatabalehi samannāgato catūhi vesārajjapādehi aṭṭhaparisapathaviṃ
atk-s0302a:165_8: uppīḷetvā sadevake loke kenaci paccatthikena paccāmittena akampiyo acalaṭṭhānena
atk-s0302a:165_9: tiṭṭhati. Evaṃ tiṭṭhamāno ca taṃ āsabhaṃ ṭhānaṃ paṭijānāti upagacchati na paccakkhāti,
atk-s0302a:165_10: attani āropeti. Tena vuttaṃ “āsabhaṃ ṭhānaṃ paṭijānātī”ti.
atk-s0302a:166_0: Parisāsūti “aṭṭha kho imā, sāriputta, parisā. Katamā aṭṭha? Khattiyaparisā brāhmaṇaparisā
atk-s0302a:166_1: gahapatiparisā samaṇaparisā cātumahārājikaparisā tāvatiṃsaparisā māraparisā brahmaparisā”ti,
atk-s0302a:166_2: imāsu aṭṭhasu parisāsu. Sīhanādaṃ nadatīti seṭṭhanādaṃ abhītanādaṃ nadati, sīhanādasadisaṃ
atk-s0302a:166_3: vā nādaṃ nadati. Ayamattho sīhanādasuttena dīpetabbo. Yathā vā sīho sahanato ceva
atk-s0302a:166_4: hananato ca sīhoti vuccati, evaṃ tathāgato lokadhammānaṃ sahanato parappavādānañca
atk-s0302a:166_5: hananato sīhoti vuccati. Evaṃ vuttassa sīhassa nādaṃ sīhanādaṃ. Tattha yathā sīho
atk-s0302a:166_6: sīhabalena samannāgato sabbattha visārado vigatalomahaṃso sīhanādaṃ nadati, evaṃ
atk-s0302a:166_7: tathāgatasīhopi tathāgatabalehi samannāgato aṭṭhasu parisāsu visārado vigatalomahaṃso,
atk-s0302a:166_8: “iti rūpa”ntiādinā nayena nānāvidhadesanāvilāsasampannaṃ sīhanādaṃ nadati. Tena vuttaṃ
atk-s0302a:167_0: Brahmacakkaṃ pavattetīti ettha brahmanti seṭṭhaṃ uttamaṃ, visuddhassa dhammacakkassetaṃ
atk-s0302a:167_1: adhivacanaṃ. Taṃ pana dhammacakkaṃ duvidhaṃ hoti paṭivedhañāṇañca desanāñāṇañca.
atk-s0302a:167_2: Tattha paññāpabhāvitaṃ attano ariyaphalāvahaṃ paṭivedhañāṇaṃ, karuṇāpabhāvitaṃ sāvakānaṃ
atk-s0302a:167_3: ariyaphalāvahaṃ desanāñāṇaṃ. Tattha paṭivedhañāṇaṃ uppajjamānaṃ uppannanti duvidhaṃ.
atk-s0302a:167_4: Tañhi abhinikkhamanato paṭṭhāya yāva arahattamaggā uppajjamānaṃ, phalakkhaṇe uppannaṃ
atk-s0302a:167_5: nāma. Tusitabhavanato vā yāva mahābodhipallaṅke arahattamaggā uppajjamānaṃ, phalakkhaṇe
atk-s0302a:167_6: uppannaṃ nāma. Dīpaṅkarato vā paṭṭhāya yāva arahattamaggā uppajjamānaṃ, phalakkhaṇe
atk-s0302a:167_7: uppannaṃ nāma. Desanāñāṇampi pavattamānaṃ pavattanti duvidhaṃ. Tañhi yāva aññāsikoṇḍaññassa
atk-s0302a:167_8: sotāpattimaggā pavattamānaṃ, phalakkhaṇe pavattaṃ nāma. Tesu paṭivedhañāṇaṃ lokuttaraṃ,
atk-s0302a:167_9: desanāñāṇaṃ lokiyaṃ. Ubhayampi panetaṃ aññehi asādhāraṇaṃ buddhānaṃyeva orasañāṇaṃ.
atk-s0302a:168_0: Idāni yaṃ iminā ñāṇena samannāgato sīhanādaṃ nadati, taṃ dassetuṃ iti rūpantiādimāha.
atk-s0302a:168_1: Tattha iti rūpanti idaṃ rūpaṃ ettakaṃ rūpaṃ, ito uddhaṃ rūpaṃ natthīti ruppanasabhāvañceva
atk-s0302a:168_3: vutto. Iti rūpassa samudayoti iminā evaṃ pariggahitassa rūpassa samudayo vutto. Tattha
atk-s0302a:168_4: itīti evaṃ samudayo hotīti attho. Tassa vitthāro “avijjāsamudayā rūpasamudayo taṇhāsamudayā,
atk-s0302a:168_5: kammasamudayā āhārasamudayā rūpasamudayoti nibbattilakkhaṇaṃ passantopi rūpakkhandhassa
atk-s0302a:168_6: udayaṃ passatī”ti evaṃ veditabbo. Atthaṅgamepi “avijjānirodhā rūpanirodho…pe… vipariṇāmalakkhaṇaṃ
atk-s0302a:168_7: passantopi rūpakkhandhassa nirodhaṃ passatī”ti ayaṃ vitthāro.
atk-s0302a:169_0: Iti vedanātiādīsupi ayaṃ vedanā ettakā vedanā, ito uddhaṃ vedanā natthi, ayaṃ saññā,
atk-s0302a:169_1: ime saṅkhārā, idaṃ viññāṇaṃ ettakaṃ viññāṇaṃ, ito uddhaṃ viññāṇaṃ natthīti vedayitasañjānanaabhisaṅkharaṇavijānanasabhāvañceva
atk-s0302a:169_4: pana evaṃ pariggahitānaṃ vedanāsaññāsaṅkhāraviññāṇānaṃ samudayo vutto. Tatrāpi itīti
atk-s0302a:169_5: evaṃ samudayo hotīti attho. Tesampi vitthāro “avijjāsamudayā vedanāsamudayo”ti rūpe
atk-s0302a:169_6: vuttanayeneva veditabbo. Ayaṃ pana viseso – tīsu khandhesu “āhārasamudayā”ti avatvā
atk-s0302a:169_8: tesaṃyeva vasena yojetabbaṃ. Ayamettha saṅkhepo. Vitthārato pana udayabbayavinicchayo
atk-s0302a:170_0: Imasmiṃ sati idaṃ hotīti ayampi aparo sīhanādo. Tassattho – imasmiṃ avijjādike paccaye
atk-s0302a:170_1: sati idaṃ saṅkhārādikaṃ phalaṃ hoti. Imassuppādā idaṃ uppajjatīti imassa avijjādikassa
atk-s0302a:170_2: paccayassa uppādā idaṃ saṅkhārādikaṃ phalaṃ uppajjati. Imasmiṃ asati idaṃ na hotīti
atk-s0302a:170_3: imasmiṃ avijjādike paccaye asati idaṃ saṅkhārādikaṃ phalaṃ na hoti. Imassa nirodhā
atk-s0302a:170_4: idaṃ nirujjhatīti imassa avijjādikassa paccayassa nirodhā idaṃ saṅkhārādikaṃ phalaṃ
atk-s0302a:170_5: nirujjhati. Idāni yathā taṃ hoti ceva nirujjhati ca, taṃ vitthārato dassetuṃ yadidaṃ
atk-s0302a:171_0: Evaṃ svākkhātoti evaṃ pañcakkhandhavibhajanādivasena suṭṭhu akkhāto kathito. Dhammoti
atk-s0302a:171_1: pañcakkhandhapaccayākāradhammo. Uttānoti anikujjito. Vivaṭoti vivaritvā ṭhapito.
atk-s0302a:171_2: Pakāsitoti dīpito jotito. Chinnapilotikoti pilotikā vuccati chinnaṃ bhinnaṃ tattha
atk-s0302a:171_3: tattha sibbitagaṇṭhitaṃ jiṇṇavatthaṃ, taṃ yassa natthīti aṭṭhahatthaṃ navahatthaṃ
atk-s0302a:171_4: vā ahatasāṭakaṃ nivattho, so chinnapilotiko nāma. Ayampi dhammo tādiso. Na hettha
atk-s0302a:171_5: kohaññādivasena chinnabhinnasibbitagaṇṭhitabhāvo atthi. Apica khuddakasāṭakopi pilotikāti
atk-s0302a:171_6: vuccati, sā yassa natthi, aṭṭhanavahattho mahāpaṭo atthi, sopi chinnapilotiko, apagatapilotikoti
atk-s0302a:171_7: attho. Tādiso ayaṃ dhammo. Yathā hi catuhatthaṃ sāṭakaṃ gahetvā pariggahaṇaṃ karonto
atk-s0302a:171_8: puriso ito cito ca añchanto kilamati, evaṃ bāhirakasamaye pabbajitā attano parittakaṃ
atk-s0302a:171_9: dhammaṃ “evaṃ sati evaṃ bhavissatī”ti kappetvā kappetvā vaḍḍhentā kilamanti. Yathā
atk-s0302a:171_10: pana aṭṭhahatthanavahatthena pariggahaṇaṃ karonto yathāruci pārupati na kilamati,
atk-s0302a:171_11: natthi tattha añchitvā vaḍḍhanakiccaṃ; evaṃ imasmimpi dhamme kappetvā kappetvā vibhajanakiccaṃ
atk-s0302a:171_12: natthi, tehi tehi kāraṇehi mayāva ayaṃ dhammo suvibhatto suvitthāritoti idampi sandhāya
atk-s0302a:171_13: “chinnapilotiko”ti āha. Apica kacavaropi pilotikāti vuccati, imasmiñca sāsane samaṇakacavaraṃ
atk-s0302a:177: Iti samaṇakacavarassa chinnattāpi ayaṃ dhammo chinnapilotiko nāma hoti.
atk-s0302a:178_0: Alamevāti yuttameva. Saddhāpabbajitenāti saddhāya pabbajitena. Kulaputtenāti dve
atk-s0302a:178_1: kulaputtā ācārakulaputto jātikulaputto ca. Tattha yo yato kutoci kulā pabbajitvā
atk-s0302a:178_2: sīlādayo pañca dhammakkhandhe pūreti, ayaṃ ācārakulaputto nāma. Yo pana yasakulaputtādayo
atk-s0302a:178_3: viya jātisampannakulā pabbajito, ayaṃ jātikulaputto nāma. Tesu idha ācārakulaputto
atk-s0302a:178_4: adhippeto. Sace pana jātikulaputto ācāravā hoti, ayaṃ uttamoyeva. Evarūpena kulaputtena.
atk-s0302a:178_5: Vīriyaṃ ārabhitunti caturaṅgasamannāgataṃ vīriyaṃ kātuṃ. Idānissa caturaṅgaṃ dassento
atk-s0302a:178_6: kāmaṃ taco cātiādimāha. Ettha hi taco ekaṃ aṅgaṃ, nhāru ekaṃ, aṭṭhi ekaṃ, maṃsalohitaṃ
atk-s0302a:178_7: ekanti. Idañca pana caturaṅgasamannāgataṃ vīriyaṃ adhiṭṭhahantena navasu ṭhānesu
atk-s0302a:178_8: samādhātabbaṃ purebhatte pacchābhatte purimayāme majjhimayāme pacchimayāme gamane
atk-s0302a:179_0: Dukkhaṃ, bhikkhave, kusīto viharatīti imasmiṃ sāsane yo kusīto puggalo, so dukkhaṃ
atk-s0302a:179_1: viharati. Bāhirasamaye pana yo kusīto, so sukhaṃ viharati. Vokiṇṇoti missībhūto.
atk-s0302a:179_2: Sadatthanti sobhanaṃ vā atthaṃ sakaṃ vā atthaṃ, ubhayenāpi arahattameva adhippetaṃ.
atk-s0302a:179_3: Parihāpetīti hāpeti na pāpuṇāti. Kusītapuggalassa hi cha dvārāni aguttāni honti,
atk-s0302a:179_4: tīṇi kammāni aparisuddhāni, ājīvaṭṭhamakaṃ sīlaṃ apariyodātaṃ, bhinnājīvo kulūpako
atk-s0302a:179_5: hoti. So sabrahmacārīnaṃ akkhimhi patitarajaṃ viya upaghātakaro hutvā dukkhaṃ viharati,
atk-s0302a:179_6: pīṭhamaddano ceva hoti laṇḍapūrako ca, satthu ajjhāsayaṃ gahetuṃ na sakkoti, dullabhaṃ
atk-s0302a:179_7: khaṇaṃ virādheti, tena bhutto raṭṭhapiṇḍopi na mahapphalo hoti.
atk-s0302a:180_0: Āraddhavīriyo ca kho, bhikkhaveti āraddhavīriyo puggalo imasmiṃyeva sāsane sukhaṃ
atk-s0302a:180_1: viharati. Bāhirasamaye pana yo āraddhavīriyo, so dukkhaṃ viharati. Pavivittoti vivitto
atk-s0302a:180_2: viyutto hutvā. Sadatthaṃ paripūretīti arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti. Āraddhavīriyassa hi cha
atk-s0302a:180_3: dvārāni suguttāni honti, tīṇi kammāni parisuddhāni, ājīvaṭṭhamakaṃ sīlaṃ pariyodātaṃ
atk-s0302a:180_4: sabrahmacārīnaṃ akkhimhi susītalañjanaṃ viya dhātugatacandanaṃ viya ca manāpo hutvā
atk-s0302a:180_5: sukhaṃ viharati, satthu ajjhāsayaṃ gahetuṃ sakkoti. Satthā hi –
atk-s0302a:182: Evaṃ gotamiyā vandito, “na kho, gotami, tathāgatā evaṃ vanditabbā”ti paṭikkhipitvā tāya yācito vanditabbākāraṃ ācikkhanto evamāha –
atk-s0302a:184: Samagge sāvake passa, esā buddhāna vandanā”ti. ;
atk-s0302a:185_0: Evaṃ āraddhavīriyo satthu ajjhāsayaṃ gahetuṃ sakkoti, dullabhaṃ khaṇaṃ na virādheti.
atk-s0302a:185_1: Tassa hi buddhuppādo dhammadesanā saṅghasuppaṭipatti saphalā hoti saudrayā, raṭṭhapiṇḍopi
atk-s0302a:186_0: Hīnena aggassāti hīnāya saddhāya hīnena vīriyena hīnāya satiyā hīnena samādhinā hīnāya
atk-s0302a:186_1: paññāya aggasaṅkhātassa arahattassa patti nāma na hoti. Aggena ca khoti aggehi saddhādīhi
atk-s0302a:186_2: aggassa arahattassa patti hoti. Maṇḍapeyyanti pasannaṭṭhena maṇḍaṃ, pātabbaṭṭhena
atk-s0302a:186_3: peyyaṃ. Yañhi pivitvā antaravīthiyaṃ patito visaññī attano sāṭakādīnampi assāmiko
atk-s0302a:186_4: hoti, taṃ pasannampi na pātabbaṃ, mayhaṃ pana sāsanaṃ evaṃ pasannañca pātabbañcāti
atk-s0302a:187_0: Tattha tividho maṇḍo – desanāmaṇḍo, paṭiggahamaṇḍo, brahmacariyamaṇḍoti. Katamo desanāmaṇḍo?
atk-s0302a:187_1: Catunnaṃ ariyasaccānaṃ ācikkhanā desanā paññāpanā paṭṭhapanā vivaraṇā vibhajanā uttānīkammaṃ,
atk-s0302a:187_2: catunnaṃ satipaṭṭhānānaṃ…pe… ariyassa aṭṭhaṅgikassa maggassa ācikkhanā…pe… uttānīkammaṃ,
atk-s0302a:187_3: ayaṃ desanāmaṇḍo. Katamo paṭiggahamaṇḍo? Bhikkhū bhikkhuniyo upāsakā upāsikāyo devā
atk-s0302a:187_4: manussā ye vā panaññepi keci viññātāro, ayaṃ paṭiggahamaṇḍo. Katamo brahmacariyamaṇḍo?
atk-s0302a:187_5: Ayameva ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo, seyyathidaṃ – sammādiṭṭhi…pe… sammāsamādhi, ayaṃ
atk-s0302a:187_6: brahmacariyamaṇḍo. Apica adhimokkhamaṇḍo saddhindriyaṃ, assaddhiyaṃ kasaṭo, assaddhiyaṃ
atk-s0302a:187_7: kasaṭaṃ chaḍḍetvā saddhindriyassa adhimokkhamaṇḍaṃ pivatīti maṇḍapeyyantiādināpi
atk-s0302a:187_8: nayenettha attho veditabbo. Satthā sammukhībhūtoti idamettha kāraṇavacanaṃ. Yasmā
atk-s0302a:187_9: satthā sammukhībhūto, tasmā vīriyasampayogaṃ katvā pivatha etaṃ maṇḍaṃ. Bāhirakañhi
atk-s0302a:187_10: bhesajjamaṇḍampi vejjassa asammukhā pivantānaṃ pamāṇaṃ vā uggamanaṃ vā niggamanaṃ
atk-s0302a:187_11: vā na jānāmāti āsaṅkā hoti. Vejjasammukhā pana “vejjo jānissatī”ti nirāsaṅkā pivanti.
atk-s0302a:187_12: Evameva amhākaṃ dhammassāmi satthā sammukhībhūtoti vīriyaṃ katvā pivathāti maṇḍapāne
atk-s0302a:187_13: nesaṃ niyojento tasmātiha, bhikkhavetiādimāha. Tattha saphalāti sānisaṃsā. Saudrayāti
atk-s0302a:187_14: savaḍḍhi. Idāni niyojanānurūpaṃ sikkhitabbataṃ niddisanto attatthaṃ vā hi, bhikkhavetiādimāha.
atk-s0302a:187_15: Tattha attatthanti attano atthabhūtaṃ arahattaṃ. Appamādena sampādetunti appamādena
atk-s0302a:187_16: sabbakiccāni kātuṃ. Paratthanti paccayadāyakānaṃ mahapphalānisaṃsaṃ. Sesaṃ sabbattha
atk-s0302a:189_0: 23. Tatiye “jānato aha”ntiādīsu jānatoti jānantassa. Passatoti passantassa. Dvepi
atk-s0302a:189_1: padāni ekatthāni, byañjanameva nānaṃ. Evaṃ santepi “jānato”ti ñāṇalakkhaṇaṃ upādāya
atk-s0302a:189_2: puggalaṃ niddisati. Jānanalakkhaṇañhi ñāṇaṃ. “Passato”ti ñāṇappabhāvaṃ upādāya. Passanappabhāvañhi
atk-s0302a:189_3: ñāṇaṃ, ñāṇasamaṅgīpuggalo cakkhumā viya cakkhunā rūpāni, ñāṇena vivaṭe dhamme passati.
atk-s0302a:189_4: Āsavānaṃ khayanti ettha āsavānaṃ pahānaṃ asamuppādo khīṇākāro natthibhāvoti ayampi
atk-s0302a:189_5: āsavakkhayoti vuccati, bhaṅgopi maggaphalanibbānānipi. “Āsavānaṃ khayā anāsavaṃ cetovimutti”ntiādīsu
atk-s0302a:189_6: hi khīṇākāro āsavakkhayoti vuccati. “Yo āsavānaṃ khayo vayo bhedo paribhedo aniccatā
atk-s0302a:191: Khayasmiṃ paṭhamaṃ ñāṇaṃ, tato aññā anantarā”ti. ; –
atk-s0302a:192_0: Ettha maggo. So hi āsave khepento vūpasamento uppajjati, tasmā āsavānaṃ khayoti vutto.
atk-s0302a:192_1: “Āsavānaṃ khayā samaṇo hotī”ti ettha phalaṃ. Tañhi āsavānaṃ khīṇante uppajjati, tasmā
atk-s0302a:194_0: Ettha nibbānaṃ. Tañhi āgamma āsavā khīyanti, tasmā āsavānaṃ khayoti vuttaṃ. Idha
atk-s0302a:194_1: pana maggaphalāni adhippetāni. No ajānato no apassatoti yo pana na jānāti na passati,
atk-s0302a:194_2: tassa no vadāmīti attho. Etena ye ajānato apassatopi saṃsārādīhiyeva suddhiṃ vadanti,
atk-s0302a:194_3: te paṭikkhittā honti. Purimena padadvayena upāyo vutto, iminā anupāyaṃ paṭisedheti.
atk-s0302a:195_0: Idāni yaṃ jānato āsavānaṃ khayo hoti, taṃ dassetukāmo kiñca, bhikkhave, jānatoti
atk-s0302a:195_1: pucchaṃ ārabhi. Tattha jānanā bahuvidhā. Dabbajātiko eva hi koci bhikkhu chattaṃ
atk-s0302a:195_2: kātuṃ jānāti, koci cīvarādīnaṃ aññataraṃ, tassa īdisāni kammāni vattasīse ṭhatvā
atk-s0302a:195_3: karontassa sā jānanā saggamaggaphalānaṃ padaṭṭhānaṃ na hotīti na vattabbaṃ. Yo pana
atk-s0302a:195_4: sāsane pabbajitvā vejjakammādīni kātuṃ jānāti, tassevaṃ jānato āsavā vaḍḍhantiyeva.
atk-s0302a:195_5: Tasmā yaṃ jānato passato ca āsavānaṃ khayo hoti, tadeva dassento iti rūpantiādimāha.
atk-s0302a:195_6: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, jānatoti evaṃ pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ udayabbayaṃ jānantassa. Āsavānaṃ
atk-s0302a:195_7: khayo hotīti āsavānaṃ khayante jātattā “āsavānaṃ khayo”ti laddhanāmaṃ arahattaṃ hoti.
atk-s0302a:196_0: Evaṃ arahattanikūṭena desanaṃ niṭṭhapetvā idāni khīṇāsavassa āgamanīyaṃ pubbabhāgapaṭipadaṃ
atk-s0302a:196_1: dassetuṃ yampissa taṃ, bhikkhavetiādimāha. Tattha khayasmiṃ khayeñāṇanti āsavakkhayasaṅkhāte
atk-s0302a:196_2: arahattaphale paṭiladdhe sati paccavekkhaṇañāṇaṃ. Tañhi arahattaphalasaṅkhāte khayasmiṃ
atk-s0302a:196_3: paṭhamavāraṃ uppanne pacchā uppannattā khayeñāṇanti vuccati. Saupanisanti sakāraṇaṃ
atk-s0302a:196_4: sappaccayaṃ. Vimuttīti arahattaphalavimutti. Sā hissa upanissayapaccayena paccayo
atk-s0302a:196_5: hoti. Evaṃ ito paresupi labbhamānavasena paccayabhāvo veditabbo.
atk-s0302a:197_0: Virāgoti maggo. So hi kilese virājento khepento uppanno, tasmā virāgoti vuccati.
atk-s0302a:197_1: Nibbidāti nibbidāñāṇaṃ. Etena balavavipassanaṃ dasseti. Balavavipassanāti bhayatūpaṭṭhāne
atk-s0302a:197_2: ñāṇaṃ ādīnavānupassane ñāṇaṃ muñcitukamyatāñāṇaṃ saṅkhārupekkhāñāṇanti catunnaṃ ñāṇānaṃ
atk-s0302a:197_4: taruṇavipassanaṃ dasseti. Taruṇavipassanā hi balavavipassanāya paccayo hoti. Taruṇavipassanāti
atk-s0302a:197_5: saṅkhāraparicchede ñāṇaṃ kaṅkhāvitaraṇe ñāṇaṃ sammasane ñāṇaṃ maggāmagge ñāṇanti
atk-s0302a:197_6: catunnaṃ ñāṇānaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Samādhīti pādakajjhānasamādhi. So hi taruṇavipassanāya
atk-s0302a:197_7: paccayo hoti. Sukhanti appanāya pubbabhāgasukhaṃ. Tañhi pādakajjhānassa paccayo hoti.
atk-s0302a:197_8: Passaddhīti darathapaṭippassaddhi. Sā hi appanāpubbabhāgassa sukhassa paccayo hoti.
atk-s0302a:197_9: Pītīti balavapīti. Sā hi darathapaṭippassaddhiyā paccayo hoti. Pāmojjanti dubbalapīti.
atk-s0302a:197_10: Sā hi balavapītiyā paccayo hoti. Saddhāti aparāparaṃ uppajjanasaddhā. Sā hi dubbalapītiyā
atk-s0302a:197_11: paccayo hoti. Dukkhanti vaṭṭadukkhaṃ. Tañhi aparāparasaddhāya paccayo hoti. Jātīti
atk-s0302a:197_12: savikārā khandhajāti. Sā hi vaṭṭadukkhassa paccayo hoti. Bhavoti kammabhavo. (So
atk-s0302a:197_13: hi savikārāya jātiyā paccayo hoti.) Etenupāyena sesapadānipi veditabbāni.
atk-s0302a:198_0: Thullaphusitaketi mahāphusitake. Pabbatakandarapadarasākhāti ettha kandaraṃ nāma
atk-s0302a:198_2: vuccati. Padaraṃ nāma aṭṭhamāse deve avassante phalito bhūmippadeso. Sākhāti kusumbhagāminiyo
atk-s0302a:198_3: khuddakamātikāyo. Kusobbhāti khuddakaāvāṭā. Mahāsobbhāti mahāāvāṭā. Kunnadiyoti khuddakanadiyo.
atk-s0302a:198_4: Mahānadiyoti gaṅgāyamunādikā mahāsaritā. Evameva kho, bhikkhave, avijjūpanisā saṅkhārātiādīsu
atk-s0302a:198_5: avijjā pabbatoti daṭṭhabbā. Abhisaṅkhārā meghoti, viññāṇādivaṭṭaṃ kandarādayoti, vimutti sāgaroti.
atk-s0302a:199_0: Yathā pabbatamatthake devo vassitvā pabbatakandarādīni pūrento anupubbena mahāsamuddaṃ
atk-s0302a:199_1: sāgaraṃ pūreti, evaṃ avijjāpabbatamatthake tāva abhisaṅkhārameghassa vassanaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0302a:199_2: Assutavā hi bālaputhujjano avijjāya aññāṇī hutvā taṇhāya abhilāsaṃ katvā kusalākusalakammaṃ
atk-s0302a:199_3: āyūhati, taṃ kusalākusalakammaṃ paṭisandhiviññāṇassa paccayo hoti, paṭisandhiviññāṇādīni
atk-s0302a:199_4: nāmarūpādīnaṃ. Iti pabbatamatthake vuṭṭhadevassa kandarādayo pūretvā mahāsamuddaṃ
atk-s0302a:199_5: āhacca ṭhitakālo viya avijjāpabbatamatthake vuṭṭhassa abhisaṅkhārameghassa paramparapaccayatāya
atk-s0302a:199_6: anupubbena viññāṇādivaṭṭaṃ pūretvā ṭhitakālo. Buddhavacanaṃ pana pāḷiyaṃ agahitampi
atk-s0302a:199_7: “idha tathāgato loke uppajjati, agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajatī”ti imāya pāḷiyā vasena
atk-s0302a:199_8: gahitamevāti veditabbaṃ. Yā hi tassa kulagehe nibbatti, sā kammabhavapaccayā savikārā
atk-s0302a:199_9: jāti nāma. So buddhānaṃ vā buddhasāvakānaṃ vā sammukhībhāvaṃ āgamma vaṭṭadosadīpakaṃ
atk-s0302a:199_10: lakkhaṇāhaṭaṃ dhammakathaṃ sutvā vaṭṭavasena pīḷito hoti, evamassa savikārā khandhajāti
atk-s0302a:199_11: vaṭṭadukkhassa paccayo hoti. So vaṭṭadukkhena pīḷito aparāparaṃ saddhaṃ janetvā agārasmā
atk-s0302a:199_12: anagāriyaṃ pabbajati, evamassa vaṭṭadukkhaṃ aparāparasaddhāya paccayo hoti. So pabbajjāmatteneva
atk-s0302a:199_13: asantuṭṭho ūnapañcavassakāle nissayaṃ gahetvā vattapaṭipattiṃ pūrento dvemātikā paguṇaṃ
atk-s0302a:199_14: katvā kammākammaṃ uggahetvā yāva arahattā nijjaṭaṃ katvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā araññe
atk-s0302a:199_15: vasanto pathavīkasiṇādīsu kammaṃ ārabhati, tassa kammaṭṭhānaṃ nissāya dubbalapīti
atk-s0302a:199_16: uppajjati. Tadassa saddhūpanisaṃ pāmojjaṃ, taṃ balavapītiyā paccayo hoti. Balavapīti
atk-s0302a:199_17: darathapaṭippassaddhiyā, sā appanāpubbabhāgasukhassa, taṃ sukhaṃ pādakajjhānasamādhissa.
atk-s0302a:199_18: So samādhinā cittakallataṃ janetvā taruṇavipassanāya kammaṃ karoti. Iccassa pādakajjhānasamādhi
atk-s0302a:199_19: taruṇavipassanāya paccayo hoti, taruṇavipassanā balavavipassanāya, balavavipassanā
atk-s0302a:199_20: maggassa, maggo phalavimuttiyā, phalavimutti paccavekkhaṇañāṇassāti. Evaṃ devassa
atk-s0302a:199_21: anupubbena sāgaraṃ pūretvā ṭhitakālo viya khīṇāsavassa vimuttisāgaraṃ pūretvā ṭhitakālo
atk-s0302a:201_0: 24. Catutthe pāvisīti paviṭṭho. So ca na tāva paviṭṭho, “pavisissāmī”ti nikkhantattā
atk-s0302a:201_1: pana evaṃ vutto. Yathā kiṃ? Yathā “gāmaṃ gamissāmī”ti nikkhantapuriso taṃ gāmaṃ appattopi
atk-s0302a:201_2: “kahaṃ itthannāmo”ti vutte “gāmaṃ gato”ti vuccati, evaṃ. Atippagoti tadā kira therassa
atk-s0302a:201_3: atippagoyeva nikkhantadivaso ahosi, atippagoyeva nikkhantabhikkhū bodhiyaṅgaṇe cetiyaṅgaṇe
atk-s0302a:201_4: nivāsanapārupanaṭṭhāneti imesu ṭhānesu yāva bhikkhācāravelā hoti, tāva papañcaṃ karonti.
atk-s0302a:201_5: Therassa pana “yāva bhikkhācāravelā hoti, tāva paribbājakehi saddhiṃ ekadvekathāvāre
atk-s0302a:201_6: karissāmī”ti cintayato yaṃnūnāhanti etadahosi. Paribbājakānaṃ ārāmoti so kira ārāmo
atk-s0302a:201_7: dakkhiṇadvārassa ca veḷuvanassa ca antarā ahosi. Idhāti imesu catūsu vādesu. Kiṃvādī
atk-s0302a:201_8: kimakkhāyīti kiṃ vadati kiṃ ācikkhati, kiṃ ettha samaṇassa gotamassa dassananti pucchanti.
atk-s0302a:201_9: Dhammassa cānudhammaṃ byākareyyāmāti, bhotā gotamena yaṃ vuttaṃ kāraṇaṃ, tassa anukāraṇaṃ
atk-s0302a:201_10: katheyyāma. Sahadhammiko vādānupātoti parehi vuttakāraṇena sakāraṇo hutvā samaṇassa
atk-s0302a:201_11: gotamassa vādānupāto vādappavatti viññūhi garahitabbaṃ kāraṇaṃ koci appamattakopi
atk-s0302a:201_12: kathaṃ nāgaccheyya? Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – kathaṃ sabbākārenapi samaṇassa gotamassa vāde
atk-s0302a:202_0: Iti vadanti phassapaccayā dukkhanti evaṃ vadantoti attho. Tatrāti tesu catūsu vādesu.
atk-s0302a:202_1: Te vata aññatra phassāti idaṃ “tadapi phassapaccayā”ti paṭiññāya sādhakavacanaṃ.
atk-s0302a:202_2: Yasmā hi na vinā phassena dukkhapaṭisaṃvedanā atthi, tasmā jānitabbametaṃ yathā “tadapi
atk-s0302a:203_0: Sādhu, sādhu, ānandāti ayaṃ sādhukāro sāriputtattherassa dinno, ānandattherena pana
atk-s0302a:203_1: saddhiṃ bhagavā āmantesi. Ekamidāhanti ettha idhāti nipātamattaṃ, ekaṃ samayanti
atk-s0302a:203_2: attho. Idaṃ vacanaṃ “na kevalaṃ sāriputtova rājagahaṃ paviṭṭho, ahampi pāvisiṃ. Na
atk-s0302a:203_3: kevalañca tassevāyaṃ vitakko uppanno, mayhampi uppajji. Na kevalañca tasseva sā titthiyehi
atk-s0302a:203_4: saddhiṃ kathā jātā, mayhampi jātapubbā”ti dassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0302a:204_0: Acchariyaṃ abbhutanti ubhayampetaṃ vimhayadīpanameva. Vacanattho panettha accharaṃ
atk-s0302a:204_1: paharituṃ yuttanti acchariyaṃ. Abhūtapubbaṃ bhūtanti abbhutaṃ. Ekena padenāti “phassapaccayā
atk-s0302a:204_2: dukkha”nti iminā ekena padena. Etena hi sabbavādānaṃ paṭikkhepattho vutto. Esevatthoti
atk-s0302a:204_3: esoyeva phassapaccayā dukkhanti paṭiccasamuppādattho. Taññevettha paṭibhātūti taññevettha
atk-s0302a:204_4: upaṭṭhātu. Idāni thero jarāmaraṇādikāya paṭiccasamuppādakathāya taṃ atthagambhīrañceva
atk-s0302a:204_5: gambhīrāvabhāsañca karonto sace maṃ, bhantetiādiṃ vatvā yaṃmūlakā kathā uppannā,
atk-s0302a:204_6: tadeva padaṃ gahetvā vivaṭṭaṃ dassento channaṃtvevātiādimāha. Sesaṃ uttānamevāti. Catutthaṃ.
atk-s0302a:206_0: 25-26. Pañcame bhūmijoti tassa therassa nāmaṃ. Sesamidhāpi purimasutte vuttanayeneva
atk-s0302a:206_1: veditabbaṃ. Ayaṃ pana viseso – yasmā idaṃ sukhadukkhaṃ na kevalaṃ phassapaccayā uppajjati,
atk-s0302a:206_2: kāyenapi kariyamānaṃ karīyati, vācāyapi manasāpi, attanāpi kariyamānaṃ karīyati,
atk-s0302a:206_3: parenapi kariyamānaṃ karīyati, sampajānenapi kariyamānaṃ karīyati, asampajānenapi,
atk-s0302a:206_4: tasmā tassa aparampi paccayavisesaṃ dassetuṃ kāye vā hānanda, satītiādimāha. Kāyasañcetanāhetūti
atk-s0302a:206_5: kāyadvāre uppannacetanāhetu. Vacīsañcetanāmanosañcetanāsupi eseva nayo. Ettha ca
atk-s0302a:206_6: kāyadvāre kāmāvacarakusalākusalavasena vīsati cetanā labbhanti, tathā vacīdvāre.
atk-s0302a:206_7: Manodvāre navahi rūpārūpacetanāhi saddhiṃ ekūnatiṃsāti tīsu dvāresu ekūnasattati
atk-s0302a:206_8: cetanā honti, tappaccayaṃ vipākasukhadukkhaṃ dassitaṃ. Avijjāpaccayā cāti idaṃ tāpi
atk-s0302a:206_9: cetanā avijjāpaccayā hontīti dassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Yasmā pana taṃ yathāvuttacetanābhedaṃ
atk-s0302a:206_10: kāyasaṅkhārañceva vacīsaṅkhārañca manosaṅkhārañca parehi anussāhito sāmaṃ asaṅkhārikacittena
atk-s0302a:206_11: karoti, parehi kāriyamāno sasaṅkhārikacittenāpi karoti, “idaṃ nāma kammaṃ karoti,
atk-s0302a:206_12: tassa evarūpo nāma vipāko bhavissatī”ti, evaṃ kammañca vipākañca jānantopi karoti,
atk-s0302a:206_13: mātāpitūsu cetiyavandanādīni karontesu anukarontā dārakā viya kevalaṃ kammameva jānanto
atk-s0302a:206_14: “imassa pana kammassa ayaṃ vipāko”ti vipākaṃ ajānantopi karoti, tasmā taṃ dassetuṃ
atk-s0302a:206_15: sāmaṃ vā taṃ, ānanda, kāyasaṅkhāraṃ abhisaṅkharotītiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0302a:207_0: Imesu, ānanda, dhammesūti ye ime “sāmaṃ vā taṃ, ānanda, kāyasaṅkhāra”ntiādīsu catūsu
atk-s0302a:207_1: ṭhānesu vuttā chasattati dvesatā cetanādhammā, imesu dhammesu avijjā upanissayakoṭiyā
atk-s0302a:207_2: anupatitā. Sabbepi hi te “avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā”ti ettheva saṅgahaṃ gacchanti. Idāni
atk-s0302a:207_3: vivaṭṭaṃ dassento avijjāya tvevātiādimāha. So kāyo na hotīti yasmiṃ kāye sati kāyasañcetanāpaccayaṃ
atk-s0302a:207_4: ajjhattaṃ sukhadukkhaṃ uppajjati, so kāyo na hoti. Vācāmanesupi eseva nayo. Apica
atk-s0302a:207_5: kāyoti cetanākāyo, vācāpi cetanāvācā, manopi kammamanoyeva. Dvārakāyo vā kāyo. Vācāmanesupi
atk-s0302a:207_6: eseva nayo. Khīṇāsavo cetiyaṃ vandati, dhammaṃ bhaṇati, kammaṭṭhānaṃ manasi karoti,
atk-s0302a:207_7: kathamassa kāyādayo na hontīti? Avipākattā. Khīṇāsavena hi kataṃ kammaṃ neva kusalaṃ
atk-s0302a:207_8: hoti nākusalaṃ. Avipākaṃ hutvā kiriyāmatte tiṭṭhati, tenassa te kāyādayo na hontīti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0302a:208_0: Khettaṃ taṃ na hotītiādīsupi viruhanaṭṭhena taṃ khettaṃ na hoti, patiṭṭhānaṭṭhena
atk-s0302a:208_1: vatthu na hoti, paccayaṭṭhena āyatanaṃ na hoti, kāraṇaṭṭhena adhikaraṇaṃ na hoti.
atk-s0302a:208_2: Sañcetanāmūlakañhi ajjhattaṃ sukhadukkhaṃ uppajjeyya, sā sañcetanā etesaṃ viruhanādīnaṃ
atk-s0302a:208_3: atthānaṃ abhāvena tassa sukhadukkhassa neva khettaṃ, na vatthu na āyatanaṃ, na adhikaraṇaṃ
atk-s0302a:208_4: hotīti. Imasmiṃ sutte vedanādīsu sukhadukkhameva kathitaṃ, tañca kho vipākamevāti. Pañcamaṃ.
atk-s0302a:209: Chaṭṭhaṃ upavāṇasuttaṃ uttānameva. Ettha pana vaṭṭadukkhameva kathitanti. Chaṭṭhaṃ.
atk-s0302a:211_0: 27-28. Sattame paṭipāṭiyā vuttesu pariyosānapadaṃ gahetvā katamañca, bhikkhave, jarāmaraṇantiādi
atk-s0302a:211_1: vuttaṃ. Evaṃ paccayaṃ pajānātīti evaṃ dukkhasaccavasena paccayaṃ jānāti. Paccayasamudayādayopi
atk-s0302a:211_2: samudayasaccādīnaṃyeva vasena veditabbā. Diṭṭhisampannoti maggadiṭṭhiyā sampanno.
atk-s0302a:211_3: Dassanasampannoti tasseva vevacanaṃ. Āgato imaṃ saddhammanti maggasaddhammaṃ āgato.
atk-s0302a:211_4: Passatīti maggasaddhammameva passati. Sekkhena ñāṇenāti maggañāṇeneva. Sekkhāya vijjāyāti
atk-s0302a:211_5: maggavijjāya eva. Dhammasotaṃ samāpannoti maggasaṅkhātameva dhammasotaṃ samāpanno.
atk-s0302a:211_6: Ariyoti puthujjanabhūmiṃ atikkanto. Nibbedhikapaññoti nibbedhikapaññāya samannāgato.
atk-s0302a:211_7: Amatadvāraṃ āhacca tiṭṭhatīti amataṃ nāma nibbānaṃ, tassa dvāraṃ ariyamaggaṃ āhacca
atk-s0302a:213: 29-30. Navamaṃ akkharabhāṇakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ ajjhāsayena vuttaṃ. Te hi parīti upasaggaṃ pakkhipitvā vuccamāne paṭivijjhituṃ sakkonti. Navamaṃ.
atk-s0302a:214: Dasame sabbaṃ uttānameva. Imesu dvīsu suttesu catusaccapaṭivedhova kathito. Dasamaṃ.
atk-s0302a:218_0: 31. Kaḷārakhattiyavaggassa paṭhame ajitapañheti ajitamāṇavena pucchitapañhe. Saṅkhātadhammāseti
atk-s0302a:218_1: saṅkhātadhammā vuccanti ñātadhammā tulitadhammā tīritadhammā. Sekkhāti satta sekkhā.
atk-s0302a:218_2: Puthūti teyeva satta jane sandhāya puthūti vuttaṃ. Idhāti imasmiṃ sāsane. Nipakoti
atk-s0302a:218_3: nepakkaṃ vuccati paññā, tāya samannāgatattā nipako, tvaṃ paṇḍito pabrūhīti yācati.
atk-s0302a:218_4: Iriyanti vuttiṃ ācāraṃ gocaraṃ vihāraṃ paṭipattiṃ. Mārisāti bhagavantaṃ ālapati.
atk-s0302a:218_5: Sekkhānañca saṅkhātadhammānañca khīṇāsavānañca paṭipattiṃ mayā pucchito paṇḍita,
atk-s0302a:219_0: Tuṇhī ahosīti kasmā yāva tatiyaṃ puṭṭho tuṇhī ahosi? Kiṃ pañhe kaṅkhati, udāhu ajjhāsayeti?
atk-s0302a:219_1: Ajjhāsaye kaṅkhati, no pañhe. Evaṃ kirassa ahosi – “satthā maṃ sekkhāsekkhānaṃ āgamanīyapaṭipadaṃ
atk-s0302a:219_2: kathāpetukāmo; sā ca khandhavasena dhātuvasena āyatanavasena paccayākāravasenāti
atk-s0302a:219_3: bahūhi kāraṇehi sakkā kathetuṃ. Kathaṃ kathento nu kho satthu ajjhāsayaṃ gahetvā
atk-s0302a:219_4: kathetuṃ sakkhissāmī”ti? Atha satthā cintesi – “ṭhapetvā maṃ añño pattaṃ ādāya caranto
atk-s0302a:219_5: sāvako nāma paññāya sāriputtasamo natthi. Ayampi mayā pañhaṃ puṭṭho yāva tatiyaṃ
atk-s0302a:219_6: tuṇhī eva. Pañhe nu kho kaṅkhati, udāhu ajjhāsaye”ti. Atha “ajjhāsaye”ti ñatvā pañhakathanatthāya
atk-s0302a:219_7: nayaṃ dadamāno bhūtamidanti, sāriputta, passasīti āha.
atk-s0302a:220_0: Tattha bhūtanti jātaṃ nibbattaṃ, khandhapañcakassetaṃ nāmaṃ. Iti satthā “pañcakkhandhavasena,
atk-s0302a:220_1: sāriputta, imaṃ pañhaṃ kathehī”ti therassa nayaṃ deti. Sahanayadānena pana therassa
atk-s0302a:220_2: tīre ṭhitapurisassa vivaṭo ekaṅgaṇo mahāsamuddo viya nayasatena nayasahassena pañhabyākaraṇaṃ
atk-s0302a:220_3: upaṭṭhāsi. Atha naṃ byākaronto bhūtamidanti, bhantetiādimāha. Tattha bhūtamidanti
atk-s0302a:220_4: idaṃ nibbattaṃ khandhapañcakaṃ. Sammappaññāya passatīti saha vipassanāya maggapaññāya
atk-s0302a:220_5: sammā passati. Paṭipanno hotīti sīlato paṭṭhāya yāva arahattamaggā nibbidādīnaṃ atthāya
atk-s0302a:220_6: paṭipanno hoti. Tadāhārasambhavanti idaṃ kasmā ārabhi? Etaṃ khandhapañcakaṃ āhāraṃ
atk-s0302a:220_7: paṭicca ṭhitaṃ, tasmā taṃ āhārasambhavaṃ nāma katvā dassetuṃ idaṃ ārabhi. Iti imināpi
atk-s0302a:220_8: pariyāyena sekkhapaṭipadā kathitā hoti. Tadāhāranirodhāti tesaṃ āhārānaṃ nirodhena.
atk-s0302a:220_9: Idaṃ kasmā ārabhi? Tañhi khandhapañcakaṃ āhāranirodhā nirujjhati, tasmā taṃ āhāranirodhasambhavaṃ
atk-s0302a:220_10: nāma katvā dassetuṃ idaṃ ārabhi. Iti imināpi pariyāyena sekkhasseva paṭipadā kathitā.
atk-s0302a:220_11: Nibbidāti ādīni sabbāni kāraṇavacanānīti veditabbāni. Anupādā vimuttoti catūhi upādānehi
atk-s0302a:220_12: kañci dhammaṃ agahetvā vimutto. Sādhu sādhūti iminā therassa byākaraṇaṃ sampahaṃsetvā
atk-s0302a:222_0: 32. Dutiye kaḷārakhattiyoti tassa therassa nāmaṃ. Dantā panassa kaḷārā visamasaṇṭhānā,
atk-s0302a:222_1: tasmā “kaḷāro”ti vuccati. Hīnāyāvattoti hīnassa gihibhāvassa atthāya nivatto. Assāsamalatthāti
atk-s0302a:222_2: assāsaṃ avassayaṃ patiṭṭhaṃ na hi nūna alattha, tayo magge tīṇi ca phalāni nūna nālatthāti
atk-s0302a:222_3: dīpeti. Yadi hi tāni labheyya, na sikkhaṃ paccakkhāya hīnāyāvatteyyāti ayaṃ therassa
atk-s0302a:222_4: adhippāyo. Na khvāhaṃ, āvusoti ahaṃ kho, āvuso, “assāsaṃ patto, na patto”ti na kaṅkhāmi.
atk-s0302a:222_5: Therassa hi sāvakapāramīñāṇaṃ avassayo, tasmā so na kaṅkhati. Āyatiṃ panāvusoti iminā
atk-s0302a:222_6: “āyatiṃ paṭisandhi tumhākaṃ ugghāṭitā, na ugghāṭitā”ti arahattappattiṃ pucchati.
atk-s0302a:222_7: Na khvāhaṃ, āvuso, vicikicchāmīti iminā thero tattha vicikicchābhāvaṃ dīpeti.
atk-s0302a:223_0: Yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamīti “imaṃ sutakāraṇaṃ bhagavato ārocessāmī”ti upasaṅkami.
atk-s0302a:223_1: Aññā byākatāti arahattaṃ byākataṃ. Khīṇā jātīti na therena evaṃ byākatā, ayaṃ pana
atk-s0302a:223_2: thero tuṭṭho pasanno evaṃ padabyañjanāni āropetvā āha. Aññataraṃ bhikkhuṃ āmantesīti
atk-s0302a:223_3: taṃ sutvā satthā cintesi – “sāriputto dhīro gambhīro. Na so kenaci kāraṇena evaṃ
atk-s0302a:223_4: byākarissati. Saṃkhittena pana pañho byākato bhavissati. Pakkosāpetvā naṃ pañhaṃ
atk-s0302a:224_0: Sace taṃ sāriputtāti idaṃ bhagavā “na esa attano dhammatāya aññaṃ byākarissati, pañhametaṃ
atk-s0302a:224_1: pucchissāmi, taṃ kathentova aññaṃ byākarissatī”ti aññaṃ byākarāpetuṃ evaṃ pucchi.
atk-s0302a:224_2: Yaṃnidānāvuso, jātīti, āvuso, ayaṃ jāti nāma yaṃpaccayā, tassa paccayassa khayā khīṇasmiṃ
atk-s0302a:224_3: jātiyā paccaye jātisaṅkhātaṃ phalaṃ khīṇanti viditaṃ. Idhāpi ca thero pañhe akaṅkhitvā
atk-s0302a:224_4: ajjhāsaye kaṅkhati. Evaṃ kirassa ahosi – “aññā nāma taṇhā khīṇā, upādānaṃ khīṇaṃ,
atk-s0302a:224_5: bhavo khīṇo, paccayo khīṇo, kilesā khīṇātiādīhi bahūhi kāraṇehi sakkā byākātuṃ, kathaṃ
atk-s0302a:224_6: kathento pana satthu ajjhāsayaṃ gahetuṃ sakkhissāmī”ti.
atk-s0302a:225_0: Kiñcāpi evaṃ ajjhāsaye kaṅkhati, pañhaṃ pana aṭṭhapetvāva paccayākāravasena byākāsi.
atk-s0302a:225_1: Satthāpi paccayākāravaseneva byākarāpetukāmo, tasmā esa byākarontova ajjhāsayaṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0302a:225_2: Tāvadeva “gahito me satthu ajjhāsayo”ti aññāsi. Athassa nayasatena nayasahassena
atk-s0302a:225_3: pañhabyākaraṇaṃ upaṭṭhāsi. Yasmā pana bhagavā uttari pañhaṃ pucchati, tasmā tena
atk-s0302a:226_0: Kathaṃ jānato pana teti idaṃ kasmā ārabhi? Savisaye sīhanādaṃ nadāpetuṃ. Thero kira
atk-s0302a:226_2: tālavaṇṭaṃ gahetvā satthāraṃ bījayamāno ṭhito tisso vedanā pariggahetvā sāvakapāramīñāṇaṃ
atk-s0302a:226_3: adhigato, ayamassa savisayo. Imasmiṃ savisaye ṭhito sīhanādaṃ nadissatīti naṃ sandhāya
atk-s0302a:226_4: satthā idaṃ pañhaṃ pucchi. Aniccāti hutvā abhāvaṭṭhena aniccā. Yadaniccaṃ taṃ dukkhanti
atk-s0302a:226_5: ettha kiñcāpi sukhā vedanā ṭhitisukhā vipariṇāmadukkhā, dukkhā vedanā ṭhitidukkhā
atk-s0302a:226_6: vipariṇāmasukhā, adukkhamasukhā ñāṇasukhā aññāṇadukkhā, vipariṇāmakoṭiyā pana sabbāva
atk-s0302a:226_7: dukkhā nāma jātā. Viditanti yasmā evaṃ vedanāttayaṃ dukkhanti viditaṃ, tasmā yā tattha
atk-s0302a:227_0: Sādhu sādhūti therassa vedanāparicchedajānane sampahaṃsanaṃ. Thero hi vedanā ekāti
atk-s0302a:227_1: vā dve tisso catassoti vā avuttepi vuttanayena tāsaṃ tissoti paricchedaṃ aññāsi,
atk-s0302a:227_2: tena taṃ bhagavā sampahaṃsanto evamāha. Dukkhasminti idaṃ bhagavā iminā adhippāyena
atk-s0302a:227_3: āha – “sāriputta, yaṃ tayā ‘iminā kāraṇena vedanāsu taṇhā na upaṭṭhāsī’ti byākataṃ,
atk-s0302a:227_4: taṃ subyākataṃ. ‘Tisso vedanā’ti vibhajantena pana te atippapañco kato, taṃ ‘dukkhasmi’nti
atk-s0302a:227_5: byākarontenapi hi te subyākatameva bhaveyya. Yaṃkiñci vedayitaṃ, taṃ dukkhanti ñātamattepi
atk-s0302a:228_0: Kathaṃ vimokkhāti katarā vimokkhā, katarena vimokkhena tayā aññā byākatāti attho?
atk-s0302a:228_1: Ajjhattaṃ vimokkhāti ajjhattavimokkhena, ajjhattasaṅkhāre pariggahetvā pattaarahattenāti
atk-s0302a:228_2: attho. Tattha catukkaṃ veditabbaṃ – ajjhattaṃ abhiniveso ajjhattaṃ vuṭṭhānaṃ, ajjhattaṃ
atk-s0302a:228_3: abhiniveso bahiddhā vuṭṭhānaṃ, bahiddhā abhiniveso bahiddhā vuṭṭhānaṃ, bahiddhā abhiniveso
atk-s0302a:228_4: ajjhattaṃ vuṭṭhānanti. Ajjhattañhi abhinivesitvā bahiddhādhammāpi daṭṭhabbāyeva,
atk-s0302a:228_5: bahiddhā abhinivesitvā ajjhattadhammāpi. Tasmā koci bhikkhu ajjhattaṃ saṅkhāresu
atk-s0302a:228_6: ñāṇaṃ otāretvā te vavatthapetvā bahiddhā otāreti, bahiddhāpi pariggahetvā puna ajjhattaṃ
atk-s0302a:228_7: otāreti, tassa ajjhatta saṅkhāre sammasanakāle maggavuṭṭhānaṃ hoti. Iti ajjhattaṃ
atk-s0302a:228_8: abhiniveso ajjhattaṃ vuṭṭhānaṃ nāma. Koci ajjhattaṃ saṅkhāresu ñāṇaṃ otāretvā te
atk-s0302a:228_9: vavatthapetvā bahiddhā otāreti, tassa bahiddhā saṅkhāre sammasanakāle maggavuṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0302a:228_10: hoti. Iti ajjhattaṃ abhiniveso bahiddhā vuṭṭhānaṃ nāma. Koci bahiddhā saṅkhāresu
atk-s0302a:228_11: ñāṇaṃ otāretvā, te vavatthapetvā ajjhattaṃ otāreti, ajjhattampi pariggahetvā puna
atk-s0302a:228_12: bahiddhā otāreti, tassa bahiddhā saṅkhāre sammasanakāle maggavuṭṭhānaṃ hoti. Iti
atk-s0302a:228_13: bahiddhā abhiniveso bahiddhā vuṭṭhānaṃ nāma. Koci bahiddhā saṅkhāresu ñāṇaṃ otāretvā
atk-s0302a:228_14: te vavatthapetvā ajjhattaṃ otāreti, tassa ajjhattasaṅkhāre sammasanakāle maggavuṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0302a:228_15: hoti. Iti bahiddhā abhiniveso ajjhattaṃ vuṭṭhānaṃ nāma. Tatra thero “ajjhattasaṅkhāre
atk-s0302a:228_16: pariggahetvā tesaṃ vavatthānakāle maggavuṭṭhānena arahattaṃ pattosmī”ti dassento
atk-s0302a:229_0: Sabbupādānakkhayāti sabbesaṃ catunnampi upādānānaṃ khayena. Tathā sato viharāmīti
atk-s0302a:229_1: tenākārena satiyā samannāgato viharāmi. Yathā sataṃ viharantanti yenākārena maṃ satiyā
atk-s0302a:229_2: samannāgataṃ viharantaṃ. Āsavā nānussavantīti cakkhuto rūpe savanti āsavanti sandanti
atk-s0302a:229_3: pavattantīti evaṃ chahi dvārehi chasu ārammaṇesu savanadhammā kāmāsavādayo āsavā
atk-s0302a:229_4: nānussavanti nānuppavaḍḍhanti, yathā me na uppajjantīti attho. Attānañca nāvajānāmīti
atk-s0302a:229_5: attānañca na avajānāmi. Iminā omānapahānaṃ kathitaṃ. Evañhi sati pajānanā pasannā hoti.
atk-s0302a:230_0: Samaṇenāti buddhasamaṇena. Tesvāhaṃ na kaṅkhāmīti tesu ahaṃ “kataro kāmāsavo, kataro
atk-s0302a:230_1: bhavāsavo, kataro diṭṭhāsavo, kataro avijjāsavo”ti evaṃ sarūpabhedatopi, “cattāro
atk-s0302a:230_2: āsavā”ti evaṃ gaṇanaparicchedatopi na kaṅkhāmi. Te me pahīnāti na vicikicchāmīti
atk-s0302a:230_3: te mayhaṃ pahīnāti vicikicchaṃ na uppādemi. Idaṃ bhagavā “evaṃ byākarontenapi tayā
atk-s0302a:230_4: subyākataṃ bhaveyya ‘ajjhattaṃ vimokkhā khvāhaṃ, āvuso’tiādīni pana te vadantena
atk-s0302a:231_0: Uṭṭhāyāsanā vihāraṃ pāvisīti paññattavarabuddhāsanato uṭṭhahitvā vihāraṃ antomahāgandhakuṭiṃ
atk-s0302a:231_1: pāvisi asambhinnāya eva parisāya. Kasmā? Buddhā hi aniṭṭhitāya desanāya asambhinnāya
atk-s0302a:231_2: parisāya uṭṭhāyāsanā gandhakuṭiṃ pavisantā puggalathomanatthaṃ vā pavisanti dhammathomanatthaṃ
atk-s0302a:231_3: vā. Tattha puggalathomanatthaṃ pavisanto satthā evaṃ cintesi – “imaṃ mayā saṃkhittena
atk-s0302a:231_4: uddesaṃ uddiṭṭhaṃ vitthārena ca avibhattaṃ dhammapaṭiggāhakā bhikkhū uggahetvā ānandaṃ
atk-s0302a:231_5: vā kaccāyanaṃ vā upasaṅkamitvā pucchissanti, te mayhaṃ ñāṇena saṃsandetvā kathessanti,
atk-s0302a:231_6: tatopi dhammapaṭiggāhakā puna maṃ pucchissanti. Tesamahaṃ ‘sukathitaṃ, bhikkhave,
atk-s0302a:231_7: ānandena, sukathitaṃ kaccāyanena, maṃ cepi tumhe etamatthaṃ puccheyyātha, ahampi
atk-s0302a:231_8: naṃ evameva byākareyya’nti evaṃ te puggale thomessāmi. Tato tesu gāravaṃ janetvā
atk-s0302a:231_9: bhikkhū upasaṅkamissanti, tepi bhikkhū atthe ca dhamme ca niyojessanti, te tehi niyojitā
atk-s0302a:232_0: Atha vā panassa evaṃ hoti – “esa mayi pakkante attano ānubhāvaṃ karissati, atha naṃ
atk-s0302a:232_1: ahampi tatheva thomessāmi, taṃ mama thomanaṃ sutvā gāravajātā bhikkhū imaṃ upasaṅkamitabbaṃ,
atk-s0302a:232_2: vacanañcassa sotabbaṃ saddhātabbaṃ maññissanti, taṃ tesaṃ bhavissati dīgharattaṃ
atk-s0302a:232_3: hitāya sukhāyā”ti dhammathomanatthaṃ pavisanto evaṃ cintesi yathā dhammadāyādasutte
atk-s0302a:232_4: cintesi. Tatra hissa evaṃ ahosi – “mayi vihāraṃ paviṭṭhe āmisadāyādaṃ garahanto dhammadāyādañca
atk-s0302a:232_5: thomento imissaṃyeva parisati nisinno sāriputto dhammaṃ desessati, evaṃ dvinnampi
atk-s0302a:232_6: amhākaṃ ekajjhāsayāya matiyā desitā ayaṃ desanā aggā ca garukā ca bhavissati pāsāṇacchattasadisā”ti.
atk-s0302a:233_0: Idha pana āyasmantaṃ sāriputtaṃ ukkaṃsetvā pakāsetvā ṭhapetukāmo puggalathomanatthaṃ
atk-s0302a:233_1: uṭṭhāyāsanā vihāraṃ pāvisi. Īdisesu ṭhānesu bhagavā nisinnāsaneyeva antarahito cittagatiyā
atk-s0302a:233_2: vihāraṃ pavisatīti veditabbo. Yadi hi kāyagatiyā gaccheyya, sabbā parisā bhagavantaṃ
atk-s0302a:233_3: parivāretvā gaccheyya, sā ekavāraṃ bhinnā puna dussannipātā bhaveyyāti bhagavā adissamānena
atk-s0302a:234_0: Evaṃ paviṭṭhe pana bhagavati bhagavato adhippāyānurūpameva sīhanādaṃ naditukāmo tatra
atk-s0302a:234_1: kho āyasmā sāriputto acirapakkantassa bhagavato bhikkhū āmantesi. Pubbe appaṭisaṃviditanti
atk-s0302a:234_2: idaṃ nāma pucchissatīti pubbe mayā aviditaṃ aññātaṃ. Paṭhamaṃ pañhanti, “sace taṃ,
atk-s0302a:234_3: sāriputta, evaṃ puccheyyuṃ kathaṃ jānatā pana tayā, āvuso sāriputta, kathaṃ passatā
atk-s0302a:234_4: aññā byākatā khīṇā jātī”ti imaṃ paṭhamaṃ pañhaṃ. Dandhāyitattanti satthu āsayajānanatthaṃ
atk-s0302a:234_5: dandhabhāvo asīghatā. Paṭhamaṃ pañhaṃ anumodīti, “jāti panāvuso sāriputta, kiṃnidānā”ti
atk-s0302a:234_6: imaṃ dutiyaṃ pañhaṃ pucchanto, “yaṃnidānāvuso, jātī”ti evaṃ vissajjitaṃ paṭhamaṃ pañhaṃ anumodi.
atk-s0302a:235_0: Etadahosīti bhagavatā anumodite nayasatena nayasahassena pañhassa ekaṅgaṇikabhāvena
atk-s0302a:235_1: pākaṭībhūtattā etaṃ ahosi. Divasampāhaṃ bhagavato etamatthaṃ byākareyyanti sakaladivasampi
atk-s0302a:235_2: ahaṃ bhagavato etaṃ paṭiccasamuppādatthaṃ puṭṭho sakaladivasampi aññamaññehi padabyañjanehi
atk-s0302a:235_3: byākareyyaṃ. Yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamīti evaṃ kirassa ahosi – “thero uḷārasīhanādaṃ
atk-s0302a:235_4: nadati, sukāraṇaṃ etaṃ, dasabalassa naṃ ārocessāmī”ti. Tasmā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami.
atk-s0302a:236_0: Sā hi bhikkhu sāriputtassa dhammadhātūti ettha dhammadhātūti paccayākārassa vivaṭabhāvadassanasamatthaṃ
atk-s0302a:236_2: Yathā buddhānaṃ atītānāgatapaccuppannā dhammā sabbaññutaññāṇassa pākaṭā honti, evaṃ
atk-s0302a:236_3: therassa sāvakapāramīñāṇaṃ sabbepi sāvakañāṇassa gocaradhamme jānātīti. Dutiyaṃ.
atk-s0302a:238_0: 33. Tatiye taṃ suṇāthāti taṃ ñāṇavatthudesanaṃ suṇātha. Ñāṇavatthūnīti cettha ñāṇameva
atk-s0302a:238_1: ñāṇavatthūti veditabbaṃ. Jarāmaraṇe ñāṇantiādīsu catūsu paṭhamaṃ savanamayañāṇaṃ
atk-s0302a:238_2: sammasanañāṇaṃ paṭivedhañāṇaṃ paccavekkhaṇañāṇanti catubbidhaṃ vaṭṭati, tathā dutiyaṃ.
atk-s0302a:238_3: Tatiyaṃ pana ṭhapetvā sammasanañāṇaṃ tividhameva hoti, tathā catutthaṃ. Lokuttaradhammesu
atk-s0302a:238_4: hi sammasanaṃ nāma natthi. Jātiyā ñāṇantiādīsupi eseva nayo. Iminā dhammenāti iminā
atk-s0302a:239_0: Diṭṭhenātiādīsu diṭṭhenāti ñāṇacakkhunā diṭṭhena. Viditenāti paññāya viditena. Akālikenāti
atk-s0302a:239_1: kiñci kālaṃ anatikkamitvā paṭivedhānantaraṃyeva phaladāyakena. Pattenāti adhigatena.
atk-s0302a:239_2: Pariyogāḷhenāti pariyogāhitena paññāya anupaviṭṭhena. Atītānāgate nayaṃ netīti “ye
atk-s0302a:239_3: kho kecī”tiādinā nayena atīte ca anāgate ca nayaṃ neti. Ettha ca na catusaccadhammena
atk-s0302a:239_4: vā maggañāṇadhammena vā sakkā atītānāgate nayaṃ netuṃ, catusacce pana maggañāṇena
atk-s0302a:239_5: paṭividdhe parato paccavekkhaṇañāṇaṃ nāma hoti. Tena nayaṃ netīti veditabbā. Abbhaññaṃsūti
atk-s0302a:239_6: abhiaññaṃsu jāniṃsu. Seyyathāpāhaṃ, etarahīti yathā ahaṃ etarahi catusaccavasena
atk-s0302a:239_7: jānāmi. Anvaye ñāṇanti anuaye ñāṇaṃ, dhammañāṇassa anugamane ñāṇaṃ, paccavekkhaṇañāṇassetaṃ
atk-s0302a:239_8: nāmaṃ. Dhamme ñāṇanti maggañāṇaṃ. Imasmiṃ sutte khīṇāsavassa sekkhabhūmi kathitā hoti. Tatiyaṃ.
atk-s0302a:241_0: 34. Catutthe sattasattarīti satta ca sattari ca. Byañjanabhāṇakā kira te bhikkhū,
atk-s0302a:241_1: bahubyañjanaṃ katvā vuccamāne paṭivijjhituṃ sakkonti, tasmā tesaṃ ajjhāsayena idaṃ
atk-s0302a:241_2: suttaṃ vuttaṃ. Dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇanti paccayākāre ñāṇaṃ. Paccayākāro hi dhammānaṃ pavattiṭṭhitikāraṇattā
atk-s0302a:241_3: dhammaṭṭhitīti vuccati, ettha ñāṇaṃ dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇaṃ, etasseva chabbidhassa ñāṇassetaṃ
atk-s0302a:241_6: ekekasmiṃ satta satta katvā ekādasasu padesu sattasattari. Imasmiṃ sutte vipassanāpaṭivipassanā kathitā. Catutthaṃ.
atk-s0302a:243_0: 35. Pañcame samudayo hotīti satthā idheva desanaṃ osāpesi. Kiṃkāraṇāti? Diṭṭhigatikassa
atk-s0302a:243_1: okāsadānatthaṃ. Tassañhi parisati upārambhacitto diṭṭhigatiko atthi, so pañhaṃ pucchissati,
atk-s0302a:243_2: athassāhaṃ vissajjessāmīti tassa okāsadānatthaṃ desanaṃ osāpesi. No kallo pañhoti
atk-s0302a:243_3: ayutto pañho. Duppañho esoti attho. Nanu ca “katamaṃ nu kho, bhante, jarāmaraṇa”nti?
atk-s0302a:243_4: Idaṃ supucchitanti. Kiñcāpi supucchitaṃ, yathā pana satasahassagghanike suvaṇṇathāle
atk-s0302a:243_5: vaḍḍhitassa subhojanassa matthake āmalakamattepi gūthapiṇḍe ṭhapite sabbaṃ bhojanaṃ
atk-s0302a:243_6: dubbhojanaṃ hoti chaḍḍetabbaṃ, evameva “kassa ca panidaṃ jarāmaraṇa”nti? Iminā sattūpaladdhivādapadena
atk-s0302a:243_7: gūthapiṇḍena taṃ bhojanaṃ dubbhojanaṃ viya ayampi sabbo duppañhova jātoti.
atk-s0302a:244_0: Brahmacariyavāsoti ariyamaggavāso. Taṃ jīvaṃ taṃ sarīranti yassa hi ayaṃ diṭṭhi,
atk-s0302a:244_1: so “jīve ucchijjamāne sarīraṃ ucchijjati, sarīre ucchijjante jīvitaṃ ucchijjatī”ti
atk-s0302a:244_2: gaṇhāti. Evaṃ gaṇhato sā diṭṭhi “satto ucchijjatī”ti gahitattā ucchedadiṭṭhi nāma
atk-s0302a:244_3: hoti. Sace pana saṅkhārāva uppajjanti ceva nirujjhanti cāti gaṇheyya, sāsanāvacarā
atk-s0302a:244_4: sammādiṭṭhi nāma bhaveyya. Ariyamaggo ca nāmeso vaṭṭaṃ nirodhento vaṭṭaṃ samucchindanto
atk-s0302a:244_5: uppajjati, tadeva taṃ vaṭṭaṃ ucchedadiṭṭhiyā gahitākārassa sambhave sati vināva maggabhāvanāya
atk-s0302a:244_6: nirujjhatīti maggabhāvanā niratthakā hoti. Tena vuttaṃ “brahmacariyavāso na hotī”ti.
atk-s0302a:245_0: Dutiyanaye aññaṃ jīvaṃ aññaṃ sarīranti yassa ayaṃ diṭṭhi, so “sarīraṃ idheva ucchijjati,
atk-s0302a:245_1: na jīvitaṃ, jīvitaṃ pana pañjarato sakuṇo viya yathāsukhaṃ gacchatī”ti gaṇhāti. Evaṃ
atk-s0302a:245_2: gaṇhato sā diṭṭhi “imasmā lokā jīvitaṃ paralokaṃ gata”nti gahitattā sassatadiṭṭhi
atk-s0302a:245_3: nāma hoti. Ayañca ariyamaggo tebhūmakavaṭṭaṃ vivaṭṭento uppajjati, so ekasaṅkhārepi
atk-s0302a:245_4: nicce dhuve sassate sati uppannopi vaṭṭaṃ vivaṭṭetuṃ na sakkotīti maggabhāvanā niratthakā
atk-s0302a:245_5: hoti. Tena vuttaṃ “aññaṃ jīvaṃ aññaṃ sarīranti vā bhikkhu diṭṭhiyā sati brahmacariyavāso na hotī”ti.
atk-s0302a:246_0: Visūkāyikānītiādi sabbaṃ micchādiṭṭhivevacanameva. Sā hi sammādiṭṭhiyā vinivijjhanaṭṭhena
atk-s0302a:246_1: visūkamiva attānaṃ āvaraṇato visūkāyikaṃ, sammādiṭṭhiṃ ananuvattitvā tassā virodhena
atk-s0302a:246_2: pavattanato visevitaṃ, kadāci ucchedassa kadāci sassatassa gahaṇato virūpaṃ phanditaṃ
atk-s0302a:246_3: vipphanditanti vuccati. Tālāvatthukatānīti tālavatthu viya katāni, puna aviruhaṇaṭṭhena
atk-s0302a:246_4: matthakacchinnatālo viya samūlaṃ tālaṃ uddharitvā tassa patiṭṭhitaṭṭhānaṃ viya ca
atk-s0302a:246_5: katānīti attho. Anabhāvaṃkatānīti anuabhāvaṃ katānīti. Pañcamaṃ.
atk-s0302a:248_0: 36. Chaṭṭhe iti vā, bhikkhave, yo vadeyyāti tassaṃ parisati diṭṭhigatiko pañhaṃ pucchitukāmo
atk-s0302a:248_1: atthi, so pana avisāradadhātuko uṭṭhāya dasabalaṃ pucchituṃ na sakkoti, tasmā tassa
atk-s0302a:248_2: ajjhāsayena sayameva pucchitvā vissajjento satthā evamāha. Chaṭṭhaṃ.
atk-s0302a:250_0: 37. Sattame na tumhākanti attani hi sati attaniyaṃ nāma hoti. Attāyeva ca natthi,
atk-s0302a:250_1: tasmā “na tumhāka”nti āha. Napi aññesanti añño nāma paresaṃ attā, tasmiṃ sati aññesaṃ
atk-s0302a:250_2: nāma siyā, sopi natthi, tasmā “napi aññesa”nti āha. Purāṇamidaṃ, bhikkhave, kammanti
atk-s0302a:250_3: nayidaṃ purāṇakammameva, purāṇakammanibbatto panesa kāyo, tasmā paccayavohārena evaṃ
atk-s0302a:250_4: vutto. Abhisaṅkhatantiādi kammavohārasseva vasena purimaliṅgasabhāgatāya vuttaṃ,
atk-s0302a:250_5: ayaṃ panettha attho – abhisaṅkhatanti paccayehi katoti daṭṭhabbo. Abhisañcetayitanti
atk-s0302a:250_6: cetanāvatthuko cetanāmūlakoti daṭṭhabbo. Vedaniyanti vedaniyavatthūti daṭṭhabbo. Sattamaṃ.
atk-s0302a:252_0: 38. Aṭṭhame yañca, bhikkhave, cetetīti yaṃ cetanaṃ ceteti, pavattetīti attho. Yañca
atk-s0302a:252_1: pakappetīti yaṃ pakappanaṃ pakappeti, pavatteticceva attho. Yañca anusetīti yañca
atk-s0302a:252_2: anusayaṃ anuseti, pavatteticceva attho. Ettha ca cetetīti tebhūmakakusalākusalacetanā
atk-s0302a:252_3: gahitā, pakappetīti aṭṭhasu lobhasahagatacittesu taṇhādiṭṭhikappā gahitā, anusetīti
atk-s0302a:252_4: dvādasannaṃ cetanānaṃ sahajātakoṭiyā ceva upanissayakoṭiyā ca anusayo gahito. Ārammaṇametaṃ
atk-s0302a:252_5: hotīti (cetanādidhammajāte sati kammaviññāṇassa uppattiyā avāritattā) etaṃ cetanādidhammajātaṃ
atk-s0302a:252_6: paccayo hoti. Paccayo hi idha ārammaṇanti adhippetā. Viññāṇassa ṭhitiyāti kammaviññāṇassa
atk-s0302a:252_7: ṭhitatthaṃ. Ārammaṇe satīti tasmiṃ paccaye sati. Patiṭṭhā viññāṇassa hotīti tassa
atk-s0302a:252_8: kammaviññāṇassa patiṭṭhā hoti. Tasmiṃ patiṭṭhite viññāṇeti tasmiṃ kammaviññāṇe patiṭṭhite.
atk-s0302a:252_9: Virūḷheti kammaṃ javāpetvā paṭisandhiākaḍḍhanasamatthatāya nibbattamūle jāte. Punabbhavābhinibbattīti
atk-s0302a:253_0: No ce, bhikkhave, cetetīti iminā tebhūmakacetanāya appavattanakkhaṇo vutto. No ce
atk-s0302a:253_1: pakappetīti iminā taṇhādiṭṭhikappānaṃ appavattanakkhaṇo. Atha ce anusetīti iminā
atk-s0302a:253_2: tebhūmakavipākesu parittakiriyāsu rūpeti ettha appahīnakoṭiyā anusayo gahito. Ārammaṇametaṃ
atk-s0302a:253_3: hotīti anusaye sati kammaviññāṇassa uppattiyā avāritattā etaṃ anusayajātaṃ paccayova hoti.
atk-s0302a:254_0: No ceva cetetītiādīsu paṭhamapade tebhūmakakusalākusalacetanā nivattā, dutiyapade
atk-s0302a:254_1: aṭṭhasu cittesu taṇhādiṭṭhiyo, tatiyapade vuttappakāresu dhammesu yo appahīnakoṭiyā
atk-s0302a:255_0: Apicettha asammohatthaṃ ceteti pakappeti anuseti, ceteti na pakappeti anuseti, na
atk-s0302a:255_1: ceteti na pakappeti anuseti, na ceteti na pakappeti na anusetīti idampi catukkaṃ
atk-s0302a:255_2: veditabbaṃ. Tattha paṭhamanaye dhammaparicchedo dassito. Dutiyanaye cetetīti tebhūmakakusalacetanā
atk-s0302a:255_3: ceva catasso ca akusalacetanā gahitā. Na pakappetīti aṭṭhasu cittesu taṇhādiṭṭhiyo
atk-s0302a:255_4: nivattā. Anusetīti tebhūmakakusale upanissayakoṭiyā, catūsu akusalacetanāsu sahajātakoṭiyā
atk-s0302a:255_5: ceva upanissayakoṭiyā ca anusayo gahito. Tatiyanaye na cetetīti tebhūmakakusalākusalaṃ
atk-s0302a:255_6: nivattaṃ, na pakappetīti aṭṭhasu cittesu taṇhādiṭṭhiyo nivattā, anusetīti sutte āgataṃ
atk-s0302a:256_0: Tadappatiṭṭhiteti tasmiṃ appatiṭṭhite. Avirūḷheti kammaṃ javāpetvā paṭisandhiākaḍḍhanasamatthatāya
atk-s0302a:256_1: anibbattamūle. Ettha pana kiṃ kathitanti? Arahattamaggassa kiccaṃ, khīṇāsavassa kiccakaraṇantipi
atk-s0302a:256_2: navalokuttaradhammātipi vattuṃ vaṭṭati. Ettha ca viññāṇassa ceva āyatiṃ punabbhavassa
atk-s0302a:256_3: ca antare eko sandhi, vedanātaṇhānamantare eko, bhavajātīnamantare ekoti. Aṭṭhamaṃ.
atk-s0302a:258: 39. Navame viññāṇanāmarūpānaṃ antare eko sandhi, vedanātaṇhānamantare eko, bhavajātīnamantare ekoti. Navamaṃ.
atk-s0302a:260_0: 40. Dasame natīti taṇhā. Sā hi piyarūpesu rūpādīsu namanaṭṭhena “natī”ti vuccati.
atk-s0302a:260_1: Āgati gati hotīti āgatimhi gati hoti, āgate paccupaṭṭhite kamme vā kammanimitte vā
atk-s0302a:260_2: gahinimitte vā paṭisandhivasena viññāṇassa gati hoti. Cutūpapātoti evaṃ viññāṇassa
atk-s0302a:260_3: āgate paṭisandhivisaye gatiyā sati ito cavanasaṅkhātā cuti, tatthūpapattisaṅkhāto
atk-s0302a:260_4: upapātoti ayaṃ cutūpapāto nāma hoti. Evaṃ imasmiṃ sutte natiyā ca āgatigatiyā ca
atk-s0302a:264_0: 41. Gahapativaggassa paṭhame yatoti yadā. Bhayāni verānīti bhayaveracetanāyo. Sotāpattiyaṅgehīti
atk-s0302a:264_1: duvidhaṃ sotāpattiyā aṅgaṃ, (sotāpattiyā ca aṅgaṃ,) yaṃ pubbabhāge sotāpattipaṭilābhāya
atk-s0302a:264_3: evaṃ āgataṃ, paṭiladdhaguṇassa ca sotāpattiṃ patvā ṭhitassa aṅgaṃ, yaṃ sotāpannassa
atk-s0302a:264_4: aṅgantipi vuccati, buddhe aveccappasādādīnaṃ etaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Idamidha adhippetaṃ.
atk-s0302a:264_5: Ariyoti niddoso nirupārambho. Ñāyoti paṭiccasamuppannaṃ ñatvā ṭhitañāṇampi paṭiccasamuppādopi.
atk-s0302a:264_6: Yathāha – “ñāyo vuccati paṭiccasamuppādo, ariyopi aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo ñāyo”ti. Paññāyāti
atk-s0302a:264_7: aparāparaṃ uppannāya vipassanāpaññāya. Sudiṭṭho hotīti aparāparaṃ uppajjitvā dassanavasena suṭṭhu diṭṭho.
atk-s0302a:265_0: Khīṇanirayotiādīsu āyatiṃ tattha anuppajjanatāya khīṇo nirayo mayhanti so ahaṃ khīṇanirayo.
atk-s0302a:265_1: Esa nayo sabbattha. Sotāpannoti maggasotaṃ āpanno. Avinipātadhammoti na vinipātasabhāvo.
atk-s0302a:265_2: Niyatoti paṭhamamaggasaṅkhātena sammattaniyāmena niyato. Sambodhiparāyanoti uttarimaggattayasaṅkhāto
atk-s0302a:265_3: sambodhi paraṃ ayanaṃ mayhanti sohaṃ sambodhiparāyano, taṃ sambodhiṃ avassaṃ abhisambujjhanakoti attho.
atk-s0302a:266_0: Pāṇātipātapaccayāti pāṇātipātakammakāraṇā. Bhayaṃ veranti atthato ekaṃ. Verañca nāmetaṃ
atk-s0302a:266_1: duvidhaṃ hoti bāhiraṃ ajjhattikanti. Ekena hi ekassa pitā mārito hoti, so cintesi
atk-s0302a:266_2: “etena kira me pitā mārito, ahampi taṃyeva māressāmī”ti nisitaṃ satthaṃ ādāya carati.
atk-s0302a:266_3: Yā tassa abbhantare uppannaveracetanā, idaṃ bāhiraṃ veraṃ nāma. Yā pana itarassa
atk-s0302a:266_4: “ayaṃ kira maṃ māressāmīti carati, ahameva naṃ paṭhamataraṃ māressāmī”ti cetanā uppajjati,
atk-s0302a:266_5: idaṃ ajjhattikaṃ veraṃ nāma. Idaṃ tāva ubhayampi diṭṭhadhammikameva. Yā pana taṃ
atk-s0302a:266_6: niraye uppannaṃ disvā “etaṃ paharissāmī”ti jalitaṃ ayamuggaraṃ gaṇhato nirayapālassa
atk-s0302a:266_7: cetanā uppajjati, idamassa samparāyikaṃ bāhiraveraṃ. Yā cassa “ayaṃ niddosaṃ maṃ
atk-s0302a:266_8: paharissāmīti āgacchati, ahameva naṃ paṭhamataraṃ paharissāmī”ti cetanā uppajjati,
atk-s0302a:266_9: idamassa samparāyikaṃ ajjhattaveraṃ. Yaṃ panetaṃ bāhiraveraṃ, taṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “puggalavera”nti
atk-s0302a:266_10: vuttaṃ. Dukkhaṃ domanassanti atthato ekameva. Yathā cettha, evaṃ sesapadesupi “iminā
atk-s0302a:266_11: mama bhaṇḍaṃ haṭaṃ, mayhaṃ dāresu cārittaṃ āpannaṃ, musā vatvā attho bhaggo, surāmadamattena
atk-s0302a:266_12: idaṃ nāma kata”ntiādinā nayena veruppatti veditabbā. Aveccappasādenāti adhigatena
atk-s0302a:266_13: acalappasādena. Ariyakantehīti pañcahi sīlehi. Tāni hi ariyānaṃ kantāni piyāni. Bhavantaragatāpi
atk-s0302a:266_14: ariyā tāni na vijahanti, tasmā “ariyakantānī”ti vuccanti. Sesamettha yaṃ vattabbaṃ
atk-s0302a:266_15: siyā, taṃ sabbaṃ visuddhimagge anussatiniddese vuttameva. Paṭhamaṃ.
atk-s0302a:270_0: 43. Tatiye dukkhassāti vaṭṭadukkhassa. Samudayanti dve samudayā khaṇikasamudayo ca
atk-s0302a:270_1: paccayasamudayo ca. Paccayasamudayaṃ passantopi bhikkhu khaṇikasamudayaṃ passati,
atk-s0302a:270_2: khaṇikasamudayaṃ passantopi paccayasamudayaṃ passati. Atthaṅgamopi accantatthaṅgamo
atk-s0302a:270_3: bhedatthaṅgamoti duvidho. Accantatthaṅgamaṃ passantopi bhedatthaṅgamaṃ passati, bhedatthaṅgamaṃ
atk-s0302a:270_4: passantopi accantatthaṅgamaṃ passati. Desessāmīti idaṃ vaṭṭadukkhassa samudayaatthaṅgamaṃ
atk-s0302a:270_5: nibbattibhedaṃ nāma desessāmi, taṃ suṇāthāti attho. Paṭiccāti nissayavasena ceva
atk-s0302a:270_6: ārammaṇavasena ca paccayaṃ katvā. Tiṇṇaṃ saṅgati phassoti tiṇṇaṃ saṅgatiyā phasso.
atk-s0302a:270_7: Ayaṃ kho, bhikkhave, dukkhassa samudayoti ayaṃ vaṭṭadukkhassa nibbatti nāma. Atthaṅgamoti
atk-s0302a:270_8: bhedo. Evañhi vaṭṭadukkhaṃ bhinnaṃ hoti appaṭisandhiyaṃ. Tatiyaṃ.
atk-s0302a:272: 44. Catutthe lokassāti saṅkhāralokassa. Ayamettha viseso. Catutthaṃ.
atk-s0302a:274_0: 45. Pañcame ñātiketi dvinnaṃ ñātakānaṃ gāme. Giñjakāvasatheti iṭṭhakāhi kate mahāpāsāde.
atk-s0302a:274_1: Dhammapariyāyanti dhammakāraṇaṃ. Upassutīti upassutiṭṭhānaṃ, yaṃ ṭhānaṃ upagatena
atk-s0302a:274_2: sakkā hoti bhagavato saddaṃ sotuṃ, tattha ṭhitoti attho. So kira gandhakuṭipariveṇasammajjanatthaṃ
atk-s0302a:274_3: āgato attano kammaṃ pahāya bhagavato dhammaghosaṃ suṇanto aṭṭhāsi. Addasāti tadā
atk-s0302a:274_4: kira bhagavato āditova paccayākāraṃ manasikarontassa “idaṃ iminā paccayena hoti,
atk-s0302a:274_5: idaṃ iminā”ti āvajjato yāva bhavaggā ekaṅgaṇaṃ ahosi, satthā manasikāraṃ pahāya vacasā
atk-s0302a:274_6: sajjhāyaṃ karonto yathānusandhinā desanaṃ niṭṭhapetvā, “api nu kho imaṃ dhammapariyāyaṃ
atk-s0302a:274_7: koci assosī”ti āvajjento taṃ bhikkhumaddasa. Tena vuttaṃ “addasā kho bhagavā”ti.
atk-s0302a:275_0: Assosi noti assosi nu. Atha vā assosi noti amhākaṃ bhāsantānaṃ assosīti. Uggaṇhāhītiādīsu
atk-s0302a:275_1: sutvā tuṇhībhūtova paguṇaṃ karonto uggaṇhāti nāma. Padānupadaṃ ghaṭetvā vācāya paricitaṃ
atk-s0302a:275_2: karonto pariyāpuṇāti nāma. Ubhayathāpi paguṇaṃ ādhārappattaṃ karonto dhāreti nāma.
atk-s0302a:275_3: Atthasaṃhitoti kāraṇanissito. Ādibrahmacariyakoti maggabrahmacariyassa ādi patiṭṭhānabhūto.
atk-s0302a:275_4: Iti tīsupi imesu suttesu vaṭṭavivaṭṭameva kathitaṃ. Pañcamaṃ.
atk-s0302a:277: 46. Chaṭṭhe aññataroti nāmavasena apākaṭo aññataro brāhmaṇo. Chaṭṭhaṃ.
atk-s0302a:279: 47. Sattame jāṇussoṇīti ṭhānantaravasena evaṃladdhanāmo asītikoṭivibhavo mahāpurohito. Sattamaṃ.
atk-s0302a:281_0: 48. Aṭṭhame lokāyatikoti vitaṇḍasatthe lokāyate kataparicayo. Jeṭṭhametaṃ lokāyatanti
atk-s0302a:281_1: paṭhamaṃ lokāyataṃ. Lokāyatanti ca lokasseva āyataṃ, bālaputhujjanalokassa āyataṃ,
atk-s0302a:281_2: mahantaṃ gambhīranti upadhāritabbaṃ parittaṃ bhāvaṃ diṭṭhigataṃ. Ekattanti ekasabhāvaṃ,
atk-s0302a:281_3: niccasabhāvamevāti pucchati. Puthuttanti purimasabhāvena nānāsabhāvaṃ, devamanussādibhāvena
atk-s0302a:281_4: paṭhamaṃ hutvā pacchā na hotīti ucchedaṃ sandhāya pucchati. Evamettha “sabbamatthi,
atk-s0302a:281_5: sabbamekatta”nti imā dvepi sassatadiṭṭhiyo, “sabbaṃ natthi, sabbaṃ puthutta”nti imā
atk-s0302a:283: 49. Navame kiṃ nu khoti saṃsayuppattiākāradassanaṃ. Samudayatīti uppajjati. Navamaṃ.
atk-s0302a:285: 50. Dasame dvepi nayā ekato vuttā. Idameva purimena nānattaṃ, sesaṃ tādisamevāti. Dasamaṃ.
atk-s0302a:289_0: 51. Dukkhavaggassa paṭhame parivīmaṃsamānoti upaparikkhamāno. Jarāmaraṇanti kasmā
atk-s0302a:289_1: jarāmaraṇaṃ ekameva “anekavidhaṃ nānappakāraka”nti vatvā gahitanti ce? Tasmiṃ gahite
atk-s0302a:289_2: sabbadukkhassa gahitattā. Yathā hi cūḷāya gahite purise so puriso gahitova hoti,
atk-s0302a:289_3: evaṃ jarāmaraṇe gahite sabbadukkhaṃ gahitameva hoti. Tasmā “yaṃ kho idaṃ anekavidhaṃ
atk-s0302a:289_4: nānappakārakaṃ dukkhaṃ loke uppajjatī”ti nhatvā ṭhitaṃ purisaṃ viya sabbadukkhaṃ
atk-s0302a:289_5: dassetvā taṃ cūḷāya gaṇhanto viya jarāmaraṇaṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0302a:290_1: parisuddhatāya sadisāva hutvā gāminīti attho. Tathā paṭipanno ca hotīti yathā taṃ
atk-s0302a:290_2: paṭipannoti vuccati, evaṃ paṭipanno hoti. Anudhammacārīti nibbānadhammaṃ anugataṃ
atk-s0302a:290_3: paṭipattidhammaṃ carati, pūretīti attho. Dukkhakkhayāya paṭipannoti sīlaṃ ādiṃ katvā
atk-s0302a:290_5: nirodhatthāya. Ettāvatā yāva arahattā desanā kathitā.
atk-s0302a:291_0: Idāni arahattaphalapaccavekkhaṇaṃ satatavihārañca dassetvā desanā nivattetabbā siyā,
atk-s0302a:291_1: tathā akatvā avijjāgatoti idaṃ kasmā gaṇhātīti? Khīṇāsavassa samatikkantavaṭṭadukkhadassanatthaṃ.
atk-s0302a:291_2: Apica puna vaṭṭaṃ ārabhitvā vivaṭṭe kathiyamāne bujjhanakasatto cettha atthi, tassa
atk-s0302a:291_3: ajjhāsayavasenāpi idaṃ gaṇhātīti veditabbo. Tattha avijjāgatoti avijjāya gato upagato
atk-s0302a:291_4: samannāgato. Purisapuggaloti purisoyeva puggalo. Ubhayenāpi sammutikathaṃ katheti.
atk-s0302a:291_5: Buddhānañhi sammutikathā paramatthakathāti dve kathā honti. Tattha “satto naro puriso
atk-s0302a:291_6: puggalo tisso nāgo”ti evaṃ pavattā sammutikathā nāma. “Khandhā dhātuyo āyatanānī”ti
atk-s0302a:291_7: evaṃ pavattā paramatthakathā nāma. Paramatthaṃ kathentāpi sammutiṃ amuñcitvā kathenti.
atk-s0302a:291_8: Te sammutiṃ kathentāpi paramatthaṃ kathentāpi saccameva kathenti. Teneva vuttaṃ –
atk-s0302a:296_0: Puññaṃ ce saṅkhāranti terasacetanābhedaṃ puññābhisaṅkhāraṃ. Abhisaṅkharotīti karoti.
atk-s0302a:296_1: Puññūpagaṃ hoti viññāṇanti kammaviññāṇaṃ kammapuññena upagataṃ sampayuttaṃ hoti,
atk-s0302a:296_2: vipākaviññāṇaṃ vipākapuññena. Apuññaṃ ce saṅkhāranti dvādasacetanābhedaṃ apuññābhisaṅkhāraṃ
atk-s0302a:296_3: abhisaṅkharoti. Āneñjaṃ ce saṅkhāranti catucetanābhedaṃ āneñjābhisaṅkhāraṃ. Āneñjūpagaṃ
atk-s0302a:296_4: hoti viññāṇanti kammāneñjena kammaviññāṇaṃ, vipākāneñjena vipākaviññāṇaṃ upagataṃ
atk-s0302a:296_5: hoti. Ettha ca tividhassa kammābhisaṅkhārassa gahitattā dvādasapadiko paccayākāro
atk-s0302a:297_0: Idāni vivaṭṭaṃ dassento yato kho, bhikkhavetiādimāha. Tattha avijjāti catūsu saccesu
atk-s0302a:297_1: aññāṇaṃ. Vijjāti arahattamaggañāṇaṃ. Ettha ca paṭhamameva avijjāya pahīnāya vijjā
atk-s0302a:297_2: uppajjati. Yathā pana caturaṅgepi tame rattiṃ padīpujjalena andhakāro pahīyati, evaṃ
atk-s0302a:297_3: vijjuppādā avijjāya pahānaṃ veditabbaṃ. Na kiñci loke upādiyatīti loke kiñci dhammaṃ
atk-s0302a:297_4: na gaṇhāti na parāmasati. Anupādiyaṃ na paritassatīti anupādiyanto agaṇhanto neva
atk-s0302a:297_5: taṇhāparitassanāya, na bhayaparitassanāya paritassati, na taṇhāyati na bhāyatīti
atk-s0302a:297_6: attho. Paccattaññevāti sayameva attanāva parinibbāyati, na aññassa ānubhāvena.
atk-s0302a:298_0: So sukhaṃ ce vedananti idaṃ kasmā ārabhi? Khīṇāsavassa paccavekkhaṇañāṇaṃ dassetvā
atk-s0302a:298_1: satatavihāraṃ dassetuṃ ārabhi. Anajjhositāti taṇhāya gilitvā pariniṭṭhapetvā agahitā.
atk-s0302a:298_2: Atha dukkhavedanā kasmā vuttā, kiṃ tampi abhinandanto atthīti? Āma atthi. Sukhaṃ
atk-s0302a:298_3: abhinandantoyeva hi dukkhaṃ abhinandati nāma dukkhaṃ patvā sukhaṃ patthanato sukhassa
atk-s0302a:298_4: ca vipariṇāmadukkhatoti. Kāyapariyantikanti kāyaparicchinnaṃ, yāva pañcadvārakāyo
atk-s0302a:298_5: pavattati, tāva pavattaṃ pañcadvārikavedananti attho. Jīvitapariyantikanti jīvitaparicchinnaṃ.
atk-s0302a:298_6: Yāva jīvitaṃ pavattati, tāva pavattaṃ manodvārikavedananti attho.
atk-s0302a:299_0: Tattha pañcadvārikavedanā pacchā uppajjitvā paṭhamaṃ nirujjhati, manodvārikavedanā
atk-s0302a:299_1: paṭhamaṃ uppajjitvā pacchā nirujjhati. Sā hi paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthurūpasmiṃyeva
atk-s0302a:299_2: patiṭṭhāti. Pañcadvārikā pavatte pañcadvāravasena pavattamānā paṭhamavaye vīsativassakāle
atk-s0302a:299_3: rajjanadussanamuyhanavasena adhimattā balavatī hoti, paṇṇāsavassakāle ṭhitā hoti,
atk-s0302a:299_4: saṭṭhivassakālato paṭṭhāya parihāyamānā asītinavutivassakāle mandā hoti. Tadā hi
atk-s0302a:299_5: sattā “cirarattaṃ ekato nisīdimhā nipajjimhā”ti vadantepi “na sañjānāmā”ti vadanti.
atk-s0302a:299_6: Adhimattānipi rūpādiārammaṇāni “na passāma na suṇāma”, “sugandhaṃ duggandhaṃ vā sāduṃ
atk-s0302a:299_7: asāduṃ vā thaddhaṃ mudukanti vā na jānāmā”ti vadanti. Iti nesaṃ pañcadvārikavedanā
atk-s0302a:299_8: bhaggā hoti, manodvārikāva pavattati. Sāpi anupubbena parihāyamānā maraṇasamaye hadayakoṭiṃyeva
atk-s0302a:299_9: nissāya pavattati. Yāva panesā pavattati, tāva satto jīvatīti vuccati. Yadā nappavattati,
atk-s0302a:301_0: Yathā hi puriso pañcaudakamaggasampannaṃ vāpiṃ kareyya, paṭhamaṃ deve vuṭṭhe pañcahi
atk-s0302a:301_1: udakamaggehi udakaṃ pavisitvā antovāpiyaṃ āvāṭe pūreyya, punappunaṃ deve vassante
atk-s0302a:301_2: udakamagge pūretvā gāvutaḍḍhayojanamattaṃ ottharitvā udakaṃ tiṭṭheyya tato tato vissandamānaṃ,
atk-s0302a:301_3: atha niddhamanatumbe vivaritvā khettesu kamme kariyamāne udakaṃ nikkhamantaṃ, sassapākakāle
atk-s0302a:301_4: (udakaṃ nikkhamantaṃ,) udakaṃ parihīnaṃ “macche gaṇhāmā”ti vattabbataṃ āpajjeyya,
atk-s0302a:301_5: tato katipāhena āvāṭesuyeva udakaṃ saṇṭhaheyya. Yāva pana taṃ āvāṭesu hoti, tāva
atk-s0302a:301_6: “mahāvāpiyaṃ udakaṃ atthī”ti saṅkhaṃ gacchati. Yadā pana tattha chijjati, tadā “vāpiyaṃ
atk-s0302a:302_0: Paṭhamaṃ deve vassante pañcahi maggehi udake pavisante āvāṭānaṃ pūraṇakālo viya hi
atk-s0302a:302_1: paṭhamameva paṭisandhikkhaṇe manodvārikavedanāya vatthurūpe patiṭṭhitakālo, punappunaṃ
atk-s0302a:302_2: deve vassante pañcannaṃ maggānaṃ pūritakālo viya pavatte pañcadvārikavedanāya pavattikālo,
atk-s0302a:302_3: gāvutaḍḍhayojanamattaṃ ajjhottharaṇaṃ viya paṭhamavaye vīsativassakāle rajjanādivasena
atk-s0302a:302_4: tassā adhimattabalavabhāvo, yāva vāpito udakaṃ na niggacchati, tāva pūrāya vāpiyā
atk-s0302a:302_5: ṭhitakālo viya paññāsavassakāle tassā ṭhitakālo, niddhamanatumbesu vivaṭesu kammante
atk-s0302a:302_6: kariyamāne udakassa nikkhamanakālo viya saṭṭhivassakālato paṭṭhāya tassā parihāni,
atk-s0302a:302_7: udake bhaṭṭhe udakamaggesu parittodakassa ṭhitakālo viya asītinavutivassakāle pañcadvārikavedanāya
atk-s0302a:302_8: mandakālo, āvāṭesuyeva udakassa patiṭṭhānakālo viya hadayavatthukoṭiṃ nissāya manodvārikavedanāya
atk-s0302a:302_9: pavattikālo, āvāṭesu parittepi udake sati “vāpiyaṃ udakaṃ atthī”ti vattabbakālo viya
atk-s0302a:302_10: yāva sā pavattati, tāva “satto jīvatī”ti vuccati. Yathā pana āvāṭesu udake chinne
atk-s0302a:302_11: “natthi vāpiyaṃ udaka”nti vuccati, evaṃ manodvārikavedanāya appavattamānāya “satto
atk-s0302a:302_12: mato”ti vuccati. Imaṃ vedanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “jīvitapariyantikaṃ vedanaṃ vediyamāno”ti.
atk-s0302a:303_0: Kāyassa bhedāti kāyassa bhedena. Jīvitapariyādānā uddhanti jīvitakkhayato uddhaṃ.
atk-s0302a:303_1: Idhevāti paṭisandhivasena parato agantvā idheva. Sītībhavissantīti pavattivipphandadaratharahitāni
atk-s0302a:303_2: sītāni appavattanadhammāni bhavissanti. Sarīrānīti dhātusarīrāni. Avasissantīti avasiṭṭhāni bhavissanti.
atk-s0302a:304_0: Kumbhakārapākāti kumbhakārassa bhājanapacanaṭṭhānato. Paṭisisseyyāti ṭhapeyya. Kapallānīti
atk-s0302a:304_1: saha mukhavaṭṭiyā ekābaddhāni kumbhakapallāni. Avasisseyyunti tiṭṭheyyuṃ. Evameva
atk-s0302a:304_2: khoti ettha idaṃ opammasaṃsandanaṃ – ādittakumbhakārapāko viya hi tayo bhavā daṭṭhabbā,
atk-s0302a:304_3: kumbhakāro viya yogāvacaro, pākato kumbhakārabhājanānaṃ nīharaṇadaṇḍako viya arahattamaggañāṇaṃ,
atk-s0302a:304_4: samo bhūmibhāgo viya asaṅkhataṃ nibbānatalaṃ, daṇḍakena uṇhakumbhaṃ ākaḍḍhitvā same
atk-s0302a:304_5: bhūmibhāge kumbhassa ṭhapitakālo viya āraddhavipassakassa rūpasattakaṃ arūpasattakaṃ
atk-s0302a:304_6: vipassantassa kammaṭṭhāne ca paguṇe vibhūte upaṭṭhahamāne tathārūpaṃ utusappāyādiṃ
atk-s0302a:304_7: labhitvā ekāsane nisinnassa vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā aggaphalaṃ arahattaṃ patvā catūhi
atk-s0302a:304_8: apāyehi attabhāvaṃ uddharitvā phalasamāpattivasena asaṅkhate nibbānatale ṭhitakālo
atk-s0302a:304_9: daṭṭhabbo. Khīṇāsavo pana uṇhakumbho viya arahattappattadivaseyeva na parinibbāti,
atk-s0302a:304_10: sāsanappaveṇiṃ pana ghaṭayamāno paṇṇāsasaṭṭhivassāni ṭhatvā carimakacittappattiyā
atk-s0302a:304_11: upādiṇṇakakkhandhabhedā anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbāti. Athassa kumbhassa
atk-s0302a:304_12: viya kapallāni anupādiṇṇakasarīrāneva avasissantīti. Sarīrāni avasissantīti pajānātīti
atk-s0302a:305_0: Viññāṇaṃ paññāyethāti paṭisandhiviññāṇaṃ paññāyetha. Sādhu sādhūti therānaṃ byākaraṇaṃ
atk-s0302a:305_1: sampahaṃsati. Evametanti yadetaṃ tividhe abhisaṅkhāre asati paṭisandhiviññāṇassa
atk-s0302a:305_2: appaññāṇantiādi, evameva etaṃ. Adhimuccathāti sanniṭṭhānasaṅkhātaṃ adhimokkhaṃ paṭilabhatha.
atk-s0302a:305_3: Esevanto dukkhassāti ayameva vaṭṭadukkhassa anto ayaṃ paricchedo, yadidaṃ nibbānanti. Paṭhamaṃ.
atk-s0302a:307_0: 52. Dutiye upādāniyesūti catunnaṃ upādānānaṃ paccayesu tebhūmakadhammesu. Assādānupassinoti
atk-s0302a:307_1: assādaṃ anupassantassa. Tatrāti tasmiṃ aggikkhandhe. Tadāhāroti taṃpaccayo. Tadupādānoti
atk-s0302a:307_2: tasseva vevacanaṃ. Evameva khoti ettha aggikkhandho viya hi tayo bhavā, tebhūmakavaṭṭantipi
atk-s0302a:307_3: etadeva, aggijaggakapuriso viya vaṭṭanissito bālaputhujjano, sukkhatiṇagomayādipakkhipanaṃ
atk-s0302a:307_4: viya assādānupassino puthujjanassa taṇhādivasena chahi dvārehi kusalākusalakammakaraṇaṃ.
atk-s0302a:307_5: Tiṇagomayādīsu khīṇesu punappunaṃ tesaṃ pakkhipanena aggikkhandhassa vaḍḍhanaṃ viya
atk-s0302a:307_6: bālaputhujjanassa uṭṭhāya samuṭṭhāya yathāvuttakammāyūhanena aparāparaṃ vaṭṭadukkhanibbattanaṃ.
atk-s0302a:308_0: Na kālena kālaṃ sukkhāni ceva tiṇāni pakkhipeyyāti tañhi koci atthakāmo evaṃ vadeyya
atk-s0302a:308_1: – “bho kasmā uṭṭhāya samuṭṭhāya kalāpe bandhitvā sukkhatiṇakaṭṭhānaṃ pacchiyañca
atk-s0302a:308_2: pūretvā sukkhagomayāni pakkhipanto etaṃ aggiṃ jālesi? Api nu te atthi itonidānaṃ
atk-s0302a:308_3: kāci vaḍḍhīti? Vaṃsāgatametaṃ bho amhākaṃ, itonidānaṃ pana me avaḍḍhiyeva, kuto vaḍḍhi?
atk-s0302a:308_4: Ahañhi imaṃ aggiṃ jagganto neva nhāyituṃ na bhuñjituṃ na nipajjituṃ labhāmīti. Tena
atk-s0302a:308_5: hi bho kiṃ te iminā niratthakena aggijālanena? Ehi tvaṃ etāni ābhatāni tiṇādīni ettha
atk-s0302a:308_6: nikkhipa, tāni sayameva jhāyissanti, tvaṃ pana asukasmiṃ ṭhāne sītodakā pokkharaṇī
atk-s0302a:308_7: atthi, tattha nhatvā, mālāgandhavilepanehi attānaṃ maṇḍetvā sunivattho supārutova
atk-s0302a:308_8: pādukāhi nagaraṃ pavisitvā pāsādavaramāruyha vātapānaṃ vivaritvā mahāvīthiyaṃ virocamāno
atk-s0302a:308_9: nisīda ekaggo sukhasamappito hutvā, tattha te nisinnassa tiṇādīnaṃ khayena sayameva
atk-s0302a:308_10: ayaṃ aggi appaṇṇattibhāvaṃ gamissatī”ti. So tathā kareyya. Tatheva ca tattha nisinnassa
atk-s0302a:308_11: so aggi upādānakkhayena appaṇṇattibhāvaṃ gaccheyya. Idaṃ sandhāyetaṃ “na kālena kāla”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0302a:309_0: Evameva khoti ettha pana idaṃ opammasaṃsandanaṃ – cattālīsāya kaṭṭhavāhānaṃ jalamāno
atk-s0302a:309_1: mahāaggikkhandho viya hi tebhūmakavaṭṭaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ, aggijagganakapuriso viya vaṭṭasannissitako
atk-s0302a:309_2: yogāvacaro, atthakāmo puriso viya sammāsambuddho, tena purisena tassa dinnaovādo
atk-s0302a:309_3: viya tathāgatena “ehi tvaṃ, bhikkhu, tebhūmakadhammesu nibbinda, evaṃ vaṭṭadukkhā
atk-s0302a:309_4: muccissasī”ti tassa tebhūmakadhammesu kammaṭṭhānassa kathitakālo, tassa purisassa
atk-s0302a:309_5: yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipajjitvā pāsāde nisinnakālo viya yogino sugatovādaṃ sampaṭicchitvā
atk-s0302a:309_6: suññāgāraṃ paviṭṭhassa tebhūmakadhammesu vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā anukkamena yathānurūpaṃ
atk-s0302a:309_7: āhārasappāyādiṃ labhitvā, ekāsane nisinnassa aggaphale patiṭṭhitakālo, tassa nhānavilepanādīhi
atk-s0302a:309_8: sudhotamaṇḍitakāyattā tasmiṃ nisinnassa ekaggasukhasamappitakālo viya yogino ariyamaggapokkharaṇiyaṃ
atk-s0302a:309_10: arahattamaṇḍanena attabhāvaṃ maṇḍetvā vimuttipupphadāmaṃ piḷandhitvā iddhipādapādukā
atk-s0302a:309_11: āruyha nibbānanagaraṃ pavisitvā dhammapāsādaṃ āruyha satipaṭṭhānamahāvīthiyaṃ virocamānassa
atk-s0302a:309_12: nibbānārammaṇaṃ phalasamāpattiṃ appetvā nisinnakālo. Tassa pana purisassa tasmiṃ
atk-s0302a:309_13: nisinnassa tiṇādīnaṃ khayena aggikkhandhassa appaṇṇattigamanakālo viya khīṇāsavassa
atk-s0302a:309_14: yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā upādiṇṇakakkhandhabhedena anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbutassa
atk-s0302a:311_0: 53. Tatiye saṃyojaniyesūti dasannaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ paccayesu. Jhāyeyyāti jaleyya. Telaṃ
atk-s0302a:311_1: āsiñceyya vaṭṭiṃ upasaṃhareyyāti dīpapaṭijagganatthaṃ telabhājanañca mahantañca vaṭṭikapālaṃ
atk-s0302a:311_2: gahetvā samīpe niccaṃ ṭhitova tele khīṇe telaṃ āsiñceyya, vaṭṭiyā khīṇāya vaṭṭiṃ
atk-s0302a:311_3: upasaṃhareyya. Sesamettha saddhiṃ opammasaṃsandanena purimanayeneva veditabbaṃ. Tatiyaṃ.
atk-s0302a:313: 54. Catutthe upamaṃ paṭhamaṃ katvā pacchā attho vutto. Sesaṃ tādisameva. Catutthaṃ.
atk-s0302a:315_0: 55. Pañcame uddhaṃ ojaṃ abhiharantīti pathavīrasañca āporasañca upari āropenti. Ojāya
atk-s0302a:315_1: āropitattā hatthasatubbedhassa rukkhassa aṅkuraggesu bindubindūni viya hutvā sineho
atk-s0302a:315_2: tiṭṭhati. Idaṃ panettha opammasaṃsandanaṃ – mahārukkho viya hi tebhūmakavaṭṭaṃ, mūlāni
atk-s0302a:315_3: viya āyatanāni, mūlehi ojāya ārohanaṃ viya chahi dvārehi kammārohanaṃ, ojāya abhiruḷhattā
atk-s0302a:315_4: mahārukkhassa yāvakappaṭṭhānaṃ viya vaṭṭanissitabālaputhujjanassa chahi dvārehi kammaṃ
atk-s0302a:315_5: āyūhantassa aparāparaṃ vaṭṭassa vaḍḍhanavasena dīgharattaṃ ṭhānaṃ.
atk-s0302a:316_0: Kuddālapiṭakanti kuddālañceva pacchibhājanañca. Khaṇḍākhaṇḍikaṃ chindeyyāti khuddakamahantāni
atk-s0302a:316_1: khaṇḍākhaṇḍāni karonto chindeyya. Idaṃ panettha opammasaṃsandanaṃ – idhāpi hi mahārukkho
atk-s0302a:316_2: viya tebhūmakavaṭṭaṃ, rukkhaṃ nāsetukāmo puriso viya yogāvacaro, kuddālo viya ñāṇaṃ,
atk-s0302a:316_3: pacchi viya samādhi, rukkhacchedanapharasu viya ñāṇaṃ, rukkhassa mūle chinnakālo
atk-s0302a:316_4: viya yogino ācariyasantike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā manasikarontassa paññā, khaṇḍākhaṇḍikaṃ
atk-s0302a:316_5: chindanakālo viya saṅkhepato catunnaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ manasikāro, phālanaṃ viya dvecattālīsāya
atk-s0302a:316_6: koṭṭhāsesu vitthāramanasikāro, sakalikaṃ sakalikaṃ karaṇakālo viya upādārūpassa ceva
atk-s0302a:316_7: rūpakkhandhārammaṇassa viññāṇassa cāti imesaṃ vasena nāmarūpapariggaho, mūlānaṃ upacchedanaṃ
atk-s0302a:316_8: viya tasseva nāmarūpassa paccayapariyesanaṃ, vātātape visosetvā agginā ḍahanakālo
atk-s0302a:316_9: viya anupubbena vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā aññataraṃ sappāyaṃ labhitvā kammaṭṭhāne vibhūte
atk-s0302a:316_10: upaṭṭhahamāne ekapallaṅke nisinnassa samaṇadhammaṃ karontassa aggaphalappatti, masikaraṇaṃ
atk-s0302a:316_11: viya arahattappattadivaseyeva aparinibbāyantassa yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhita kālo, mahāvāte
atk-s0302a:316_12: opunanaṃ nadiyā pavāhanaṃ viya ca upādiṇṇakakkhandhabhedena anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā
atk-s0302a:318: 56. Chaṭṭhepi upamaṃ paṭhamaṃ vatvā pacchā attho vutto, idameva nānattaṃ. Chaṭṭhaṃ.
atk-s0302a:320_0: 57-59. Sattame taruṇoti ajātaphalo. Palimajjeyyāti sodheyya. Paṃsuṃ dadeyyāti thaddhapharusapaṃsuṃ
atk-s0302a:320_1: haritvā mudugomayacuṇṇamissaṃ madhurapaṃsuṃ pakkhipeyya. Vuddhinti vuddhiṃ āpajjitvā
atk-s0302a:320_2: pupphūpago pupphaṃ, phalūpago phalaṃ gaṇheyya. Idaṃ panettha opammasaṃsandanaṃ –
atk-s0302a:320_3: taruṇarukkho viya hi tebhūmakavaṭṭaṃ, rukkhajaggako puriso viya vaṭṭanissito puthujjano,
atk-s0302a:320_4: mūlaphalasantānādīni viya tīhi dvārehi kusalākusalakammāyūhanaṃ, rukkhassa vuḍḍhiāpajjanaṃ
atk-s0302a:320_5: viya puthujjanassa tīhi dvārehi kammaṃ āyūhato aparāparaṃ vaṭṭappavatti. Vivaṭṭaṃ
atk-s0302a:322_0: 60. Dasame kurūsu viharatīti kurūti evaṃ bahuvacanavasena laddhavohāre janapade viharati.
atk-s0302a:322_1: Kammāsadhammaṃ nāma kurūnaṃ nigamoti evaṃnāmako kurūnaṃ nigamo, taṃ gocaragāmaṃ katvāti
atk-s0302a:322_2: attho. Āyasmāti piyavacanametaṃ garuvacanametaṃ. Ānandoti tassa therassa nāmaṃ. Ekamantaṃ
atk-s0302a:322_3: nisīdīti cha nisajjadose vivajjento dakkhiṇajāṇumaṇḍalassa abhimukhaṭṭhāne chabbaṇṇānaṃ
atk-s0302a:322_4: buddharasmīnaṃ anto pavisitvā pasannalākhārasaṃ vigāhanto viya suvaṇṇapaṭaṃ pārupanto
atk-s0302a:322_5: viya rattakambalavitānamajjhaṃ pavisanto viya dhammabhaṇḍāgāriko āyasmā ānando nisīdi.
atk-s0302a:323_0: Kāya pana velāya kena kāraṇena ayamāyasmā bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamantoti? Sāyanhavelāya
atk-s0302a:323_1: paccayākārapañhaṃ pucchanakāraṇena. Taṃ divasaṃ kira ayamāyasmā kulasaṅgahatthāya
atk-s0302a:323_2: gharadvāre gharadvāre sahassabhaṇḍikaṃ nikkhipanto viya kammāsadhammaṃ piṇḍāya caritvā
atk-s0302a:323_3: piṇḍapātapaṭikkanto satthu vattaṃ dassetvā satthari gandhakuṭiṃ paviṭṭhe satthāraṃ
atk-s0302a:323_4: vanditvā attano divāṭṭhānaṃ gantvā antevāsikesu vattaṃ dassetvā paṭikkantesu divāṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0302a:323_5: paṭisammajjitvā cammakkhaṇḍaṃ paññapetvā udakatumbato udakena hatthapāde sītalaṃ
atk-s0302a:323_6: katvā pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā nisinno sotāpattiphalasamāpattiṃ samāpajjitvā. Atha paricchinnakālavasena
atk-s0302a:323_7: samāpattito vuṭṭhāya paccayākāre ñāṇaṃ otāresi. So “avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā”tiādito
atk-s0302a:323_8: paṭṭhāya antaṃ, antato paṭṭhāya ādiṃ, ubhayantato paṭṭhāya majjhaṃ, majjhato paṭṭhāya
atk-s0302a:323_9: ubho ante pāpento tikkhattuṃ dvādasapadaṃ paccayākāraṃ sammasi. Tassevaṃ sammasantassa
atk-s0302a:323_10: paccayākāro vibhūto hutvā uttānakuttānako viya upaṭṭhāsi. Tato cintesi – “ayaṃ paccayākāro
atk-s0302a:323_11: sabbabuddhehi gambhīro ceva gambhīrāvabhāso cāti kathito, mayhaṃ kho pana padesañāṇe
atk-s0302a:323_12: ṭhitassa sāvakassa sato uttāno viya vibhūto pākaṭo hutvā upaṭṭhāti, mayhaṃyeva nu
atk-s0302a:323_13: kho esa uttānako viya upaṭṭhāti, udāhu aññesampīti attano upaṭṭhānakāraṇaṃ satthu
atk-s0302a:323_14: ārocessāmī”ti nisinnaṭṭhānato uṭṭhāya cammakkhaṇḍaṃ papphoṭetvā ādāya sāyanhasamaye
atk-s0302a:323_15: bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkami. Tena vuttaṃ – “sāyanhavelāyaṃ paccayākārapañhaṃ pucchanakāraṇena upasaṅkamanto”ti.
atk-s0302a:324_0: Yāva gambhīroti ettha yāvasaddo pamāṇātikkame. Atikkamma pamāṇaṃ gambhīro, atigambhīroti
atk-s0302a:324_1: attho. Gambhīrāvabhāsoti gambhīrova hutvā avabhāsati, dissatīti attho. Ekañhi uttānameva
atk-s0302a:324_2: gambhīrāvabhāsaṃ hoti pūtipaṇṇarasavasena kāḷavaṇṇaṃ purāṇaudakaṃ viya. Tañhi jāṇuppamāṇampi
atk-s0302a:324_3: sataporisaṃ viya dissati. Ekaṃ gambhīraṃ uttānāvabhāsaṃ hoti maṇibhāsaṃ vippasannaudakaṃ
atk-s0302a:324_4: viya. Tañhi sataporisampi jāṇuppamāṇaṃ viya khāyati. Ekaṃ uttānaṃ uttānāvabhāsaṃ
atk-s0302a:324_5: hoti pātiādīsu udakaṃ viya. Ekaṃ gambhīraṃ gambhīrāvabhāsaṃ hoti sinerupādakamahāsamudde
atk-s0302a:324_6: udakaṃ viya. Evaṃ udakameva cattāri nāmāni labhati. Paṭiccasamuppāde panetaṃ natthi.
atk-s0302a:324_7: Ayañhi gambhīro ca gambhīrāvabhāso cāti ekameva nāmaṃ labhati. Evarūpo samānopi atha
atk-s0302a:324_8: ca pana me uttānakuttānako viya khāyati, tadidaṃ acchariyaṃ, bhante, abbhutaṃ, bhanteti
atk-s0302a:324_9: evaṃ attano vimhayaṃ pakāsento pañhaṃ pucchitvā tuṇhībhūto nisīdi.
atk-s0302a:325_0: Bhagavā tassa vacanaṃ sutvā “ānando bhavaggagahaṇāya hatthaṃ pasārento viya sineruṃ
atk-s0302a:325_1: bhinditvā miñjaṃ nīharituṃ vāyamamāno viya vinā nāvāya mahāsamuddaṃ taritukāmo viya
atk-s0302a:325_2: pathaviṃ parivattetvā pathavojaṃ gahetuṃ vāyamamāno viya buddhavisayaṃ pañhaṃ attano
atk-s0302a:325_3: uttānuttānanti vadati, handassa gambhīrabhāvaṃ ācikkhāmī”ti cintetvā mā hevantiādimāha.
atk-s0302a:326_0: Tattha mā hevanti ha-kāro nipātamattaṃ, evaṃ mā bhaṇīti attho. “Mā heva”nti ca idaṃ
atk-s0302a:326_1: vacanaṃ bhagavā āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ ussādentopi bhaṇati apasādentopi. Tattha ussādentopīti,
atk-s0302a:326_2: ānanda, tvaṃ mahāpañño visadañāṇo, tena te gambhīropi paṭiccasamuppādo uttānako viya
atk-s0302a:326_3: khāyati, aññesaṃ panesa uttānakoti na sallakkhetabbo, gambhīroyeva ca so gambhīrāvabhāso ca.
atk-s0302a:327_0: Tattha catasso upamā vadanti – cha māse subhojanarasapuṭṭhassa kira katayogassa mahāmallassa
atk-s0302a:327_1: samajjasamaye katamallapāsāṇaparicayassa yuddhabhūmiṃ gacchantassa antarā mallapāsāṇaṃ
atk-s0302a:327_2: dassesuṃ. So “kiṃ eta”nti āha. Mallapāsāṇoti. Āharatha nanti. “Ukkhipituṃ na sakkomā”ti
atk-s0302a:327_3: vutte sayaṃ gantvā “kuhiṃ imassa bhāriyaṭṭhāna”nti vatvā dvīhi hatthehi dve pāsāṇe
atk-s0302a:327_4: ukkhipitvā kīḷāguḷe viya khipitvā agamāsi. Tattha mallassa mallapāsāṇo lahukoti na
atk-s0302a:327_5: aññesampi lahukoti vattabbo. Cha māse subhojanarasapuṭṭho mallo viya hi kappasatasahassaṃ
atk-s0302a:327_6: abhinīhārasampanno āyasmā ānando. Yathā mallassa mahābalatāya mallapāsāṇo lahuko,
atk-s0302a:327_7: evaṃ therassa mahāpaññatāya paṭiccasamuppādo uttānoti vattabbo, so aññesaṃ uttānoti na vattabbo.
atk-s0302a:328_0: Mahāsamudde ca timi nāma mahāmaccho dviyojanasatiko, timiṅgalo tiyojanasatiko, timirapiṅgalo
atk-s0302a:328_1: pañcayojanasatiko, ānando timinando ajjhāroho mahātimīti ime cattāro yojanasahassikā.
atk-s0302a:328_2: Tattha timirapiṅgaleneva dīpenti. Tassa kira dakkhiṇakaṇṇaṃ cālentassa pañcayojanasate
atk-s0302a:328_3: padese udakaṃ calati, tathā vāmakaṇṇaṃ, tathā naṅguṭṭhaṃ, tathā sīsaṃ. Dve pana kaṇṇe
atk-s0302a:328_4: cāletvā naṅguṭṭhena paharitvā sīsaṃ aparāparaṃ katvā kīḷituṃ āraddhassa sattaṭṭhayojanasate
atk-s0302a:328_5: ṭhāne bhājane pakkhipitvā uddhane āropitaṃ viya udakaṃ pakkuthati. Yojanasatamatte
atk-s0302a:328_6: padese udakaṃ piṭṭhiṃ chādetuṃ na sakkoti. So evaṃ vadeyya – “ayaṃ mahāsamuddo gambhīroti
atk-s0302a:328_7: vadanti, kutassa gambhīratā, mayaṃ piṭṭhimattacchādanampi udakaṃ na labhāmā”ti. Tattha
atk-s0302a:328_8: kāyūpapannassa timirapiṅgalassa mahāsamuddo uttānoti aññesañca khuddakamacchānaṃ
atk-s0302a:328_9: uttānoti na vattabbo, evameva ñāṇūpapannassa therassa paṭiccasamuppādo uttānoti aññesampi
atk-s0302a:328_10: uttānoti na vattabbo. Supaṇṇarājā ca diyaḍḍhayojanasatiko hoti. Tassa dakkhiṇapakkho
atk-s0302a:328_11: paññāsayojaniko hoti, tathā vāmapakkho, piñchavaṭṭi ca saṭṭhiyojanikā, gīvā tiṃsayojanikā,
atk-s0302a:328_12: mukhaṃ navayojanaṃ, pādā dvādasayojanikā, tasmiṃ supaṇṇavātaṃ dassetuṃ āraddhe sattaṭṭhayojanasataṃ
atk-s0302a:328_13: ṭhānaṃ nappahoti. So evaṃ vadeyya – “ayaṃ ākāso anantoti vadanti, kutassa anantatā,
atk-s0302a:328_14: mayaṃ pakkhavātappattharaṇokāsampi na labhāmā”ti. Tattha kāyūpapannassa supaṇṇarañño
atk-s0302a:328_15: ākāso parittoti aññesañca khuddakapakkhīnaṃ parittoti na vattabbo, evameva ñāṇūpapannassa
atk-s0302a:328_16: therassa paṭiccasamuppādo uttānoti aññesampi uttānoti na vattabbo.
atk-s0302a:329_0: Rāhu asurindo pana pādantato yāva kesantā yojanānaṃ cattāri sahassāni aṭṭha ca satāni
atk-s0302a:329_1: honti. Tassa dvinnaṃ bāhānaṃ antare dvādasayojanasatikaṃ, bahalattena chayojanasatikaṃ,
atk-s0302a:329_2: hatthapādatalāni tiyojanasatikāni, tathā mukhaṃ, ekaṅgulipabbaṃ paññāsayojanaṃ, tathā
atk-s0302a:329_3: bhamukantaraṃ, nalāṭaṃ tiyojanasatikaṃ, sīsaṃ navayojanasatikaṃ. Tassa mahāsamuddaṃ
atk-s0302a:329_4: otiṇṇassa gambhīraṃ udakaṃ jāṇuppamāṇaṃ hoti. So evaṃ vadeyya – “ayaṃ mahāsamuddo
atk-s0302a:329_5: gambhīroti vadanti. Kutassa gambhīratā? Mayaṃ jāṇuppaṭicchādanamattampi udakaṃ na
atk-s0302a:329_6: labhāmā”ti. Tattha kāyūpapannassa rāhuno mahāsamuddo uttānoti aññesañca uttānoti
atk-s0302a:329_7: na vattabbo. Evameva ñāṇūpapannassa therassa paṭiccasamuppādo uttānoti aññesampi
atk-s0302a:329_8: uttānoti na vattabbo. Etamatthaṃ sandhāya bhagavā mā hevaṃ, ānanda, mā hevaṃ, ānandāti āha.
atk-s0302a:330: Therassa hi catūhi kāraṇehi gambhīro paṭiccasamuppādo uttānoti upaṭṭhāsi. Katamehi catūhi? Pubbūpanissayasampattiyā titthavāsena sotāpannatāya bahussutabhāvenāti.
atk-s0302a:331_0: Ito kira satasahassime kappe padumuttaro nāma satthā loke uppajji. Tassa haṃsavatī
atk-s0302a:331_1: nāma nagaraṃ ahosi, ānando nāma rājā pitā, sumedhā nāma devī mātā, bodhisatto uttarakumāro
atk-s0302a:331_2: nāma ahosi. So puttassa jātadivase mahābhinikkhamanaṃ nikkhamma pabbajitvā padhānamanuyutto
atk-s0302a:331_3: anukkamena sabbaññutaṃ patvā, “anekajātisaṃsāra”nti udānaṃ udānetvā sattāhaṃ bodhipallaṅke
