atk-s0302a:331_4: vītināmetvā “pathaviyaṃ pādaṃ ṭhapessāmī”ti pādaṃ abhinīhari. Atha pathaviṃ bhinditvā
atk-s0302a:331_5: mahantaṃ padumaṃ uṭṭhāsi. Tassa dhurapattāni navutihatthāni, kesaraṃ tiṃsahatthaṃ,
atk-s0302a:332_0: Satthā pana ubbedhato aṭṭhapaññāsahattho ahosi, tassa ubhinnaṃ bāhānamantaraṃ aṭṭhārasahatthaṃ,
atk-s0302a:332_1: nalāṭaṃ pañcahatthaṃ, hatthapādā ekādasahatthā. Tassa ekādasahatthena pādena dvādasahatthāya
atk-s0302a:332_2: kaṇṇikāya akkantamattāya navaghaṭappamāṇā reṇu uṭṭhāya aṭṭhapaññāsahatthaṃ padesaṃ
atk-s0302a:332_3: uggantvā okiṇṇamanosilācuṇṇaṃ viya paccokiṇṇaṃ. Tadupādāya bhagavā “padumuttaro”tveva
atk-s0302a:332_4: paññāyittha. Tassa devilo ca sujāto ca dve aggasāvakā ahesuṃ, amitā ca asamā ca dve
atk-s0302a:332_5: aggasāvikā, sumano nāma upaṭṭhāko. Padumuttaro bhagavā pitusaṅgahaṃ kurumāno bhikkhusatasahassaparivāro
atk-s0302a:333_0: Kaniṭṭhabhātā panassa sumanakumāro nāma. Tassa rājā haṃsavatito vīsayojanasate bhogaṃ
atk-s0302a:333_1: adāsi. So kadāci āgantvā pitarañca satthārañca passati. Athekadivasaṃ paccanto kupito.
atk-s0302a:333_2: Sumano rañño sāsanaṃ pesesi. Rājā “tvaṃ mayā, tāta, kasmā ṭhapito”ti paṭipesesi.
atk-s0302a:333_3: So core vūpasametvā “upasanto, deva, janapado”ti rañño pesesi. Rājā tuṭṭho “sīghaṃ
atk-s0302a:333_4: mama putto āgacchatū”ti āha. Tassa sahassamattā amaccā honti. So tehi saddhiṃ antarāmagge
atk-s0302a:333_5: mantesi – “mayhaṃ pitā tuṭṭho sace me varaṃ deti, kiṃ gaṇhāmī”ti? Atha naṃ ekacce
atk-s0302a:333_6: “hatthiṃ gaṇhatha, assaṃ gaṇhatha, janapadaṃ gaṇhatha, sattaratanāni gaṇhathā”ti
atk-s0302a:333_7: āhaṃsu. Apare “tumhe pathavissarassa puttā, na tumhākaṃ dhanaṃ dullabhaṃ, laddhampi
atk-s0302a:333_8: cetaṃ sabbaṃ pahāya gamanīyaṃ, puññameva ekaṃ ādāya gamanīyaṃ, tasmā deve varaṃ dadamāne
atk-s0302a:333_9: temāsaṃ padumuttaraṃ bhagavantaṃ upaṭṭhātuṃ varaṃ gaṇhathā”ti. So “tumhe mayhaṃ kalyāṇamittā
atk-s0302a:333_10: nāma, mametaṃ cittaṃ natthi, tumhehi pana uppāditaṃ, evaṃ karissāmī”ti, gantvā pitaraṃ
atk-s0302a:333_11: vanditvā pitarā āliṅgetvā, matthake cumbitvā “varaṃ te, putta, demī”ti vutte “icchāmahaṃ,
atk-s0302a:333_12: mahārāja, bhagavantaṃ temāsaṃ catūhi paccayehi upaṭṭhahanto jīvitaṃ avañjhaṃ kātuṃ,
atk-s0302a:333_13: idaṃ me varaṃ dehī”ti āha. Na sakkā, tāta, aññaṃ varehīti. Deva, khattiyānaṃ nāma
atk-s0302a:333_14: dvekathā natthi, etameva me dehi, na mamaññena atthoti. Tāta, buddhānaṃ nāma cittaṃ
atk-s0302a:333_15: dujjānaṃ, sace bhagavā na icchissati, mayā dinnampi kiṃ bhavissatīti? “Sādhu, deva,
atk-s0302a:333_16: ahaṃ bhagavato cittaṃ jānissāmī”ti vihāraṃ gato.
atk-s0302a:334_0: Tena ca samayena bhattakiccaṃ niṭṭhāpetvā bhagavā gandhakuṭiṃ paviṭṭho hoti. So maṇḍalamāḷe
atk-s0302a:334_1: sannisinnānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ santikaṃ agamāsi. Te naṃ āhaṃsu – “rājaputta kasmā āgatosī”ti?
atk-s0302a:334_2: Bhagavantaṃ dassanāya, dassetha me bhagavantanti. “Na mayaṃ, rājaputta, icchiticchitakkhaṇe
atk-s0302a:334_3: satthāraṃ daṭṭhuṃ labhāmā”ti. Ko pana, bhante, labhatīti? Sumanatthero nāma rājaputtāti.
atk-s0302a:334_4: So “kuhiṃ bhante thero”ti? Therassa nisinnaṭṭhānaṃ pucchitvā gantvā vanditvā – “icchāmahaṃ,
atk-s0302a:334_5: bhante, bhagavantaṃ passituṃ, dassetha me bhagavanta”nti āha. Thero “ehi, rājaputtā”ti
atk-s0302a:334_6: taṃ gahetvā gandhakuṭipariveṇe ṭhapetvā gandhakuṭiṃ āruhi. Atha naṃ bhagavā “sumana,
atk-s0302a:334_7: kasmā āgatosī”ti āha. Rājaputto, bhante, bhagavantaṃ dassanāya āgatoti. Tena hi bhikkhu
atk-s0302a:334_8: āsanaṃ paññapehīti. Thero āsanaṃ paññapesi. Nisīdi bhagavā paññatte āsane. Rājaputto
atk-s0302a:334_9: bhagavantaṃ vanditvā paṭisanthāraṃ akāsi, “kadā āgatosi rājaputtā”ti? Bhante, tumhesu
atk-s0302a:334_10: gandhakuṭiṃ paviṭṭhesu, bhikkhū pana “na mayaṃ icchiticchitakkhaṇe bhagavantaṃ daṭṭhuṃ
atk-s0302a:334_11: labhāmā”ti maṃ therassa santikaṃ pāhesuṃ, thero pana ekavacaneneva dassesi, thero,
atk-s0302a:334_12: bhante, tumhākaṃ sāsane vallabho maññeti. Āma, rājakumāra, vallabho esa bhikkhu mayhaṃ
atk-s0302a:334_13: sāsaneti. Bhante, buddhānaṃ sāsane kiṃ katvā vallabho hotīti? Dānaṃ datvā sīlaṃ samādiyitvā
atk-s0302a:334_14: uposathakammaṃ katvā, kumārāti. Bhagavā ahampi thero viya buddhasāsane vallabho hotukāmo,
atk-s0302a:334_15: temāsaṃ me vassāvāsaṃ adhivāsethāti. Bhagavā, “atthi nu kho gatena attho”ti oloketvā
atk-s0302a:334_16: “atthī”ti disvā “suññāgāre kho, rājakumāra, tathāgatā abhiramantī”ti āha. Kumāro
atk-s0302a:334_17: “aññātaṃ bhagavā, aññātaṃ sugatā”ti vatvā – “ahaṃ, bhante, purimataraṃ gantvā vihāraṃ
atk-s0302a:334_18: kāremi, mayā pesite bhikkhusatasahassena saddhiṃ āgacchathā”ti paṭiññaṃ gahetvā pitu
atk-s0302a:334_19: santikaṃ gantvā, “dinnā me, deva, bhagavatā paṭiññā, mayā pahite tumhe bhagavantaṃ
atk-s0302a:334_20: peseyyāthā”ti pitaraṃ vanditvā nikkhamitvā yojane yojane vihāraṃ kāretvā vīsayojanasataṃ
atk-s0302a:334_21: addhānaṃ gato. Gantvā attano nagare vihāraṭṭhānaṃ vicinanto sobhanassa nāma kuṭumbikassa
atk-s0302a:334_22: uyyānaṃ disvā satasahassena kiṇitvā satasahassaṃ vissajjetvā vihāraṃ kāresi. Tattha
atk-s0302a:334_24: kārāpetvā pākāraparikkhepaṃ dvārakoṭṭhakañca niṭṭhāpetvā pitu santikaṃ pesesi “niṭṭhitaṃ
atk-s0302a:335_0: Rājā bhagavantaṃ bhojetvā “bhagavā sumanassa kiccaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ, tumhākaṃ āgamanaṃ
atk-s0302a:335_1: paccāsīsatī”ti. Bhagavā satasahassabhikkhuparivāro yojane yojane vihāresu vasamāno
atk-s0302a:335_2: agamāsi. Kumāro “satthā āgacchatī”ti sutvā yojanaṃ paccuggantvā gandhamālādīhi pūjayamāno vihāraṃ pavesetvā –
atk-s0302a:338_0: Vihāraṃ niyyātesi. So vassūpanāyikadivase dānaṃ datvā attano puttadāre ca amacce
atk-s0302a:338_1: ca pakkosāpetvā āha –“satthā amhākaṃ santikaṃ dūrato āgato, buddhā ca nāma dhammagarunova,
atk-s0302a:338_2: nāmisagarukā. Tasmā ahaṃ imaṃ temāsaṃ dve sāṭake nivāsetvā dasa sīlāni samādiyitvā
atk-s0302a:338_3: idheva vasissāmi, tumhe khīṇāsavasatasahassassa imināva nīhārena temāsaṃ dānaṃ dadeyyāthā”ti.
atk-s0302a:339_0: So sumanattherassa vasanaṭṭhānasabhāgeyeva ṭhāne vasanto yaṃ thero bhagavato vattaṃ
atk-s0302a:339_1: karoti, taṃ sabbaṃ disvā, “imasmiṃ ṭhāne ekantavallabho esa thero, etasseva ṭhānantaraṃ
atk-s0302a:339_2: patthetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti cintetvā, upakaṭṭhāya pavāraṇāya gāmaṃ pavisitvā sattāhaṃ mahādānaṃ
atk-s0302a:339_3: datvā sattame divase bhikkhūsatasahassassa pādamūle ticīvaraṃ ṭhapetvā bhagavantaṃ
atk-s0302a:339_4: vanditvā, “bhante, yadetaṃ mayā magge yojanantarikavihārakārāpanato paṭṭhāya puññaṃ
atk-s0302a:339_5: kataṃ, taṃ neva sakkasampattiṃ, na mārabrahmasampattiṃ patthayantena, buddhassa pana
atk-s0302a:339_6: upaṭṭhākabhāvaṃ patthentena kataṃ. Tasmā ahampi bhagavā anāgate sumanatthero viya
atk-s0302a:339_7: ekassa buddhassa upaṭṭhāko homī”ti pañcapatiṭṭhitena patitvā vanditvā nipanno. Bhagavā
atk-s0302a:339_8: “mahantaṃ kulaputtassa cittaṃ, ijjhissati nu kho, no”ti olokento, “anāgate ito satasahassime
atk-s0302a:339_9: kappe gotamo nāma buddho uppajjissati, tasseva upaṭṭhāko bhavissatī”ti ñatvā –
atk-s0302a:341: Sabbe pūrentu saṅkappā, cando pannaraso yathā”ti. –
atk-s0302a:342_0: Āha. Kumāro sutvā “buddhā nāma advejjhakathā hontī”ti dutiyadivaseyeva tassa bhagavato
atk-s0302a:342_1: pattacīvaraṃ gahetvā piṭṭhito piṭṭhito gacchanto viya ahosi. So tasmiṃ buddhuppāde
atk-s0302a:342_2: vassasatasahassaṃ dānaṃ datvā sagge nibbattitvā kassapabuddhakālepi piṇḍāya carato
atk-s0302a:342_3: therassa pattaggahaṇatthaṃ uttarisāṭakaṃ datvā pūjaṃ akāsi. Puna sagge nibbattitvā
atk-s0302a:342_4: tato cuto bārāṇasirājā hutvā aṭṭhannaṃ paccekabuddhānaṃ paṇṇasālāyo kāretvā maṇiādhārake
atk-s0302a:342_5: upaṭṭhapetvā catūhi paccayehi dasavassasahassāni upaṭṭhānaṃ akāsi. Etāni pākaṭaṭṭhānāni.
atk-s0302a:343_0: Kappasatasahassaṃ pana dānaṃ dadamānova amhākaṃ bodhisattena saddhiṃ tusitapure nibbattitvā
atk-s0302a:343_1: tato cuto amitodanasakkassa gehe paṭisandhiṃ gahetvā anupubbena katābhinikkhamano
atk-s0302a:343_2: sammāsambodhiṃ patvā paṭhamagamanena kapilavatthuṃ āgantvā tato nikkhamante bhagavati
atk-s0302a:343_3: bhagavato parivāratthaṃ rājakumāresu pabbajantesu bhaddiyādīhi saddhiṃ nikkhamitvā
atk-s0302a:343_4: bhagavato santike pabbajitvā nacirasseva āyasmato puṇṇassa mantāṇiputtassa santike
atk-s0302a:343_5: dhammakathaṃ sutvā sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahi. Evamesa āyasmā pubbūpanissayasampanno,
atk-s0302a:343_6: tassimāya pubbūpanissayasampattiyā gambhīropi paṭiccasamuppādo uttānako viya upaṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0302a:344_0: Titthavāsoti pana garūnaṃ santike uggahaṇasavanaparipucchanadhāraṇāni vuccanti. So
atk-s0302a:344_1: therassa ativiya parisuddho. Tenāpissāyaṃ gambhīropi uttānako viya upaṭṭhāsi. Sotāpannānañca
atk-s0302a:344_2: nāma paccayākāro uttānako hutvā upaṭṭhāti, ayañca āyasmā sotāpanno. Bahussutānaṃ
atk-s0302a:344_3: catuhatthe ovarake padīpe jalamāne mañcapīṭhaṃ viya nāmarūpaparicchedo pākaṭo hoti,
atk-s0302a:344_4: ayañca āyasmā bahussutānaṃ aggo. Iti bāhusaccabhāvenapissa gambhīropi paccayākāro
atk-s0302a:344_5: uttānako viya upaṭṭhāsi. Paṭiccasamuppādo catūhi gambhīratāhi gambhīro. Sā panassa
atk-s0302a:344_6: gambhīratā visuddhimagge vitthāritāva. Sā sabbāpi therassa uttānakā viya upaṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0302a:344_7: Tena bhagavā āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ ussādento mā hevantiādimāha. Ayañhettha adhippāyo
atk-s0302a:344_8: – ānanda, tvaṃ mahāpañño visadañāṇo, tena te gambhīropi paṭiccasamuppādo uttānako
atk-s0302a:344_9: viya khāyati. Tasmā “mayhameva nu kho esa uttānako viya hutvā upaṭṭhāti, udāhu aññesampī”ti mā evaṃ avaca.
atk-s0302a:345_0: Yaṃ pana vuttaṃ “apasādento”ti, tatthāyamadhippāyo – ānanda, “atha ca pana me uttānakuttānako
atk-s0302a:345_1: viya khāyatī”ti mā hevaṃ avaca. Yadi hi te esa uttānakuttānako viya khāyati, kasmā
atk-s0302a:345_2: tvaṃ attano dhammatāya sotāpanno nāhosi, mayā dinnanaye ṭhatvā sotāpattimaggaṃ paṭivijjhi?
atk-s0302a:345_3: Ānanda, idaṃ nibbānameva gambhīraṃ, paccayākāro pana uttānako jāto, atha kasmā oḷārikaṃ
atk-s0302a:345_4: kāmarāgasaṃyojanaṃ paṭighasaṃyojanaṃ oḷārikaṃ kāmarāgānusayaṃ paṭighānusayanti ime
atk-s0302a:345_5: cattāro kilese samugghātetvā sakadāgāmiphalaṃ na sacchikarosi, teyeva aṇusahagate
atk-s0302a:345_6: cattāro kilese samugghātetvā anāgāmiphalaṃ na sacchikarosi, rūparāgādīni pañca saṃyojanāni,
atk-s0302a:345_7: mānānusayaṃ bhavarāgānusayaṃ avijjānusayanti ime aṭṭha kilese samugghātetvā arahattaṃ
atk-s0302a:345_8: na sacchikarosi? Kasmā vā satasahassakappādhikaṃ ekaṃ asaṅkhyeyyaṃ pūritapāramino
atk-s0302a:345_9: sāriputtamoggallānā viya sāvakapāramīñāṇaṃ na paṭivijjhasi, satasahassakappādhikāni
atk-s0302a:345_10: dve asaṅkhyeyyāni pūritapāramino paccekabuddhā viya ca paccekabodhiñāṇaṃ na paṭivijjhasi?
atk-s0302a:345_11: Yadi vā te sabbathāva esa uttānako hutvā upaṭṭhāsi. Atha kasmā satasahassakappādhikāni
atk-s0302a:345_12: cattāri aṭṭha soḷasa vā asaṅkhyeyyāni pūritapāramino buddhā viya sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ
atk-s0302a:345_13: na sacchikarosi? Kiṃ anatthikosi etehi visesādhigamehi? Passa yāva ca te aparaddhaṃ,
atk-s0302a:345_14: tvaṃ nāma sāvakapadesañāṇe ṭhito atigambhīraṃ paccayākāraṃ “uttānako viya me upaṭṭhātī”ti
atk-s0302a:345_15: vadasi. Tassa te idaṃ vacanaṃ buddhānaṃ kathāya paccanīkaṃ hoti. Tādisena nāma bhikkhunā
atk-s0302a:345_16: buddhānaṃ kathāya paccanīkaṃ kathetabbanti na yuttametaṃ. Nanu mayhaṃ, ānanda, imaṃ
atk-s0302a:345_17: paccayākāraṃ paṭivijjhituṃ vāyamantasseva kappasatasahassādhikāni cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni
atk-s0302a:345_18: atikkantāni. Paccayākārapaṭivijjhanatthāya ca pana me adinnadānaṃ nāma natthi, apūritapāramī
atk-s0302a:345_19: nāma natthi. “Ajja paccayākāraṃ paṭivijjhissāmī”ti pana me nirussāhaṃ viya mārabalaṃ
atk-s0302a:345_20: vidhamantassa ayaṃ mahāpathavī dvaṅgulamattampi nākampi, tathā paṭhamayāme pubbenivāsaṃ,
atk-s0302a:345_21: majjhimayāme dibbacakkhuṃ sampādentassa. Pacchimayāme pana me balavapaccūsasamaye,
atk-s0302a:345_22: “avijjā saṅkhārānaṃ navahi ākārehi paccayo hotī”ti diṭṭhamatteyeva dasasahassilokadhātu
atk-s0302a:345_23: ayadaṇḍena ākoṭitakaṃsathālo viya viravasataṃ viravasahassaṃ muñcamānā vātāhate paduminipaṇṇe
atk-s0302a:345_24: udakabindu viya pakampittha. Evaṃ gambhīro cāyaṃ, ānanda, paṭiccasamuppādo gambhīrāvabhāso
atk-s0302a:345_25: ca, etassa, ānanda, dhammassa ananubodhā…pe… nātivattatīti.
atk-s0302a:346_0: Etassa dhammassāti etassa paccayadhammassa. Ananubodhāti ñātapariññāvasena ananubujjhanā.
atk-s0302a:346_2: viya ākulajātā. Yathā nāma dunnikkhittaṃ mūsikacchinnaṃ pesakārānaṃ tantaṃ tahiṃ
atk-s0302a:346_3: tahiṃ ākulaṃ hoti, “idaṃ aggaṃ, idaṃ mūla”nti aggena vā aggaṃ, mūlena vā mūlaṃ samānetuṃ
atk-s0302a:346_4: dukkaraṃ hoti. Evameva sattā imasmiṃ paccayākāre khalitā ākulā byākulā honti, na
atk-s0302a:346_5: sakkonti paccayākāraṃ ujuṃ kātuṃ. Tattha tantaṃ paccattapurisakāre ṭhatvā sakkāpi
atk-s0302a:346_6: bhaveyya ujuṃ kātuṃ, ṭhapetvā pana dve bodhisatte añño satto attano dhammatāya paccayākāraṃ
atk-s0302a:346_7: ujuṃ kātuṃ samattho nāma natthi. Yathā pana ākulaṃ tantaṃ kañjiyaṃ datvā kocchena
atk-s0302a:346_8: pahaṭaṃ tattha tattha guḷakajātaṃ hoti gaṇṭhibaddhaṃ, evamime sattā paccayesu pakkhalitvā
atk-s0302a:346_9: paccaye ujuṃ kātuṃ asakkontā dvāsaṭṭhidiṭṭhigatavasena guḷakajātā honti gaṇṭhibaddhā.
atk-s0302a:346_10: Ye hi keci diṭṭhiyo sannissitā, sabbe te paccayaṃ ujuṃ kātuṃ asakkontāyeva.
atk-s0302a:347_0: Kulāgaṇṭhikajātāti kulāgaṇṭhikaṃ vuccati pesakārakañjiyasuttaṃ. Kulā nāma sakuṇikā,
atk-s0302a:347_1: tassā kulāvakotipi eke. Yathā hi tadubhayampi ākulaṃ aggena vā aggaṃ, mūlena vā mūlaṃ
atk-s0302a:348_0: Muñjapabbajabhūtāti muñjatiṇaṃ viya pabbajatiṇaṃ viya ca bhūtā tādisā jātā. Yathā
atk-s0302a:348_1: hi tāni tiṇāni koṭṭetvā katarajju jiṇṇakāle katthaci patitaṃ gahetvā tesaṃ tiṇānaṃ
atk-s0302a:348_2: “idaṃ aggaṃ, idaṃ mūla”nti aggena vā aggaṃ, mūlena vā mūlaṃ samānetuṃ dukkaraṃ, tampi
atk-s0302a:348_3: paccattapurisakāre ṭhatvā sakkā bhaveyya ujuṃ kātuṃ, ṭhapetvā pana dve bodhisatte
atk-s0302a:348_4: añño satto attano dhammatāya paccayākāraṃ ujuṃ kātuṃ samattho nāma natthi, evamayaṃ
atk-s0302a:348_5: pajā paccayaṃ ujuṃ kātuṃ asakkontī diṭṭhigatavasena gaṇṭhikajātā hutvā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ
atk-s0302a:349_0: Tattha apāyoti nirayatiracchānayonipettivisayaasurakāyā. Sabbepi hi te vaḍḍhisaṅkhātassa
atk-s0302a:349_1: ayassa abhāvato “apāyo”ti vuccati, tathā dukkhassa gatibhāvato duggati, sukhasamussayato
atk-s0302a:352_0: Taṃ sabbampi nātivattati nātikkamati, atha kho cutito paṭisandhiṃ, paṭisandhito cutinti
atk-s0302a:352_1: evaṃ punappunaṃ cutipaṭisandhiyo gaṇhamānā tīsu bhavesu catūsu yonīsu pañcasu gatīsu
atk-s0302a:352_2: sattasu viññāṇaṭṭhitīsu navasu sattāvāsesu mahāsamudde vātakkhittā nāvā viya yante
atk-s0302a:352_3: yuttagoṇo viya ca paribbhamatiyeva. Iti sabbametaṃ bhagavā āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ apasādento
atk-s0302a:356_2: jananādikāraṇehi puthujjano. Vuttañhetaṃ – “puthu kilese janentīti puthujjanā”ti
atk-s0302a:356_3: sabbaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ. Apica puthūnaṃ gaṇanapathamatītānaṃ ariyadhammaparammukhānaṃ
atk-s0302a:356_4: nīcadhammasamācārānaṃ janānaṃ antogadhattāpi puthujjano, puthu vā ayaṃ visuṃyeva
atk-s0302a:356_5: saṅkhaṃ gato, visaṃsaṭṭho sīlasutādiguṇayuttehi ariyehi janoti puthujjano. Evametehi
atk-s0302a:359_0: Dve puthujjanā vuttā, tesu andhaputhujjano gahito. Imasminti paccuppannapaccakkhakāyaṃ
atk-s0302a:359_1: dasseti. Cātumahābhūtikasminti catumahābhūtakāye catumahābhūtehi nibbatte catumahābhūtamayeti
atk-s0302a:359_2: attho. Nibbindeyyāti ukkaṇṭheyya. Virajjeyyāti na rajjeyya. Vimucceyyāti muccitukāmo
atk-s0302a:359_3: bhaveyya. Ācayoti vuḍḍhi. Apacayoti parihāni. Ādānanti nibbatti. Nikkhepananti bhedo.
atk-s0302a:360_0: Tasmāti yasmā ime cattāro vuḍḍhihāninibbattibhedā paññāyanti, tasmā taṃkāraṇāti attho.
atk-s0302a:360_1: Iti bhagavā cātumahābhūtike kāye rūpaṃ pariggahetuṃ ayuttarūpaṃ katvā arūpaṃ pariggahetuṃ
atk-s0302a:360_2: yuttarūpaṃ karoti. Kasmā? Tesañhi bhikkhūnaṃ rūpasmiṃ gāho balavā adhimatto, tena
atk-s0302a:360_3: tesaṃ rūpe gāhassa pariggahetabbarūpataṃ dassetvā nikkaḍḍhanto arūpe patiṭṭhāpanatthaṃ evamāha.
atk-s0302a:361_0: Cittantiādi sabbaṃ manāyatanasseva nāmaṃ. Tañhi cittavatthutāya cittagocaratāya sampayuttadhammacittatāya
atk-s0302a:361_1: ca cittaṃ, mananaṭṭhena mano, vijānanaṭṭhena viññāṇanti vuccati. Nālanti na samattho.
atk-s0302a:361_2: Ajjhositanti taṇhāya gilitvā pariniṭṭhapetvā gahitaṃ. Mamāyitanti taṇhāmamattena
atk-s0302a:361_3: mama idanti gahitaṃ. Parāmaṭṭhanti diṭṭhiyā parāmasitvā gahitaṃ. Etaṃ mamāti taṇhāgāho,
atk-s0302a:361_4: tena aṭṭhasatataṇhāvicaritaṃ gahitaṃ hoti. Esohamasmīti mānagāho, tena nava mānā
atk-s0302a:361_5: gahitā honti. Eso me attāti diṭṭhigāho, tena dvāsaṭṭhi diṭṭhiyo gahitā honti. Tasmāti
atk-s0302a:361_6: yasmā evaṃ dīgharattaṃ gahitaṃ, tasmā nibbindituṃ na samattho.
atk-s0302a:362_0: Varaṃ, bhikkhaveti idaṃ kasmā āha? Paṭhamañhi tena rūpaṃ pariggahetuṃ ayuttarūpaṃ
atk-s0302a:362_1: kataṃ, arūpaṃ yuttarūpaṃ, atha “tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ rūpato gāho nikkhamitvā arūpaṃ gato”ti
atk-s0302a:362_2: ñatvā taṃ nikkaḍḍhituṃ imaṃ desanaṃ ārabhi. Tattha attato upagaccheyyāti attāti gaṇheyya.
atk-s0302a:362_3: Bhiyyopīti vassasatato uddhampi. Kasmā pana bhagavā evamāha? Kiṃ atirekavassasataṃ
atk-s0302a:362_4: tiṭṭhamānaṃ rūpaṃ nāma atthi? Nanu paṭhamavaye pavattaṃ rūpaṃ majjhimavayaṃ na pāpuṇāti,
atk-s0302a:362_5: majjhimavaye pavattaṃ pacchimavayaṃ, purebhatte pavattaṃ pacchābhattaṃ, pacchābhatte
atk-s0302a:362_6: pavattaṃ paṭhamayāmaṃ, paṭhamayāme pavattaṃ majjhimayāmaṃ, majjhimayāme pavattaṃ
atk-s0302a:362_7: pacchimayāmaṃ na pāpuṇāti? Tathā gamane pavattaṃ ṭhānaṃ, ṭhāne pavattaṃ nisajjaṃ,
atk-s0302a:362_8: nisajjāya pavattaṃ sayanaṃ na pāpuṇāti. Ekairiyāpathepi pādassa uddharaṇe pavattaṃ
atk-s0302a:362_9: atiharaṇaṃ, atiharaṇe pavattaṃ vītiharaṇaṃ, vītiharaṇe pavattaṃ vossajjanaṃ, vossajjane
atk-s0302a:362_10: pavattaṃ sannikkhepanaṃ, sannikkhepane pavattaṃ sannirujjhanaṃ na pāpuṇāti, tattha
atk-s0302a:362_11: tattheva odhi odhi pabbaṃ pabbaṃ hutvā tattakapāle pakkhittatilā viya paṭapaṭāyantā
atk-s0302a:362_12: saṅkhārā bhijjantīti? Saccametaṃ. Yathā pana padīpassa jalato jātā taṃ taṃ vaṭṭippadesaṃ
atk-s0302a:362_13: anatikkamitvā tattha tattheva bhijjati, atha ca pana paveṇisambandhavasena sabbarattiṃ
atk-s0302a:362_14: jalito padīpoti vuccati, evamidhāpi paveṇivasena ayampi kāyo evaṃ ciraṭṭhitiko viya katvā dassito.
atk-s0302a:363_0: Rattiyā ca divasassa cāti rattimhi ca divase ca. Bhummatthe hetaṃ sāmivacanaṃ. Aññadeva
atk-s0302a:363_1: uppajjati, aññaṃ nirujjhatīti yaṃ rattiṃ uppajjati ca nirujjhati ca, tato aññadeva
atk-s0302a:363_2: divā uppajjati ca nirujjhati cāti attho. Aññaṃ uppajjati, anuppannameva aññaṃ nirujjhatīti
atk-s0302a:363_3: evaṃ pana attho na gahetabbo. “Rattiyā ca divasassa cā”ti idaṃ purimapaveṇito parittakaṃ
atk-s0302a:363_4: paveṇiṃ gahetvā paveṇivaseneva vuttaṃ, ekarattiṃ pana ekadivasaṃ vā ekameva cittaṃ
atk-s0302a:363_5: ṭhātuṃ samatthaṃ nāma natthi. Ekasmiñhi accharākkhaṇe anekāni cittakoṭisatasahassāni
atk-s0302a:364_0: “Vāhasataṃ kho, mahārāja, vīhīnaṃ, aḍḍhacūḷañca vāhā, vīhisattambaṇāni, dve ca tumbā,
atk-s0302a:364_1: ekaccharākkhaṇe pavattassa cittassa ettakā vīhī lakkhaṃ ṭhapīyamānā parikkhayaṃ pariyādānaṃ gaccheyyu”nti.
atk-s0302a:365_0: Pavaneti mahāvane. Taṃ muñcitvā aññaṃ gaṇhāti, taṃ muñcitvā aññaṃ gaṇhātīti iminā
atk-s0302a:365_1: na so gaṇhitabbasākhaṃ alabhitvā bhūmiṃ otarati. Atha kho tasmiṃ mahāvane vicaranto
atk-s0302a:365_2: taṃ taṃ sākhaṃ gaṇhantoyeva caratīti ayamattho dassito.
atk-s0302a:366_0: Evameva khoti ettha idaṃ opammasaṃsandanaṃ – araññamahāvanaṃ viya hi ārammaṇavanaṃ
atk-s0302a:366_1: veditabbaṃ. Tasmiṃ vane vicaraṇamakkaṭo viya ārammaṇavane uppajjanakacittaṃ. Sākhāgahaṇaṃ
atk-s0302a:366_2: viya ārammaṇe lubbhanaṃ. Yathā so araññe vicaranto makkaṭo taṃ taṃ sākhaṃ pahāya
atk-s0302a:366_3: taṃ taṃ sākhaṃ gaṇhāti, evamidaṃ ārammaṇavane vicarantaṃ cittampi kadāci rūpārammaṇaṃ
atk-s0302a:366_4: gahetvā uppajjati, kadāci saddādīsu aññataraṃ, kadāci atītaṃ, kadāci anāgataṃ vā
atk-s0302a:366_5: paccuppannaṃ vā, tathā kadāci ajjhattaṃ, kadāci bāhiraṃ. Yathā ca so araññe vicaranto
atk-s0302a:366_6: makkaṭo sākhaṃ alabhitvā oruyha bhūmiyaṃ nisinnoti na vattabbo, ekaṃ pana paṇṇasākhaṃ
atk-s0302a:366_7: gahetvāva nisīdati, evameva ārammaṇavane vicarantaṃ cittampi ekaṃ olubbhārammaṇaṃ
atk-s0302a:366_8: alabhitvā uppannanti na vattabbaṃ, ekajātiyaṃ pana ārammaṇaṃ gahetvāva uppajjatīti
atk-s0302a:366_9: veditabbaṃ. Ettāvatā ca pana bhagavatā rūpato nīharitvā arūpe gāho patiṭṭhāpito,
atk-s0302a:367_0: Idāni taṃ ubhayato nikkaḍḍhitukāmo tatra, bhikkhave, sutavā ariyasāvakoti desanaṃ
atk-s0302a:367_1: ārabhi. Ayaṃ panattho āsīvisadaṭṭhūpamāya dīpetabbo – eko kira puriso āsīvisena daṭṭho,
atk-s0302a:367_2: athassa visaṃ harissāmīti cheko bhisakko āgantvā vamanaṃ kāretvā heṭṭhā garuḷo, upari
atk-s0302a:367_3: nāgoti mantaṃ parivattetvā visaṃ upari āropesi. So yāva akkhippadesā āruḷhabhāvaṃ
atk-s0302a:367_4: ñatvā “ito paraṃ abhiruhituṃ na dassāmi, daṭṭhaṭṭhāneyeva ṭhapessāmī”ti upari garuḷo,
atk-s0302a:367_5: heṭṭhā nāgoti mantaṃ parivattetvā kaṇṇe dhumetvā daṇḍakena paharitvā visaṃ otāretvā
atk-s0302a:367_6: daṭṭhaṭṭhāneyeva ṭhapesi. Tatrassa ṭhitabhāvaṃ ñatvā agadalepena visaṃ nimmathetvā
atk-s0302a:368_0: Tattha āsīvisena daṭṭhassa kāye visapatiṭṭhānaṃ viya imesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ rūpe adhimattagāhakālo,
atk-s0302a:368_1: cheko bhisakko viya tathāgato, mantaṃ parivattetvā upari visassa āropitakālo viya
atk-s0302a:368_2: tathāgatena tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ rūpato gāhaṃ nīharitvā arūpe patiṭṭhāpitakālo, yāva
atk-s0302a:368_3: akkhippadesā āruḷhavisassa upari abhiruhituṃ adatvā puna mantabalena otāretvā daṭṭhaṭṭhāneyeva
atk-s0302a:368_4: ṭhapanaṃ viya satthārā tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ arūpato gāhaṃ nīharitvā rūpe patiṭṭhāpitakālo.
atk-s0302a:368_5: Daṭṭhaṭṭhāne ṭhitassa visassa agadalepena nimmathanaṃ viya ubhayato gāhaṃ nīharaṇatthāya
atk-s0302a:368_6: imissā desanāya āraddhakālo veditabbo. Tattha nibbindaṃ virajjatīti iminā maggo kathito,
atk-s0302a:368_7: virāgā vimuccatīti phalaṃ, vimuttasmintiādinā paccavekkhaṇā. Paṭhamaṃ.
atk-s0302a:370_0: 62. Dutiye sukhavedaniyanti sukhavedanāya paccayaṃ. Phassanti cakkhusamphassādiṃ.
atk-s0302a:370_1: Nanu ca cakkhusamphasso sukhavedanāya paccayo na hotīti? Sahajātapaccayena na hoti,
atk-s0302a:370_2: upanissayapaccayena pana javanavedanāya hoti, taṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ. Sotasamphassādīsupi
atk-s0302a:370_3: eseva nayo. Tajjanti tajjātikaṃ tassāruppaṃ, tassa phassassa anurūpanti attho. Dukkhavedaniyantiādi
atk-s0302a:370_4: vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ. Saṅghaṭṭanasamodhānāti saṅghaṭṭanena ceva samodhānena ca,
atk-s0302a:370_5: saṅghaṭṭanasampiṇḍanenāti attho. Usmāti uṇhākāro. Tejo abhinibbattatīti aggicuṇṇo
atk-s0302a:370_6: nikkhamatīti na gahetabbaṃ, usmākārasseva pana etaṃ vevacanaṃ. Tattha dvinnaṃ kaṭṭhānanti
atk-s0302a:370_7: dvinnaṃ araṇīnaṃ. Tattha adhoaraṇī viya vatthu, uttarāraṇī viya ārammaṇaṃ, saṅghaṭṭanaṃ
atk-s0302a:370_8: viya phasso, usmādhātu viya vedanā. Dutiyaṃ.
atk-s0302a:372_0: 63. Tatiye cattārome, bhikkhave, āhārātiādi vuttanayameva. Yasmā panassa aṭṭhuppattiko
atk-s0302a:372_1: nikkhepo, tasmā taṃ dassetvāvettha anupubbapadavaṇṇanaṃ karissāmi. Katarāya pana
atk-s0302a:372_2: idaṃ aṭṭhuppattiyā nikkhittanti? Lābhasakkārena. Bhagavato kira mahālābhasakkāro
atk-s0302a:372_3: uppajji, yathā taṃ cattāro asaṅkhyeyye pūritadānapāramīsañcayassa. Sabbadisāsu hissa
atk-s0302a:372_4: yamakamahāmegho vuṭṭhahitvā mahoghaṃ viya sabbapāramiyo “ekasmiṃ attabhāve vipākaṃ
atk-s0302a:372_5: dassāmā”ti sampiṇḍitā viya lābhasakkāramahoghaṃ nibbattayiṃsu. Tato tato annapānayānavatthamālāgandhavilepanādihatthā
atk-s0302a:372_6: khattiyabrāhmaṇādayo āgantvā, “kahaṃ buddho, kahaṃ bhagavā, kahaṃ devadevo narāsabho
atk-s0302a:372_7: purisasīho”ti? Bhagavantaṃ pariyesanti. Sakaṭasatehipi paccaye āharitvā okāsaṃ alabhamānā
atk-s0302a:372_8: samantā gāvutappamāṇampi sakaṭadhurena sakaṭadhuraṃ āhacca tiṭṭhanti ceva anuppavattanti
atk-s0302a:372_9: ca andhakavindabrāhmaṇādayo viya. Sabbaṃ khandhake tesu tesu suttesu ca āgatanayena veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0302a:374_0: “Tena kho pana samayena bhagavā sakkato hoti garukato mānito pūjito apacito lābhī
atk-s0302a:375: Tathā “yāvatā kho, cunda, etarahi saṅgho vā gaṇo vā loke uppanno, nāhaṃ, cunda, aññaṃ ekasaṅghampi samanupassāmi evaṃ lābhaggayasaggapattaṃ yatharivāyaṃ, cunda, bhikkhusaṅgho”ti.
atk-s0302a:376_0: Svāyaṃ bhagavato ca saṅghassa ca uppanno lābhasakkāro ekato hutvā dvinnaṃ mahānadīnaṃ
atk-s0302a:376_1: udakaṃ viya appameyyo ahosi. Atha satthā rahogato cintesi – “mahālābhasakkāro atītabuddhānampi
atk-s0302a:376_2: evarūpo ahosi, anāgatānampi evarūpo bhavissati. Kiṃ nu kho bhikkhū āhārapariggāhakena
atk-s0302a:376_3: satisampajaññena samannāgatā majjhattā nicchandarāgā hutvā āhāraṃ paribhuñjituṃ sakkonti, na sakkontī”ti?
atk-s0302a:377_0: So addasa ekacce adhunā pabbajite kulaputte apaccavekkhitvā āhāraṃ paribhuñjamāne.
atk-s0302a:377_1: Disvānassa etadahosi – “mayā kappasatasahassādhikāni cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni pāramiyo
atk-s0302a:377_2: pūrentena na cīvarādihetu pūritā, uttamaphalassa pana arahattassatthāya pūritā. Imepi
atk-s0302a:377_3: bhikkhū mama santike pabbajantā na cīvarādihetu pabbajitā, arahattasseva pana atthāya
atk-s0302a:377_4: pabbajitā. Te idāni asārameva sāraṃ anatthameva ca atthaṃ karontī”ti evamassa dhammasaṃvego
atk-s0302a:377_5: udapādi. Tato cintesi – “sace pañcamaṃ pārājikaṃ paññapetuṃ sakkā abhavissa, apaccavekkhitāhāraparibhogo
atk-s0302a:377_6: pañcamaṃ pārājikaṃ katvā paññapetabbo bhaveyya. Na pana sakkā evaṃ kātuṃ, dhuvapaṭisevanaṭṭhānañhetaṃ
atk-s0302a:377_7: sattānaṃ. Yathā pana kathite pañcamaṃ pārājikaṃ viya naṃ passissanti. Evaṃ dhammādāsaṃ
atk-s0302a:377_8: saṃvaraṃ mariyādaṃ ṭhapessāmi, yaṃ āvajjitvā āvajjitvā anāgate bhikkhū cattāro paccaye
atk-s0302a:377_9: paccavekkhitvā paribhuñjissantī”ti. Imāya aṭṭhuppattiyā imaṃ puttamaṃsūpamasuttantaṃ
atk-s0302a:377_10: nikkhipi. Tattha cattārome, bhikkhave, āhārātiādi heṭṭhā vuttatthameva.
atk-s0302a:378_0: Cattāro pana āhāre vitthāretvā idāni tesu ādīnavaṃ dassetuṃ kathañca, bhikkhave,
atk-s0302a:378_1: kabaḷīkāro āhāro daṭṭhabbotiādimāha? Tattha jāyampatikāti jāyā ceva pati ca. Parittaṃ
atk-s0302a:378_2: sambalanti puṭabhattasattumodakādīnaṃ aññataraṃ appamattakaṃ pātheyyaṃ. Kantāramagganti
atk-s0302a:378_3: kantārabhūtaṃ maggaṃ, kantāre vā maggaṃ. Kantāranti corakantāraṃ vāḷakantāraṃ amanussakantāraṃ
atk-s0302a:378_4: nirudakakantāraṃ appabhakkhakantāranti pañcavidhaṃ. Tesu yattha corabhayaṃ atthi,
atk-s0302a:378_5: taṃ corakantāraṃ. Yattha sīhabyagghādayo vāḷā atthi, taṃ vāḷakantāraṃ. Yattha balavāmukhayakkhiniādīnaṃ
atk-s0302a:378_6: amanussānaṃ vasena bhayaṃ atthi, taṃ amanussakantāraṃ. Yattha pātuṃ vā nhāyituṃ vā
atk-s0302a:378_7: udakaṃ natthi, taṃ nirudakakantāraṃ. Yattha khāditabbaṃ vā bhuñjitabbaṃ vā antamaso
atk-s0302a:378_8: kandamūlādimattampi natthi, taṃ appabhakkhakantāraṃ nāma. Yattha panetaṃ pañcavidhampi
atk-s0302a:378_9: bhayaṃ atthi, taṃ kantārameva. Taṃ panetaṃ ekāhadvīhatīhādivasena nittharitabbampi
atk-s0302a:378_10: atthi, na taṃ idha adhippetaṃ. Idha pana nirudakaṃ appabhakkhaṃ yojanasatikakantāraṃ
atk-s0302a:378_11: adhippetaṃ. Evarūpe kantāre maggaṃ. Paṭipajjeyyunti chātakabhayena ceva rogabhayena
atk-s0302a:378_12: ca rājabhayena ca upaddutā paṭipajjeyyuṃ “etaṃ kantāraṃ nittharitvā dhammikassa rañño
atk-s0302a:379_0: Ekaputtakoti ukkhipitvā gahito anukampitabbayutto athirasarīro ekaputtako. Vallūrañca
atk-s0302a:379_2: gahetvā sūlamaṃsañcāti attho. Paṭipiseyyunti pahareyyuṃ. Kahaṃ ekaputtakāti ayaṃ
atk-s0302a:380_0: Ayaṃ panettha bhūtamatthaṃ katvā ādito paṭṭhāya saṅkhepato atthavaṇṇanā – dve kira
atk-s0302a:380_1: jāyampatikā puttaṃ gahetvā parittena pātheyyena yojanasatikaṃ kantāramaggaṃ paṭipajjiṃsu.
atk-s0302a:380_2: Tesaṃ paññāsayojanāni gantvā pātheyyaṃ niṭṭhāsi, te khuppipāsāturā viraḷacchāyāyaṃ
atk-s0302a:380_3: nisīdiṃsu. Tato puriso bhariyaṃ āha – “bhadde ito samantā paññāsayojanāni gāmo vā
atk-s0302a:380_4: nigamo vā natthi. Tasmā yaṃ taṃ purisena kātabbaṃ bahumpi kasigorakkhādikammaṃ, na
atk-s0302a:380_5: dāni sakkā taṃ mayā kātuṃ, ehi maṃ māretvā upaḍḍhamaṃsaṃ khāditvā upaḍḍhaṃ pātheyyaṃ
atk-s0302a:380_6: katvā puttena saddhiṃ kantāraṃ nittharāhī”ti. Puna sāpi taṃ āha – “sāmi mayā dāni
atk-s0302a:380_7: yaṃ taṃ itthiyā kātabbaṃ bahumpi suttakantanādikammaṃ, taṃ kātuṃ na sakkā, ehi maṃ
atk-s0302a:380_8: māretvā upaḍḍhamaṃsaṃ khāditvā upaḍḍhaṃ pātheyyaṃ katvā puttena saddhiṃ kantāraṃ
atk-s0302a:380_9: nittharāhī”ti. Puna sopi taṃ āha – “bhadde mātugāmamaraṇena dvinnaṃ maraṇaṃ paññāyati.
atk-s0302a:380_10: Na hi mando kumāro mātarā vinā jīvituṃ sakkoti. Yadi pana mayaṃ jīvāma. Puna dārakaṃ
atk-s0302a:380_11: labheyyāma. Handa dāni puttakaṃ māretvā, maṃsaṃ gahetvā kantāraṃ nittharāmā”ti. Tato
atk-s0302a:380_12: mātā puttamāha – “tāta, pitusantikaṃ gacchā”ti, so agamāsi. Athassa pitā, “mayā ‘puttakaṃ
atk-s0302a:380_13: posessāmī’ti kasigorakkhādīhi anappakaṃ dukkhamanubhūtaṃ, na sakkomi ahaṃ puttaṃ
atk-s0302a:380_14: māretuṃ, tvaṃyeva tava puttaṃ mārehī”ti vatvā, “tāta mātusantikaṃ gacchā”ti āha.
atk-s0302a:380_15: So agamāsi. Athassa mātāpi, “mayā puttaṃ patthentiyā govatakukkuravatadevatāyācanādīhipi
atk-s0302a:380_16: tāva anappakaṃ dukkhamanubhūtaṃ, ko pana vādo kucchinā pariharantiyā? Na sakkomi
atk-s0302a:380_17: ahaṃ puttaṃ māretu”nti vatvā “tāta, pitusantikameva gacchā”ti āha. Evaṃ so dvinnamantarā
atk-s0302a:380_18: gacchantoyeva mato. Te taṃ disvā paridevitvā vuttanayena maṃsāni gahetvā khādantā pakkamiṃsu.
atk-s0302a:381_0: Tesaṃ so puttamaṃsāhāro navahi kāraṇehi paṭikūlattā neva davāya hoti, na madāya,
atk-s0302a:381_1: na maṇḍanāya, na vibhūsanāya, kevalaṃ kantāranittharaṇatthāyeva hoti. Katamehi navahi
atk-s0302a:381_2: kāraṇehi paṭikūloti ce? Sajātimaṃsatāya ñātimaṃsatāya puttamaṃsatāya piyaputtamaṃsatāya
atk-s0302a:381_3: taruṇamaṃsatāya āmakamaṃsatāya abhogamaṃsatāya aloṇatāya adhūpitatāyāti. Evañhi te
atk-s0302a:381_4: navahi kāraṇehi paṭikūlaṃ taṃ puttamaṃsaṃ khādantā na sārattā giddhamānasā hutvā
atk-s0302a:381_5: khādiṃsu, majjhattabhāveyeva pana nicchandarāgaparibhoge ṭhitā khādiṃsu. Na aṭṭhinhārucammanissitaṭṭhānāni
atk-s0302a:381_6: apanetvā thūlathūlaṃ varamaṃsameva khādiṃsu, hatthasampattaṃ maṃsameva pana khādiṃsu.
atk-s0302a:381_7: Na yāvadatthaṃ kaṇṭhappamāṇaṃ katvā khādiṃsu, thokaṃ thokaṃ pana ekadivasaṃ yāpanamattameva
atk-s0302a:381_8: khādiṃsu. Na aññamaññaṃ maccharāyantā khādiṃsu, vigatamaccheramalena pana parisuddheneva
atk-s0302a:381_9: cetasā khādiṃsu. Na aññaṃ kiñci migamaṃsaṃ vā moramaṃsādīnaṃ vā aññataraṃ khādāmāti
atk-s0302a:381_10: sammūḷhā khādiṃsu, piyaputtamaṃsabhāvaṃ pana jānantāva khādiṃsu. Na “aho vata mayaṃ
atk-s0302a:381_11: punapi evarūpaṃ puttamaṃsaṃ khādeyyāmā”ti patthanaṃ katvā khādiṃsu, patthanaṃ pana
atk-s0302a:381_12: vītivattāva hutvā khādiṃsu. Na “ettakaṃ kantāre khāditvā avasiṭṭhaṃ kantāraṃ atikkamma
atk-s0302a:381_13: loṇambilādīhi yojetvā khādissāmā”ti sannidhiṃ akaṃsu, kantārapariyosāne pana “pure
atk-s0302a:381_14: mahājano passatī”ti bhūmiyaṃ vā nikhaṇiṃsu, agginā vā jhāpayiṃsu. Na “koci añño amhe
atk-s0302a:381_15: viya evarūpaṃ puttamaṃsaṃ khādituṃ na labhatī”ti mānaṃ vā dappaṃ vā akaṃsu, nihatamānā
atk-s0302a:381_16: pana nihatadappā hutvā khādiṃsu. “Kiṃ iminā aloṇena anambilena adhūpitena duggandhenā”ti
atk-s0302a:381_17: na hīḷetvā khādiṃsu, hīḷanaṃ pana vītivattā hutvā khādiṃsu. Na “tuyhaṃ bhāgo mayhaṃ
atk-s0302a:381_18: bhāgo tava putto mama putto”ti aññamaññaṃ atimaññiṃsu. Samaggā pana sammodamānā hutvā
atk-s0302a:381_19: khādiṃsu. Imaṃ nesaṃ evarūpaṃ nicchandarāgādiparibhogaṃ sampassamāno satthā bhikkhusaṅghampi
atk-s0302a:381_20: taṃ kāraṇaṃ anujānāpento taṃ kiṃ maññatha, bhikkhave, api nu te davāya vā āhāraṃ
atk-s0302a:381_21: āhāreyyuntiādimāha. Tattha davāya vātiādīni visuddhimagge vitthāritāneva. Kantārassāti
atk-s0302a:382_0: Evameva khoti navannaṃ pāṭikulyānaṃ vasena piyaputtamaṃsasadiso katvā daṭṭhabboti
atk-s0302a:382_1: attho. Katamesaṃ navannaṃ? Gamanapāṭikulyatādīnaṃ. Gamanapāṭikulyataṃ paccavekkhantopi
atk-s0302a:382_3: paccavekkhantopi, tāni panetāni gamanapāṭikulyatādīni visuddhimagge āhārapāṭikulyatāniddese
atk-s0302a:382_4: vitthāritāneva. Iti imesaṃ navannaṃ pāṭikulyānaṃ vasena puttamaṃsūpamaṃ katvā āhāro paribhuñjitabbo.
atk-s0302a:383_0: Yathā te jāyampatikā pāṭikulyaṃ piyaputtamaṃsaṃ khādantā na sārattā giddhamānasā
atk-s0302a:383_1: hutvā khādiṃsu, majjhattabhāveyeva nicchandarāgaparibhoge ṭhitā khādiṃsu, evaṃ nicchandarāgaparibhogaṃ
atk-s0302a:383_2: katvā paribhuñjitabbo. Yathā ca te na aṭṭhinhārucammanissitaṃ apanetvā thūlathūlaṃ
atk-s0302a:383_3: varamaṃsameva khādiṃsu, hatthasampattameva pana khādiṃsu, evaṃ sukkhabhattamandabyañjanādīni
atk-s0302a:383_4: piṭṭhihatthena apaṭikkhipitvā vaṭṭakena viya kukkuṭena viya ca odhiṃ adassetvā tato
atk-s0302a:383_5: tato sappimaṃsādisaṃsaṭṭhavarabhojanaṃyeva vicinitvā abhuñjantena sīhena viya sapadānaṃ paribhuñjitabbo.
atk-s0302a:384_0: Yathā ca te na yāvadatthaṃ kaṇṭhappamāṇaṃ khādiṃsu, thokaṃ thokaṃ pana ekekadivasaṃ
atk-s0302a:384_1: yāpanamattameva khādiṃsu, evameva āharahatthakādibrāhmaṇānaṃ aññatarena viya yāvadatthaṃ
atk-s0302a:384_2: udarāvadehakaṃ abhuñjantena catunnaṃ pañcannaṃ vā ālopānaṃ okāsaṃ ṭhapetvāva dhammasenāpatinā
atk-s0302a:384_3: viya paribhuñjitabbo. So kira pañcacattālīsa vassāni tiṭṭhamāno “pacchābhatte ambiluggārasamuṭṭhāpakaṃ
atk-s0302a:384_4: katvā ekadivasampi āhāraṃ na āhāresi”nti vatvā sīhanādaṃ nadanto imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0302a:387_0: Yathā ca te na aññamaññaṃ maccharāyantā khādiṃsu, vigatamalamaccherena pana parisuddheneva
atk-s0302a:387_1: cetasā khādiṃsu, evameva piṇḍapātaṃ labhitvā amaccharāyitvā “imaṃ sabbaṃ gaṇhantassa
atk-s0302a:387_2: sabbaṃ dassāmi, upaḍḍhaṃ gaṇhantassa upaḍḍhaṃ, sace gahitāvaseso bhavissati, attanā
atk-s0302a:387_3: paribhuñjissāmī”ti sāraṇīyadhamme ṭhiteneva paribhuñjitabbo. Yathā ca te na “aññaṃ
atk-s0302a:387_4: kiñci mayaṃ migamaṃsaṃ vā moramaṃsādīnaṃ vā aññataraṃ khādāmā”ti sammūḷhā khādiṃsu,
atk-s0302a:387_5: piyaputtamaṃsabhāvaṃ pana jānantāva khādiṃsu, evameva piṇḍapātaṃ labhitvā “ahaṃ khādāmi
atk-s0302a:387_7: vaḍḍhemī’ti, kāyopi na jānāti ‘kabaḷīkārāhāro maṃ vaḍḍhetī”’ti, evaṃ sammohaṃ pahāya
atk-s0302a:387_8: paribhuñjitabbo. Satisampajaññavasenāpi cesa asammūḷheneva hutvā paribhuñjitabbo.
atk-s0302a:388_0: Yathā ca te na “aho vata mayaṃ punapi evarūpaṃ puttamaṃsaṃ khādeyyāmā”ti patthanaṃ
atk-s0302a:388_1: katvā khādiṃsu, patthanaṃ pana vītivattāva hutvā khādiṃsu, evameva paṇītabhojanaṃ
atk-s0302a:388_2: laddhā ‘aho vatāhaṃ svepi punadivasepi evarūpaṃ labheyyaṃ’, lūkhaṃ vā pana laddhā
atk-s0302a:388_3: “hiyyo viya me ajja paṇītabhojanaṃ na laddha”nti patthanaṃ vā anusocanaṃ vā akatvā nittaṇhena –
atk-s0302a:392_0: Yathā ca te na “ettakaṃ kantāre khāditvā avasiṭṭhaṃ kantāraṃ atikkamma loṇambilādīhi
atk-s0302a:392_1: yojetvā khādissāmā”ti sannidhiṃ akaṃsu, kantārapariyosāne pana “pure mahājano passatī”ti
atk-s0302a:392_2: bhūmiyaṃ vā nikhaṇiṃsu, agginā vā jhāpayiṃsu, evameva –
atk-s0302a:397_0: Imaṃ ovādaṃ anussarantena catūsu paccayesu yaṃ yaṃ labhati, tato tato attano yāpanamattaṃ
atk-s0302a:397_1: gahetvā, sesaṃ sabrahmacārīnaṃ vissajjetvā sannidhiṃ parivajjantena paribhuñjitabbo.
atk-s0302a:397_2: Yathā ca te na “koci añño amhe viya evarūpaṃ puttamaṃsaṃ khādituṃ na labhatī”ti mānaṃ
atk-s0302a:397_3: vā dappaṃ vā akaṃsu, nihatamānā pana nihatadappā hutvā khādiṃsu, evameva paṇītabhojanaṃ
atk-s0302a:397_4: labhitvā “ahamasmi lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātādīna”nti na māno vā dappo vā kātabbo. “Nāyaṃ
atk-s0302a:397_5: pabbajjā cīvarādihetu, arahattahetu panāyaṃ pabbajjā”ti paccavekkhitvā nihatamānadappeneva paribhuñjitabbo.
atk-s0302a:398_0: Yathā ca te “kiṃ iminā aloṇena anambilena adhūpitena duggandhenā”ti hīḷetvā na khādiṃsu,
atk-s0302a:398_1: hīḷanaṃ pana vītivattā hutvā khādiṃsu, evameva piṇḍapātaṃ labhitvā “kiṃ iminā assagoṇabhattasadisena
atk-s0302a:398_2: lūkhena nirasena, suvānadoṇiyaṃ taṃ pakkhipathā”ti evaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ vā “ko imaṃ bhuñjissati,
atk-s0302a:398_3: kākasunakhādīnaṃ dehī”ti evaṃ dāyakaṃ vā ahīḷentena –
atk-s0302a:400: Appaṃ dānaṃ na hīḷeyya, dātāraṃ nāvajāniyā”ti. ; –
atk-s0302a:401_0: Imaṃ ovādaṃ anussarantena paribhuñjitabbo. Yathā ca te na “tuyhaṃ bhāgo, mayhaṃ bhāgo,
atk-s0302a:401_1: tava putto mama putto”ti aññamaññaṃ atimaññiṃsu, samaggā pana, sammodamānā hutvā
atk-s0302a:401_2: khādiṃsu, evamevaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ labhitvā yathā ekacco “ko tumhādisānaṃ dassati nikkāraṇā
atk-s0302a:401_3: ummāresu pakkhalantānaṃ āhiṇḍantānaṃ vijātamātāpi vo dātabbaṃ na maññati, mayaṃ pana
atk-s0302a:401_4: gatagataṭṭhāne paṇītāni cīvarādīni labhāmā”ti sīlavante sabrahmacārī atimaññati,
atk-s0302a:402: “So tena lābhasakkārasilokena abhibhūto pariyādiṇṇacitto aññe pesale bhikkhū atimaññati. Tañhi tassa, bhikkhave, moghapurisassa hoti dīgharattaṃ ahitāya dukkhāyā”ti.
atk-s0302a:403: Evaṃ kañci anatimaññitvā sabbehi sabrahmacārīhi saddhiṃ samaggena sammodamānena hutvā paribhuñjitabbaṃ.
atk-s0302a:404_0: Pariññāteti ñātapariññā tīraṇapariññā pahānapariññāti imāhi tīhi pariññāhi pariññāte.
atk-s0302a:404_1: Kathaṃ? Idha bhikkhu “kabaḷīkārāhāro nāma ayaṃ savatthukavasena ojaṭṭhamakarūpaṃ
atk-s0302a:404_2: hoti, ojaṭṭhamakarūpaṃ kattha paṭihaññati? Jivhāpasāde, jivhāpasādo kinnissito? Catumahābhūtanissito.
atk-s0302a:404_3: Iti ojaṭṭhamakaṃ jivhāpasādo tassa paccayāni mahābhūtānīti ime dhammā rūpakkhandho
atk-s0302a:404_4: nāma, taṃ pariggaṇhato uppannā phassapañcamakā dhammā cattāro arūpakkhandhā. Iti
atk-s0302a:404_5: sabbepime pañcakkhandhā saṅkhepato nāmarūpamattaṃ hotī”ti pajānāti. So te dhamme
atk-s0302a:404_6: sarasalakkhaṇato vavatthapetvā tesaṃ paccayaṃ pariyesanto anulomapaṭilomaṃ paṭiccasamuppādaṃ
atk-s0302a:404_7: passati. Ettāvatānena kabaḷīkārāhāramukhena sappaccayassa nāmarūpassa yāthāvato diṭṭhattā
atk-s0302a:404_8: kabaḷīkārāhāro ñātapariññāya pariññāto hoti. So tadeva sappaccayaṃ nāmarūpaṃ aniccaṃ
atk-s0302a:404_9: dukkhaṃ anattāti tīṇi lakkhaṇāni āropetvā sattannaṃ anupassanānaṃ vasena sammasati.
atk-s0302a:404_11: hoti. Tasmiṃyeva nāmarūpe chandarāgāvakaḍḍhanena anāgāmimaggena parijānatā pahānapariññāya pariññāto hotīti.
atk-s0302a:405_0: Pañcakāmaguṇikoti pañcakāmaguṇasambhavo rāgo pariññāto hoti. Ettha pana tisso pariññā
atk-s0302a:405_1: ekapariññā sabbapariññā mūlapariññāti. Katamā ekapariññā? Yo bhikkhu jivhādvāre ekarasataṇhaṃ
atk-s0302a:405_2: parijānāti, tena pañcakāmaguṇiko rāgo pariññātova hotīti. Kasmā? Tassāyeva tattha
atk-s0302a:405_3: uppajjanato. Sāyeva hi taṇhā cakkhudvāre uppannā rūparāgo nāma hoti, sotadvārādīsu
atk-s0302a:405_4: uppannā saddarāgādayo. Iti yathā ekasseva corassa pañcamagge hanato ekasmiṃ magge
atk-s0302a:405_5: gahetvā sīse chinne pañcapi maggā khemā honti, evaṃ jivhādvāre rasataṇhāya pariññātāya
atk-s0302a:405_6: pañcakāmaguṇiko rāgo pariññāto hotīti ayaṃ ekapariññā nāma.
atk-s0302a:406_0: Katamā sabbapariññā? Patte pakkhittapiṇḍapātasmiñhi ekasmiṃyeva pañcakāmaguṇikarāgo
atk-s0302a:406_1: labbhati. Kathaṃ? Parisuddhaṃ tāvassa vaṇṇaṃ olokayato rūparāgo hoti, uṇhe sappimhi
atk-s0302a:406_2: tattha āsiñcante paṭapaṭāti saddo uṭṭhahati, tathārūpaṃ khādanīyaṃ vā khādantassa
atk-s0302a:406_3: murumurūti saddo uppajjati, taṃ assādayato saddarāgo. Jīrakādivasagandhaṃ assādentassa
atk-s0302a:406_4: gandharāgo, sādurasavasena rasarāgo. Mudubhojanaṃ phassavantanti assādayato phoṭṭhabbarāgo.
atk-s0302a:406_5: Iti imasmiṃ āhāre satisampajaññena pariggahetvā nicchandarāgaparibhogena paribhutte
atk-s0302a:406_6: sabbopi so pariññāto hotīti ayaṃ sabbapariññā nāma.
atk-s0302a:407_0: Katamā mūlapariññā? Pañcakāmaguṇikarāgassa hi kabaḷīkārāhāro mūlaṃ. Kasmā? Tasmiṃ
atk-s0302a:407_1: sati tassuppattito. Brāhmaṇatissabhaye kira dvādasa vassāni jāyampatikānaṃ upanijjhānacittaṃ
atk-s0302a:407_2: nāma nāhosi. Kasmā? Āhāramandatāya. Bhaye pana vūpasante yojanasatiko tambapaṇṇidīpo
atk-s0302a:407_3: dārakānaṃ jātamaṅgalehi ekamaṅgalo ahosi. Iti mūlabhūte āhāre pariññāte pañcakāmaguṇiko
atk-s0302a:407_4: rāgo pariññātova hotīti ayaṃ mūlapariññā nāma.
atk-s0302a:408_0: Natthi taṃ saṃyojananti tena rāgena saddhiṃ pahānekaṭṭhatāya pahīnattā natthi. Evamayaṃ
atk-s0302a:408_1: desanā yāva anāgāmimaggā kathitā. “Ettakena pana mā vosānaṃ āpajjiṃsū”ti etesaṃyeva
atk-s0302a:408_2: rūpādīnaṃ vasena pañcasu khandhesu vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā yāva arahattā kathetuṃ vaṭṭatīti.
atk-s0302a:409_0: Dutiye niccammāti khurato paṭṭhāya yāva siṅgamūlā sakalasarīrato uddālitacammā kiṃsukarāsivaṇṇā.
atk-s0302a:409_1: Kasmā pana aññaṃ hatthiassagoṇādiupamaṃ agahetvā niccammagāvūpamā gahitāti? Titikkhituṃ
atk-s0302a:409_2: asamatthabhāvadīpanatthaṃ. Mātugāmo hi uppannaṃ dukkhavedanaṃ titikkhituṃ adhivāsetuṃ
atk-s0302a:409_3: na sakkoti, evameva phassāhāro abalo dubbaloti dassanatthaṃ sadisameva upamaṃ āhari.
atk-s0302a:409_4: Kuṭṭanti silākuṭṭādīnaṃ aññataraṃ. Kuṭṭanissitā pāṇā nāma uṇṇanābhisarabūmūsikādayo.
atk-s0302a:409_6: ḍaṃsamakasakākakulalādayo. Khādeyyunti luñcitvā khādeyyuṃ. Sā tasmiṃ tasmiṃ ṭhāne
atk-s0302a:409_7: taṃ taṃṭhānasannissayamūlikaṃ pāṇakhādanabhayaṃ sampassamānā neva attano sakkārasammānaṃ,
atk-s0302a:409_8: na piṭṭhiparikammasarīrasambāhanauṇhodakāni icchati, evameva bhikkhu phassāhāramūlakaṃ
atk-s0302a:410_0: Phasse, bhikkhave, āhāre pariññāteti tīhi pariññāhi pariññāte. Idhāpi tisso pariññā.
atk-s0302a:410_1: Tattha “phasso saṅkhārakkhandho, taṃsampayuttā vedanā vedanākkhandho, saññā saññākkhandho,
atk-s0302a:410_2: cittaṃ viññāṇakkhandho, tesaṃ vatthārammaṇāni rūpakkhandho”ti evaṃ sappaccayassa
atk-s0302a:410_3: nāmarūpassa yāthāvato dassanaṃ ñātapariññā. Tattheva tilakkhaṇaṃ āropetvā sattannaṃ
atk-s0302a:410_4: anupassanānaṃ vasena aniccādito tulanaṃ tīraṇapariññā. Tasmiṃyeva pana nāmarūpe chandarāganikkaḍḍhano
atk-s0302a:410_5: arahattamaggo pahānapariññā. Tisso vedanāti evaṃ phassāhāre tīhi pariññāhi pariññāte
atk-s0302a:410_6: tisso vedanā pariññātāva honti tammūlakattā taṃsampayuttattā ca. Iti phassāhāravasena
atk-s0302a:411: Tatiye aṅgārakāsūti aṅgārānaṃ kāsu. Kāsūti rāsipi vuccati āvāṭopi.
atk-s0302a:418_0: Ettha āvāṭo. Idhāpi ayameva adhippeto. Sādhikaporisāti atirekaporisā pañcaratanappamāṇā.
atk-s0302a:418_1: Vītaccikānaṃ vītadhūmānanti etenassa mahāpariḷāhataṃ dasseti. Jālāya vā hi dhūme
atk-s0302a:418_2: vā sati vāto samuṭṭhāti, pariḷāho mahā na hoti, tadabhāve vātābhāvato pariḷāho mahā
atk-s0302a:419_0: Evameva khoti ettha idaṃ opammasaṃsandanaṃ – aṅgārakāsu viya hi tebhūmakavaṭṭaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-s0302a:419_1: Jīvitukāmo puriso viya vaṭṭanissito bālaputhujjano. Dve balavanto purisā viya kusalākusalakammaṃ.
atk-s0302a:419_2: Tesaṃ taṃ purisaṃ nānābāhāsu gahetvā aṅgārakāsuṃ upakaḍḍhanakālo viya puthujjanassa
atk-s0302a:419_3: kammāyūhanakālo. Kammañhi āyūhiyamānameva paṭisandhiṃ ākaḍḍhati nāma. Aṅgārakāsunidānaṃ
atk-s0302a:420_0: Pariññāteti tīhi pariññāhi pariññāte. Pariññāyojanā panettha phasse vuttanayeneva
atk-s0302a:420_1: veditabbā. Tisso taṇhāti kāmataṇhā bhavataṇhā vibhavataṇhāti imā pariññātā honti.
atk-s0302a:420_2: Kasmā? Taṇhāmūlakattā manosañcetanāya. Na hi hetumhi appahīne phalaṃ pahīyati. Iti
atk-s0302a:420_3: manosañcetanāhāravasenapi yāva arahattā desanā kathitā. Tatiyāhāro.
atk-s0302a:421: Catutthe āgucārinti pāpacāriṃ dosakārakaṃ. Kathaṃ so purisoti so puriso kathaṃbhūto, kiṃ yāpeti, na yāpetīti pucchati? Tatheva deva jīvatīti yathā pubbe, idānipi tatheva jīvati.
atk-s0302a:422_0: Evameva khoti idhāpi idaṃ opammasaṃsandanaṃ – rājā viya hi kammaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ, āgucārī
atk-s0302a:422_1: puriso viya vaṭṭasannissito bālaputhujjano, tīṇi sattisatāni viya paṭisandhiviññāṇaṃ,
atk-s0302a:422_2: āgucāriṃ purisaṃ “tīhi sattisatehi hanathā”ti raññā āṇattakālo viya kammaraññā vaṭṭasannissitaputhujjanaṃ
atk-s0302a:422_3: gahetvā paṭisandhiyaṃ pakkhipanakālo. Tattha kiñcāpi tīṇi sattisatāni viya paṭisandhiviññāṇaṃ,
atk-s0302a:422_4: sattīsu pana dukkhaṃ natthi, sattīhi pahaṭavaṇamūlakaṃ dukkhaṃ, evameva paṭisandhiyampi
atk-s0302a:422_5: dukkhaṃ natthi, dinnāya pana paṭisandhiyā pavatte vipākadukkhaṃ sattipahaṭavaṇamūlakaṃ dukkhaṃ viya hoti.
atk-s0302a:423_0: Pariññāteti tīheva pariññāhi pariññāte. Idhāpi pariññāyojanā phassāhāre vuttanayeneva
atk-s0302a:423_1: veditabbā. Nāmarūpanti viññāṇapaccayā nāmarūpaṃ. Viññāṇasmiñhi pariññāte taṃ pariññātameva
atk-s0302a:423_2: hoti tammūlakattā sahuppannattā ca. Iti viññāṇāhāravasenapi yāva arahattā desanā
atk-s0302a:425_0: 64. Catutthe rāgotiādīni lobhasseva nāmāni. So hi rañjanavasena rāgo, nandanavasena
atk-s0302a:425_1: nandī, taṇhāyanavasena taṇhāti vuccati. Patiṭṭhitaṃ tattha viññāṇaṃ virūḷhanti kammaṃ
atk-s0302a:425_2: javāpetvā paṭisandhiākaḍḍhanasamatthatāya patiṭṭhitañceva virūḷhañca. Yatthāti tebhūmakavaṭṭe
atk-s0302a:425_3: bhummaṃ, sabbattha vā purimapurimapade etaṃ bhummaṃ. Atthi tattha saṅkhārānaṃ vuddhīti
atk-s0302a:425_4: idaṃ imasmiṃ vipākavaṭṭe ṭhitassa āyativaṭṭahetuke saṅkhāre sandhāya vuttaṃ. Yattha
atk-s0302a:425_5: atthi āyatiṃ punabbhavābhinibbattīti yasmiṃ ṭhāne āyatiṃ punabbhavābhinibbatti atthi.
atk-s0302a:426_0: Evameva khoti ettha idaṃ opammasaṃsandanaṃ – rajakacittakārā viya hi sahakammasambhāraṃ
atk-s0302a:426_1: kammaṃ, phalakabhittidussapaṭā viya tebhūmakavaṭṭaṃ. Yathā rajakacittakārā parisuddhesu
atk-s0302a:426_2: phalakādīsu rūpaṃ samuṭṭhāpenti, evameva sasambhārakakammaṃ bhavesu rūpaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti.
atk-s0302a:426_3: Tattha yathā akusalena cittakārena samuṭṭhāpitaṃ rūpaṃ virūpaṃ hoti dussaṇṭhitaṃ
atk-s0302a:426_4: amanāpaṃ, evameva ekacco kammaṃ karonto ñāṇavippayuttena cittena karoti, taṃ kammaṃ
atk-s0302a:426_5: rūpaṃ samuṭṭhāpentaṃ cakkhādīnaṃ sampattiṃ adatvā dubbaṇṇaṃ dussaṇṭhitaṃ mātāpitūnampi
atk-s0302a:426_6: amanāpaṃ rūpaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti. Yathā pana kusalena cittakārena samuṭṭhāpitaṃ rūpaṃ
atk-s0302a:426_7: surūpaṃ hoti susaṇṭhitaṃ manāpaṃ, evameva ekacco kammaṃ karonto ñāṇasampayuttena
atk-s0302a:426_8: cittena karoti, taṃ kammaṃ rūpaṃ samuṭṭhāpentaṃ cakkhādīnaṃ sampattiṃ datvā suvaṇṇaṃ
atk-s0302a:427_0: Ettha ca āhāraṃ viññāṇena saddhiṃ saṅkhipitvā āhāranāmarūpānaṃ antare eko sandhi,
atk-s0302a:427_1: vipākavidhiṃ nāmarūpena saṅkhipitvā nāmarūpasaṅkhārānaṃ antare eko sandhi, saṅkhārānañca
atk-s0302a:427_2: āyatibhavassa ca antare eko sandhīti veditabbo.
atk-s0302a:428_0: Kūṭāgāranti ekakaṇṇikaṃ gāhāpetvā kataṃ agāraṃ. Kūṭāgārasālāti dve kaṇṇike gahetvā
atk-s0302a:428_1: katasālā. Evameva khoti ettha khīṇāsavassa kammaṃ sūriyarasmisamaṃ veditabbaṃ. Sūriyarasmi
atk-s0302a:428_2: pana atthi, sā kevalaṃ patiṭṭhāya abhāvena appatiṭṭhā nāma jātā, khīṇāsavassa kammaṃ
atk-s0302a:428_3: natthitāya eva appatiṭṭhaṃ. Tassa hi kāyādayo atthi, tehi pana katakammaṃ kusalākusalaṃ
atk-s0302a:428_4: nāma na hoti, kiriyamatte ṭhatvā avipākaṃ hoti. Evamassa kammaṃ natthitāya eva appatiṭṭhaṃ
atk-s0302a:430_0: 65. Pañcame nāmarūpe kho sati viññāṇanti ettha “saṅkhāresu sati viññāṇa”nti ca “avijjāya
atk-s0302a:430_1: sati saṅkhārā”ti ca vattabbaṃ bhaveyya, tadubhayampi na vuttaṃ. Kasmā? Avijjāsaṅkhārā
atk-s0302a:430_2: hi tatiyo bhavo, tehi saddhiṃ ayaṃ vipassanā na ghaṭīyati. Mahāpuriso hi paccuppannapañcavokāravasena abhiniviṭṭhoti.
atk-s0302a:431_0: Nanu ca avijjāsaṅkhāresu adiṭṭhesu na sakkā buddhena bhavitunti. Saccaṃ na sakkā,
atk-s0302a:431_1: iminā pana te bhavaupādānataṇhāvasena diṭṭhāva. Tasmā yathā nāma godhaṃ anubandhanto
atk-s0302a:431_2: puriso taṃ kūpaṃ paviṭṭhaṃ disvā otaritvā paviṭṭhaṭṭhānaṃ khaṇitvā godhaṃ gahetvā
atk-s0302a:431_3: pakkameyya, na parabhāgaṃ khaneyya, kasmā? Kassaci natthitāya. Evaṃ mahāpurisopi
atk-s0302a:431_4: godhaṃ anubandhanto puriso viya bodhipallaṅke nisinno jarāmaraṇato paṭṭhāya “imassa
atk-s0302a:431_5: ayaṃ paccayo, imassa ayaṃ paccayo”ti pariyesanto yāva nāmarūpadhammānaṃ paccayaṃ
atk-s0302a:431_6: disvā tassapi paccayaṃ pariyesanto viññāṇameva addasa. Tato “ettako pañcavokārabhavavasena
atk-s0302a:431_7: sammasanacāro”ti vipassanaṃ paṭinivattesi, parato tucchakūpassa abhinnaṭṭhānaṃ viya
atk-s0302a:431_8: avijjāsaṅkhāradvayaṃ atthi, tadetaṃ heṭṭhā vipassanāya gahitattā pāṭiyekkaṃ sammasanūpagaṃ
atk-s0302a:432_0: Paccudāvattatīti paṭinivattati. Katamaṃ panettha viññāṇaṃ paccudāvattatīti? Paṭisandhiviññāṇampi
atk-s0302a:432_1: vipassanāviññāṇampi. Tattha paṭisandhiviññāṇaṃ paccayato paṭinivattati, vipassanāviññāṇaṃ
atk-s0302a:432_2: ārammaṇato. Ubhayampi nāmarūpaṃ nātikkamati, nāmarūpato paraṃ na gacchati. Ettāvatā
atk-s0302a:432_3: jāyetha vātiādīsu viññāṇe nāmarūpassa paccaye honte, nāmarūpe viññāṇassa paccaye
atk-s0302a:432_4: honte, dvīsupi aññamaññapaccayesu hontesu ettakena jāyetha vā upapajjetha vā. Ito
atk-s0302a:432_5: hi paraṃ kimaññaṃ jāyetha vā upapajjetha vā, nanu etadeva jāyati ca upapajjati cāti?
atk-s0302a:433_0: Evaṃ saddhiṃ aparāparacutipaṭisandhīhi pañca padāni dassetvā puna taṃ ettāvatāti
atk-s0302a:433_1: vuttamatthaṃ niyyātento yadidaṃ nāmarūpapaccayā viññāṇaṃ, viññāṇapaccayā nāmarūpanti
atk-s0302a:433_2: vatvā tato paraṃ anulomapaccayākāravasena viññāṇapaccayā nāmarūpamūlakaṃ āyatijarāmaraṇaṃ
atk-s0302a:434_0: Añjasanti maggasseva vevacanaṃ. Uddhāpavantanti āpato uggatattā uddhāpanti laddhavohārena
atk-s0302a:434_1: pākāravatthunā samannāgataṃ. Ramaṇīyanti samantā catunnaṃ dvārānaṃ abbhantare ca
atk-s0302a:434_2: nānābhaṇḍānaṃ sampattiyā ramaṇīyaṃ. Māpehīti mahājanaṃ pesetvā vāsaṃ kārehi. Māpeyyāti
atk-s0302a:434_3: vāsaṃ kāreyya. Kārento ca paṭhamaṃ aṭṭhārasa manussakoṭiyo pesetvā “sampuṇṇa”nti
atk-s0302a:434_4: pucchitvā “na tāva sampuṇṇa”nti vutte aparāni pañcakulāni peseyya. Puna pucchitvā
atk-s0302a:434_5: “na tāva sampuṇṇa”nti vutte aparāni pañcapaññāsakulāni peseyya. Puna pucchitvā “na
atk-s0302a:434_6: tāva sampuṇṇa”nti vutte aparāni tiṃsa kulāni peseyya. Puna pucchitvā “na tāva sampuṇṇa”nti
atk-s0302a:434_7: vutte aparaṃ kulasahassaṃ peseyya. Puna pucchitvā “na tāva sampuṇṇa”nti vutte aparāni
atk-s0302a:434_8: ekādasanahutāni kulāni peseyya. Puna pucchitvā “na tāva sampuṇṇa”nti vutte aparāni
atk-s0302a:434_9: caturāsītikulasahassāni peseyya. Puna “sampuṇṇa”nti pucchite, “mahārāja, kiṃ vadesi?
atk-s0302a:434_10: Mahantaṃ nagaraṃ asambādhaṃ, iminā nayena kulāni pesetvā na sakkā pūretuṃ, bheriṃ
atk-s0302a:434_11: pana carāpetvā ‘amhākaṃ nagaraṃ imāya ca imāya ca sampattiyā sampannaṃ, ye tattha
atk-s0302a:434_12: vasitukāmā, yathāsukhaṃ gacchantu, imañcimañca parihāraṃ labhissantī’ti nagarassa
atk-s0302a:434_13: ceva vaṇṇaṃ lokassa ca parihāralābhaṃ ghosāpethā”ti vadeyya. So evaṃ kareyya. Tato
atk-s0302a:434_14: manussā nagaraguṇañceva parihāralābhañca sutvā sabbadisāhi samosaritvā nagaraṃ pūreyyuṃ.
atk-s0302a:434_15: Taṃ aparena samayena iddhañceva assa phītañca. Taṃ sandhāya tadassa nagaraṃ aparena
atk-s0302a:435_0: Tattha iddhanti samiddhaṃ subhikkhaṃ. Phītanti sabbasampattīhi pupphitaṃ. Bāhujaññanti
atk-s0302a:435_1: bahūhi ñātabbaṃ, bahujanānaṃ hitaṃ vā. “Bahujana”ntipi pāṭho. Ākiṇṇamanussanti manussehi
atk-s0302a:435_2: ākiṇṇaṃ nirantaraṃ phuṭṭhaṃ. Vuḍḍhivepullappattanti vuḍḍhippattañceva vepullappattañca,
atk-s0302a:435_3: seṭṭhabhāvañceva vipulabhāvañca pattaṃ, dasasahassacakkavāḷe agganagaraṃ jātanti attho.
atk-s0302a:436_0: Evameva khoti ettha idaṃ opammasaṃsandanaṃ – araññapavane caramānapuriso viya hi
atk-s0302a:436_1: dīpaṅkarapādamūlato paṭṭhāya pāramiyo pūrayamāno mahāpuriso daṭṭhabbo, tassa purisassa
atk-s0302a:436_2: pubbakehi manussehi anuyātamaggadassanaṃ viya mahāsattassa anupubbena bodhipallaṅke
atk-s0302a:436_3: nisinnassa pubbabhāge aṭṭhaṅgikassa vipassanāmaggassa dassanaṃ, purisassa taṃ ekapadikamaggaṃ
atk-s0302a:436_4: anugacchato aparabhāge mahāmaggadassanaṃ viya mahāsattassa uparivipassanāya ciṇṇante
atk-s0302a:436_5: lokuttaramaggadassanaṃ, purisassa teneva maggena gacchato purato nagaradassanaṃ viya
atk-s0302a:436_6: tathāgatassa nibbānanagaradassanaṃ, bahinagaraṃ panettha aññena diṭṭhaṃ, aññena manussavāsaṃ
atk-s0302a:436_7: kataṃ, nibbānanagaraṃ satthā sayameva passi, sayaṃ vāsamakāsi. Tassa purisassa catunnaṃ
atk-s0302a:436_8: dvārānaṃ diṭṭhakālo viya tathāgatassa catunnaṃ maggānaṃ diṭṭhakālo, tassa catūhi
atk-s0302a:436_9: dvārehi nagaraṃ paviṭṭhakālo viya tathāgatassa catūhi maggehi nibbānaṃ paviṭṭhakālo,
atk-s0302a:436_10: tassa nagarabbhantare bhaṇḍavavatthānakālo viya tathāgatassa paccavekkhaṇañāṇena
atk-s0302a:436_12: viya satthu phalasamāpattito vuṭṭhāya veneyyasatte volokanakālo, tena purisena yācitassa
atk-s0302a:436_13: rañño ekaṃ mahākuṭumbikaṃ diṭṭhakālo viya mahābrahmunā yācitassa bhagavato aññāsikoṇḍaññattheraṃ
atk-s0302a:436_14: diṭṭhakālo, rañño mahākuṭumbikaṃ pakkosāpetvā “nagaravāsaṃ karohī”ti pahitakālo viya
atk-s0302a:436_15: bhagavato ekasmiṃ pacchābhatte aṭṭhārasayojanamaggaṃ gantvā āsāḷhipuṇṇamadivase bārāṇasiyaṃ
atk-s0302a:436_16: isipatanaṃ pavisitvā theraṃ kāyasakkhiṃ katvā dhammaṃ desitakālo, mahākuṭumbikena
atk-s0302a:436_17: aṭṭhārasa purisakoṭiyo gahetvā nagaraṃ ajjhāvuṭṭhakālo viya tathāgatena dhammacakke
atk-s0302a:436_18: pavattite therassa aṭṭhārasahi brahmakoṭīhi saddhiṃ sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhitakālo,
atk-s0302a:436_19: evaṃ nibbānanagaraṃ paṭhamaṃ āvāsitaṃ, tato sampuṇṇaṃ nagaranti pucchitvā na tāvāti
atk-s0302a:436_20: vutte pañca kulāni ādiṃ katvā yāva caturāsītikulasahassapesanaṃ viya tathāgatassa
atk-s0302a:436_21: pañcamadivasato paṭṭhāya anattalakkhaṇasuttādīni desetvā pañcavaggiye ādiṃ katvā
atk-s0302a:436_22: yasapamukhā pañcapaṇṇāsa kulaputtā, tiṃsa bhaddavaggiyā, sahassapurāṇajaṭilā, bimbisārapamukhāni
atk-s0302a:436_24: ariyamaggaṃ otāretvā nibbānanagaraṃ pesitakālo, atha tena nayena nagare apūriyamāne
atk-s0302a:436_25: bheriṃ carāpetvā nagarassa vaṇṇaghosanaṃ kulānaṃ parihāralābhaghosanaṃ viya ca māsassa
atk-s0302a:436_26: aṭṭha divase tattha tattha nisīditvā dhammakathikānaṃ nibbānavaṇṇassa ceva nibbānappattānaṃ
atk-s0302a:436_27: jātikantārādinittharaṇānisaṃsassa ca ghosanaṃ, tato sabbadisāhi āgantvā manussānaṃ
atk-s0302a:436_28: nagarasamosaraṇaṃ viya tattha tattha dhammakathaṃ sutvā tato tato nikkhamitvā pabbajjaṃ
atk-s0302a:436_29: ādiṃ katvā anulomapaṭipadaṃ paṭipannānaṃ aparimāṇānaṃ kulaputtānaṃ nibbānasamosaraṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-s0302a:437_0: Purāṇaṃ magganti ariyaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ maggaṃ. Ayañhi ariyamaggo pavāraṇasutte avattamānakaṭṭhena
atk-s0302a:437_2: sikkhattayasaṅgahaṃ sakalasāsanaṃ. Iddhanti jhānassādena samiddhaṃ subhikkhaṃ. Phītanti
atk-s0302a:437_3: abhiññābharaṇehi pupphitaṃ. Vitthārikanti vitthiṇṇaṃ. Bāhujaññanti bahujanaviññeyyaṃ.
atk-s0302a:437_4: Yāva devamanussehi suppakāsitanti yāva dasasahassacakkavāḷe devamanussehi paricchedo
atk-s0302a:437_5: atthi, etasmiṃ antare suppakāsitaṃ sudesitaṃ tathāgatenāti. Pañcamaṃ.
atk-s0302a:439_0: 66. Chaṭṭhe āmantesīti kasmā āmantesi? Yasmāssa sukhumā tilakkhaṇāhatā dhammadesanā
atk-s0302a:439_1: upaṭṭhāsi. Tasmiṃ kira janapade manussā sahetukā paññavanto. Siniddhāni kirettha
atk-s0302a:439_2: bhojanāni, tānisevato janassa paññā vaḍḍhati, te gambhīraṃ tilakkhaṇāhataṃ dhammakathaṃ
atk-s0302a:439_3: paṭivijjhituṃ samatthā honti. Teneva bhagavā dīghamajjhimesu mahāsatipaṭṭhānāni mahānidānaṃ,
atk-s0302a:439_4: āneñjasappāyaṃ, saṃyuttake cūḷanidānādisuttanti evamādīni aññāni gambhīrāni suttāni
atk-s0302a:439_5: tattheva kathesi. Sammasatha noti sammasatha nu. Antaraṃ sammasanti abbhantaraṃ paccayasammasanaṃ.
atk-s0302a:439_6: Na so bhikkhu bhagavato cittaṃ ārādhesīti paccayākāravasena byākārāpetukāmassa bhagavato
atk-s0302a:439_7: tathā abyākaritvā dvattiṃsākāravasena byākaronto ajjhāsayaṃ gahetuṃ nāsakkhi.
atk-s0302a:440_0: Etadavocāti desanā yathānusandhiṃ na gatā, desanāya yathānusandhigamanatthaṃ etadavoca.
atk-s0302a:440_1: Tenahānanda, suṇāthāti idaṃ tepiṭake buddhavacane asambhinnapadaṃ. Aññattha hi evaṃ
atk-s0302a:440_2: vuttaṃ nāma natthi. Upadhinidānanti khandhupadhinidānaṃ. Khandhapañcakañhettha upadhīti
atk-s0302a:440_3: adhippetaṃ. Uppajjatīti jāyati. Nivisatīti punappunaṃ pavattivasena patiṭṭhahati.
atk-s0302a:441_0: Yaṃ kho loke piyarūpaṃ sātarūpanti yaṃ lokasmiṃ piyasabhāvañceva madhurasabhāvañca.
atk-s0302a:441_1: Cakkhuṃ loketiādīsu lokasmiñhi cakkhādīsu mamattena abhiniviṭṭhā sattā sampattiyaṃ
atk-s0302a:441_2: patiṭṭhitā attano cakkhuṃ ādāsādīsu nimittaggahaṇānusārena vippasannapañcapasādaṃ
atk-s0302a:441_3: suvaṇṇavimāne ugghāṭitamaṇisīhapañjaraṃ viya maññanti, sotaṃ rajatapanāḷikaṃ viya
atk-s0302a:441_4: pāmaṅgasuttaṃ viya ca maññanti, tuṅganāsāti laddhavohāraṃ ghānaṃ vaṭṭetvā ṭhapitaharitālavaṭṭiṃ
atk-s0302a:441_5: viya maññanti, jivhaṃ rattakambalapaṭalaṃ viya mudusiniddhamadhurarasadaṃ maññanti,
atk-s0302a:441_6: kāyaṃ sālalaṭṭhiṃ viya suvaṇṇatoraṇaṃ viya ca maññanti, manaṃ aññesaṃ manena asadisaṃ uḷāraṃ maññanti.
atk-s0302a:442_0: Niccato addakkhunti niccanti addasaṃsu. Sesapadesupi eseva nayo. Na parimucciṃsu
atk-s0302a:442_1: dukkhasmāti sakalasmāpi vaṭṭadukkhā na parimucciṃsu. Dakkhissantīti passissanti.
atk-s0302a:442_2: Āpānīyakaṃsoti sarakassa nāmaṃ. Yasmā panettha āpaṃ pivanti, tasmā “āpānīyo”ti vuccati.
atk-s0302a:442_3: Āpānīyo ca so kaṃso cāti āpānīyakaṃso. Surāmaṇḍasarakassetaṃ nāmaṃ. “Vaṇṇasampanno”tiādivacanato
atk-s0302a:442_4: pana kaṃse ṭhitapānameva evaṃ vuttaṃ. Ghammābhitattoti ghammena abhitatto. Ghammaparetoti
atk-s0302a:442_5: ghammena phuṭṭho, anugatoti attho. Pivato hi kho taṃ chādessatīti pivantassa taṃ
atk-s0302a:442_6: pānīyaṃ vaṇṇādisampattiyā ruccissati, sakalasarīraṃ vā pharitvā tuṭṭhiṃ uppādayamānaṃ
atk-s0302a:443_0: Evameva khoti ettha idaṃ opammasaṃsandanaṃ – āpānīyakaṃso viya hi loke piyarūpaṃ
atk-s0302a:443_1: sātarūpaṃ ārammaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ, ghammābhitattapuriso viya vaṭṭanissito puthujjano,
atk-s0302a:443_2: āpānīyakaṃsena nimantanapuriso viya loke piyarūpena sātarūpena ārammaṇena nimantakajano,
atk-s0302a:443_3: āpānīyakaṃse sampattiñca ādīnavañca ārocento āpānakamanusso viya ācariyupajjhāyādiko
atk-s0302a:443_4: kalyāṇamitto. Yatheva hi tassa purisassa apalokitamanusso āpānīyakaṃse guṇañca ādīnavañca
atk-s0302a:443_5: āroceti, evameva ācariyo vā upajjhāyo vā bhikkhuno pañcasu kāmaguṇesu assādañca nissaraṇañca katheti.
atk-s0302a:444_0: Tattha yathā āpānīyakaṃsamhi guṇe ca ādīnave ca ārocite so puriso piyavaṇṇādisampadāyameva
atk-s0302a:444_1: sañjātavego “sace maraṇaṃ bhavissati, pacchā jānissāmī”ti sahasā appaṭisaṅkhāya taṃ
atk-s0302a:444_2: pivitvā maraṇaṃ vā maraṇamattaṃ vā dukkhaṃ nigacchati, evameva, bhikkhu, “pañcasu
atk-s0302a:444_3: kāmaguṇesu dassanādivasena uppannasomanassamattameva assādo, ādīnavo pana diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyiko
atk-s0302a:444_4: bahu nānappakāro, appassādā kāmā bahudukkhā bahupāyāsā”ti evaṃ ācariyupajjhāyehi
atk-s0302a:444_5: ānisaṃsañca ādīnavañca kathetvā – “samaṇapaṭipadaṃ paṭipajja, indriyesu guttadvāro
atk-s0302a:444_6: bhava bhojane mattaññū jāgariyaṃ anuyutto”ti evaṃ ovaditopi assādabaddhacittatāya
atk-s0302a:444_7: “sace vuttappakāro ādīnavo bhavissati, pacchā jānissāmī”ti ācariyupajjhāye apasādetvā
atk-s0302a:444_8: uddesaparipucchādīni ceva vattapaṭipattiñca pahāya lokāmisakathaṃ kathento kāme paribhuñjitukāmatāya
atk-s0302a:444_9: sikkhaṃ paccakkhāya hīnāyāvattati. Tato duccaritāni pūrento sandhicchedanādikāle
atk-s0302a:444_10: “coro aya”nti gahetvā rañño dassito idheva hatthapādādichedanaṃ patvā samparāye catūsu
atk-s0302a:445_0: Pānīyena vā vinetunti sītena vārinā harituṃ. Dadhimaṇḍakenāti dadhimaṇḍanamattena.
atk-s0302a:446_0: Opammasaṃsandanaṃ panettha – ghammābhitattapuriso viya vaṭṭasannissitakāle yogāvacaro
atk-s0302a:446_1: daṭṭhabbo, tassa purisassa paṭisaṅkhā āpānīyakaṃsaṃ pahāya pānīyādīhi pipāsassa vinodanaṃ
atk-s0302a:446_2: viya bhikkhuno ācariyupajjhāyānaṃ ovāde ṭhatvā chadvārādīni pariggahetvā anukkamena
atk-s0302a:446_3: vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhentassa arahattaphalādhigamo, pānīyādīni cattāri pānāni viya hi cattāro
atk-s0302a:446_4: maggā, tesu aññataraṃ pivitvā surāpipāsitaṃ vinodetvā sukhino yena kāmaṃ gamanaṃ
atk-s0302a:446_5: viya khīṇāsavassa catumaggapānaṃ pivitvā taṇhaṃ vinodetvā agatapubbaṃ nibbānadisaṃ
atk-s0302a:448_0: 67. Sattame kinnu kho, āvusoti kasmā pucchati? “Evaṃ puṭṭho kathaṃ nu kho byākareyyā”ti.
atk-s0302a:448_1: Therassa ajjhāsayajānanatthaṃ. Apica atīte dve aggasāvakā imaṃ pañhaṃ vinicchayiṃsūti
atk-s0302a:448_2: anāgate bhikkhū jānissantītipi pucchati. Idāneva kho mayanti idaṃ thero yassa nāmarūpassa
atk-s0302a:448_3: viññāṇaṃ paccayoti vuttaṃ, tadeva nāmarūpaṃ viññāṇassa paccayoti vuttattā āha. Naḷakalāpiyoti
atk-s0302a:448_4: idha pana ayakalāpādivasena upamaṃ anāharitvā viññāṇanāmarūpānaṃ abaladubbalabhāvadassanatthaṃ ayaṃ upamā ābhatā.
atk-s0302a:449_0: Nirodho hotīti ettake ṭhāne paccayuppannapañcavokārabhavavasena desanā kathitā. Chattiṃsāya
atk-s0302a:449_1: vatthūhīti heṭṭhā vissajjitesu dvādasasu padesu ekekasmiṃ tiṇṇaṃ tiṇṇaṃ vasena chattiṃsāya
atk-s0302a:449_2: kāraṇehi. Ettha ca paṭhamo dhammakathikaguṇo, dutiyā paṭipatti, tatiyaṃ paṭipattiphalaṃ.
atk-s0302a:449_3: Tattha paṭhamanayena desanāsampatti kathitā, dutiyena sekkhabhūmi, tatiyena asekkhabhūmīti. Sattamaṃ.
atk-s0302a:451_0: 68. Aṭṭhame aññatrevāti ekacco hi parassa saddahitvā yaṃ esa bhaṇati, taṃ bhūtanti
atk-s0302a:451_1: gaṇhāti. Aparassa nisīditvā cintentassa yaṃ kāraṇaṃ ruccati, so “atthi eta”nti ruciyā
atk-s0302a:451_2: gaṇhāti. Eko “cirakālato paṭṭhāya evaṃ anussavo atthi, bhūtameta”nti anussavena gaṇhāti.
atk-s0302a:451_3: Aññassa vitakkayato ekaṃ kāraṇaṃ upaṭṭhāti, so “attheta”nti ākāraparivitakkena gaṇhāti.
atk-s0302a:451_4: Aparassa cintayato ekā diṭṭhi uppajjati, yāyassa taṃ kāraṇaṃ nijjhāyantassa khamati,
atk-s0302a:451_5: so “attheta”nti diṭṭhinijjhānakkhantiyā gaṇhāti. Thero pana pañcapi etāni kāraṇāni
atk-s0302a:451_6: paṭikkhipitvā paccakkhañāṇena paṭividdhabhāvaṃ pucchanto aññatreva, āvuso musila,
atk-s0302a:451_7: saddhāyātiādimāha. Tattha aññatrevāti saddhādīni kāraṇāni ṭhapetvā, vinā etehi kāraṇehīti
atk-s0302a:452_0: Tuṇhī ahosīti thero khīṇāsavo, ahaṃ pana khīṇāsavoti vā na vāti vā avatvā tuṇhīyeva
atk-s0302a:452_1: ahosi. Āyasmā nārado āyasmantaṃ paviṭṭhaṃ etadavocāti kasmā avoca? So kira cintesi
atk-s0302a:452_2: – “bhavanirodho nibbānaṃ nāmāti sekhehipi jānitabbo pañho esa, ayaṃ pana thero imaṃ
atk-s0302a:452_3: theraṃ asekhabhūmiyā kāreti, imaṃ ṭhānaṃ jānāpessāmī”ti etaṃ avoca.
atk-s0302a:453_0: Sammappaññāya sudiṭṭhanti saha vipassanāya maggapaññāya suṭṭhu diṭṭhaṃ. Na camhi
atk-s0302a:453_1: arahanti anāgāmimagge ṭhitattā arahaṃ na homīti dīpeti. Yaṃ panassa idāni “bhavanirodho
atk-s0302a:453_2: nibbāna”nti ñāṇaṃ, taṃ ekūnavīsatiyā paccavekkhaṇañāṇehi vimuttaṃ paccavekkhaṇañāṇaṃ.
atk-s0302a:453_4: Udakanti hi kho ñāṇaṃ assāti tīre ṭhitassa olokayato evaṃ ñāṇaṃ bhaveyya. Na ca kāyena
atk-s0302a:453_5: phusitvāti udakaṃ pana nīharitvā kāyena phusitvā viharituṃ na sakkuṇeyya. Udapāne
atk-s0302a:453_6: udakadassanaṃ viya hi anāgāmino nibbānadassanaṃ, ghammābhitattapuriso viya anāgāmī,
atk-s0302a:453_7: udakavārako viya arahattamaggo, yathā ghammābhitattapuriso udapāne udakaṃ passati.
atk-s0302a:453_8: Evaṃ anāgāmī paccavekkhaṇañāṇena “upari arahattaphalasamayo nāma atthī”ti jānāti.
atk-s0302a:453_9: Yathā pana so puriso udakavārakassa natthitāya udakaṃ nīharitvā kāyena phusituṃ na
atk-s0302a:453_10: labhati, evaṃ anāgāmī arahattamaggassa natthitāya nibbānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā arahattaphalasamāpattiṃ
atk-s0302a:455_0: 69. Navame upayantoti udakavaḍḍhanasamaye upari gacchanto. Mahānadiyoti gaṅgāyamunādikā
atk-s0302a:455_1: mahāsaritāyo. Upayāpetīti upari yāpeti, vaḍḍheti pūretīti attho. Avijjā upayantīti
atk-s0302a:455_2: avijjā upari gacchantī saṅkhārānaṃ paccayo bhavituṃ sakkuṇantī. Saṅkhāre upayāpetīti
atk-s0302a:455_3: saṅkhāre upari yāpeti vaḍḍheti. Evaṃ sabbapadesu attho veditabbo. Apayantoti apagacchanto
atk-s0302a:455_4: osaranto. Avijjā apayantīti avijjā apagacchamānā osaramānā upari saṅkhārānaṃ paccayo
atk-s0302a:455_5: bhavituṃ na sakkuṇantīti attho. Saṅkhāre apayāpetīti saṅkhāre apagacchāpeti. Esa
atk-s0302a:457_0: 70. Dasame garukatoti sabbehi devamanussehi pāsāṇacchattaṃ viya cittena garukato.
atk-s0302a:457_1: Mānitoti manena piyāyito. Pūjitoti catupaccayapūjāya pūjito. Apacitoti nīcavuttikaraṇena
atk-s0302a:457_2: apacito. Satthārañhi disvā manussā hatthikkhandhādīhi otaranti maggaṃ denti, aṃsakūṭato
atk-s0302a:457_3: sāṭakaṃ apanenti, āsanato vuṭṭhahanti vandanti. Evaṃ so tehi apacito nāma hoti. Susimoti
atk-s0302a:457_4: evaṃnāmako vedaṅgesu kusalo paṇḍitaparibbājako. Ehi tvanti tesaṃ kira etadahosi –
atk-s0302a:457_5: “samaṇo gotamo na jātigottādīni āgamma lābhaggappatto jāto, kaviseṭṭho panesa uttamakavitāya
atk-s0302a:457_6: sāvakānaṃ ganthaṃ bandhitvā deti, taṃ te uggaṇhitvā upaṭṭhākānaṃ upanisinnakathampi
atk-s0302a:457_7: anumodanampi sarabhaññampīti evamādīni kathenti, te tesaṃ pasannā lābhaṃ upasaṃharanti.
atk-s0302a:457_8: Sace mayaṃ yaṃ samaṇo gotamo jānāti, tato thokaṃ jāneyyāma, attano samayaṃ tattha
atk-s0302a:457_9: pakkhipitvā mayampi upaṭṭhākānaṃ katheyyāma, tato etehi lābhitarā bhaveyyāma. Ko
atk-s0302a:457_10: nu kho samaṇassa gotamassa santike pabbajitvā khippameva uggaṇhituṃ sakkhissatī”ti.
atk-s0302a:457_11: Te evaṃ cintetvā “susimo paṭibalo”ti disvā taṃ upasaṅkamitvā evamāhaṃsu.
atk-s0302a:458_0: Yenāyasmā ānando tenupasaṅkamīti kasmā upasaṅkami? Evaṃ kirassa ahosi, “kassa nu
atk-s0302a:458_1: kho santikaṃ gantvā ahaṃ imaṃ dhammaṃ khippaṃ laddhuṃ sakkhissāmī”ti? Tato cintesi
atk-s0302a:458_2: – “samaṇo gotamo garu tejussado niyamamanuyutto, na sakkā akāle upasaṅkamituṃ, aññepi
atk-s0302a:458_3: bahū khattiyādayo samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ upasaṅkamanti, tasmimpi samaye na sakkā upasaṅkamituṃ.
atk-s0302a:458_4: Sāvakesupissa sāriputto mahāpañño vipassanālakkhaṇamhi etadagge ṭhapito, mahāmoggallāno
atk-s0302a:458_5: samādhilakkhaṇasmiṃ etadagge ṭhapito, mahākassapo dhutaṅgadharesu anuruddho dibbacakkhukesu,
atk-s0302a:458_6: puṇṇo mantāṇiputto dhammakathikesu, upālitthero vinayadharesu etadagge ṭhapito, ayaṃ
atk-s0302a:458_7: pana ānando bahussuto tipiṭakadharo, satthāpissa tattha tattha kathitaṃ dhammaṃ āharitvā
atk-s0302a:458_8: katheti, pañcasu ṭhānesu etadagge ṭhapito, aṭṭhannaṃ varānaṃ lābhī, catūhi acchariyabbhutadhammehi
atk-s0302a:458_9: samannāgato, tassa samīpaṃ gato khippaṃ dhammaṃ laddhuṃ sakkhissāmī”ti. Tasmā yenāyasmā
atk-s0302a:459_0: Yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamīti kasmā sayaṃ apabbājetvā upasaṅkami? Evaṃ kirassa ahosi
atk-s0302a:459_1: – “ayaṃ titthiyasamaye pāṭiyekko ‘ahaṃ satthā’ti paṭijānanto carati, pabbajitvā sāsanassa
atk-s0302a:459_2: alābhāyapi parisakkeyya. Na kho panassāhaṃ ajjhāsayaṃ ājānāmi, satthā jānissatī”ti.
atk-s0302a:459_3: Tasmā taṃ ādāya yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami. Tenahānanda, susimaṃ pabbājethāti satthā
atk-s0302a:459_4: kira cintesi – “ayaṃ paribbājako titthiyasamaye ‘ahaṃ pāṭiyekko satthā’ti paṭijānamāno
atk-s0302a:459_5: carati, ‘idha maggabrahmacariyaṃ carituṃ icchāmī’ti kira vadati. Kiṃ nu kho mayi
atk-s0302a:459_6: pasanno, udāhu mayhaṃ sāvakesu, udāhu mayhaṃ vā mama sāvakānaṃ vā dhammakathāya pasanno”ti?
atk-s0302a:459_7: Athassa ekaṭṭhānepi pasādābhāvaṃ ñatvā, “ayaṃ mama sāsane dhammaṃ thenessāmīti pabbajati.
atk-s0302a:459_8: Itissa āgamanaṃ aparisuddhaṃ; nipphatti nu kho kīdisā”ti? Olokento “kiñcāpi ‘dhammaṃ
atk-s0302a:459_9: thenessāmī’ti pabbajati, katipāheneva pana ghaṭetvā arahattaṃ gaṇhissatī”ti ñatvā
atk-s0302a:460_0: Aññā byākatā hotīti te kira bhikkhū satthu santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā temāsaṃ vassaṃ
atk-s0302a:460_1: vasantā tasmiṃyeva antotemāse ghaṭentā vāyamantā arahattaṃ paṭilabhiṃsu. Te “paṭiladdhaguṇaṃ
atk-s0302a:460_2: satthu ārocessāmā”ti pavāritapavāraṇā senāsanaṃ saṃsāmetvā satthu santikaṃ āgantvā
atk-s0302a:460_3: attano paṭiladdhaguṇaṃ ārocesuṃ. Taṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ. Aññāti arahattassa nāmaṃ.
atk-s0302a:460_4: Byākatāti ārocitā. Assosīti so kira ohitasoto hutvā tesaṃ tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ ṭhitaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0302a:460_5: gacchati taṃ taṃ kathaṃ suṇitukāmo. Yena te bhikkhū tenupasaṅkamīti kasmā upasaṅkami?
atk-s0302a:460_6: Taṃ kirassa pavattiṃ sutvā etadahosi – “aññā nāma imasmiṃ sāsane paramappamāṇaṃ sārabhūtā
atk-s0302a:460_7: ācariyamuṭṭhi maññe bhavissati, pucchitvā naṃ jānissāmī”ti. Tasmā upasaṅkami.
atk-s0302a:461_0: Anekavihitanti anekavidhaṃ. Iddhividhanti iddhikoṭṭhāsaṃ. Āvibhāvaṃ tirobhāvanti
atk-s0302a:461_1: āvibhāvaṃ gahetvā tirobhāvaṃ, tirobhāvaṃ gahetvā āvibhāvaṃ kātuṃ sakkothāti pucchati.
atk-s0302a:461_2: Tirokuṭṭanti parakuṭṭaṃ. Itarapadadvayepi eseva nayo. Ummujjanimujjanti ummujjanañca
atk-s0302a:461_3: nimujjanañca. Pallaṅkenāti pallaṅkabandhanena. Kamathāti nisīdituṃ vā gantuṃ vā sakkothāti
atk-s0302a:461_4: pucchati? Pakkhī sakuṇoti pakkhayutto sakuṇo. Ayamettha saṅkhepo, vitthārato pana
atk-s0302a:461_5: imassa iddhividhassa, ito paresaṃ dibbasotādīnañca vaṇṇanānayo visuddhimagge vuttanayena veditabboti.
atk-s0302a:462_0: Santā vimokkhāti aṅgasantatāya ceva ārammaṇasantatāya ca santā āruppavimokkhā. Kāyena
atk-s0302a:462_1: phusitvāti nāmakāyena phusitvā paṭilabhitvā. Paññāvimuttā kho mayaṃ, āvusoti, āvuso,
atk-s0302a:462_2: mayaṃ nijjhānakā sukkhavipassakā paññāmatteneva vimuttāti dasseti. Ājāneyyāsi vā
atk-s0302a:462_3: tvaṃ, āvuso susima, na vā tvaṃ ājāneyyāsīti kasmā evamāhaṃsu? Evaṃ kira nesaṃ ahosi
atk-s0302a:462_4: – “mayaṃ imassa ajjhāsayaṃ gahetvā kathetuṃ na sakkhissāma, dasabalaṃ pana pucchitvā
atk-s0302a:462_5: nikkaṅkho bhavissatī”ti. Dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇanti vipassanāñāṇaṃ, taṃ paṭhamataraṃ uppajjati.
atk-s0302a:462_6: Nibbāne ñāṇanti vipassanāya ciṇṇante pavattamaggañāṇaṃ, taṃ pacchā uppajjati. Tasmā bhagavā evamāha.
atk-s0302a:463_0: Ājāneyyāsi vātiādi kasmā vuttaṃ? Vināpi samādhiṃ evaṃ ñāṇuppattidassanatthaṃ. Idañhi
atk-s0302a:463_1: vuttaṃ hoti – susima, maggo vā phalaṃ vā na samādhinissando, na samādhiānisaṃso,
atk-s0302a:463_2: na samādhissa nipphatti, vipassanāya paneso nissando, vipassanāya ānisaṃso, vipassanāya
atk-s0302a:463_3: nipphatti, tasmā jāneyyāsi vā tvaṃ, na vā tvaṃ jāneyyāsi, atha kho dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇaṃ
atk-s0302a:464_0: Idānissa paṭivedhabhabbataṃ ñatvā teparivaṭṭaṃ dhammadesanaṃ desento taṃ kiṃ maññasi,
atk-s0302a:464_1: susima? Rūpaṃ niccaṃ vā aniccaṃ vātiādimāha? Te parivaṭṭadesanāvasāne pana thero
atk-s0302a:464_2: arahattaṃ patto. Idānissa anuyogaṃ āropento jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇanti, susima, passasītiādimāha.
atk-s0302a:464_3: Api pana tvaṃ, susimāti idaṃ kasmā ārabhi? Nijjhānakānaṃ sukkhavipassakabhikkhūnaṃ
atk-s0302a:464_4: pākaṭakaraṇatthaṃ. Ayañhettha adhippāyo – na kevalaṃ tvameva nijjhānako sukkhavipassako,
atk-s0302a:464_5: etepi bhikkhū evarūpāyevāti. Sesaṃ sabbattha pākaṭamevāti. Dasamaṃ.
atk-s0302a:468: 71-72. Samaṇabrāhmaṇavagge jarāmaraṇādīsu ekekapadavasena ekekaṃ katvā ekādasa suttāni vuttāni, tāni uttānatthānevāti.
atk-s0302a:472_1: nāma honti. Te sabbepi tathā tathā bujjhanakānaṃ veneyyapuggalānaṃ ajjhāsayavasena
atk-s0302a:472_2: vuttā. Tattha satthāti buddho vā hotu sāvako vā, yaṃ nissāya maggañāṇaṃ labhati,
atk-s0302a:472_3: ayaṃ satthā nāma, so pariyesitabbo. Sikkhā karaṇīyāti tividhāpi sikkhā kātabbā. Yogādīsu
atk-s0302a:472_4: yogoti payogo. Chandoti kattukamyatākusalacchando. Ussoḷhīti sabbasahaṃ adhimattavīriyaṃ.
atk-s0302a:472_5: Appaṭivānīti anivattanā. Ātappanti kilesatāpanavīriyameva. Sātaccanti satatakiriyaṃ.
atk-s0302a:472_6: Satīti jarāmaraṇādivasena catusaccapariggāhikā sati. Sampajaññanti tādisameva ñāṇaṃ.
atk-s0302a:472_7: Appamādoti saccabhāvanāya appamādo. Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānamevāti.
atk-s0302a:477_0: 74. Abhisamayasaṃyuttassa paṭhame nakhasikhāyanti maṃsaṭṭhānena vimutte nakhagge.
atk-s0302a:477_1: Nakhasikhā ca nāma lokiyānaṃ mahatīpi hoti, satthu pana rattuppalapattakoṭi viya
atk-s0302a:477_2: sukhumā. Kathaṃ panettha paṃsu patiṭṭhitoti? Adhiṭṭhānabalena. Bhagavatā hi atthaṃ
atk-s0302a:477_3: ñāpetukāmena adhiṭṭhānabalena tattha patiṭṭhāpito. Satimaṃ kalanti mahāpathaviyā
atk-s0302a:477_4: paṃsuṃ satakoṭṭhāse katvā tato ekakoṭṭhāsaṃ. Paratopi eseva nayo. Abhisametāvinoti
atk-s0302a:477_5: paññāya ariyasaccāni abhisametvā ṭhitassa. Purimaṃ dukkhakkhandhaṃ parikkhīṇaṃ pariyādiṇṇaṃ
atk-s0302a:477_6: upanidhāyāti etadeva bahutaraṃ dukkhaṃ, yadidaṃ parikkhīṇanti evaṃ paṭhamaṃ vuttaṃ
atk-s0302a:477_7: dukkhakkhandhaṃ upanidhāya, ñāṇena taṃ tassa santike ṭhapetvā upaparikkhiyamāneti
atk-s0302a:477_8: attho. Katamaṃ panettha purimadukkhaṃ nāma? Yaṃ parikkhīṇaṃ. Katamaṃ pana parikkhīṇaṃ?
atk-s0302a:477_9: Yaṃ paṭhamamaggassa abhāvitattā uppajjeyya. Katamaṃ pana upanidhāya? Yaṃ sattasu
atk-s0302a:477_10: attabhāvesu apāye aṭṭhamañca paṭisandhiṃ ādiṃ katvā yattha katthaci uppajjeyya, sabbaṃ
atk-s0302a:477_11: taṃ parikkhīṇanti veditabbaṃ. Sattakkhattunti satta vāre, sattasu attabhāvesūti attho.
atk-s0302a:477_12: Paramatāti idamassa paraṃ pamāṇanti dasseti. Mahatthiyoti mahato atthassa nipphādako. Paṭhamaṃ.
atk-s0302a:479: 75. Dutiye pokkharaṇīti vāpī. Ubbedhenāti gambhīratāya. Samatittikāti mukhavaṭṭisamā. Kākapeyyāti sakkā hoti tīre ṭhitena kākena pakatiyāpi mukhatuṇḍikaṃ otāretvā pātuṃ. Dutiyaṃ.
atk-s0302a:481_0: 76-77. Tatiye yatthimāti yasmiṃ sambhijjaṭṭhāne imā. Saṃsandantīti samāgantvā sandanti.
atk-s0302a:481_1: Samentīti samāgacchanti. Dve vā ti vāti dve vā tīṇi vā. Udakaphusitānīti udakabindūni.
atk-s0302a:481_2: Saṃbhejjaudakanti aññāhi nadīhi saddhiṃ sambhinnaṭṭhāne udakaṃ. Catutthaṃ uttānatthameva. Tatiyacatutthāni.
atk-s0302a:483_0: 78-84. Pañcame mahāpathaviyāti cakkavāḷabbhantarāya mahāpathaviyā uddharitvā. Kolaṭṭhimattiyoti
atk-s0302a:483_1: padaraṭṭhipamāṇā. Guḷikāti mattikaguḷikā. Upanikkhipeyyāti ekasmiṃ ṭhāne ṭhapeyya.
atk-s0302a:483_2: Chaṭṭhādīsu vuttanayeneva attho veditabbo. Pariyosāne pana aññatitthiyasamaṇabrāhmaṇaparibbājakānaṃ
atk-s0302a:483_3: adhigamoti bāhirakānaṃ sabbopi guṇādhigamo paṭhamamaggena adhigataguṇānaṃ satabhāgampi
atk-s0302a:488_1: laddhanāmānaṃ dhammānaṃ nānāsabhāvo dhātunānattaṃ. Cakkhudhātūtiādīsu cakkhupasādo
atk-s0302a:488_2: cakkhudhātu, rūpārammaṇaṃ rūpadhātu, cakkhupasādavatthukaṃ cittaṃ cakkhuviññāṇadhātu.
atk-s0302a:488_3: Sotapasādo sotadhātu, saddārammaṇaṃ saddadhātu, sotapasādavatthukaṃ cittaṃ sotaviññāṇadhātu.
atk-s0302a:488_4: Ghānapasādo ghānadhātu, gandhārammaṇaṃ gandhadhātu, ghānapasādavatthukaṃ cittaṃ ghānaviññāṇadhātu.
atk-s0302a:488_5: Jivhāpasādo jivhādhātu, rasārammaṇaṃ rasadhātu, jivhāpasādavatthukaṃ cittaṃ jivhāviññāṇadhātu.
atk-s0302a:488_6: Kāyapasādo kāyadhātu, phoṭṭhabbārammaṇaṃ phoṭṭhabbadhātu, kāyapasādavatthukaṃ cittaṃ
atk-s0302a:488_7: kāyaviññāṇadhātu. Tisso manodhātuyo manodhātu, vedanādayo tayo khandhā sukhumarūpāni
atk-s0302a:488_8: nibbānañca dhammadhātu, sabbampi manoviññāṇaṃ manoviññāṇadhātūti. Ettha ca soḷasa
atk-s0302a:488_9: dhātuyo kāmāvacarā, avasāne dve catubhūmikāti. Paṭhamaṃ.
atk-s0302a:490_0: 86. Dutiye uppajjati phassanānattanti nānāsabhāvo phasso uppajjati. Tattha cakkhusamphassādayo
atk-s0302a:490_2: Manodhātuṃ paṭiccāti manodvārāvajjanaṃ kiriyāmanoviññāṇadhātuṃ paṭicca paṭhamajavanasamphasso
atk-s0302a:492_0: 87. Tatiye no manosamphassaṃ paṭicca uppajjati manodhātūti manodvāre paṭhamajavanasampayuttaṃ
atk-s0302a:492_1: phassaṃ paṭicca āvajjanakiriyāmanoviññāṇadhātu no uppajjatīti evamattho daṭṭhabbo. Tatiyaṃ.
atk-s0302a:494_0: 88. Catutthe cakkhusamphassajā vedanāti sampaṭicchanamanodhātuto paṭṭhāya sabbāpi
atk-s0302a:494_1: tasmiṃ dvāre vedanā vatteyyuṃ, nibbattiphāsukatthaṃ pana anantaraṃ sampaṭicchanavedanameva
atk-s0302a:494_2: gahetuṃ vaṭṭatīti vuttaṃ. Manosamphassaṃ paṭiccāti manodvāre āvajjanasamphassaṃ paṭicca
atk-s0302a:494_3: paṭhamajavanavedanā, paṭhamajavanasamphassaṃ paṭicca dutiyajavanavedanāti ayamadhippāyo. Catutthaṃ.
atk-s0302a:496_0: 89. Pañcame tatiyacatutthesu vuttanayāva ekato katvā desitāti. Iti dutiyādīsu catūsu
atk-s0302a:496_1: suttesu manodhātuṃ manodhātūti agahetvā manodvārāvajjanaṃ manodhātūti gahitaṃ. Sabbāni
atk-s0302a:496_2: cetāni tathā tathā kathite bujjhanakānaṃ ajjhāsayena desitāni. Ito paresupi eseva nayo. Pañcamaṃ.
atk-s0302a:498: 90. Chaṭṭhe pana pañca dhātuyo kāmāvacarā, dhammadhātu catubhūmikāti. Chaṭṭhaṃ.
atk-s0302a:500_0: 91. Sattame rūpadhātūti āpāthe patitaṃ attano vā parassa vā sāṭakaveṭhanādivatthukaṃ
atk-s0302a:500_1: rūpārammaṇaṃ. Rūpasaññāti cakkhuviññāṇasampayuttā saññā. Rūpasaṅkappoti sampaṭicchanādīhi
atk-s0302a:500_2: tīhi cittehi sampayutto saṅkappo. Rūpacchandoti rūpe chandikataṭṭhena chando. Rūpapariḷāhoti
atk-s0302a:500_3: rūpe anuḍahanaṭṭhena pariḷāho. Rūpapariyesanāti pariḷāhe uppanne sandiṭṭhasambhatte
atk-s0302a:500_4: gahetvā tassa rūpassa paṭilābhatthāya pariyesanā. Ettha ca saññāsaṅkappachandā ekajavanavārepi
atk-s0302a:500_5: nānājavanavārepi labbhanti, pariḷāhapariyesanā pana nānājavanavāreyeva labbhantīti.
atk-s0302a:500_6: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, dhātunānattanti ettha ca evaṃ rūpādinānāsabhāvaṃ dhātuṃ paṭicca
atk-s0302a:500_7: rūpasaññādinānāsabhāvasaññā uppajjatīti iminā nayena attho veditabbo. Sattamaṃ.
atk-s0302a:502: 92. Aṭṭhame no dhammapariyesanaṃ paṭicca uppajjati dhammapariḷāhoti evaṃ āgataṃ paṭisedhamattameva nānaṃ. Aṭṭhamaṃ.
atk-s0302a:504_0: 93-94. Navame uppajjati rūpasaññāti vuttappakāre ārammaṇe uppajjati saññā. Rūpasaṅkappoti
atk-s0302a:504_1: tasmiṃyeva ārammaṇe tīhi cittehi sampayuttasaṅkappo. Rūpasamphassoti tadevārammaṇaṃ
atk-s0302a:504_2: phusamāno phasso. Vedanāti tadeva ārammaṇaṃ anubhavamānā vedanā. Chandādayo vuttanayāva.
atk-s0302a:504_3: Rūpalābhoti pariyesitvā laddhaṃ saha taṇhāya ārammaṇaṃ “rūpalābho”ti vuttaṃ. Ayaṃ
atk-s0302a:504_4: tāva sabbasaṅgāhikanayo ekasmiṃ yevārammaṇe sabbadhammānaṃ uppattivasena vutto. Aparo
atk-s0302a:504_5: āgantukārammaṇamissako hoti – rūpasaññā rūpasaṅkappo phasso vedanāti ime tāva cattāro
atk-s0302a:504_6: dhammā dhuvaparibhoge nibaddhārammaṇe honti. Nibaddhārammaṇañhi iṭṭhaṃ kantaṃ manāpaṃ
atk-s0302a:504_7: piyaṃ yaṃkiñci viya upaṭṭhāti, āgantukārammaṇaṃ pana yaṃkiñci samānampi khobhetvā tiṭṭhati.
atk-s0302a:505_0: Tatridaṃ vatthu – eko kira amaccaputto gāmiyehi parivārito gāmamajjhe ṭhatvā kammaṃ
atk-s0302a:505_1: karoti. Tasmiñcassa samaye upāsikā nadiṃ gantvā nhatvā alaṅkatapaṭiyattā dhātigaṇaparivutā
atk-s0302a:505_2: gehaṃ gacchati. So dūrato disvā “āgantukamātugāmo bhavissatī”ti saññaṃ uppādetvā
atk-s0302a:505_3: “gaccha, bhaṇe jānāhi, kā esā”ti purisaṃ pesesi. So gantvā taṃ disvā paccāgato, “kā
atk-s0302a:505_4: esā”ti puṭṭho yathāsabhāvaṃ ārocesi. Evaṃ āgantukārammaṇaṃ khobheti. Tasmiṃ uppanno
atk-s0302a:505_5: chando rūpachando nāma, tadeva ārammaṇaṃ katvā uppanno pariḷāho rūpapariḷāho nāma,
atk-s0302a:505_6: sahāye gaṇhitvā tassa pariyesanaṃ rūpapariyesanā nāma, pariyesitvā laddhaṃ saha taṇhāya
atk-s0302a:506_0: Uruvalliyavāsī cūḷatissatthero panāha – “kiñcāpi bhagavatā phassavedanā pāḷiyā majjhe
atk-s0302a:506_1: gahitā, pāḷiṃ pana parivaṭṭetvā vuttappakāre ārammaṇe uppannā saññā rūpasaññā, tasmiṃyeva
atk-s0302a:506_2: saṅkappo rūpasaṅkappo tasmiṃ chando rūpacchando, tasmiṃ pariḷāho rūpapariḷāho, tasmiṃ
atk-s0302a:506_3: pariyesanā rūpapariyesanā, pariyesitvā laddhaṃ saha taṇhāya ārammaṇaṃ rūpalābho.
atk-s0302a:506_4: Evaṃ laddhārammaṇe pana phusanaṃ phasso, anubhavanaṃ vedanā. Rūpasamphasso rūpasamphassajā
atk-s0302a:506_5: vedanāti idaṃ dvayaṃ labbhatī”ti. Aparampi avibhūtavāraṃ nāma gaṇhanti. Ārammaṇañhi
atk-s0302a:506_6: sāṇipākārehi vā parikkhittaṃ tiṇapaṇṇādīhi vā paṭicchannaṃ hoti, taṃ “upaḍḍhaṃ diṭṭhaṃ
atk-s0302a:506_7: me ārammaṇaṃ, suṭṭhu naṃ passissāmī”ti olokayato tasmiṃ ārammaṇe uppannā saññā rūpasaññā
atk-s0302a:506_8: nāma. Tasmiṃyeva uppannā saṅkappādayo rūpasaṅkappādayo nāmāti veditabbā. Etthāpi
atk-s0302a:506_9: ca saññāsaṅkappaphassavedanāchandā ekajavanavārepi nānājavanavārepi labbhanti, pariḷāhapariyesanālābhā
atk-s0302a:510_0: 95. Dutiyavaggassa paṭhame ābhādhātūti ālokadhātu. Ālokassapi ālokakasiṇe parikammaṃ
atk-s0302a:510_1: katvā uppannajjhānassāpīti sahārammaṇassa jhānassa etaṃ nāmaṃ. Subhadhātūti subhakasiṇe
atk-s0302a:510_4: bhikkhuno tattha nisīditvā pañhaṃ pucchitukāmassa okāsaṃ dento desanaṃ niṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0302a:511_0: Andhakāraṃ paṭiccāti andhakāro hi ālokena paricchinno, ālokopi andhakārena. Andhakārena
atk-s0302a:511_1: hi so pākaṭo hoti. Tasmā “andhakāraṃ paṭicca paññāyatī”ti āha. Asubhaṃ paṭiccāti
atk-s0302a:511_2: etthāpi eseva nayo. Asubhañhi subhena, subhañca asubhena paricchinnaṃ, asubhe sati
atk-s0302a:511_3: subhaṃ paññāyati, tasmā evamāha. Rūpaṃ paṭiccāti rūpāvacarasamāpattiṃ paṭicca. Rūpāvacarasamāpattiyā
atk-s0302a:511_4: hi sati ākāsānañcāyatanasamāpatti nāma hoti rūpasamatikkamo vā, tasmā evamāha. Viññāṇañcāyatanadhātuādīsupi
atk-s0302a:511_5: eseva nayo. Nirodhaṃ paṭiccāti catunnaṃ khandhānaṃ paṭisaṅkhāappavattiṃ paṭicca.
atk-s0302a:511_6: Khandhanirodhañhi paṭicca nirodhasamāpatti nāma paññāyati, na khandhapavattiṃ, tasmā
atk-s0302a:511_7: evamāha. Ettha ca catunnaṃ khandhānaṃ nirodhova nirodhasamāpattīti veditabbo.
