atk-s0302a:512_0: Kathaṃ samāpatti pattabbāti kathaṃ samāpattiyo kīdisā samāpattiyo nāma hutvā pattabbāti?
atk-s0302a:512_1: Saññāsamāpatti pattabbāti saññāya atthibhāvena saññāsamāpattiyo saññāsamāpattiyo
atk-s0302a:512_2: nāma hutvā pattabbā. Saṅkhārāvasesasamāpatti pattabbāti sukhumasaṅkhārānaṃ avasiṭṭhatāya
atk-s0302a:512_3: saṅkhārāvasesasamāpatti nāma hutvā pattabbā. Nirodhasamāpatti pattabbāti nirodhova
atk-s0302a:512_4: nirodhasamāpatti nirodhasamāpatti nāma hutvā pattabbāti attho. Paṭhamaṃ.
atk-s0302a:514_0: 96. Dutiye sanidānanti bhāvanapuṃsakametaṃ, sanidāno sapaccayo hutvā uppajjatīti
atk-s0302a:514_1: attho. Kāmadhātuṃ, bhikkhave, paṭiccāti ettha kāmavitakkopi kāmadhātu kāmāvacaradhammāpi,
atk-s0302a:515_0: “Tattha katamā kāmadhātu? Kāmapaṭisaṃyutto takko vitakko saṅkappo appanā byappanā
atk-s0302a:515_1: cetaso abhiniropanā micchāsaṅkappo, ayaṃ vuccati kāmadhātu. Heṭṭhato avīcinirayaṃ
atk-s0302a:515_2: pariyantaṃ karitvā uparito paranimmitavasavattī deve antokaritvā yaṃ etasmiṃ antare
atk-s0302a:515_3: etthāvacarā ettha pariyāpannā khandhadhātuāyatanā rūpā vedanā saññā saṅkhārā viññāṇaṃ,
atk-s0302a:515_4: ayaṃ vuccati kāmadhātu. Sabbepi akusalā dhammā kāmadhātū”ti.
atk-s0302a:516_0: Ettha sabbasaṅgāhikā asambhinnāti dve kathā honti. Kathaṃ? Kāmadhātuggahaṇena hi
atk-s0302a:516_1: byāpādadhātuvihiṃsādhātuyo gahitā hontīti ayaṃ sabbasaṅgāhikā. Tāsaṃ pana dvinnaṃ
atk-s0302a:516_2: dhātūnaṃ visuṃ āgatattā sesadhammā kāmadhātūti ayaṃ asambhinnakathā. Ayamidha gahetabbā
atk-s0302a:516_3: imaṃ kāmadhātuṃ ārammaṇavasena vā sampayogavasena vā paṭicca kāmasaññā nāma uppajjati.
atk-s0302a:516_4: Kāmasaññaṃ paṭiccāti kāmasaññaṃ pana sampayogavasena vā upanissayavasena vā paṭicca
atk-s0302a:516_5: kāmasaṅkappo nāma uppajjati. Iminā nayena sabbapadesu attho veditabbo. Tīhi ṭhānehīti
atk-s0302a:516_6: tīhi kāraṇehi. Micchā paṭipajjatīti ayāthāvapaṭipadaṃ aniyyānikapaṭipadaṃ paṭipajjati.
atk-s0302a:517: Byāpādadhātuṃ, bhikkhaveti ettha byāpādavitakkopi byāpādadhātu byāpādopi. Yathāha –
atk-s0302a:518_0: “Tattha katamā byāpādadhātu? Byāpādapaṭisaṃyutto takko vitakko…pe… ayaṃ vuccati byāpādadhātu.
atk-s0302a:518_1: Dasasu āghātavatthūsu cittassa āghāto paṭivirodho kopo pakopo…pe… anattamanatā cittassa,
atk-s0302a:519: Imaṃ byāpādadhātuṃ sahajātapaccayādivasena paṭicca byāpādasaññā nāma uppajjati. Sesaṃ purimanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0302a:520: Vihiṃsādhātuṃ, bhikkhaveti ettha vihiṃsāvitakkopi vihiṃsādhātu vihiṃsāpi. Yathāha –
atk-s0302a:521_0: “Tattha katamā vihiṃsādhātu? Vihiṃsāpaṭisaṃyutto takko vitakko…pe… ayaṃ vuccati vihiṃsādhātu.
atk-s0302a:521_1: Idhekacco pāṇinā vā leḍḍunā vā daṇḍena vā satthena vā rajjuyā vā aññataraññatarena
atk-s0302a:521_2: vā satte viheṭheti. Yā evarūpā heṭhanā viheṭhanā hiṃsanā vihiṃsanā rosanā parūpaghāto,
atk-s0302a:522: Imaṃ vihiṃsādhātuṃ sahajātapaccayādivasena paṭicca vihiṃsāsaññā nāma uppajjati. Sesamidhāpi purimanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0302a:523_0: Tiṇadāyeti tiṇagahane araññe. Anayabyasananti avuḍḍhiṃ vināsaṃ. Evameva khoti ettha
atk-s0302a:523_1: sukkhatiṇadāyo viya ārammaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ, tiṇukkā viya akusalasaññā, tiṇakaṭṭhanissitā
atk-s0302a:523_2: pāṇā viya ime sattā. Yathā sukkhatiṇadāye ṭhapitaṃ tiṇukkaṃ khippaṃ vāyamitvā anibbāpentassa
atk-s0302a:523_3: te pāṇā anayabyasanaṃ pāpuṇanti. Evameva ye samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā uppannaṃ akusalasaññaṃ
atk-s0302a:524_0: Visamagatanti rāgavisamādīni anugataṃ akusalasaññaṃ. Na khippameva pajahatīti vikkhambhanādivasena
atk-s0302a:524_1: sīghaṃ nappajahati. Na vinodetīti na nīharati. Na byantīkarotīti bhaṅgamattampi anavasesento
atk-s0302a:524_2: na vigatantaṃ karoti. Na anabhāvaṃ gametīti na anuabhāvaṃ gameti. Evaṃ sabbapadesu
atk-s0302a:524_3: na – kāro āharitabbo. Pāṭikaṅkhāti pāṭikaṅkhitabbā icchitabbā.
atk-s0302a:525: Nekkhammadhātuṃ, bhikkhaveti ettha nekkhammavitakkopi nekkhammadhātu sabbepi kusalā dhammā. Yathāha –
atk-s0302a:526: “Tattha katamā nekkhammadhātu? Nekkhammapaṭisaṃyutto takko vitakko…pe… sammāsaṅkappo, ayaṃ vuccati nekkhammadhātū”ti.
atk-s0302a:527_0: Idhāpi duvidhā kathā. Nekkhammadhātuggahaṇena hi itarāpi dve dhātuyo gahaṇaṃ gacchanti
atk-s0302a:527_1: kusaladhammapariyāpannattā, ayaṃ sabbasaṅgāhikā. Tā pana dhātuyo visuṃ dīpetabbāti
atk-s0302a:527_2: tā ṭhapetvā sesā sabbakusalā nekkhammadhātūti ayaṃ asambhinnā. Imaṃ nekkhammadhātuṃ
atk-s0302a:527_3: sahajātādipaccayavasena paṭicca nekkhammasaññā nāma uppajjati. Saññādīni paṭicca
atk-s0302a:528: Abyāpādadhātuṃ, bhikkhaveti ettha abyāpādavitakkopi abyāpādadhātu abyāpādopi. Yathāha –
atk-s0302a:529: “Tattha katamā abyāpādadhātu? Abyāpādapaṭisaṃyutto takko…pe… ayaṃ vuccati abyāpādadhātu. Yā sattesu metti mettāyanā mettāyitattaṃ mettācetovimutti, ayaṃ vuccati abyāpādadhātū”ti.
atk-s0302a:530: Imaṃ abyāpādadhātuṃ paṭicca vuttanayeneva abyāpādasaññā nāma uppajjati.
atk-s0302a:531: Avihiṃsādhātuṃ, bhikkhaveti etthāpi avihiṃsāvitakkopi avihiṃsādhātu karuṇāpi. Yathāha –
atk-s0302a:532_0: “Tattha katamā avihiṃsādhātu? Avihiṃsāpaṭisaṃyutto takko…pe… ayaṃ vuccati avihiṃsādhātu.
atk-s0302a:532_1: Yā sattesu karuṇā karuṇāyanā karuṇāyitattaṃ karuṇācetovimutti, ayaṃ vuccati avihiṃsādhātū”ti.
atk-s0302a:533: Imaṃ avihiṃsādhātuṃ paṭicca vuttanayeneva avihiṃsāsaññā nāma uppajjati. Sesaṃ sabbattha vuttānusāreneva veditabbaṃ. Dutiyaṃ.
atk-s0302a:535_0: 97. Tatiye dhātuṃ, bhikkhaveti ito paṭṭhāya ajjhāsayaṃ dhātūti dīpeti. Uppajjati
atk-s0302a:535_1: saññāti ajjhāsayaṃ paṭicca saññā uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati, vitakko uppajjatīti.
atk-s0302a:535_2: Idhāpi “kaccāno pañhaṃ pucchissatī”ti tassa okāsadānatthaṃ ettāvatāva desanaṃ niṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0302a:535_3: Asammāsambuddhesūti chasu satthāresu. Sammāsambuddhāti mayamasma sammāsambuddhāti.
atk-s0302a:535_4: Kiṃ paṭicca paññāyatīti kismiṃ sati hotīti? Satthārānaṃ uppannaṃ diṭṭhiṃ pucchati.
atk-s0302a:535_5: Asammāsambuddhesu tesu sammāsambuddhā eteti evaṃ uppannaṃ titthiyasāvakānampi diṭṭhiṃ pucchatiyeva.
atk-s0302a:536_0: Idāni yasmā tesaṃ avijjādhātuṃ paṭicca sā diṭṭhi hoti, avijjādhātu ca nāma mahatī
atk-s0302a:536_1: dhātu, tasmā mahatiṃ dhātuṃ paṭicca tassā uppattiṃ dīpento mahatī kho esātiādimāha.
atk-s0302a:536_2: Hīnaṃ, kaccāna, dhātuṃ paṭiccāti hīnaṃ ajjhāsayaṃ paṭicca. Paṇidhīti cittaṭṭhapanaṃ.
atk-s0302a:536_3: Sā panesā itthibhāvaṃ vā makkaṭāditiracchānabhāvaṃ vā patthentassa uppajjati. Hīno
atk-s0302a:536_4: puggaloti yassete hīnā dhammā uppajjanti, sabbo so puggalopi hīno nāma. Hīnā vācāti
atk-s0302a:536_5: yā tassa vācā, sāpi hīnā. Hīnaṃ ācikkhatīti so ācikkhantopi hīnameva ācikkhati, desentopi
atk-s0302a:536_6: hīnameva desetīti sabbapadāni yojetabbāni. Upapattīti dve upapattiyo paṭilābho ca
atk-s0302a:536_7: nibbatti ca. Nibbatti hīnakulādivasena veditabbā, paṭilābho cittuppādakkhaṇe hīnattikavasena.
atk-s0302a:536_8: Kathaṃ? Tassa hi pañcasu nīcakulesu uppajjanato hīnā nibbatti, vessasuddakulesu uppajjanato
atk-s0302a:536_9: majjhimā, khattiyabrāhmaṇakulesu uppajjanato paṇītā. Dvādasākusalacittuppādānaṃ pana
atk-s0302a:536_10: paṭilābhato hīno paṭilābho, tebhūmakadhammānaṃ paṭilābhato majjhimo, navalokuttaradhammānaṃ
atk-s0302a:536_11: paṭilābhato paṇīto. Imasmiṃ pana ṭhāne nibbattiyeva adhippetāti. Tatiyaṃ.
atk-s0302a:538: 98. Catutthe saṃsandantīti ekato honti. Samentīti samāgacchanti, nirantarā honti. Hīnādhimuttikāti hīnajjhāsayā. Kalyāṇādhimuttikāti kalyāṇajjhāsayā. Catutthaṃ.
atk-s0302a:540_0: 99. Pañcame passatha noti passatha nu. Sabbe kho eteti sāriputtatthero bhagavatā
atk-s0302a:540_1: “etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave, mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ mahāpaññānaṃ yadidaṃ sāriputto”ti
atk-s0302a:540_2: mahāpaññesu etadagge ṭhapito. Iti naṃ “khandhantaraṃ dhātvantaraṃ āyatanantaraṃ satipaṭṭhānabodhipakkhiyadhammantaraṃ
atk-s0302a:540_3: tilakkhaṇāhataṃ gambhīraṃ pañhaṃ pucchissāmā”ti mahāpaññāva parivārenti. Sopi tesaṃ
atk-s0302a:540_4: pathaviṃ pattharento viya sinerupādato vālikaṃ uddharanto viya cakkavāḷapabbataṃ
atk-s0302a:540_5: bhindanto viya sineruṃ ukkhipanto viya ākāsaṃ vitthārento viya candimasūriye uṭṭhāpento
atk-s0302a:540_6: viya ca pucchitapucchitaṃ katheti. Tena vuttaṃ “sabbe kho ete, bhikkhave, bhikkhū mahāpaññā”ti.
atk-s0302a:541_0: Mahāmoggallānopi bhagavatā “etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave, mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ iddhimantānaṃ
atk-s0302a:541_1: yadidaṃ mahāmoggallāno”ti iddhimantesu etadagge ṭhapito. Iti naṃ “parikammaṃ ānisaṃsaṃ
atk-s0302a:541_2: adhiṭṭhānaṃ vikubbanaṃ pucchissāmā”ti iddhimantova parivārenti. Sopi tesaṃ vuttanayeneva
atk-s0302a:541_3: pucchitapucchitaṃ katheti. Tena vuttaṃ “sabbe kho ete, bhikkhave, bhikkhū mahiddhikā”ti.
atk-s0302a:542_0: Mahākassapopi bhagavatā “etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave, mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ dhutavādānaṃ
atk-s0302a:542_1: yadidaṃ mahākassapo”ti dhutavādesu etadagge ṭhapito. Iti naṃ “dhutaṅgaparihāraṃ ānisaṃsaṃ
atk-s0302a:542_2: samodhānaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṃ bhedaṃ pucchissāmā”ti dhutavādāva parivārenti. Sopi tesaṃ
atk-s0302a:542_3: tatheva pucchitapucchitaṃ byākaroti. Tena vuttaṃ “sabbe kho ete, bhikkhave, bhikkhū dhutavādā”ti.
atk-s0302a:543_0: Anuruddhattheropi bhagavatā “etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave, mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ dibbacakkhukānaṃ
atk-s0302a:543_1: yadidaṃ anuruddho”ti dibbacakkhukesu etadagge ṭhapito. Iti naṃ “dibbacakkhussa parikammaṃ
atk-s0302a:543_2: ānisaṃsaṃ upakkilesaṃ pucchissāmā”ti dibbacakkhukāva parivārenti. Sopi tesaṃ tatheva
atk-s0302a:543_3: pucchitapucchitaṃ katheti. Tena vuttaṃ “sabbe kho ete, bhikkhave, bhikkhū dibbacakkhukā”ti.
atk-s0302a:544_0: Puṇṇattheropi bhagavatā “etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave, mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ dhammakathikānaṃ
atk-s0302a:544_1: yadidaṃ puṇṇo mantāṇiputto”ti dhammakathikesu etadagge ṭhapito. Iti naṃ “dhammakathāya
atk-s0302a:544_3: parivārenti. Sopi tesaṃ “āvuso, dhammakathikena nāma ādito parisaṃ vaṇṇetuṃ vaṭṭati,
atk-s0302a:544_4: majjhe suññataṃ pakāsetuṃ, ante catusaccavasena kūṭaṃ gaṇhitu”nti evaṃ taṃ taṃ dhammakathānayaṃ
atk-s0302a:544_5: ācikkhati. Tena vuttaṃ “sabbe kho ete, bhikkhave, bhikkhū dhammakathikā”ti.
atk-s0302a:545_0: Upālittheropi bhagavatā “etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave, mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ vinayadharānaṃ
atk-s0302a:545_1: yadidaṃ upālī”ti vinayadharesu etadagge ṭhapito. Iti naṃ “garukalahukaṃ satekicchaatekicchaṃ
atk-s0302a:545_2: āpattānāpattiṃ pucchissāmā”ti vinayadharāva parivārenti. Sopi tesaṃ pucchitapucchitaṃ
atk-s0302a:545_3: tatheva katheti. Tena vuttaṃ “sabbe kho ete, bhikkhave, bhikkhū vinayadharā”ti.
atk-s0302a:546_0: Ānandattheropi bhagavatā “etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave, mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ bahussutānaṃ
atk-s0302a:546_1: yadidaṃ ānando”ti bahussutesu etadagge ṭhapito. Iti naṃ “dasavidhaṃ byañjanabuddhiṃ
atk-s0302a:546_2: aṭṭhuppattiṃ anusandhiṃ pubbāparaṃ pucchissāmā”ti bahussutāva parivārenti. Sopi tesaṃ
atk-s0302a:546_3: “idaṃ evaṃ vattabbaṃ, idaṃ evaṃ gahetabba”nti sabbaṃ katheti. Tena vuttaṃ “sabbe
atk-s0302a:547_0: Devadatto pana pāpiccho icchāpakato, tena naṃ “kulasaṅgaṇhanaparihāraṃ nānappakārakaṃ
atk-s0302a:547_1: kohaññataṃ pucchissāmā”ti pāpicchāva parivārenti. Sopi tesaṃ taṃ taṃ niyāmaṃ ācikkhati.
atk-s0302a:547_2: Tena vuttaṃ “sabbe kho ete, bhikkhave, bhikkhū pāpicchā”ti.
atk-s0302a:548_0: Kasmā panete avidūre caṅkamiṃsūti. “Devadatto satthari paduṭṭhacitto anatthampi kātuṃ
atk-s0302a:548_1: upakkameyyā”ti ārakkhaggahaṇatthaṃ. Atha devadatto kasmā caṅkamīti? “Akārako ayaṃ,
atk-s0302a:548_2: yadi kārako bhaveyya, na idha āgaccheyyā”ti attano katadosapaṭicchādanatthaṃ. Kiṃ
atk-s0302a:548_3: pana devadatto bhagavato anatthaṃ kātuṃ samattho, bhagavato vā ārakkhakiccaṃ atthīti?
atk-s0302a:548_4: Natthi. Tena vuttaṃ “aṭṭhānametaṃ, ānanda, anavakāso, yaṃ tathāgato parūpakkamena
atk-s0302a:548_5: parinibbāyeyyā”ti. Bhikkhū pana satthari gāravena āgatā. Teneva bhagavā evaṃ vatvā
atk-s0302a:550_0: 100. Chaṭṭhe gūtho gūthena saṃsandati sametīti samuddantare janapadantare cakkavāḷantare
atk-s0302a:550_1: ṭhitopi vaṇṇenapi gandhenapi rasenapi nānattaṃ anupagacchanto saṃsandati sameti,
atk-s0302a:550_2: ekasadisova hoti nirantaro. Sesesupi eseva nayo. Ayaṃ pana aniṭṭhaupamā hīnajjhāsayānaṃ
atk-s0302a:551_0: Saṃsaggāti dassanasavanasaṃsaggādivatthukena taṇhāsnehena. Vanatho jātoti kilesavanaṃ
atk-s0302a:551_1: jātaṃ. Asaṃsaggena chijjatīti ekato ṭhānanisajjādīni akarontassa asaṃsaggena adassanena
atk-s0302a:551_2: chijjati. Sādhujīvīti parisuddhajīvitaṃ jīvamāno. Sahāvaseti sahavāsaṃ vaseyya. Chaṭṭhaṃ.
atk-s0302a:553_0: 101. Sattame assaddhā assaddhehītiādīsu buddhe vā dhamme vā saṅghe vā saddhāvirahitā
atk-s0302a:553_1: nirojā nirasā puggalā samuddassa orimatīre ṭhitā pārimatīrepi ṭhitehi assaddhehi
atk-s0302a:553_2: saddhiṃ tāya assaddhatāya ekasadisā nirantarā honti. Tathā ahirikā bhinnamariyādā
atk-s0302a:553_3: alajjipuggalā ahirikehi, anottappino pāpakiriyāya abhāyamānā anottappīhi, appassutā
atk-s0302a:553_4: sutavirahitā appassutehi, kusītā ālasiyapuggalā kusītehi, muṭṭhassatino bhattanikkhittakākamaṃsanikkhittasiṅgālasadisā
atk-s0302a:553_5: muṭṭhassatīhi, duppaññā khandhādiparicchedikāya paññāya abhāvena nippaññā tādiseheva
atk-s0302a:553_6: duppaññehi, saddhāsampannā cetiyavandanādikiccapasutā saddhehi, hirimanā lajjipuggalā
atk-s0302a:553_7: hirimanehi, ottappino pāpabhīrukā ottappīhi, bahussutā sutadharā āgamadharā tantipālakā
atk-s0302a:553_8: vaṃsānurakkhakā bahussutehi, āraddhavīriyā paripuṇṇaparakkamā āraddhavīriyehi, upaṭṭhitassatī
atk-s0302a:553_9: sabbakiccapariggāhikāya satiyā samannāgatā upaṭṭhitassatīhi, paññavanto mahāpaññehi
atk-s0302a:553_10: vajirūpamañāṇehi paññavantehi saddhiṃ dūre ṭhitāpi tāya paññāsampattiyā saṃsandanti samenti. Sattamaṃ.
atk-s0302a:555_0: 102-106. Aṭṭhamādīni teyeva assaddhādidhamme tikavasena katvā desitāni. Tattha aṭṭhame
atk-s0302a:555_1: assaddhādimūlakā kaṇhapakkhasukkapakkhavasena pañca tikā vuttā, navame ahirikamūlakā
atk-s0302a:555_2: cattāro. Dasame anottappamūlakā tayo, ekādasame appassutamūlakā dve, dvādasame kusītamūlako
atk-s0302a:555_3: eko tiko vuttoti sabbepi pañcasu suttantesu pannarasa tikā honti. Pannarasa cete
atk-s0302a:555_4: suttantātipi vadanti. Ayaṃ tikapeyyālo nāma. Aṭṭhamādīni.
atk-s0302a:559_0: 107-108. Ito paresu paṭhamaṃ assaddhādipañcakavasena vuttaṃ, tathā dutiyaṃ. Paṭhame
atk-s0302a:559_1: pana asamāhitapadaṃ catutthaṃ, dutiye dussīlapadaṃ. Evaṃ vuccamāne bujjhanakapuggalānaṃ
atk-s0302a:559_2: ajjhāsayena hi etāni vuttāni. Ettha asamāhitāti upacārappanāsamādhirahitā. Dussīlāti
atk-s0302a:561_0: 109-111. Tatiyaṃ pañcakammapathavasena bujjhanakānaṃ ajjhāsayavasena vuttaṃ, catutthaṃ
atk-s0302a:561_1: sattakammapathavasena, pañcamaṃ dasakammapathavasena. Tattha tatiye surāmerayamajjappamādaṭṭhāyinoti
atk-s0302a:561_2: surāmerayasaṅkhātaṃ majjaṃ yāya pamādacetanāya pivanti, sā “surāmerayamajjappamādo”ti
atk-s0302a:561_3: vuccati, tasmiṃ tiṭṭhantīti surāmerayamajjappamādaṭṭhāyino. Ayaṃ tāvettha asādhāraṇapadassa attho.
atk-s0302a:562_0: Pañcame pāṇaṃ atipātentīti pāṇātipātino, pāṇaghātikāti attho. Adinnaṃ ādiyantīti
atk-s0302a:562_1: adinnādāyino, parassahārinoti attho. Vatthukāmesu kilesakāmena micchā carantīti kāmesumicchācārino.
atk-s0302a:562_2: Musā vadantīti musāvādino, paresaṃ atthabhañjakaṃ tucchaṃ alikaṃ vācaṃ bhāsitāroti
atk-s0302a:562_3: attho. Pisuṇā vācā etesanti pisuṇavācā. Mammacchedikā pharusā vācā etesanti pharusavācā.
atk-s0302a:562_4: Samphaṃ niratthakaṃ vacanaṃ palapantīti samphappalāpino. Abhijjhāyantīti abhijjhāluno,
atk-s0302a:562_5: parabhaṇḍe lubbhanasīlāti attho. Byāpannaṃ pūtibhūtaṃ cittametesanti byāpannacittā.
atk-s0302a:562_6: Micchā pāpikā viññugarahitā etesaṃ diṭṭhīti micchādiṭṭhikā, kammapathapariyāpannāya
atk-s0302a:562_8: attho. Sammā sobhanā viññupasatthā etesaṃ diṭṭhīti sammādiṭṭhikā, kammapathapariyāpannāya
atk-s0302a:562_10: ca samannāgatāti attho. Idaṃ tāvettha anuttānānaṃ padānaṃ padavaṇṇanāmattaṃ.
atk-s0302a:563_0: Yo pana tesaṃ pāṇātipāto adinnādānaṃ kāmesumicchācāro musāvādo pisuṇavācā pharusavācā
atk-s0302a:563_1: samphappalāpo abhijjhā byāpādo micchādiṭṭhīti kaṇhapakkhe dasavidho attho hoti. Tattha
atk-s0302a:563_2: pāṇassa atipāto pāṇātipāto, pāṇavadho pāṇaghātoti vuttaṃ hoti. Pāṇoti cettha vohārato
atk-s0302a:563_3: satto, paramatthato jīvitindriyaṃ. Tasmiṃ pana pāṇe pāṇasaññino jīvitindriyupacchedakaupakkamasamuṭṭhāpikā
atk-s0302a:563_4: kāyavacīdvārānaṃ aññataradvārappavattā vadhakacetanā pāṇātipāto. So guṇavirahitesu
atk-s0302a:563_5: tiracchānagatādīsu pāṇesu khuddake pāṇe appasāvajjo, mahāsarīre mahāsāvajjo. Kasmā?
atk-s0302a:563_6: Payogamahantatāya, payogasamattepi vatthumahantatāya. Guṇavantesu manussādīsu appaguṇe
atk-s0302a:563_7: appasāvajjo, mahāguṇe mahāsāvajjo. Sarīraguṇānaṃ pana samabhāve sati kilesānaṃ upakkamānañca
atk-s0302a:564_0: Tassa pañca sambhārā honti – pāṇo, pāṇasaññitā, vadhakacittaṃ, upakkamo, tena maraṇanti.
atk-s0302a:564_1: Cha payogā sāhatthiko, āṇattiko, nissaggiyo, thāvaro, vijjāmayo, iddhimayoti. Imasmiṃ
atk-s0302a:564_2: panatthe vitthāriyamāne atippapañco hoti, tasmā taṃ na vitthārayāma, aññañca evarūpaṃ.
atk-s0302a:564_3: Atthikehi pana samantapāsādikaṃ vinayaṭṭhakathaṃ oloketvā gahetabbo.
atk-s0302a:565_0: Adinnassa ādānaṃ adinnādānaṃ, parassaharaṇaṃ theyyaṃ corikāti vuttaṃ hoti. Tattha
atk-s0302a:565_1: adinnanti parapariggahitaṃ, yattha paro yathākāmakāritaṃ āpajjanto adaṇḍāraho anupavajjo
atk-s0302a:565_2: hoti. Tasmiṃ pana parapariggahite parapariggahitasaññino tadādāyakaupakkamasamuṭṭhāpikā
atk-s0302a:565_3: theyyacetanā adinnādānaṃ. Taṃ hīne parasantake appasāvajjaṃ, paṇīte mahāsāvajjaṃ.
atk-s0302a:565_4: Kasmā? Vatthupaṇītatāya. Vatthusamatte sati guṇādhikānaṃ santake vatthusmiṃ mahāsāvajjaṃ,
atk-s0302a:565_5: taṃ taṃ guṇādhikaṃ upādāya tato tato hīnaguṇassa santake vatthusmiṃ appasāvajjaṃ.
atk-s0302a:566_0: Tassa pañca sambhārā honti – parapariggahitaṃ, parapariggahitasaññitā, theyyacittaṃ,
atk-s0302a:566_1: upakkamo, tena haraṇanti. Cha payogā sāhatthikādayova. Te ca kho yathānurūpaṃ theyyāvahāro,
atk-s0302a:566_2: pasayhāvahāro, paṭicchannāvahāro, parikappāvahāro, kusāvahāroti imesaṃ avahārānaṃ
atk-s0302a:566_3: vasena pavattāti ayamettha saṅkhepo, vitthāro pana samantapāsādikāyaṃ vutto.
atk-s0302a:567_0: Kāmesumicchācāroti ettha pana kāmesūti methunasamācāresu. Micchācāroti ekantanindito
atk-s0302a:567_1: lāmakācāro. Lakkhaṇato pana asaddhammādhippāyena kāyadvārappavattā agamanīyaṭṭhānavītikkamacetanā
atk-s0302a:567_2: kāmesumicchācāro. Tattha agamanīyaṭṭhānaṃ nāma purisānaṃ tāva māturakkhitā piturakkhitā
atk-s0302a:567_3: mātāpiturakkhitā bhāturakkhitā bhaginirakkhitā ñātirakkhitā gottarakkhitā dhammarakkhitā
atk-s0302a:567_4: sārakkhā saparidaṇḍāti māturakkhitādayo dasa, dhanakkītā chandavāsinī bhogavāsinī
atk-s0302a:567_5: paṭavāsinī odapattakinī obhatacumbaṭā dāsī ca bhariyā ca kammakārī ca bhariyā ca
atk-s0302a:567_6: dhajāhaṭā muhuttikāti etā dhanakkītādayo dasāti vīsati itthiyo. Itthīsu pana dvinnaṃ
atk-s0302a:567_7: sārakkhasaparidaṇḍānaṃ, dasannañca dhanakkītādīnanti dvādasannaṃ itthīnaṃ aññe purisā.
atk-s0302a:567_8: Idaṃ agamanīyaṭṭhānaṃ nāma. So panesa micchācāro sīlādiguṇarahite agamanīyaṭṭhāne
atk-s0302a:567_9: appasāvajjo, sīlādiguṇasampanne mahāsāvajjo. Tassa cattāro sambhārā – agamanīyavatthu,
atk-s0302a:567_10: tasmiṃ sevanacittaṃ, sevanappayogo, maggenamaggapaṭipattiadhivāsananti. Eko payogo sāhatthiko eva.
atk-s0302a:568_0: Musāti visaṃvādanapurekkhārassa atthabhañjanako vacīpayogo kāyappayogo vā, visaṃvādanādhippāyena
atk-s0302a:568_1: panassa paravisaṃvādanakāyavacīpayogasamuṭṭhāpikā cetanā, musāvādo. Aparo nayo –
atk-s0302a:568_2: musāti abhūtaṃ atacchaṃ vatthu. Vādoti tassa bhūtato tacchato viññāpanaṃ. Lakkhaṇato
atk-s0302a:568_3: pana atathaṃ vatthuṃ tathato paraṃ viññāpetukāmassa tathāviññattisamuṭṭhāpikā cetanā
atk-s0302a:568_4: musāvādo. So yamatthaṃ bhañjati, tassa appatāya appasāvajjo, mahantatāya mahāsāvajjo.
atk-s0302a:568_5: Api ca gahaṭṭhānaṃ attano santakaṃ adātukāmatāya natthītiādinayappavatto appasāvajjo,
atk-s0302a:568_6: sakkhinā hutvā atthabhañjanatthaṃ vutto mahāsāvajjo. Pabbajitānaṃ appakampi telaṃ
atk-s0302a:568_7: vā sappiṃ vā labhitvā hasādhippāyena “ajja gāme telaṃ nadī maññe sandatī”ti pūraṇakathānayena
atk-s0302a:568_8: pavatto appasāvajjo, adiṭṭhaṃyeva pana “diṭṭha”ntiādinā nayena vadantānaṃ mahāsāvajjo.
atk-s0302a:568_9: Tassa cattāro sambhārā honti – atathaṃ vatthu, visaṃvādanacittaṃ, tajjo vāyāmo, parassa
atk-s0302a:568_10: tadatthavijānananti. Eko payogo sāhatthikova. So kāyena vā kāyapaṭibaddhena vā vācāya
atk-s0302a:568_11: vā paravisaṃvādakakiriyākaraṇe daṭṭhabbo. Tāya ce kiriyāya paro tamatthaṃ jānāti,
atk-s0302a:569_0: Pisuṇavācātiādīsu yāya vācāya, yassa taṃ vācaṃ bhāsati, tassa hadaye attano piyabhāvaṃ,
atk-s0302a:569_1: parassa ca suññabhāvaṃ karoti, sā pisuṇavācā. Yāya pana attānampi parampi pharusaṃ
atk-s0302a:569_2: karoti, yā vācā sayampi pharusā, neva kaṇṇasukhā na hadayaṅgamā, ayaṃ pharusavācā.
atk-s0302a:569_3: Yena pana samphaṃ palapati niratthakaṃ, so samphappalāpo. Tesaṃ mūlabhūtā cetanāpi
atk-s0302a:569_4: pisuṇavācādināmameva labhati. Sā eva ca idha adhippetāti.
atk-s0302a:570_0: Tattha saṃkiliṭṭhacittassa paresaṃ vā bhedāya, attano piyakamyatāya vā kāyavacīpayogasamuṭṭhāpikā
atk-s0302a:570_1: cetanā pisuṇavācā. Sā yassa bhedaṃ karoti, tassa appaguṇatāya appasāvajjā, mahāguṇatāya
atk-s0302a:570_2: mahāsāvajjā. Tassā cattāro sambhārā – bhinditabbo paro, iti ime nānā bhavissanti,
atk-s0302a:570_3: vinā bhavissantīti bhedapurekkhāratā, iti ahaṃ piyo bhavissāmi vissāsikoti piyakamyatā
atk-s0302a:571_1: Tassā āvibhāvatthamidaṃ vatthu – eko kira dārako mātu vacanaṃ anādiyitvā araññaṃ
atk-s0302a:571_2: gacchati. Mātā taṃ nivattetuṃ asakkontī, “caṇḍā taṃ mahiṃsī anubandhatū”ti akkosi.
atk-s0302a:571_3: Athassa tatheva araññe mahiṃsī uṭṭhāsi. Dārako, “yaṃ mama mātā mukhena kathesi, taṃ
atk-s0302a:571_4: mā hotu, yaṃ cittena cintesi, taṃ hotū”ti saccakiriyaṃ akāsi. Mahiṃsī tattheva baddhā
atk-s0302a:571_5: viya aṭṭhāsi. Evaṃ mammacchedakopi payogo cittasaṇhatāya pharusavācā na hoti. Mātāpitaro
atk-s0302a:571_6: hi kadāci puttake evaṃ vadanti – “corā vo khaṇḍākhaṇḍikaṃ karontū”ti, uppalapattampi
atk-s0302a:571_7: ca nesaṃ upari patantaṃ na icchanti. Ācariyupajjhāyā ca kadāci nissitake evaṃ vadanti
atk-s0302a:571_8: – “kiṃ ime ahirikā anottappino caranti, niddhamatha ne”ti. Atha ca nesaṃ āgamādhigamasampattiṃ
atk-s0302a:571_9: icchanti. Yathā ca cittasaṇhatāya pharusavācā na hoti, evaṃ vacanasaṇhatāya apharusavācāpi
atk-s0302a:571_10: na hoti. Na hi mārāpetukāmassa “imaṃ sukhaṃ sayāpethā”ti vacanaṃ apharusavācā hoti.
atk-s0302a:571_11: Cittapharusatāya panesā pharusavācāva. Sā yaṃ sandhāya pavattitā, tassa appaguṇatāya
atk-s0302a:571_12: appasāvajjā, mahāguṇatāya mahāsāvajjā. Tassā tayo sambhārā – akkositabbo paro, kupitacittaṃ, akkosanāti.
atk-s0302a:572_0: Anatthaviññāpikā kāyavacīpayogasamuṭṭhāpikā akusalacetanā samphappalāpo. So āsevanamandatāya
atk-s0302a:572_1: appasāvajjo, āsevanamahantatāya mahāsāvajjo. Tassa dve sambhārā – bhāratayuddha-sītāharaṇādi-niratthakakathā-purekkhāratā,
atk-s0302a:573_0: Abhijjhāyatīti abhijjhā. Parabhaṇḍābhimukhī hutvā tanninnatāya pavattatīti attho.
atk-s0302a:573_1: Sā “aho vatidaṃ mamassā”ti evaṃ parabhaṇḍābhijjhāyanalakkhaṇā adinnādānaṃ viya appasāvajjā
atk-s0302a:573_2: mahāsāvajjā ca. Tassā dve sambhārā parabhaṇḍaṃ attano pariṇāmanañca. Parabhaṇḍavatthuke
atk-s0302a:573_3: hi lobhe uppannepi na tāva kammapathabhedo hoti, yāva na “aho vatidaṃ mamassā”ti
atk-s0302a:574_0: Hitasukhaṃ byāpādayatīti, byāpādo. So paravināsāya manopadosalakkhaṇo. Pharusavācā
atk-s0302a:574_1: viya appasāvajjo mahāsāvajjo ca. Tassa dve sambhārā parasatto ca, tassa ca vināsacintā.
atk-s0302a:574_2: Parasattavatthuke hi kodhe uppannepi na tāva kammapathabhedo hoti, yāva na “aho vatāyaṃ
atk-s0302a:575_0: Yathābhuccagahaṇābhāvena micchā passatīti micchādiṭṭhi. Sā “natthi dinna”ntiādinā
atk-s0302a:575_1: nayena viparītadassanalakkhaṇā samphappalāpo viya appasāvajjā mahāsāvajjā ca. Api
atk-s0302a:575_2: ca aniyatā appasāvajjā, niyatā mahāsāvajjā. Tassā dve sambhārā – vatthuno ca gahitākāraviparītatā
atk-s0302a:575_3: yathā ca naṃ gaṇhāti, tathābhāvena tassā upaṭṭhānanti.
atk-s0302a:576_0: Imesaṃ pana dasannaṃ akusalakammapathānaṃ dhammato koṭṭhāsato ārammaṇato vedanāto
atk-s0302a:576_1: mūlatoti pañcahākārehi vinicchayo veditabbo. Tattha dhammatoti etesu hi paṭipāṭiyā
atk-s0302a:576_2: satta cetanādhammāva honti, abhijjhādayo tisso cetanāsampayuttā. Koṭṭhāsatoti paṭipāṭiyā
atk-s0302a:576_3: satta, micchādiṭṭhi cāti ime aṭṭha kammapathā eva honti, no mūlāni, abhijjhābyāpādā
atk-s0302a:576_4: kammapathā ceva mūlāni ca. Abhijjhā hi mūlaṃ patvā lobho akusalamūlaṃ hoti, byāpādo doso akusalamūlaṃ.
atk-s0302a:577_0: Ārammaṇatoti pāṇātipāto jīvitindriyārammaṇato saṅkhārārammaṇo hoti, adinnādānaṃ sattārammaṇaṃ
atk-s0302a:577_1: vā saṅkhārārammaṇaṃ vā, micchācāro phoṭṭhabbavasena saṅkhārārammaṇova, sattārammaṇotipi
atk-s0302a:577_2: eke. Musāvādo sattārammaṇo vā saṅkhārārammaṇo vā, tathā pisuṇavācā. Pharusavācā sattārammaṇāva.
atk-s0302a:577_3: Samphappalāpo diṭṭhasutamutaviññātavasena sattārammaṇo vā saṅkhārārammaṇo vā, tathā
atk-s0302a:577_4: abhijjhā. Byāpādo sattārammaṇova. Micchādiṭṭhi tebhūmakadhammavasena saṅkhārārammaṇā.
atk-s0302a:578_0: Vedanātoti pāṇātipāto dukkhavedano hoti. Kiñcāpi hi rājāno coraṃ disvā hasamānāpi
atk-s0302a:578_1: “gacchatha naṃ ghātethā”ti vadanti, sanniṭṭhāpakacetanā pana nesaṃ dukkhasampayuttāva
atk-s0302a:578_2: hoti. Adinnādānaṃ tivedanaṃ, micchācāro sukhamajjhattavasena dvivedano, sanniṭṭhāpakacitte
atk-s0302a:578_3: pana majjhattavedano na hoti. Musāvādo tivedano, tathā pisuṇavācā pharusavācā dukkhavedanā,
atk-s0302a:578_4: samphappalāpo tivedano, abhijjhā sukhamajjhattavasena dvivedanā, tathā micchādiṭṭhi.
atk-s0302a:579_0: Mūlatoti pāṇātipāto dosamohavasena dvimūlako hoti, adinnādānaṃ dosamohavasena vā
atk-s0302a:579_1: lobhamohavasena vā, micchācāro lobhamohavasena. Musāvādo dosamohavasena vā lobhamohavasena
atk-s0302a:579_2: vā, tathā pisuṇavācā samphappalāpo ca. Pharusavācā dosamohavasena, abhijjhā mohavasena
atk-s0302a:579_3: ekamūlā, tathā byāpādo. Micchādiṭṭhi lobhamohavasena dvimūlāti.
atk-s0302a:580_0: Pāṇātipātā paṭiviratātiādīsu pāṇātipātādayo vuttatthā eva. Yāya pana viratiyā ete
atk-s0302a:580_1: paṭiviratā nāma honti, sā bhedato tividhā hoti sampattavirati samādānavirati samucchedaviratīti.
atk-s0302a:580_3: amhākaṃ evarūpaṃ kātu”nti sampattaṃ vatthuṃ avītikkamantānaṃ uppajjamānā virati sampattaviratīti
atk-s0302a:580_4: veditabbā sīhaḷadīpe cakkanaupāsakassa viya. Tassa kira daharakāleyeva mātu rogo
atk-s0302a:580_5: uppajji. Vejjena ca “allasasakamaṃsaṃ laddhuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vuttaṃ. Tato cakkanassa
atk-s0302a:580_6: bhātā “gaccha tāta khettaṃ āhiṇḍāhī”ti cakkanaṃ pesesi. So tattha gato. Tasmiñca
atk-s0302a:580_7: samaye eko saso taruṇasassaṃ khādituṃ āgato hoti. So taṃ disvā vegena dhāvanto valliyā
atk-s0302a:580_8: baddho “kiri kirī”ti saddamakāsi. Cakkano tena saddena gantvā taṃ gahetvā cintesi
atk-s0302a:580_9: “mātu bhesajjaṃ karomī”ti. Puna cintesi – “na metaṃ patirūpaṃ, yvāhaṃ mātu jīvitakāraṇā
atk-s0302a:580_10: paraṃ jīvitā voropeyya”nti. Atha naṃ “gaccha araññe sasehi saddhiṃ tiṇodakaṃ paribhuñjā”ti
atk-s0302a:580_11: muñci. Bhātarā ca “kiṃ tāta saso laddho”ti? Pucchito taṃ pavattiṃ ācikkhi. Tato naṃ
atk-s0302a:580_12: bhātā paribhāsi. So mātu santikaṃ gantvā, “yatohaṃ jāto, nābhijānāmi sañcicca pāṇaṃ
atk-s0302a:580_13: jīvitā voropetā”ti saccaṃ vatvā aṭṭhāsi, tāvadeva cassa mātā arogā ahosi.
atk-s0302a:581_0: Samādinnasikkhāpadānaṃ pana sikkhāpadasamādāne ca tatuttari ca attano jīvitaṃ pariccajitvā
atk-s0302a:581_1: vatthuṃ avītikkamantānaṃ uppajjamānā virati samādānaviratīti veditabbā, uttaravaḍḍhamānapabbatavāsīupāsakassa
atk-s0302a:581_3: gahetvā khettaṃ kasati. Athassa goṇo naṭṭho, so taṃ gavesanto uttaravaḍḍhamānapabbataṃ
atk-s0302a:581_4: āruhi, tatra naṃ mahāsappo aggahesi. So cintesi – “imāya tikhiṇāya vāsiyā sīsaṃ chindāmī”ti.
atk-s0302a:581_5: Puna cintesi – “na metaṃ patirūpaṃ, yvāhaṃ bhāvanīyassa garuno santike sikkhāpadaṃ
atk-s0302a:581_6: gahetvā bhindeyya”nti. Evaṃ yāvatatiyaṃ cintetvā – “jīvitaṃ pariccajāmi, na sikkhāpada”nti
atk-s0302a:581_7: aṃse ṭhapitaṃ tikhiṇadaṇḍavāsiṃ araññe chaḍḍesi. Tāvadeva mahāvāḷo naṃ muñcitvā agamāsīti.
atk-s0302a:582: Ariyamaggasampayuttā pana virati samucchedaviratīti veditabbā, yassā uppattito pabhuti pāṇaṃ ghātessāmīti ariyapuggalānaṃ cittampi na uppajjatīti.
atk-s0302a:583_0: Yathā ca akusalānaṃ, evaṃ imesampi kusalakammapathānaṃ dhammato koṭṭhāsato ārammaṇato
atk-s0302a:583_1: vedanāto mūlatoti pañcahākārehi vinicchayo veditabbo. Tattha dhammatoti etesu hi
atk-s0302a:583_2: paṭipāṭiyā satta cetanāpi vaṭṭanti viratiyopi, ante tayo cetanāsampayuttāva.
atk-s0302a:584_0: Koṭṭhāsatoti paṭipāṭiyā satta kammapathā eva, na mūlāni, ante tayo kammapathā ceva
atk-s0302a:584_1: mūlāni ca. Anabhijjhā hi mūlaṃ patvā alobho kusalamūlaṃ hoti, abyāpādo adoso kusalamūlaṃ,
atk-s0302a:585_0: Ārammaṇatoti pāṇātipātādīnaṃ. Ārammaṇāneva etesaṃ ārammaṇāni. Vītikkamitabbavatthutoyeva
atk-s0302a:585_1: hi virati nāma hoti. Yathā pana nibbānārammaṇo ariyamaggo kilese pajahati, evaṃ jīvitindriyādiārammaṇāpete
atk-s0302a:586: Vedanātoti sabbe sukhavedanā vā honti majjhattavedanā vā. Kusalaṃ patvā hi dukkhavedanā nāma natthi.
atk-s0302a:587_0: Mūlatoti paṭipāṭiyā satta ñāṇasampayuttacittena viramantassa alobhaadosaamohavasena
atk-s0302a:587_1: timūlā honti, ñāṇavippayuttacittena viramantassa dvimūlā. Anabhijjhā ñāṇasampayuttacittena
atk-s0302a:587_2: viramantassa dvimūlā hoti, ñāṇavippayuttacittena ekamūlā. Alobho pana attanāva attano
atk-s0302a:587_3: mūlaṃ na hoti. Abyāpādepi eseva nayo. Sammādiṭṭhi alobhaadosavasena dvimūlāvāti. Tatiyādīni.
atk-s0302a:589: 112. Chaṭṭhaṃ aṭṭhamaggaṅgavasena bujjhanakānaṃ ajjhāsayavasena vuttaṃ. Chaṭṭhaṃ.
atk-s0302a:591_1: samannāgatāti attho. Micchāvimuttinoti aniyyānikavimuttino kusalavimuttīti gahetvā
atk-s0302a:591_2: ṭhitā. Sammāñāṇinoti sammāpaccavekkhaṇā. Sammāvimuttinoti niyyānikāya phalavimuttiyā
atk-s0302a:595_0: 114. Catutthavaggassa paṭhame pathavīdhātūti patiṭṭhādhātu. Āpodhātūti ābandhanadhātu.
atk-s0302a:595_1: Tejodhātūti paripācanadhātu. Vāyodhātūti vitthambhanadhātu. Ayamettha saṅkhepo, vitthārato
atk-s0302a:597_0: 115. Dutiye ayaṃ pathavīdhātuyā assādoti ayaṃ pathavīdhātunissayo assādo. Svāyaṃ
atk-s0302a:597_1: kāyaṃ abbhunnāmetvā udaraṃ pasāretvā, “idha me aṅgulaṃ pavesituṃ vāyamathā”ti vā
atk-s0302a:597_2: hatthaṃ pasāretvā, “imaṃ nāmetuṃ vāyamathā”ti vā vadati, evaṃ pavattānaṃ vasena veditabbo.
atk-s0302a:597_3: Aniccātiādīsu hutvā abhāvākārena aniccā, paṭipīḷanākārena dukkhā, sabhāvavigamākārena
atk-s0302a:597_4: vipariṇāmadhammā. Ayaṃ pathavīdhātuyā ādīnavoti yena ākārena sā aniccā dukkhā vipariṇāmadhammā,
atk-s0302a:597_5: ayamākāro pathavīdhātuyā ādīnavoti attho. Chandarāgavinayo chandarāgappahānanti nibbānaṃ
atk-s0302a:597_6: āgamma pathavīdhātuyā chandarāgo vinīyati ceva pahīyati ca, tasmā nibbānamassā nissaraṇaṃ.
atk-s0302a:598_0: Ayaṃ āpodhātuyā assādoti ayaṃ āpodhātunissayo assādo. Svāyaṃ aññaṃ āpodhātuyā upaddutaṃ
atk-s0302a:598_1: disvā, “kiṃ ayaṃ nipannakālato paṭṭhāya passāvaṭṭhānābhimukho nikkhamati ceva pavisati
atk-s0302a:598_2: ca, appamattakampissa kammaṃ karontassa sedatintaṃ vatthaṃ pīḷetabbatākāraṃ pāpuṇāti,
atk-s0302a:598_3: anumodanamattampi kathentassa tālavaṇṭaṃ gaṇhitabbaṃ hoti, mayaṃ pana sāyaṃ nipannā
atk-s0302a:598_4: pātova uṭṭhahāma, māsapuṇṇaghaṭo viya no sarīraṃ, mahākammaṃ karontānaṃ sedamattampi
atk-s0302a:598_5: no na uppajjati, asanisaddena viya dhammaṃ kathentānaṃ sarīre usumākāramattampi no
atk-s0302a:599_0: Ayaṃ tejodhātuyā assādoti ayaṃ tejodhātunissayo assādo. Svāyaṃ sītagahaṇike disvā,
atk-s0302a:599_1: “kiṃ ime kiñcideva yāgubhattakhajjamattaṃ ajjhoharitvā thaddhakucchino nisīditvā
atk-s0302a:599_2: sabbarattiṃ aṅgārakaṭāhaṃ pariyesanti, phusitamattesupi sarīre patitesu aṅgārakaṭāhaṃ
atk-s0302a:599_3: ottharitvā pārupitvāva nipajjanti? Mayaṃ pana atithaddhampi maṃsaṃ vā pūvaṃ vā khādāma,
atk-s0302a:599_4: kucchipūraṃ bhattaṃ bhuñjāma, tāvadeva no sabbaṃ pheṇapiṇḍo viya vilīyati, sattāhavaddalikāya
atk-s0302a:599_5: vattamānāya sarīre sītānudahanamattampi no natthī”ti evaṃ pavattānaṃ vasena veditabbo.
atk-s0302a:600_0: Ayaṃ vāyodhātuyā assādoti ayaṃ vāyodhātunissayo assādo. Svāyaṃ aññe vātabhīruke disvā,
atk-s0302a:600_1: “imesaṃ appamattakampi kammaṃ karontānaṃ anumodanamattampi kathentānaṃ sarīraṃ vāto
atk-s0302a:600_2: vijjhati, gāvutamattampi addhānaṃ gatānaṃ hatthapādā sīdanti, piṭṭhi rujjati, kucchivātasīsavātakaṇṇavātādīhi
atk-s0302a:600_3: niccupaddutā telaphāṇitādīni vātabhesajjāneva karontā atināmenti, amhākaṃ pana mahākammaṃ
atk-s0302a:600_4: karontānampi tiyāmarattiṃ dhammaṃ kathentānampi ekadivaseneva dasa yojanāni gacchantānampi
atk-s0302a:600_5: hatthapādasaṃsīdanamattaṃ vā piṭṭhirujjanamattaṃ vā na hotī”ti, evaṃ pavattānaṃ vasena
atk-s0302a:600_6: veditabbo. Evaṃ pavattā hi etā dhātuyo assādenti nāma.
atk-s0302a:601_0: Abbhaññāsinti abhivisiṭṭhena ñāṇena aññāsiṃ. Anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhinti uttaravirahitaṃ
atk-s0302a:601_1: sabbaseṭṭhaṃ sammā sāmañca bodhiṃ, atha vā pasatthaṃ sundarañca bodhiṃ. Bodhīti rukkhopi
atk-s0302a:601_3: “antarā ca bodhiṃ antarā ca gaya”nti ca āgataṭṭhānesu hi rukkho bodhīti vuccati.
atk-s0302a:601_4: “Bodhi vuccati catūsu maggesu ñāṇa”nti āgataṭṭhāne maggo. “Pappoti bodhiṃ varabhūrimedhaso”ti
atk-s0302a:601_5: āgataṭṭhāne sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ. “Patvāna bodhiṃ amataṃ asaṅkhata”nti āgataṭṭhāne nibbānaṃ.
atk-s0302a:602_0: Sāvakānaṃ arahattamaggo anuttarā bodhi hoti, na hotīti? Na hoti. Kasmā? Asabbaguṇadāyakattā.
atk-s0302a:602_1: Tesañhi kassaci arahattamaggo arahattaphalameva deti, kassaci tisso vijjā, kassaci
atk-s0302a:602_2: cha abhiññā, kassaci catasso paṭisambhidā, kassaci sāvakapāramīñāṇaṃ. Paccekabuddhānampi
atk-s0302a:602_3: paccekabodhiñāṇameva deti. Buddhānaṃ pana sabbaguṇasampattiṃ deti abhiseko viya rañño
atk-s0302a:602_4: sabbalokissariyabhāvaṃ. Tasmā aññassa kassacipi anuttarā bodhi na hoti.
atk-s0302a:603_0: Abhisambuddhoti paccaññāsinti “abhisambuddho ahaṃ patto paṭivijjhitvā ṭhito”ti evaṃ
atk-s0302a:603_1: paṭijāniṃ. Ñāṇañca pana me dassanaṃ udapādīti adhigataguṇadassanasamatthaṃ paccavekkhaṇañāṇañca
atk-s0302a:603_2: me udapādi. Akuppā me vimuttīti “ayaṃ mayhaṃ arahattaphalavimutti akuppā”ti evaṃ
atk-s0302a:603_3: ñāṇaṃ udapādi. Tattha dvīhākārehi akuppatā veditabbā kāraṇato ca ārammaṇato ca. Sā
atk-s0302a:603_4: hi catūhi maggehi samucchinnakilesānaṃ puna anivattanatāya kāraṇatopi akuppā, akuppadhammaṃ
atk-s0302a:603_5: nibbānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā pavattatāya ārammaṇatopi akuppā. Antimāti pacchimā. Natthi
atk-s0302a:603_6: dāni punabbhavoti idāni puna añño bhavo nāma natthīti.
atk-s0302a:604_0: Imasmiṃ sutte cattāri saccāni kathitāni. Kathaṃ? Catūsu hi dhātūsu assādo samudayasaccaṃ,
atk-s0302a:604_1: ādīnavo dukkhasaccaṃ, nissaraṇaṃ nirodhasaccaṃ, nirodhappajānano maggo maggasaccaṃ.
atk-s0302a:604_2: Vitthāravasenapi kathetuṃ vaṭṭatiyeva. Ettha hi yaṃ pathavīdhātuṃ paṭicca uppajjati
atk-s0302a:604_3: sukhaṃ somanassaṃ, ayaṃ pathavīdhātuyā assādoti pahānapaṭivedho samudayasaccaṃ. Yā
atk-s0302a:604_4: pathavīdhātu aniccā dukkhā vipariṇāmadhammā, ayaṃ pathavīdhātuyā, ādīnavoti pariññāpaṭivedho
atk-s0302a:604_5: dukkhasaccaṃ. Yo pathavīdhātuyā chandarāgavinayo chandarāgappahānaṃ, idaṃ pathavīdhātuyā
atk-s0302a:604_6: nissaraṇanti sacchikiriyāpaṭivedho nirodhasaccaṃ. Yā imesu tīsu ṭhānesu diṭṭhi saṅkappo
atk-s0302a:604_7: vācā kammanto ājīvo vāyāmo sati samādhi, ayaṃ bhāvanāpaṭivedho maggasaccanti. Dutiyaṃ.
atk-s0302a:606: 116. Tatiye acarinti ñāṇacārena acariṃ, anubhavanacārenāti attho. Yāvatāti yattako. Tatiyaṃ.
atk-s0302a:608_0: 117. Catutthe nissaṭātiādīni ādito vuttapaṭisedhena yojetvā “na nissaṭā, na visaṃyuttā,
atk-s0302a:608_1: na vippamuttā, na vimariyādikatena cetasā vihariṃsū”ti evaṃ veditabbāni. Dutiyanaye
atk-s0302a:608_2: vimariyādikatenāti nimmariyādikatena. Tattha duvidhā mariyādā kilesamariyādā vaṭṭamariyādāti.
atk-s0302a:608_3: Tattha ca yassa upaḍḍhā kilesā pahīnā, upaḍḍhā appahīnā, vaṭṭaṃ vā pana upaḍḍhaṃ
atk-s0302a:608_4: pahīnaṃ, upaḍḍhaṃ appahīnaṃ, tassa cittaṃ pahīnakilese vā vaṭṭaṃ vā sandhāya vimariyādikataṃ,
atk-s0302a:608_5: appahīnakilese vā vaṭṭaṃ vā sandhāya na vimariyādikataṃ. Idha pana ubhayassāpi pahīnattā
atk-s0302a:608_6: “vimariyādikatena cetasā”ti vuttaṃ, mariyādaṃ akatvā ṭhitena atikkantamariyādena
atk-s0302a:608_7: cetasāti attho. Iti tīsupi imesu suttesu catusaccameva kathitaṃ. Catutthaṃ.
atk-s0302a:610_0: 118. Pañcame ekantadukkhāti atikkamitvā ṭhitassa tattakāro viya ekanteneva dukkhā.
atk-s0302a:610_1: Dukkhānupatitāti dukkhena anupatitā. Dukkhāvakkantāti dukkhena okkantā otiṇṇā. Sukhāti
atk-s0302a:610_2: sukhavedanāya paccayabhūtā. Evaṃ sabbattha attho veditabbo. Imasmiṃ sutte dukkhalakkhaṇaṃ kathitaṃ. Pañcamaṃ.
atk-s0302a:612: 119-123. Chaṭṭhasattamesu vivaṭṭaṃ, avasāne tīsu catusaccamevāti. Chaṭṭhādīni.
atk-s0302a:618_0: 124. Anamataggasaṃyuttassa paṭhame anamataggoti anu amataggo, vassasataṃ vassasahassaṃ
atk-s0302a:618_1: ñāṇena anugantvāpi amataggo aviditaggo, nāssa sakkā ito vā etto vā aggaṃ jānituṃ,
atk-s0302a:618_2: aparicchinnapubbāparakoṭikoti attho. Saṃsāroti khandhādīnaṃ avicchinnappavattā paṭipāṭi.
atk-s0302a:618_3: Pubbā koṭi na paññāyatīti purimamariyādā na dissati. Yadaggena cassa purimā koṭi
atk-s0302a:618_4: na paññāyati, pacchimāpi tadaggeneva na paññāyati, vemajjheyeva pana sattā saṃsaranti.
atk-s0302a:618_5: Pariyādānaṃ gaccheyyāti idaṃ upamāya khuddakattā vuttaṃ. Bāhirasamayasmiñhi attho
atk-s0302a:618_6: paritto hoti, upamā mahatī. “Hatthī viya ayaṃ goṇo, goṇo viya sūkaro, samuddo viya
atk-s0302a:618_7: taḷāka”nti hi vutte na tesaṃ tādisaṃ pamāṇaṃ hoti. Buddhasamaye pana upamā parittā,
atk-s0302a:618_8: attho mahā. Pāḷiyañhi eko jambudīpo gahito, evarūpānaṃ pana jambudīpānaṃ satepi sahassepi
atk-s0302a:618_9: satasahassepi tiṇādīni tena upakkamena pariyādānaṃ gaccheyyuṃ, na tveva purisassa
atk-s0302a:618_10: mātu mātaroti. Dukkhaṃ paccanubhūtanti tumhehi dukkhaṃ anubhūtaṃ. Tibbanti tasseva
atk-s0302a:618_11: vevacanaṃ. Byasananti ñātibyasanādianekavidhaṃ. Kaṭasīti susānaṃ, pathavīyeva vā.
atk-s0302a:618_12: Sā hi punappunaṃ marantehi sarīranikkhepena vaḍḍhitā. Alamevāti yuttameva. Paṭhamaṃ.
atk-s0302a:620: 125. Dutiye mahāpathavinti cakkavāḷapariyantaṃ mahāpathaviṃ. Nikkhipeyyāti taṃ pathaviṃ bhinditvā vuttappamāṇaṃ guḷikaṃ karitvā ekamantaṃ ṭhapeyya. Dutiyaṃ.
atk-s0302a:622_0: 126. Tatiye kandantānanti sasaddaṃ rudamānānaṃ. Passannanti sanditaṃ pavattaṃ. Catūsu
atk-s0302a:622_1: mahāsamuddesūti sinerurasmīhi paricchinnesu catūsu mahāsamuddesu. Sinerussa hi pācīnapassaṃ
atk-s0302a:622_2: rajatamayaṃ, dakkhiṇapassaṃ maṇimayaṃ, pacchimapassaṃ phalikamayaṃ, uttarapassaṃ
atk-s0302a:622_3: suvaṇṇamayaṃ. Pubbadakkhiṇapassehi nikkhantā rajatamaṇirasmiyo ekato hutvā mahāsamuddapiṭṭhena
atk-s0302a:622_4: gantvā cakkavāḷapabbataṃ āhacca tiṭṭhanti, dakkhiṇapacchimapassehi nikkhantā maṇiphalikarasmiyo,
atk-s0302a:622_6: suvaṇṇarajatarasmiyo ekato hutvā mahāsamuddapiṭṭhena gantvā cakkavāḷapabbataṃ āhacca
atk-s0302a:622_7: tiṭṭhanti. Tāsaṃ rasmīnaṃ antaresu cattāro mahāsamuddā honti. Te sandhāya vuttaṃ
atk-s0302a:622_8: “catūsu mahāsamuddesū”ti. Ñātibyasanantiādīsu byasananti viasanaṃ, vināsoti attho.
atk-s0302a:622_9: Ñātīnaṃ byasanaṃ ñātibyasanaṃ, bhogānaṃ byasanaṃ bhogabyasanaṃ. Rogo pana sayameva
atk-s0302a:622_10: ārogyaṃ viyasati vināsetīti byasanaṃ, rogova byasanaṃ rogabyasanaṃ. Tatiyaṃ.
atk-s0302a:624_0: 127. Catutthe mātuthaññanti ekanāmikāya manussamātu khīraṃ. Imesañhi sattānaṃ gaṇḍuppādakipillikādīsu
atk-s0302a:624_1: vā macchakacchapādīsu vā pakkhijātesu vā nibbattakāle mātukhīrameva natthi, ajapasumahiṃsādīsu
atk-s0302a:624_2: nibbattakāle khīraṃ atthi, tathā manussesu. Tattha ajādikāle ca manussesu cāpi “devī
atk-s0302a:624_3: sumanā tissā”ti evaṃ nānānāmikānaṃ kucchiyaṃ nibbattakāle aggahetvā tissāti ekanāmikāya
atk-s0302a:624_4: eva mātu kucchiyaṃ nibbattakāle pītaṃ thaññaṃ catūsu mahāsamuddesu udakato bahutaranti
atk-s0302a:626_0: 128. Pañcame sakkā pana, bhanteti so kira bhikkhu cintesi – “satthā anamataggassa
atk-s0302a:626_1: saṃsārassa dīghatamattā ‘na sukaraṃ na sukara’nti kathetiyeva, kathaṃ nacchindati,
atk-s0302a:626_2: sakkā nu kho upamaṃ kārāpetu”nti. Tasmā evamāha. Kāsikenāti tayo kappāsaṃsū ekato
atk-s0302a:626_3: gahetvā kantitasuttamayena atisukhumavatthena. Tena pana parimaṭṭhe kittakaṃ khīyeyyāti.
atk-s0302a:628: 129. Chaṭṭhe āyasaṃ nagaranti āyasena pākārena parikkhittaṃ nagaraṃ, na pana anto āyasehi ekabhūmikādipāsādehi ākiṇṇanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Chaṭṭhaṃ.
atk-s0302a:630_0: 130. Sattame anussareyyunti ekena kappasatasahasse anussarite aparo tassa ṭhitaṭṭhānato
atk-s0302a:630_1: aññaṃ satasahassaṃ, aññopi aññanti evaṃ cattāropi cattārisatasahassāni anussareyyuṃ. Sattamaṃ.
atk-s0302a:632: 131-132. Aṭṭhame yā etasmiṃ antare vālikāti yā etasmiṃ āyāmato pañcayojanasatike antare vālikā. Navame vattabbaṃ natthi. Aṭṭhamanavamāni.
atk-s0302a:634_0: 133. Dasame aṭṭhikaṅkalotiādīni tīṇipi rāsivevacanāneva. Imesaṃ pana sattānaṃ saaṭṭhikālato
atk-s0302a:634_1: anaṭṭhikālova bahutaro. Gaṇḍuppādakādipāṇabhūtānañhi etesaṃ aṭṭhimeva natthi, macchakacchapādibhūtānaṃ
atk-s0302a:634_2: pana aṭṭhimeva bahutaraṃ, tasmā anaṭṭhikālañca bahuaṭṭhikālañca aggahetvā samaṭṭhikālova
atk-s0302a:634_3: gahetabbo. Uttaro gijjhakūṭassāti gijjhakūṭassa uttarapasse ṭhito. Magadhānaṃ giribbajeti
atk-s0302a:634_4: magadharaṭṭhassa giribbaje, giriparikkhepe ṭhitoti attho. Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānamevāti. Dasamaṃ.
atk-s0302a:638: 134. Dutiyavaggassa paṭhame duggatanti daliddaṃ kapaṇaṃ. Durūpetanti dussaṇṭhānehi hatthapādehi upetaṃ. Paṭhamaṃ.
atk-s0302a:640: 135. Dutiye sukhitanti sukhasamappitaṃ mahaddhanaṃ mahābhogaṃ. Susajjitanti alaṅkatapaṭiyattaṃ hatthikkhandhagataṃ mahāparivāraṃ. Dutiyaṃ.
atk-s0302a:642_0: 136. Tatiye pāveyyakāti pāveyyadesavāsino. Sabbe āraññikātiādīsu dhutaṅgasamādānavasena
atk-s0302a:642_1: tesaṃ āraññikādibhāvo veditabbo. Sabbe sasaṃyojanāti sabbe sabandhanā, keci sotāpannā,
atk-s0302a:642_2: keci sakadāgāmino, keci anāgāmino. Tesu hi puthujjano vā khīṇāsavo vā natthi. Gunnantiādīsu
atk-s0302a:642_3: setakāḷādivaṇṇesu ekekavaṇṇakālova gahetabbo. Pāripanthakāti paripanthe tiṭṭhanakā
atk-s0302a:644_0: 137-142. Catutthādīsu liṅganiyamena ceva cakkavāḷaniyamena ca attho veditabbo. Purisānañhi
atk-s0302a:644_1: mātugāmakālo, mātugāmānañca purisakāloti evamettha liṅganiyamo. Imamhā cakkavāḷā
atk-s0302a:644_2: sattā paracakkavāḷaṃ, paracakkavāḷā ca imaṃ cakkavāḷaṃ saṃsaranti. Tesu imasmiṃ cakkavāḷe
atk-s0302a:644_3: mātugāmakāle mātubhūtaññeva dassento yo namātābhūtapubboti āha. Yo napitābhūtapubbotiādīsupi
atk-s0302a:646_0: 143. Dasame bhūtapubbanti atītakāle ekaṃ apadānaṃ āharitvā dasseti. Samaññā udapādīti
atk-s0302a:646_1: paññatti ahosi. Catūhena ārohantīti idaṃ thāmamajjhime sandhāya vuttaṃ. Agganti uttamaṃ.
atk-s0302a:646_2: Bhaddayuganti sundarayugalaṃ. Tīhena ārohantīti ettāvatā kira dvinnaṃ buddhānaṃ antare
atk-s0302a:646_3: yojanaṃ pathavī ussannā, so pabbato tiyojanubbedho jāto.
atk-s0302a:647_0: Appaṃ vā bhiyyoti vassasatato uttariṃ appaṃ dasa vā vīsaṃ vā vassāni. Puna vassasatameva
atk-s0302a:647_1: jīvanako nāma natthi, uttamakoṭiyā pana saṭṭhi vā asīti vā vassāni jīvanti. Vassasataṃ
atk-s0302a:647_2: pana appatvā pañcavassadasavassādikāle mīyamānāva bahukā. Ettha ca kakusandho bhagavā
atk-s0302a:647_4: anupubbena parihīnasadisaṃ kataṃ, na pana evaṃ parihīnaṃ, vaḍḍhitvā vaḍḍhitvā parihīnanti
atk-s0302a:647_5: veditabbaṃ. Kathaṃ? Kakusandho tāva bhagavā imasmiṃyeva kappe cattālīsavassasahassāyukakāle
atk-s0302a:647_6: nibbatto āyuppamāṇaṃ pañca koṭṭhāse katvā cattāro ṭhatvā pañcame vijjamāneyeva parinibbuto.
atk-s0302a:647_7: Taṃ āyu parihāyamānaṃ dasavassakālaṃ patvā puna vaḍḍhamānaṃ asaṅkheyyaṃ hutvā tato
atk-s0302a:647_8: parihāyamānaṃ tiṃsavassasahassāyukakāle ṭhitaṃ, tadā koṇāgamano nibbatto. Tasmimpi
atk-s0302a:647_9: tatheva parinibbute taṃ āyu dasavassakālaṃ patvā puna vaḍḍhamānaṃ asaṅkheyyaṃ hutvā
atk-s0302a:647_10: parihāyitvā vīsavassasahassakāle ṭhitaṃ, tadā kassapo bhagavā nibbatto. Tasmimpi
atk-s0302a:647_11: tatheva parinibbute taṃ āyu dasavassakālaṃ patvā puna vaḍḍhamānaṃ asaṅkheyyaṃ hutvā
atk-s0302a:647_12: parihāyitvā vassasatakālaṃ pattaṃ, atha amhākaṃ sammāsambuddho nibbatto. Evaṃ anupubbena
atk-s0302a:647_13: parihāyitvā vaḍḍhitvā vaḍḍhitvā parihīnanti veditabbaṃ. Tattha ca yaṃ āyuparimāṇesu
atk-s0302a:647_14: mandesu buddhā nibbattanti, tesampi tadeva āyuparimāṇaṃ hotīti. Dasamaṃ.
atk-s0302a:652_0: 144. Kassapasaṃyuttassa paṭhame santuṭṭhāyanti santuṭṭho ayaṃ. Itarītarenāti na thūlasukhumalūkhapaṇītathirajiṇṇānaṃ
atk-s0302a:652_1: yena kenaci, atha kho yathāladdhādīnaṃ itarītarena yena kenaci santuṭṭhoti attho.
atk-s0302a:652_2: Cīvarasmiñhi tayo santosā yathālābhasantoso yathābalasantoso yathāsāruppasantosoti.
atk-s0302a:653_0: Tesaṃ ayaṃ pabhedasaṃvaṇṇanā – idha bhikkhu cīvaraṃ labhati sundaraṃ vā asundaraṃ
atk-s0302a:653_1: vā, so teneva yāpeti, aññaṃ na pattheti, labhantopi na gaṇhāti. Ayamassa cīvare yathālābhasantoso.
atk-s0302a:653_2: Atha pana pakatidubbalo vā hoti ābādhajarābhibhūto vā, garucīvaraṃ pārupanto kilamati,
atk-s0302a:653_3: so sabhāgena bhikkhunā saddhiṃ taṃ parivattetvā lahukena yāpentopi santuṭṭhova hoti.
atk-s0302a:653_4: Ayamassa cīvare yathābalasantoso. Aparo paṇītapaccayalābhī hoti, so paṭṭacīvarādīnaṃ
atk-s0302a:653_5: aññataraṃ mahagghacīvaraṃ bahūni vā cīvarāni labhitvā – “idaṃ therānaṃ cirapabbajitānaṃ,
atk-s0302a:653_6: idaṃ bahussutānaṃ anurūpaṃ, idaṃ gilānānaṃ, idaṃ appalābhīnaṃ hotū”ti datvā tesaṃ
atk-s0302a:653_7: purāṇacīvaraṃ vā saṅkārakūṭādito vā pana nantakāni uccinitvā tehi saṅghāṭiṃ katvā
atk-s0302a:653_8: dhārentopi santuṭṭhova hoti. Ayamassa cīvare yathāsāruppasantoso.
atk-s0302a:654_0: Idha pana bhikkhu piṇḍapātaṃ labhati lūkhaṃ vā paṇītaṃ vā, so teneva yāpeti, aññaṃ
atk-s0302a:654_1: na pattheti, labhantopi na gaṇhāti. Ayamassa piṇḍapāte yathālābha santoso. Yo pana
atk-s0302a:654_2: attano pakativiruddhaṃ vā byādhiviruddhaṃ vā piṇḍapātaṃ labhati, yenassa paribhuttena
atk-s0302a:654_3: aphāsu hoti, so sabhāgassa bhikkhuno taṃ datvā tassa hatthato sappāyabhojanaṃ bhutvā
atk-s0302a:654_4: samaṇadhammaṃ karontopi santuṭṭhova hoti. Ayamassa piṇḍapāte yathābalasantoso. Aparo
atk-s0302a:654_5: bahuṃ paṇītaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ labhati, so taṃ cīvaraṃ viya cirapabbajita-bahussuta-appalābhagilānānaṃ
atk-s0302a:654_6: datvā, tesaṃ vā sesakaṃ piṇḍāya vā caritvā missakāhāraṃ bhuñjantopi santuṭṭhova hoti.
atk-s0302a:655_0: Idha pana bhikkhu senāsanaṃ labhati manāpaṃ vā amanāpaṃ vā, so tena neva somanassaṃ
atk-s0302a:655_1: na paṭighaṃ uppādeti, antamaso tiṇasanthārakenāpi yathāladdheneva tussati. Ayamassa
atk-s0302a:655_2: senāsane yathālābhasantoso. Yo pana attano pakativiruddhaṃ vā byādhiviruddhaṃ vā
atk-s0302a:655_3: senāsanaṃ labhati, yatthassa vasato aphāsu hoti, so taṃ sabhāgassa bhikkhuno datvā
atk-s0302a:655_4: tassa santake sappāyasenāsane vasantopi santuṭṭhova hoti. Ayamassa senāsane yathābalasantoso.
atk-s0302a:655_5: Aparo mahāpuñño leṇamaṇḍapakūṭāgārādīni bahūni paṇītasenāsanāni labhati, so tāni
atk-s0302a:655_6: cīvarādīni viya cirapabbajitabahussutaappalābhagilānānaṃ datvā yattha katthaci vasantopi
atk-s0302a:655_7: santuṭṭhova hoti. Ayamassa senāsane yathāsāruppasantoso. Yopi “uttamasenāsanaṃ nāma
atk-s0302a:655_8: pamādaṭṭhānaṃ, tattha nisinnassa thinamiddhaṃ okkamati, niddābhibhūtassa paṭibujjhato
atk-s0302a:655_9: pāpavitakkā pātubhavantī”ti paṭisañcikkhitvā tādisaṃ senāsanaṃ pattampi na sampaṭicchati,
atk-s0302a:655_10: so taṃ paṭikkhipitvā abbhokāsarukkhamūlādīsu vasanto santuṭṭhova hoti. Ayampi senāsane
atk-s0302a:656_0: Idha pana bhikkhu bhesajjaṃ labhati lūkhaṃ vā paṇītaṃ vā, so yaṃ labhati teneva tussati,
atk-s0302a:656_1: aññaṃ na pattheti, labhantopi na gaṇhāti. Ayamassa gilānapaccaye yathālābhasantoso.
atk-s0302a:656_2: Yo pana telenatthiko phāṇitaṃ labhati, so taṃ sabhāgassa bhikkhuno datvā tassa hatthato
atk-s0302a:656_3: telaṃ gahetvā vā aññadeva vā pariyesitvā bhesajjaṃ karontopi santuṭṭhova hoti. Ayamassa
atk-s0302a:656_4: gilānapaccaye yathābalasantoso. Aparo mahāpuñño bahuṃ telamadhuphāṇitādipaṇītabhesajjaṃ
atk-s0302a:656_5: labhati, so taṃ cīvaraṃ viya cirapabbajita-bahussuta-appalābhagilānānaṃ datvā tesaṃ
atk-s0302a:656_6: ābhatena yena kenaci yāpentopi santuṭṭhova hoti. Yo pana ekasmiṃ bhājane muttaharītakaṃ
atk-s0302a:656_7: ṭhapetvā ekasmiṃ catumadhuraṃ “gaṇha, bhante, yadicchasī”ti vuccamāno sacassa tesu
atk-s0302a:656_8: aññatarenapi rogo vūpasammati, atha “muttaharītakaṃ nāma buddhādīhi vaṇṇita”nti catumadhuraṃ
atk-s0302a:656_9: paṭikkhipitvā muttaharītakena bhesajjaṃ karonto paramasantuṭṭhova hoti. Ayamassa
atk-s0302a:656_10: gilānapaccaye yathāsāruppasantoso. Iti ime tayo santose sandhāya “santuṭṭhāyaṃ, bhikkhave,
atk-s0302a:657_0: Vaṇṇavādīti eko santuṭṭho hoti, santosassa vaṇṇaṃ na katheti. Eko na santuṭṭho hoti,
atk-s0302a:657_1: santosassa vaṇṇaṃ katheti. Eko neva santuṭṭho hoti, na santosassa vaṇṇaṃ katheti.
atk-s0302a:657_2: Eko santuṭṭho ca hoti, santosassa ca vaṇṇaṃ katheti. Ayaṃ tādisoti dassetuṃ itarītaracīvarasantuṭṭhiyā
atk-s0302a:657_3: ca vaṇṇavādīti vuttaṃ. Anesananti dūteyyapahiṇagamanānuyogappabhedaṃ nānappakāraṃ
atk-s0302a:657_4: anesanaṃ. Aladdhāti alabhitvā. Yathā ca ekacco “kathaṃ nu kho cīvaraṃ labhissāmī”ti
atk-s0302a:657_5: puññavantehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ ekato hutvā kohaññaṃ karonto uttasati paritassati,
atk-s0302a:657_6: ayaṃ evaṃ aladdhā ca cīvaraṃ na paritassati. Laddhā cāti dhammena samena labhitvā.
atk-s0302a:657_7: Agadhitoti vigatalobhagedho. Amucchitoti adhimattataṇhāya mucchaṃ anāpanno. Anajjhāpannoti
atk-s0302a:657_8: taṇhāya anotthaṭo apariyonaddho. Ādīnavadassāvīti anesanāpattiyañca gadhitaparibhoge
atk-s0302a:657_9: ca ādīnavaṃ passamāno. Nissaraṇapaññoti, “yāvadeva sītassa paṭighātāyā”ti vuttanissaraṇameva
atk-s0302a:657_10: jānanto paribhuñjatīti attho. Itarītarena piṇḍapātenātiādīsupi yathāladdhādīnaṃ yena
atk-s0302a:657_11: kenaci piṇḍapātena, yena kenaci senāsanena, yena kenaci gilānapaccayabhesajjaparikkhārenāti
atk-s0302a:658_0: Kassapena vā hi vo, bhikkhave, ovadissāmīti ettha yathā mahākassapatthero catūsu
atk-s0302a:658_1: paccayesu tīhi santosehi santuṭṭho, tumhepi tathārūpā bhavathāti ovadanto kassapena
atk-s0302a:658_2: ovadati nāma. Yo vā panassa kassapasadisoti etthāpi yo vā panaññopi kassapasadiso
atk-s0302a:658_3: mahākassapatthero viya catūsu paccayesu tīhi santosehi santuṭṭho bhaveyya, tumhepi
atk-s0302a:658_4: tathārūpā bhavathāti ovadanto kassapasadisena ovadati nāma. Tathattāya paṭipajjitabbanti
atk-s0302a:658_6: nāma bhāro, amhākampi imaṃ paṭipattiṃ paripūraṃ katvā pūraṇaṃ bhāroyeva, āgato kho
atk-s0302a:658_7: pana bhāro gahetabbo”ti cintetvā yathā mayā kathitaṃ, tathattāya tathābhāvāya tumhehipi
atk-s0302a:660_0: 145. Dutiye anātāpīti yaṃ vīriyaṃ kilese ātapati, tena rahito. Anottappīti nibbhayo
atk-s0302a:660_1: kilesuppattito kusalānuppattito ca bhayarahito. Sambodhāyāti sambujjhanatthāya. Nibbānāyāti
atk-s0302a:660_2: nibbānasacchikiriyāya. Anuttarassa yogakkhemassāti arahattassa tañhi anuttarañceva
atk-s0302a:661_0: Anuppannātiādīsu ye pubbe appaṭiladdhapubbaṃ cīvarādiṃ vā paccayaṃ upaṭṭhākasaddhivihārika-antevāsīnaṃ
atk-s0302a:661_1: vā aññatarato manuññavatthuṃ paṭilabhitvā taṃ subhaṃ sukhanti ayoniso gaṇhantassa
atk-s0302a:661_2: aññataraṃ vā pana ananubhūtapubbaṃ ārammaṇaṃ yathā tathā vā ayoniso āvajjentassa
atk-s0302a:661_3: lobhādayo pāpakā akusalā dhammā uppajjanti, te anuppannāti veditabbā. Aññathā hi
atk-s0302a:661_4: anamatagge saṃsāre anuppannā nāma pāpakā dhammā natthi. Anubhūtapubbepi ca vatthumhi
atk-s0302a:661_5: ārammaṇe vā yassa pakatibuddhiyā vā uddesaparipucchāya vā pariyattinavakammayonisomanasikārānaṃ
atk-s0302a:661_6: vā aññataravasena pubbe anuppajjitvā pacchā tādisena paccayena sahasā uppajjanti,
atk-s0302a:661_7: imepi “anuppannā uppajjamānā anatthāya saṃvatteyyu”nti veditabbā. Tesuyeva pana vatthārammaṇesu
atk-s0302a:661_8: punappunaṃ uppajjamānā nappahīyanti nāma, te “uppannā appahīyamānā anatthāya saṃvatteyyu”nti
atk-s0302a:661_9: veditabbā. Ayamettha saṅkhepo, vitthārato pana uppannānuppannabhedo ca pahānappahānavidhānañca
atk-s0302a:662_0: Anuppannā me kusalā dhammāti appaṭiladdhāpi sīlasamādhimaggaphalasaṅkhātā anavajjadhammā.
atk-s0302a:662_1: Uppannāti teyeva paṭiladdhā. Nirujjhamānā anatthāya saṃvatteyyunti te sīlādidhammā
atk-s0302a:662_2: parihānivasena puna anuppattiyā nirujjhamānā anatthāya saṃvatteyyunti veditabbā.
atk-s0302a:662_3: Ettha ca lokiyā parihāyanti, lokuttarānaṃ parihāni natthīti. “Uppannānaṃ kusalānaṃ
atk-s0302a:662_4: dhammānaṃ ṭhitiyā”ti imassa pana sammappadhānassa vasenāyaṃ desanā katā. Dutiyamaggo
atk-s0302a:662_5: vā sīghaṃ anuppajjamāno, paṭhamamaggo nirujjhamāno anatthāya saṃvatteyyāti evampettha
atk-s0302a:662_6: attho daṭṭhabbo. Iti imasmiṃ sutte ime cattāro sammappadhānā pubbabhāgavipassanāvasena kathitāti. Dutiyaṃ.
atk-s0302a:664_0: 146. Tatiye candūpamāti candasadisā hutvā. Kiṃ parimaṇḍalatāya? No, apica kho yathā
atk-s0302a:664_1: cando gaganatalaṃ pakkhandamāno na kenaci saddhiṃ santhavaṃ vā sinehaṃ vā ālayaṃ
atk-s0302a:664_2: vā nikantiṃ vā patthanaṃ vā pariyuṭṭhānaṃ vā karoti, na ca na hoti mahājanassa piyo
atk-s0302a:664_3: manāpo, tumhepi evaṃ kenaci saddhiṃ santhavādīnaṃ akaraṇena bahujanassa piyā manāpā
atk-s0302a:664_4: candūpamā hutvā khattiyakulādīni cattāri kulāni upasaṅkamathāti attho. Apica yathā
atk-s0302a:664_5: cando andhakāraṃ vidhamati, ālokaṃ pharati, evaṃ kilesandhakāravidhamanena ñāṇālokapharaṇena
atk-s0302a:664_6: cāpi candūpamā hutvāti evamādīhipi nayehi ettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0302a:665_0: Apakasseva kāyaṃ apakassa cittanti teneva santhavādīnaṃ akaraṇena kāyañca cittañca
atk-s0302a:665_1: apakassitvā, apanetvāti attho. Yo hi bhikkhu araññepi na vasati, kāmavitakkādayopi
atk-s0302a:665_2: vitakketi, ayaṃ neva kāyaṃ apakassati, na cittaṃ. Yo hi araññepi kho viharati, kāmavitakkādayo
atk-s0302a:665_3: pana vitakketi, ayaṃ kāyameva apakassati, na cittaṃ. Yo gāmante vasati, kāmavitakkādayopi
atk-s0302a:665_4: kho na ca vitakketi, ayaṃ cittameva apakassati, na kāyaṃ. Yo pana araññe ceva vasati,
atk-s0302a:665_5: kāmavitakkādayo ca na vitakketi, ayaṃ ubhayampi apakassati. Evarūpā hutvā kulāni
atk-s0302a:665_6: upasaṅkamathāti dīpento “apakasseva kāyaṃ apakassa citta”nti āha.
atk-s0302a:666_0: Niccanavakāti niccaṃ navakāva, āgantukasadisā eva hutvāti attho. Āgantuko hi paṭipāṭiyā
atk-s0302a:666_1: sampattagehaṃ pavisitvā sace naṃ gharasāmikā disvā, “amhākaṃ puttabhātaro vippavāsaṃ
atk-s0302a:666_2: gatā evaṃ vicariṃsū”ti anukampamānā nisīdāpetvā bhojenti, bhuttamattoyeva “tumhākaṃ
atk-s0302a:666_3: bhājanaṃ gaṇhathā”ti uṭṭhāya pakkamati, na tehi saddhiṃ santhavaṃ vā karoti, na kiccakaraṇīyāni
atk-s0302a:666_4: vā saṃvidahati, evaṃ tumhepi paṭipāṭiyā sampattagharaṃ pavisitvā yaṃ iriyāpathesu
atk-s0302a:666_5: pasannā manussā denti, taṃ gahetvā chinnasanthavā, tesaṃ kiccakaraṇīye abyāvaṭā hutvā
atk-s0302a:667_0: Imassa pana niccanavakabhāvassa āvibhāvatthaṃ dvebhātikavatthu kathetabbaṃ – vasāḷanagaragāmato
atk-s0302a:667_1: kira dve bhātikā nikkhamitvā pabbajitā, te cūḷanāgatthero ca mahānāgatthero cāti
atk-s0302a:667_2: paññāyiṃsu. Te cittalapabbate tiṃsa vassāni vasitvā arahattaṃ pattā “mātaraṃ passissāmā”ti
atk-s0302a:667_3: āgantvā vasāḷanagaravihāre vasitvā punadivase mātugāmaṃ piṇḍāya pavisiṃsu. Mātāpi
atk-s0302a:667_4: tesaṃ uḷuṅkena yāguṃ nīharitvā ekassa patte ākiri. Tassā taṃ olokayamānāya puttasineho
atk-s0302a:667_5: uppajji. Atha naṃ āha – “tvaṃ, tāta, mayhaṃ putto mahānāgo”ti. Thero “pacchimaṃ theraṃ
atk-s0302a:667_6: puccha upāsike”ti vatvā pakkāmi. Pacchimatherassapi yāguṃ datvā, “tāta, tvaṃ mayhaṃ
atk-s0302a:667_7: putto cūḷanāgo”ti pucchi? Thero “kiṃ, upāsike, purimaṃ theraṃ na pucchasī”ti? Vatvā
atk-s0302a:667_8: pakkāmi. Evaṃ mātarāpi saddhiṃ chinnasanthavo bhikkhu niccanavako nāma hoti.
atk-s0302a:668_0: Appagabbhāti na pagabbhā, aṭṭhaṭṭhānena kāyapāgabbhiyena, catuṭṭhānena vacīpāgabbhiyena,
atk-s0302a:668_1: anekaṭṭhānena manopāgabbhiyena ca virahitāti attho. Aṭṭhaṭṭhānaṃ kāyapāgabbhiyaṃ
atk-s0302a:668_3: kāyena appatirūpakaraṇaṃ. Seyyathidaṃ – idhekacco saṅghamajjhe pallatthikāya vā nisīdati
atk-s0302a:668_4: pāde pādaṃ ādhāyitvā vāti evamādi. Tathā gaṇamajjhe. Gaṇamajjheti catuparisasannipāte
atk-s0302a:668_5: vā suttantikagaṇādisannipāte vā. Tathā vuḍḍhatare puggale. Bhojanasālāya pana vuḍḍhānaṃ
atk-s0302a:668_6: āsanaṃ na deti, navānaṃ āsanaṃ paṭibāhati. Tathā jantāghare. Vuḍḍhe cettha anāpucchā
atk-s0302a:668_7: aggijalanādīni karoti. Nhānatitthe ca yadidaṃ “daharo vuḍḍhoti pamāṇaṃ akatvā āgatapaṭipāṭiyā
atk-s0302a:668_8: nhāyitabba”nti vuttaṃ, tampi anādiyanto pacchā āgantvā udakaṃ otaritvā vuḍḍhe ca
atk-s0302a:668_9: nave ca bādhati. Bhikkhācāramagge pana aggāsanaaggodakaaggapiṇḍānaṃ atthāya purato
atk-s0302a:668_10: gacchati bāhāya bāhaṃ paharanto. Antaragharappavesane vuḍḍhehi paṭhamataraṃ pavisati,
atk-s0302a:669_1: Seyyathidaṃ – idhekacco saṅghamajjhe anāpucchā dhammaṃ bhāsati. Tathā pubbe vuttappakārassa
atk-s0302a:669_2: gaṇassa majjhe puggalassa ca santike, tattheva manussehi pañhaṃ puṭṭho vuḍḍhataraṃ
atk-s0302a:669_3: anāpucchā vissajjeti. Antaraghare pana “itthannāme kiṃ atthi? Kiṃ yāgu, udāhu khādanīyaṃ
atk-s0302a:669_4: bhojanīyaṃ? Kiṃ me dassasi? Kiṃ ajja khādissāma? Kiṃ bhuñjissāma? Kiṃ pivissāmā”tiādīni bhāsati.
atk-s0302a:670_0: Anekaṭṭhānaṃ manopāgabbhiyaṃ nāma tesu tesu ṭhānesu kāyavācāhi ajjhācāraṃ anāpajjitvāpi
atk-s0302a:670_1: manasāva kāmavitakkādīnaṃ vitakkanaṃ. Apica dussīlasseva sato “sīlavāti maṃ jano
atk-s0302a:670_2: jānātū”ti evaṃ pavattā pāpicchatāpi manopāgabbhiyaṃ. Iti sabbesampi imesaṃ pāgabbhiyānaṃ
atk-s0302a:671_0: Jarudapānanti jiṇṇakūpaṃ. Pabbatavisamanti pabbate visamaṃ papātaṭṭhānaṃ. Nadīvidugganti
atk-s0302a:671_1: nadiyā viduggaṃ chinnataṭaṭṭhānaṃ. Apakasseva kāyanti tādisāni ṭhānāni yo khiḍḍādipasuto
atk-s0302a:671_2: kāyaṃ anapakassa ekatobhāriyaṃ akatvāva vāyupatthambhakaṃ aggāhāpetvā cittampi anapakassa
atk-s0302a:671_4: sampiyāyamāno oloketi, so patitvā hatthapādabhañjanādianatthaṃ pāpuṇāti. Yo pana
atk-s0302a:671_5: udakatthiko vā aññena vā kenaci kiccena oloketukāmo kāyaṃ apakassa ekato bhāriyaṃ
atk-s0302a:671_6: katvā vāyupatthambhakaṃ gāhāpetvā, cittampi apakassa ādīnavadassanena saṃvejetvā
atk-s0302a:671_7: oloketi, so na patati, yathāruciṃ oloketvā sukhī yenakāmaṃ pakkamati.
atk-s0302a:672_0: Evameva khoti ettha idaṃ opammasaṃsandanaṃ – jarudapānādayo viya hi cattāri kulāni,
atk-s0302a:672_1: olokanapuriso viya bhikkhu. Yathā anapakaṭṭhakāyacitto tāni olokento puriso tattha
atk-s0302a:672_2: patati, evaṃ arakkhitehi kāyādīhi kulāni upasaṅkamanto bhikkhu kulesu bajjhati, tato
atk-s0302a:672_3: nānappakāraṃ sīlapādabhañjanādianatthaṃ pāpuṇāti. Yathā pana apakaṭṭhakāyacitto puriso
atk-s0302a:672_4: tattha na patati, evaṃ rakkhiteneva kāyena rakkhitehi cittehi rakkhitāya vācāya suppaṭṭhitāya
atk-s0302a:672_5: satiyā apakaṭṭhakāyacitto hutvā kulāni upasaṅkamanto bhikkhu kulesu na bajjhati.
atk-s0302a:672_6: Athassa yathā tattha apatitassa purisassa, na pādā bhañjanti, evaṃ sīlapādo na bhijjati.
atk-s0302a:672_7: Yathā hatthā na bhañjanti, evaṃ saddhāhattho na bhijjati. Yathā kucchi na bhijjati,
atk-s0302a:672_8: evaṃ samādhikucchi na bhijjati. Yathā sīsaṃ na bhijjati, evaṃ ñāṇasīsaṃ na bhijjati,
atk-s0302a:672_9: yathā ca taṃ khāṇukaṇṭakādayo na vijjhanti, evamimaṃ rāgakaṇṭakādayo na vijjhanti.
atk-s0302a:672_10: Yathā so nirupaddavo yathāruci oloketvā sukhī yenakāmaṃ pakkamati, evaṃ bhikkhu kulāni
atk-s0302a:672_11: nissāya cīvarādayo paccaye paṭisevanto kammaṭṭhānaṃ vaḍḍhetvā saṅkhāre sammasanto
atk-s0302a:672_12: arahattaṃ patvā lokuttarasukhena sukhito yenakāmaṃ agatapubbaṃ nibbānadisaṃ gacchati.
atk-s0302a:673_0: Idāni yo hīnādhimuttiko micchāpaṭipanno evaṃ vadeyya “sammāsambuddho ‘tividhaṃ pāgabbhiyaṃ
atk-s0302a:673_1: pahāya niccanavakattena candūpamā kulāni upasaṅkamathā’ti vadanto aṭṭhāne ṭhapeti,
atk-s0302a:673_2: asayhaṃ bhāraṃ āropeti, yaṃ na sakkā kātuṃ taṃ kāretī”ti, tassa vādapathaṃ pacchinditvā,
atk-s0302a:673_3: “sakkā evaṃ kātuṃ, atthi evarūpo bhikkhū”ti dassento kassapo, bhikkhavetiādimāha.
atk-s0302a:674_0: Ākāse pāṇiṃ cālesīti nīle gaganantare yamakavijjutaṃ cārayamāno viya heṭṭhābhāgaṃ
atk-s0302a:674_1: uparibhāgaṃ ubhatopassesu pāṇiṃ sañcāresi. Idañca pana tepiṭake buddhavacane asambhinnapadaṃ
atk-s0302a:674_2: nāma. Attamanoti tuṭṭhacitto sakamano, na domanassena pacchinditvā gahitamano. Kassapassa,
atk-s0302a:674_3: bhikkhaveti idampi purimanayeneva paravādaṃ pacchinditvā atthi evarūpo bhikkhūti
atk-s0302a:675_0: Pasannākāraṃ kareyyunti cīvarādayo paccaye dadeyyuṃ. Tathattāya paṭipajjeyyunti sīlassa
atk-s0302a:675_1: āgataṭṭhāne sīlaṃ pūrayamānā, samādhivipassanā maggaphalānaṃ āgataṭṭhāne tāni tāni
atk-s0302a:675_2: sampādayamānā tathābhāvāya paṭipajjeyyuṃ. Anudayanti rakkhaṇabhāvaṃ. Anukampanti
atk-s0302a:675_3: muducittataṃ. Ubhayañcetaṃ kāruññasseva vevacanaṃ. Kassapo, bhikkhaveti idampi purimanayeneva
atk-s0302a:675_4: paravādaṃ pacchinditvā atthi evarūpo bhikkhūti dassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Kassapena vāti
atk-s0302a:675_5: ettha candopamādivasena yojanaṃ katvā purimanayeneva attho veditabbo. Tatiyaṃ.
atk-s0302a:677: 147. Catutthe kulūpakoti kulagharānaṃ upagantā. Dentuyeva meti dadantuyeva mayhaṃ. Sandīyatīti aṭṭīyati pīḷiyati. Sesamettha vuttanayānusāreneva veditabbaṃ. Catutthaṃ.
atk-s0302a:679_0: 148. Pañcame jiṇṇoti thero mahallako. Garukānīti taṃ satthu santikā laddhakālato
atk-s0302a:679_1: paṭṭhāya chinnabhinnaṭṭhāne suttasaṃsibbanena ceva aggaḷadānena ca anekāni paṭalāni
atk-s0302a:679_2: hutvā garukāni jātāni. Nibbasanānīti pubbe bhagavatā nivāsetvā apanītatāya evaṃladdhanāmāni.
atk-s0302a:679_3: Tasmāti yasmā tvaṃ jiṇṇo ceva garupaṃsukūlo ca. Gahapatānīti paṃsukūlikaṅgaṃ vissajjetvā
atk-s0302a:679_4: gahapatīhi dinnacīvarāni dhārehīti vadati. Nimantanānīti piṇḍapātikaṅgaṃ vissajjetvā
atk-s0302a:679_5: salākabhattādīni nimantanāni bhuñjāhīti vadati. Mama ca santiketi āraññikaṅgaṃ vissajjetvā
atk-s0302a:680_0: Nanu ca yathā rājā senāpatiṃ senāpatiṭṭhāne ṭhapetvā tassa rājūpaṭṭhānādinā attano
atk-s0302a:680_1: kammena ārādhentasseva taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ gahetvā aññassa dadamāno ayuttaṃ nāma karoti,
atk-s0302a:680_2: evaṃ satthā mahākassapattherassa paccuggamanatthāya tigāvutaṃ maggaṃ gantvā rājagahassa
atk-s0302a:680_3: ca nāḷandāya ca antare bahuputtakarukkhamūle nisinno tīhi ovādehi upasampādetvā tena
atk-s0302a:680_4: saddhiṃ attano cīvaraṃ parivattetvā theraṃ jātiāraññikaṅgañceva jātipaṃsukūlikaṅgañca
atk-s0302a:680_5: akāsi, so tasmiṃ kattukamyatāchandena satthu cittaṃ ārādhentasseva paṃsukūlādīni
atk-s0302a:680_6: vissajjāpetvā gahapaticīvarapaṭiggahaṇādīsu niyojento ayuttaṃ nāma karotīti. Na karoti.
atk-s0302a:680_7: Kasmā? Attajjhāsayattā. Na hi satthā dhutaṅgāni vissajjāpetukāmo, yathā pana aghaṭṭitā
atk-s0302a:680_8: bheriādayo saddaṃ na vissajjenti, evaṃ aghaṭṭitā evarūpā puggalā na sīhanādaṃ nadantīti
atk-s0302a:680_9: nadāpetukāmo sīhanādajjhāsayena evamāha. Theropi satthu ajjhāsayānurūpeneva “ahaṃ
atk-s0302a:680_10: kho, bhante, dīgharattaṃ āraññiko cevā”tiādinā nayena sīhanādaṃ nadati.
atk-s0302a:681_0: Diṭṭhadhammasukhavihāranti diṭṭhadhammasukhavihāro nāma āraññikasseva labbhati, no
atk-s0302a:681_1: gāmantavāsino. Gāmantasmiñhi vasanto dārakasaddaṃ suṇāti, asappāyarūpāni passati,
atk-s0302a:681_2: asappāye sadde suṇāti, tenassa anabhirati uppajjati. Āraññiko pana gāvutaṃ vā aḍḍhayojanaṃ
atk-s0302a:681_3: vā atikkamitvā araññaṃ ajjhogāhetvā vasanto dīpibyagghasīhādīnaṃ sadde suṇāti, yesaṃ
atk-s0302a:681_4: savanapaccayā amānusikāsavanarati uppajjati. Yaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ –
atk-s0302a:683: Amānusī ratī hoti, sammā dhammaṃ vipassato.
atk-s0302a:686: “Purato pacchato vāpi, aparo ce na vijjati;
atk-s0302a:687: Tattheva phāsu bhavati, ekassa ramato vane”ti.
atk-s0302a:688_0: Tathā piṇḍapātikasseva labbhati, no apiṇḍapātikassa. Apiṇḍapātiko hi akālacārī hoti,
atk-s0302a:688_1: turitacāraṃ gacchati, parivatteti, palibuddhova gacchati, tattha ca bahusaṃsayo hoti.
atk-s0302a:688_2: Piṇḍapātiko pana na akālacārī hoti, na turitacāraṃ gacchati, na parivatteti, apalibuddhova
atk-s0302a:688_3: gacchati, tattha ca na bahusaṃsayo hoti.
atk-s0302a:689_0: Kathaṃ? Apiṇḍapātiko hi gāmato dūravihāre vasamāno kālasseva “yāguṃ vā pārivāsikabhattaṃ
atk-s0302a:689_1: vā lacchāmi, āsanasālāya vā pana uddesabhattādīsu kiñcideva mayhaṃ pāpuṇissatī”ti
atk-s0302a:689_2: makkaṭakasuttāni chindanto sayitagorūpāni uṭṭhāpento pātova gacchanto akālacārī hoti.
atk-s0302a:689_3: Manusse khettakammādīnaṃ atthāya gehā nikkhanteyeva sampāpuṇituṃ migaṃ anubandhanto
atk-s0302a:689_4: viya vegena gacchanto turitacārī hoti. Antarā kiñcideva disvā “asukaupāsako vā asukaupāsikā
atk-s0302a:689_5: vā gehe, no gehe”ti pucchati, “no gehe”ti sutvā “idāni kuto labhissāmī”ti? Aggidaḍḍho
atk-s0302a:689_6: viya pavedhati, sayaṃ pacchimadisaṃ gantukāmo pācīnadisāya salākaṃ labhitvā aññaṃ
atk-s0302a:689_7: pacchimadisāya laddhasalākaṃ upasaṅkamitvā, “bhante, ahaṃ pacchimadisaṃ gamissāmi,
atk-s0302a:689_8: mama salākaṃ tumhe gaṇhatha, tumhākaṃ salākaṃ mayhaṃ dethā”ti salākaṃ parivatteti.
atk-s0302a:689_9: Ekaṃ vā pana salākabhattaṃ āharitvā paribhuñjanto “aparassāpi salākabhattassa pattaṃ
atk-s0302a:689_10: dethā”ti manussehi vutte, “bhante, tumhākaṃ pattaṃ detha, ahaṃ mayhaṃ patte bhattaṃ
atk-s0302a:689_11: pakkhipitvā tumhākaṃ pattaṃ dassāmī”ti aññassa pattaṃ dāpetvā bhatte āhaṭe attano
atk-s0302a:689_12: patte pakkhipitvā pattaṃ paṭidento pattaṃ parivatteti nāma. Vihāre rājarājamahāmattādayo
atk-s0302a:689_13: mahādānaṃ denti, iminā ca bhiyyo dūragāme salākā laddhā, tattha agacchanto puna sattāhaṃ
atk-s0302a:689_14: salākaṃ na labhatīti alābhabhayena gacchati, evaṃ gacchanto palibuddho hutvā gacchati
atk-s0302a:689_15: nāma. Yassa cesa salākabhattādino atthāya gacchati, “taṃ dassanti nu kho me, udāhu
atk-s0302a:689_16: na dassanti, paṇītaṃ nu kho dassanti, udāhu lūkhaṃ, thokaṃ nu kho, udāhu bahukaṃ,
atk-s0302a:689_17: sītalaṃ nu kho, udāhu uṇha”nti evaṃ tattha ca bahusaṃsayo hoti.
atk-s0302a:690_0: Piṇḍapātiko pana kālasseva vuṭṭhāya vattapaṭivattaṃ katvā sarīraṃ paṭijaggitvā vasanaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0302a:690_1: pavisitvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ manasikatvā kālaṃ sallakkhetvā mahājanassa uḷuṅkabhikkhādīni
atk-s0302a:690_2: dātuṃ pahonakakāle gacchatīti na akālacārī hoti, ekekaṃ padavāraṃ cha koṭṭhāse katvā
atk-s0302a:690_3: vipassanto gacchatīti na turitacārī hoti, attano garubhāvena “asuko gehe, na gehe”ti
atk-s0302a:690_4: na pucchati, salākabhattādīniyeva na gaṇhāti. Agaṇhanto kiṃ parivattessati? Na aññassa
atk-s0302a:690_5: vasena palibuddhova hoti, kammaṭṭhānaṃ manasikaronto yathāruci gacchati, itaro viya
atk-s0302a:690_6: na bahusaṃsayo hoti. Ekasmiṃ gāme vā vīthiyā vā alabhitvā aññattha carati. Tasmimpi
atk-s0302a:690_7: alabhitvā aññattha caranto missakodanaṃ saṅkaḍḍhitvā amataṃ viya paribhuñjitvā gacchati.
atk-s0302a:691_0: Paṃsukūlikasseva labbhati, no apaṃsukūlikassa. Apaṃsukūliko hi vassāvāsikaṃ pariyesanto
atk-s0302a:691_1: carati, na senāsanasappāyaṃ pariyesati. Paṃsukūliko pana na vassāvāsikaṃ pariyesanto
atk-s0302a:691_2: carati, senāsanasappāyameva pariyesati. Tecīvarikasseva labbhati, na itarassa. Atecīvariko
atk-s0302a:691_3: hi bahubhaṇḍo bahuparikkhāro hoti, tenassa phāsuvihāro natthi. Appicchādīnañceva
atk-s0302a:691_4: labbhati, na itaresanti. Tena vuttaṃ – “attano ca diṭṭhadhammasukhavihāraṃ sampassamāno”ti. Pañcamaṃ.
atk-s0302a:693_0: 149. Chaṭṭhe ahaṃ vāti kasmā āha? Theraṃ attano ṭhāne ṭhapanatthaṃ. Kiṃ sāriputtamoggallānā
atk-s0302a:693_1: natthīti? Atthi. Evaṃ panassa ahosi “ime na ciraṃ ṭhassanti, kassapo pana vīsavassasatāyuko,
atk-s0302a:693_2: so mayi parinibbute sattapaṇṇiguhāyaṃ nisīditvā dhammavinayasaṅgahaṃ katvā mama sāsanaṃ
atk-s0302a:693_3: pañcavassasahassaparimāṇakālapavattanakaṃ karissati, attano taṃ ṭhāne ṭhapemi, evaṃ
atk-s0302a:693_4: bhikkhū kassapassa sussūsitabbaṃ maññissantī”ti. Tasmā evamāha. Dubbacāti dukkhena
atk-s0302a:693_6: sutvā padakkhiṇaṃ na gaṇhanti yathānusiṭṭhaṃ na paṭipajjanti, appaṭipajjantā vāmagāhino
atk-s0302a:693_7: nāma jātāti dasseti. Accāvadanteti atikkamma vadante, sutapariyattiṃ nissāya ativiya
atk-s0302a:693_8: vādaṃ karonteti attho. Ko bahutaraṃ bhāsissatīti dhammaṃ kathento ko bahuṃ bhāsissati,
atk-s0302a:693_9: kiṃ tvaṃ, udāhu ahanti? Ko sundarataranti, eko bahuṃ bhāsanto asahitaṃ amadhuraṃ
atk-s0302a:693_10: bhāsati, eko sahitaṃ madhuraṃ, taṃ sandhāyāha “ko sundaratara”nti? Eko pana bahuñca
atk-s0302a:693_11: sundarañca kathento ciraṃ na bhāsati, lahuññeva uṭṭhāti, eko addhānaṃ pāpeti, taṃ
atk-s0302a:695_0: 150. Sattame saddhāti okappanasaddhā. Vīriyanti kāyikacetasikaṃ vīriyaṃ. Paññāti
atk-s0302a:695_1: kusaladhammajānanapaññā. Na santi bhikkhū ovādakāti imassa puggalassa ovādakā anusāsakā
atk-s0302a:695_2: kalyāṇamittā natthīti idaṃ, bhante, parihānanti dasseti. Sattamaṃ.
atk-s0302a:697_0: 151. Aṭṭhame tathā hi panāti pubbe sovacassatāya, etarahi ca dovacassatāya kāraṇapaṭṭhapane
atk-s0302a:697_1: nipāto. Tatrāti tesu theresu. Ko nāmāyaṃ bhikkhūti ko nāmo ayaṃ bhikkhu? Kiṃ tissatthero
atk-s0302a:697_2: kiṃ nāgattheroti? Tatrāti tasmiṃ evaṃ sakkāre kayiramāne. Tathattāyāti tathābhāvāya,
atk-s0302a:697_3: āraññikādibhāvāyāti attho. Sabrahmacārikāmoti “ime maṃ parivāretvā carantū”ti evaṃ
atk-s0302a:697_4: kāmeti icchati patthetīti sabrahmacārikāmo. Tathattāyāti lābhasakkāranibbattanatthāya.
atk-s0302a:697_5: Brahmacārupaddavenāti yo sabrahmacārīnaṃ catūsu paccayesu adhimattacchandarāgo upaddavoti
atk-s0302a:697_6: vuccati, tena upaddutā. Abhipatthanāti adhimattapatthanā. Brahmacāriabhipatthanenāti
atk-s0302a:699_0: 152. Navame yāvadeva ākaṅkhāmīti yāvadeva icchāmi. Yāni pana ito paraṃ vivicceva
atk-s0302a:699_1: kāmehītiādinā nayena cattāri rūpāvacarajjhānāni, sabbaso rūpasaññānaṃ samatikkamātiādinā
atk-s0302a:699_2: nayena catasso arūpasamāpattiyo, sabbaso nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ samatikkamma saññāvedayitanirodhanti
atk-s0302a:699_3: evaṃ nirodhasamāpatti, anekavihitaṃ iddhividhantiādinā nayena pañca lokikābhiññā
atk-s0302a:699_4: ca vuttā. Tattha yaṃ vattabbaṃ siyā, taṃ sabbaṃ anupadavaṇṇanāya ceva bhāvanāvidhānena
atk-s0302a:699_5: ca saddhiṃ visuddhimagge vitthāritameva. Chaḷabhiññāya pana āsavānaṃ khayāti āsavānaṃ
atk-s0302a:699_6: khayena. Anāsavanti āsavānaṃ apaccayabhūtaṃ. Cetovimuttinti arahattaphalasamādhiṃ.
atk-s0302a:701_0: 153. Dasame āyāma, bhanteti kasmā bhikkhunīupassayagamanaṃ yācati? Na lābhasakkārahetu,
atk-s0302a:701_1: kammaṭṭhānatthikā panettha bhikkhuniyo atthi, tā ussukkāpetvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ kathāpessāmīti
atk-s0302a:701_2: yācati. Nanu ca so sayampi tepiṭako bahussuto, kiṃ sayaṃ kathetuṃ na sakkotīti? No
atk-s0302a:701_3: na sakkoti. Buddhapaṭibhāgassa pana sāvakassa kathaṃ saddhātabbaṃ maññissantīti yācati.
atk-s0302a:701_4: Bahukicco tvaṃ bahukaraṇīyoti kiṃ thero navakammādipasuto, yena naṃ evamāhāti? No,
atk-s0302a:701_5: satthari pana parinibbute catasso parisā ānandattheraṃ upasaṅkamitvā, “bhante, idāni
atk-s0302a:701_6: kassa pattacīvaraṃ gahetvā caratha, kassa pariveṇaṃ sammajjatha, kassa mukhodakaṃ
atk-s0302a:701_7: dethā”ti rodanti paridevanti. Thero “aniccā saṅkhārā, vuddhasarīrepi nillajjova maccurājā
atk-s0302a:701_8: pahari. Esā saṅkhārānaṃ dhammatā, mā socittha, mā paridevitthā”ti parisaṃ saññāpeti.
atk-s0302a:701_9: Idamassa bahukiccaṃ. Taṃ sandhāya thero evamāha. Sandassesīti paṭipattiguṇaṃ dassesi.
atk-s0302a:701_10: Samādapesīti gaṇhāpesi. Samuttejesīti samussāhesi. Sampahaṃsesīti paṭiladdhaguṇena modāpesi.
atk-s0302a:702_0: Thullatissāti sarīrena thūlā, nāmena tissā. Vedehamuninoti paṇḍitamunino. Paṇḍito
atk-s0302a:702_1: hi ñāṇasaṅkhātena vedena īhati sabbakiccāni karoti, tasmā “vedeho”ti vuccati. Vedeho
atk-s0302a:702_2: ca so muni cāti, vedehamuni. Dhammaṃ bhāsitabbaṃ maññatīti tipiṭakadharassa dhammabhaṇḍāgārikassa
atk-s0302a:702_3: sammukhe sayaṃ araññavāsī paṃsukūliko samāno “dhammakathiko aha”nti dhammaṃ bhāsitabbaṃ
atk-s0302a:702_4: maññati. Idaṃ kiṃ pana, kathaṃ panāti? Avajānamānā bhaṇati. Assosīti aññena āgantvā
atk-s0302a:702_5: ārocitavasena assosi. Āgamehi tvaṃ, āvusoti tiṭṭha tvaṃ, āvuso. Mā te saṅgho uttari
atk-s0302a:702_6: upaparikkhīti mā bhikkhusaṅgho atirekaokāse taṃ upaparikkhīti. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti –
atk-s0302a:702_7: “ānandena buddhapaṭibhāgo sāvako vārito, ekā bhikkhunī na vāritā, tāya saddhiṃ santhavo
atk-s0302a:702_8: vā sineho vā bhavissatī”ti mā taṃ saṅgho evaṃ amaññīti.
atk-s0302a:703_0: Idāni attano buddhapaṭibhāgabhāvaṃ dīpento taṃ kiṃ maññasi, āvusotiādimāha? Sattaratananti
atk-s0302a:703_1: sattahatthappamāṇaṃ. Nāganti hatthiṃ. Aḍḍhaṭṭharatanaṃ vāti aḍḍharatanena ūnaaṭṭharatanaṃ,
atk-s0302a:703_2: purimapādato paṭṭhāya yāva kumbhā vidatthādhikasattahatthubbedhanti attho. Tālapattikāyāti
atk-s0302a:703_3: taruṇatālapaṇṇena. Cavitthāti cutā, na matā vā naṭṭhā vā, buddhapaṭibhāgassa pana
atk-s0302a:703_4: sāvakassa upavādaṃ vatvā mahākassapatthere chahi abhiññāhi sīhanādaṃ nadante tassā
atk-s0302a:703_5: kāsāvāni kaṇṭakasākhā viya kacchusākhā viya ca sarīraṃ khādituṃ āraddhāni, tāni hāretvā
atk-s0302a:705_0: 154. Ekādasame dakkhiṇāgirisminti rājagahaṃ parivāretvā ṭhitassa girino dakkhiṇabhāge
atk-s0302a:705_1: janapado dakkhiṇāgiri nāma, tasmiṃ cārikaṃ caratīti attho. Cārikā ca nāma duvidhā
atk-s0302a:705_2: hoti turitacārikā ca aturitacārikā ca. Tattha yaṃ ekacco ekaṃ kāsāvaṃ nivāsetvā ekaṃ
atk-s0302a:705_3: pārupitvā pattacīvaraṃ aṃse laggetvā chattaṃ ādāya sarīrato sedehi paggharantehi
atk-s0302a:705_4: divasena sattaṭṭhayojanāni gacchati, yaṃ vā pana buddhā kiñcideva bodhaneyyasattaṃ
atk-s0302a:705_5: disvā yojanasatampi yojanasahassampi khaṇena gacchanti, esā turitacārikā nāma. Devasikaṃ
atk-s0302a:705_6: pana gāvutaṃ aḍḍhayojanaṃ tigāvutaṃ yojananti ettakaṃ addhānaṃ ajjatanāya nimantanaṃ
atk-s0302a:705_7: adhivāsayato janasaṅgahaṃ karoto gamanaṃ, esā aturitacārikā nāma. Ayaṃ idha adhippetā.
atk-s0302a:706_0: Nanu ca thero pañcavīsati vassāni chāyā viya dasabalassa pacchato pacchato gacchantova
atk-s0302a:706_1: ahosi, “kahaṃ ānando”ti vacanassa okāsameva na adāsi, so kismiṃ kāle bhikkhusaṅghena
atk-s0302a:706_2: saddhiṃ cārikaṃ carituṃ okāsaṃ labhatīti? Satthu parinibbānasaṃvacchare. Parinibbute
atk-s0302a:706_3: kira satthari mahākassapatthero satthu parinibbāne sannipatitassa bhikkhusaṅghassa
atk-s0302a:706_4: majjhe nisīditvā dhammavinayasaṅgāyanatthaṃ pañcasate bhikkhū uccinitvā, “āvuso,
atk-s0302a:706_5: mayaṃ rājagahe vassaṃ vasantā dhammavinayaṃ saṅgāyissāma, tumhe pure vassūpanāyikāya
atk-s0302a:706_6: attano palibodhaṃ ucchinditvā rājagahe sannipatathā”ti vatvā attanā rājagahaṃ gato.
atk-s0302a:706_7: Ānandattheropi bhagavato pattacīvaraṃ ādāya mahājanaṃ saññāpento sāvatthiṃ gantvā
atk-s0302a:706_8: tato nikkhamma rājagahaṃ gacchanto dakkhiṇāgirismiṃ cārikaṃ cari. Taṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0302a:707_0: Yebhuyyena kumārabhūtāti ye te hīnāyāvattā nāma, te yebhuyyena kumārakā daharā taruṇā
atk-s0302a:707_1: ekavassikadvevassikā bhikkhū ceva anupasampannakumārakā ca. Kasmā panete pabbajitā,
atk-s0302a:707_2: kasmā hīnāyāvattāti? Tesaṃ kira mātāpitaro cintesuṃ – “ānandatthero satthu vissāsiko
atk-s0302a:707_3: aṭṭha vare yācitvā upaṭṭhahati, icchiticchitaṭṭhānaṃ satthāraṃ gahetvā gantuṃ sakkoti,
atk-s0302a:707_4: amhākaṃ dārake etassa santike pabbājema, so satthāraṃ gahetvā āgamissati, tasmiṃ
atk-s0302a:707_5: āgate mayaṃ mahāsakkāraṃ kātuṃ labhissāmā”ti. Iminā tāva kāraṇena nesaṃ ñātakā te
atk-s0302a:707_6: pabbājesuṃ. Satthari pana parinibbute tesaṃ sā patthanā upacchinnā, atha te ekadivaseneva uppabbājesuṃ.
atk-s0302a:708_0: Yathābhirantanti yathāruciyā yathāajjhāsayena. Tikabhojanaṃ paññattanti, idaṃ “gaṇabhojane
atk-s0302a:708_1: aññatra samayā pācittiya”nti. Idaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Tattha hi tiṇṇaṃ janānaṃ akappiyanimantanaṃ
atk-s0302a:708_2: sādiyitvā ekato paṭiggaṇhantānampi anāpatti, tasmā “tikabhojana”nti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0302a:709_0: Dummaṅkūnaṃ puggalānaṃ niggahāyāti dussīlapuggalānaṃ niggaṇhanatthaṃ. Pesalānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ
atk-s0302a:709_1: phāsuvihārāyāti dummaṅkūnaṃ niggaheneva pesalānaṃ uposathapavāraṇā vattanti, samaggavāso
atk-s0302a:709_2: hoti, ayaṃ tesaṃ phāsuvihāro hoti, imassa phāsuvihārassa atthāya. Mā pāpicchā pakkhaṃ
atk-s0302a:709_3: nissāya saṅghaṃ bhindeyyunti yathā devadatto sapariso kulesu viññāpetvā bhuñjanto
atk-s0302a:709_4: pāpicche nissāya saṅghaṃ bhindi, evaṃ aññepi pāpicchā gaṇabandhena kulesu viññāpetvā
atk-s0302a:709_5: bhuñjamānā gaṇaṃ vaḍḍhetvā taṃ pakkhaṃ nissāya mā saṅghaṃ bhindeyyunti, iti iminā
atk-s0302a:709_6: kāraṇena paññattanti attho. Kulānuddayatāya cāti bhikkhusaṅghe uposathapavāraṇaṃ
atk-s0302a:709_7: katvā samaggavāsaṃ vasante manussā salākabhattādīni datvā saggaparāyaṇā bhavanti,
atk-s0302a:709_8: iti imāya kulānuddayatāya ca paññattanti attho.
atk-s0302a:710_0: Sassaghātaṃ maññe carasīti sassaṃ ghātento viya āhiṇḍasi. Kulūpaghātaṃ maññe carasīti
atk-s0302a:710_1: kulāni upaghātento viya hananto viya āhiṇḍasi. Olujjatīti visesena palujjati bhijjati.
atk-s0302a:710_2: Palujjanti kho te, āvuso, navappāyāti, āvuso, ete tuyhaṃ pāyena yebhuyyena navakā
atk-s0302a:710_3: ekavassikaduvassikā daharā ceva sāmaṇerā ca palujjanti bhijjanti. Na vāyaṃ kumārako
atk-s0302a:710_4: mattamaññāsīti ayaṃ kumārako attano pamāṇaṃ na jānātīti theraṃ tajjento āha.
atk-s0302a:711_0: Kumārakavādā na muccāmāti kumārakavādato na muccāma. Tathā hi pana tvanti idamassa
atk-s0302a:711_1: evaṃ vattabbatāya kāraṇadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Ayañhettha adhippāyo – yasmā tvaṃ imehi
atk-s0302a:711_2: navehi bhikkhūhi indriyasaṃvararahitehi saddhiṃ vicarasi, tasmā kumārakehi saddhiṃ
atk-s0302a:712_0: Aññatitthiyapubbo samānoti idaṃ yasmā therassa imasmiṃ sāsane neva ācariyo na upajjhāyo
atk-s0302a:712_1: paññāyati, sayaṃ kāsāyāni gahetvā nikkhanto, tasmā anattamanatāya aññatitthiyapubbataṃ āropayamānā āha.
atk-s0302a:713_0: Sahasāti ettha rāgamohacāropi sahasācāro, idaṃ pana dosacāravasena vuttaṃ. Appaṭisaṅkhāti
atk-s0302a:713_1: appaccavekkhitvā, idāni attano pabbajjaṃ sodhento yatvāhaṃ, āvusotiādimāha. Tattha
atk-s0302a:713_2: aññaṃ satthāraṃ uddisitunti ṭhapetvā bhagavantaṃ aññaṃ mayhaṃ satthāti evaṃ uddisituṃ
atk-s0302a:713_3: na jānāmi. Sambādho gharāvāsotiādīsu sacepi saṭṭhihatthe ghare yojanasatantarepi
atk-s0302a:713_4: vā dve jāyampatikā vasanti, tathāpi tesaṃ sakiñcanasapalibodhaṭṭhena gharāvāso sambādhoyeva.
atk-s0302a:713_6: vattuṃ vaṭṭati. Alagganaṭṭhena abbhokāso viyāti abbhokāso. Pabbajito hi kūṭāgāraratanamayapāsādadevavimānādīsu
atk-s0302a:713_7: pihitadvāravātapānesu paṭicchannesu vasantopi neva laggati na sajjati na bajjhati,
atk-s0302a:713_8: tena vuttaṃ “abbhokāso pabbajjā”ti. Apica sambādho gharāvāso kusalakiriyāya okāsābhāvato
atk-s0302a:713_9: rajāpatho asaṃvutasaṅkāraṭṭhānaṃ viya rajānaṃ, kilesarajānaṃ sannipātaṭṭhānato, abbhokāso
atk-s0302a:714_0: Nayidaṃ sukaraṃ…pe… pabbajeyyanti ettha ayaṃ saṅkhepakathā – yadetaṃ sikkhattayabrahmacariyaṃ
atk-s0302a:714_1: ekampi divasaṃ akhaṇḍaṃ katvā carimakacittaṃ pāpetabbatāya ekantaparipuṇṇaṃ caritabbaṃ,
atk-s0302a:714_2: ekadivasampi ca kilesamalena amalīnaṃ katvā carimakacittaṃ pāpetabbatāya ekantaparisuddhaṃ,
atk-s0302a:714_3: saṅkhalikhitaṃ likhitasaṅkhasadisaṃ dhotasaṅkhasappaṭibhāgaṃ caritabbaṃ, idaṃ na
atk-s0302a:714_4: sukaraṃ agāraṃ ajjhāvasatā agāramajjhe vasantena ekantaparipuṇṇaṃ…pe… carituṃ, yaṃnūnāhaṃ
atk-s0302a:714_5: kesamassuṃ ohāretvā kasāyarasapītatāya kāsāyāni brahmacariyaṃ carantānaṃ anucchavikāni
atk-s0302a:714_6: vatthāni acchādetvā paridahitvā agārasmā nikkhamitvā anagāriyaṃ pabbajjeyyanti. Ettha
atk-s0302a:714_7: ca yasmā agārassa hitaṃ kasivaṇijjādikammaṃ agāriyanti vuccati, taṃ pabbajjāya natthi,
atk-s0302a:714_8: tasmā pabbajjā anagāriyāti ñātabbā, taṃ anagāriyaṃ. Pabbajeyyanti paṭipajjeyyaṃ.
atk-s0302a:715_0: Paṭapilotikānanti jiṇṇapilotikānaṃ terasahatthopi hi navasāṭako dasānaṃ chinnakālato
atk-s0302a:715_1: paṭṭhāya pilotikāti vuccati. Iti mahārahāni vatthāni chinditvā kataṃ saṅghāṭiṃ sandhāya
atk-s0302a:715_3: maggo addhānanti vuccati, taṃ addhānamaggaṃ paṭipanno, dīghamaggaṃ paṭipannoti attho.
atk-s0302a:716_0: Idāni yathā esa pabbajito, yathā ca addhānamaggaṃ paṭipanno, imassatthassa āvibhāvatthaṃ
atk-s0302a:716_1: abhinīhārato paṭṭhāya anupubbikathā kathetabbā – atīte kira kappasatasahassamatthake
atk-s0302a:716_2: padumuttaro nāma satthā udapādi, tasmiṃ haṃsavatīnagaraṃ upanissāya kheme migadāye
