atk-s0302a:716_3: viharante vedeho nāma kuṭumbiko asītikoṭidhanavibhavo pātova subhojanaṃ bhuñjitvā
atk-s0302a:716_4: uposathaṅgāni adhiṭṭhāya gandhapupphādīni gahetvā vihāraṃ gantvā satthāraṃ pūjetvā
atk-s0302a:716_5: vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi. Tasmiṃ khaṇe satthā mahānisabhattheraṃ nāma tatiyasāvakaṃ
atk-s0302a:716_6: “etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave, mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ dhutavādānaṃ yadidaṃ nisabho”ti
atk-s0302a:716_7: etadagge ṭhapesi. Upāsako taṃ sutvā pasanno dhammakathāvasāne mahājane uṭṭhāya gate
atk-s0302a:716_8: satthāraṃ vanditvā, “bhante, sve mayhaṃ bhikkhaṃ adhivāsethā”ti āha. Mahā kho, upāsaka,
atk-s0302a:716_9: bhikkhusaṅghoti. Kittako bhagavāti. Aṭṭhasaṭṭhibhikkhusatasahassanti. Bhante, ekaṃ
atk-s0302a:716_10: sāmaṇerampi vihāre asesetvā bhikkhaṃ adhivāsethāti. Satthā adhivāsesi. Upāsako satthu
atk-s0302a:716_11: adhivāsanaṃ viditvā gehaṃ gantvā mahādānaṃ sajjetvā punadivase satthu kālaṃ ārocāpesi.
atk-s0302a:716_12: Satthā pattacīvaramādāya bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto upāsakassa gharaṃ gantvā paññattāsane
atk-s0302a:716_13: nisinno dakkhiṇodakāvasāne yāgubhattādīni sampaṭicchanto bhattavissaggaṃ akāsi. Upāsakopi
atk-s0302a:717_0: Tasmiṃ antare mahānisabhatthero piṇḍāya caranto tameva vīthiṃ paṭipajji. Upāsako
atk-s0302a:717_1: disvā uṭṭhāya gantvā theraṃ vanditvā “pattaṃ, bhante, no dethā”ti āha. Thero pattaṃ
atk-s0302a:717_2: adāsi. Bhante, idheva pavisatha, satthāpi gehe nisinnoti. Na vaṭṭissati upāsakāti.
atk-s0302a:717_3: Upāsako therassa pattaṃ gahetvā piṇḍapātassa pūretvā nīharitvā adāsi. Tato theraṃ
atk-s0302a:717_4: anugantvā nivatto satthu santike nisīditvā evamāha – “bhante, mahānisabhatthero ‘satthā
atk-s0302a:717_5: gehe nisinno’ti vuttepi pavisituṃ na icchi, atthi nu kho etassa tumhākaṃ guṇehi atireko
atk-s0302a:717_6: guṇo”ti. Buddhānañca vaṇṇamaccheraṃ nāma natthi. Atha satthā evamāha – “upāsaka,
atk-s0302a:717_7: mayaṃ bhikkhaṃ āgamayamānā gehe nisīdāma, so bhikkhu na evaṃ nisīditvā bhikkhaṃ udikkhati.
atk-s0302a:717_8: Mayaṃ gāmantasenāsane vasāma, so araññasmiṃyeva vasati. Mayaṃ channe vasāma, so abbhokāsamhiyeva
atk-s0302a:717_9: vasati. Iti tassa ayañca ayañca guṇo”ti mahāsamuddaṃ pūrayamānova kathesi. Upāsako
atk-s0302a:717_10: pakatiyāpi jalamānadīpo telena āsitto viya suṭṭhutaraṃ pasanno hutvā cintesi – “kiṃ
atk-s0302a:717_11: mayhaṃ aññāya sampattiyā, anāgate ekassa buddhassa santike dhutavādānaṃ aggabhāvatthāya
atk-s0302a:718_0: So punapi satthāraṃ nimantetvā teneva niyāmena satta divasāni dānaṃ datvā sattame
atk-s0302a:718_1: divase aṭṭhasaṭṭhibhikkhusatasahassassa ticīvarāni datvā satthu pādamūle nipajjitvā
atk-s0302a:718_2: evamāha – “yaṃ me, bhante, satta divasāni dānaṃ dentassa mettaṃ kāyakammaṃ mettaṃ
atk-s0302a:718_3: vacīkammaṃ mettaṃ manokammaṃ, imināhaṃ na aññaṃ devasampattiṃ vā sakkamārabrahmasampattiṃ
atk-s0302a:718_4: vā patthemi, idaṃ pana me kammaṃ anāgate ekassa buddhassa santike mahānisabhattherena
atk-s0302a:718_5: pattaṭṭhānantaraṃ pāpuṇanatthāya terasadhutaṅgadharānaṃ aggabhāvassa paccayo hotū”ti.
atk-s0302a:718_6: Satthā “mahantaṃ ṭhānaṃ iminā patthitaṃ, samijjhissati nu kho”ti olokento samijjhanabhāvaṃ
atk-s0302a:718_7: disvā āha – “manāpaṃ te ṭhānaṃ patthitaṃ, anāgate satasahassakappamatthake gotamo
atk-s0302a:718_8: nāma buddho uppajjissati, tassa tvaṃ tatiyasāvako mahākassapatthero nāma bhavissasī”ti.
atk-s0302a:718_9: Taṃ sutvā upāsako “buddhānaṃ dve kathā nāma natthī”ti punadivase pattabbaṃ viya taṃ
atk-s0302a:718_10: sampattiṃ amaññittha. So yāvatāyukaṃ sīlaṃ rakkhitvā tattha kālaṅkato sagge nibbatti.
atk-s0302a:719_0: Tato paṭṭhāya devamanussesu sampattiṃ anubhavanto ito ekanavutikappe vipassimhi sammāsambuddhe
atk-s0302a:719_1: bandhumatīnagaraṃ nissāya kheme migadāye viharante devalokā cavitvā aññatarasmiṃ
atk-s0302a:719_2: parijiṇṇe brāhmaṇakule nibbatti. Tasmiñca kāle “vipassī bhagavā sattame sattame saṃvacchare
atk-s0302a:719_3: dhammaṃ kathetī”ti mahantaṃ kolāhalaṃ hoti. Sakalajambudīpe devatā “satthā dhammaṃ
atk-s0302a:719_4: kathessatī”ti ārocenti, brāhmaṇo taṃ sāsanaṃ assosi. Tassa ca nivāsanasāṭako eko
atk-s0302a:719_5: hoti, tathā brāhmaṇiyā, pārupanaṃ pana dvinnampi ekameva. Sakalanagare “ekasāṭakabrāhmaṇo”ti
atk-s0302a:719_6: paññāyati. Brāhmaṇānaṃ kenacideva kiccena sannipāte sati brāhmaṇiṃ gehe ṭhapetvā
atk-s0302a:719_7: sayaṃ gacchati, brāhmaṇīnaṃ sannipāte sati sayaṃ gehe tiṭṭhati, brāhmaṇī taṃ vatthaṃ
atk-s0302a:719_8: pārupitvā gacchati. Tasmiṃ pana divase brāhmaṇo brāhmaṇiṃ āha – “bhoti, kiṃ rattiṃ
atk-s0302a:719_9: dhammassavanaṃ suṇissasi divā”ti? “Mayaṃ mātugāmajātikā nāma rattiṃ sotuṃ na sakkoma,
atk-s0302a:719_10: divā sossāmī”ti brāhmaṇaṃ gehe ṭhapetvā vatthaṃ pārupitvā upāsikāhi saddhiṃ divā
atk-s0302a:719_11: gantvā satthāraṃ vanditvā ekamante nisinnā dhammaṃ sutvā upāsikāhiyeva saddhiṃ āgamāsi.
atk-s0302a:719_12: Atha brāhmaṇo brāhmaṇiṃ gehe ṭhapetvā vatthaṃ pārupitvā vihāraṃ gato.
atk-s0302a:720_0: Tasmiṃ ca samaye satthā parisamajjhe alaṅkatadhammāsane sannisinno cittabījaniṃ ādāya
atk-s0302a:720_1: ākāsagaṅgaṃ otārento viya sineruṃ matthaṃ katvā sāgaraṃ nimmathento viya dhammakathaṃ
atk-s0302a:720_2: katheti. Brāhmaṇassa parisante nisinnassa dhammaṃ suṇantassa paṭhamayāmasmiṃyeva
atk-s0302a:720_3: sakalasarīraṃ pūrayamānā pañcavaṇṇā pīti uppajji. So pārutavatthaṃ saṅgharitvā “dasabalassa
atk-s0302a:720_4: dassāmī”ti cintesi. Athassa ādīnavasahassaṃ dassayamānaṃ maccheraṃ uppajji, so “brāhmaṇiyā
atk-s0302a:720_5: ca mayhañca ekameva vatthaṃ, aññaṃ kiñci pārupanaṃ natthi, apārupitvā ca nāma bahi
atk-s0302a:720_6: carituṃ na sakkā”ti sabbathāpi adātukāmo ahosi. Athassa nikkhante paṭhamayāme majjhimayāmepi
atk-s0302a:720_7: tatheva pīti uppajji, so tatheva ca cintetvā tatheva adātukāmo ahosi. Athassa majjhimayāme
atk-s0302a:720_8: nikkhante pacchimayāmepi tatheva pīti uppajji, so “taraṇaṃ vā hotu maraṇaṃ vā, pacchāpi
atk-s0302a:720_9: jānissāmī”ti vatthaṃ saṅgharitvā satthu pādamūle ṭhapesi. Tato vāmahatthaṃ ābhujitvā
atk-s0302a:720_10: dakkhiṇena hatthena tikkhattuṃ apphoṭetvā “jitaṃ me jitaṃ me”ti tayo vāre nadi.
atk-s0302a:721_0: Tasmiñca samaye bandhumarājā dhammāsanassa pacchato antosāṇiyaṃ nisinno dhammaṃ suṇāti.
atk-s0302a:721_1: Rañño ca nāma “jitaṃ me”ti saddo amanāpo hoti. So purisaṃ pesesi “gaccha etaṃ puccha
atk-s0302a:721_2: kiṃ vadesī”ti? So tena gantvā pucchito āha – “avasesā hatthiyānādīni āruyha asicammādīni
atk-s0302a:721_3: gahetvā parasenaṃ jinanti, na taṃ acchariyaṃ, ahaṃ pana pacchato āgacchantassa kūṭagoṇassa
atk-s0302a:721_4: muggarena sīsaṃ bhinditvā taṃ palāpento viya maccheracittaṃ madditvā pārutavatthaṃ
atk-s0302a:721_5: dasabalassa adāsiṃ, taṃ me macchariyaṃ jita”nti āha. Puriso gantvā taṃ pavattiṃ rañño
atk-s0302a:721_6: ārocesi. Rājā āha – “amhe bhaṇe dasabalassa anurūpaṃ na jānimhā, brāhmaṇo pana jānī”ti
atk-s0302a:721_7: vatthayugampi pesesi. Taṃ disvā brāhmaṇo cintesi – “ayaṃ mayhaṃ tuṇhī nisinnassa
atk-s0302a:721_8: paṭhamaṃ kiñci adatvā satthu guṇe kathentassa adāsi, satthu guṇe paṭicca uppannena
atk-s0302a:721_9: mayhaṃ ko attho”ti tampi vatthayugaṃ dasabalasseva adāsi. Rājā “kiṃ brāhmaṇena kata”nti?
atk-s0302a:721_10: Pucchitvā, “tampi tena vatthayugaṃ tathāgatasseva dinna”nti sutvā aññāni dve vatthayugāni
atk-s0302a:721_11: pesesi. So tānipi adāsi. Rājā aññānipi cattārīti evaṃ yāva dvattiṃsa vatthayugāni
atk-s0302a:721_12: pesesi. Atha brāhmaṇo “idaṃ vaḍḍhetvā gahaṇaṃ viya hotī”ti attano atthāya ekaṃ brāhmaṇiyā
atk-s0302a:721_13: atthāya ekanti dve vatthayugāni gahetvā tiṃsa yugāni tathāgatasseva adāsi. Tato paṭṭhāya
atk-s0302a:722_0: Atha naṃ rājā ekadivasaṃ sītasamaye satthu santike dhammaṃ suṇantaṃ disvā satasahassagghanikaṃ
atk-s0302a:722_1: attano pārutaṃ rattakambalaṃ datvā āha – “ito paṭṭhāya idaṃ pārupitvā dhammaṃ suṇāhī”ti.
atk-s0302a:722_2: So “kiṃ me iminā kambalena imasmiṃ pūtikāye upanītenā”ti? Cintetvā, antogandhakuṭiyaṃ
atk-s0302a:722_3: tathāgatamañcassa upari vitānaṃ katvā agamāsi. Atha ekadivasaṃ rājā pātova vihāraṃ
atk-s0302a:722_4: gantvā antogandhakuṭiyaṃ satthu santike nisīdi. Tasmiñca samaye chabbaṇṇā buddharasmiyo
atk-s0302a:722_5: kambalaṃ paṭihaññanti, kambalo ativiya virocati. Rājā uddhaṃ olokento sañjānitvā
atk-s0302a:722_6: āha – “bhante, amhākaṃ esa kambalo, amhehi ekasāṭakabrāhmaṇassa dinno”ti. Tumhehi,
atk-s0302a:722_7: mahārāja, brāhmaṇo pūjito, brāhmaṇena ahaṃ pūjitoti. Rājā “brāhmaṇo yuttakaṃ aññāsi,
atk-s0302a:722_8: na maya”nti pasīditvā yaṃ manussānaṃ upakārabhūtaṃ, taṃ sabbaṃ aṭṭhaṭṭhakaṃ katvā
atk-s0302a:722_9: sabbaṭṭhakaṃ nāma dānaṃ datvā purohitaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi. Sopi “aṭṭhaṭṭhakaṃ nāma catusaṭṭhi
atk-s0302a:722_10: hotī”ti catusaṭṭhi salākabhattāni upanibandhāpetvā yāvajīvaṃ dānaṃ datvā sīlaṃ rakkhitvā
atk-s0302a:723_0: Puna tato cuto imasmiṃ kappe koṇāgamanassa ca bhagavato kassapadasabalassa cāti dvinnaṃ
atk-s0302a:723_1: buddhānaṃ antare bārāṇasiyaṃ kuṭumbiyaghare nibbatto, so vuddhimanvāya gharāvāsaṃ
atk-s0302a:723_2: vasanto ekadivasaṃ araññe jaṅghavihāraṃ carati. Tasmiñca samaye paccekabuddho nadītīre
atk-s0302a:723_3: cīvarakammaṃ karonto anuvāte appahonte saṅgharitvā ṭhapetuṃ āraddho. So disvā, “kasmā,
atk-s0302a:723_4: bhante, saṅgharitvā ṭhapethā”ti? Āha. Anuvāto nappahotīti. “Iminā, bhante, karothā”ti
atk-s0302a:723_5: sāṭakaṃ datvā, “nibbattanibbattaṭṭhāne me kenaci parihāni mā hotū”ti patthanaṃ paṭṭhapesi.
atk-s0302a:723_6: Gharepissa bhaginiyā saddhiṃ bhariyāya kalahaṃ karontiyā paccekabuddho piṇḍāya pāvisi.
atk-s0302a:724_0: Athassa bhaginī paccekabuddhassa piṇḍapātaṃ datvā tassa bhariyaṃ sandhāya “evarūpaṃ
atk-s0302a:724_1: bālaṃ yojanasatena parivajjeyya”nti patthanaṃ paṭṭhapesi. Sā gehadvāre ṭhitā taṃ
atk-s0302a:724_2: sutvā, “imāya dinnaṃ bhattaṃ esa mā bhuñjatū”ti pattaṃ gahetvā piṇḍapātaṃ chaḍḍetvā
atk-s0302a:724_3: kalalassa pūretvā adāsi. Itarā disvā, “bāle maṃ tāva akkosa vā pahara vā. Evarūpassa
atk-s0302a:724_4: pana dve asaṅkheyyāni pūritapāramissa pattato bhattaṃ chaḍḍetvā kalalaṃ dātuṃ na
atk-s0302a:724_5: yutta”nti āha. Athassa bhariyāya paṭisaṅkhānaṃ uppajji. Sā “tiṭṭhatha, bhante”ti
atk-s0302a:724_6: kalalaṃ chaḍḍetvā pattaṃ dhovitvā gandhacuṇṇena ubbaṭṭetvā pavarassa catumadhurassa
atk-s0302a:724_7: pūretvā upari āsittena padumagabbhavaṇṇena sappinā vijjotamānaṃ paccekabuddhassa
atk-s0302a:724_8: hatthe ṭhapetvā, “yathā ayaṃ piṇḍapāto obhāsajāto, evaṃ obhāsajātaṃ me sarīraṃ hotū”ti
atk-s0302a:724_9: patthanaṃ paṭṭhapesi. Paccekabuddho anumoditvā ākāsaṃ pakkhandi. Tepi jāyampatikā
atk-s0302a:724_10: yāvatāyukaṃ kusalaṃ katvā sagge nibbattitvā puna tato cavitvā upāsako bārāṇasiyaṃ
atk-s0302a:724_11: asītikoṭivibhavassa seṭṭhino putto hutvā nibbatti, itarā tādisasseva dhītā hutvā nibbatti.
atk-s0302a:725_0: Tassa vuddhippattassa tameva seṭṭhidhītaraṃ ānayiṃsu. Tassā pubbe adinnavipākassa
atk-s0302a:725_1: tassa kammassa ānubhāvena patikulaṃ paviṭṭhamattāya ummārabbhantare sakalasarīraṃ
atk-s0302a:725_2: ugghāṭitavaccakuṭi viya duggandhaṃ jātaṃ. Seṭṭhikumāro “kassāyaṃ gandho”ti pucchitvā
atk-s0302a:725_4: Sā eteneva nīhārena sattasu ṭhānesu paṭinivattitā cintesi – “ahaṃ sattasu ṭhānesu
atk-s0302a:725_5: paṭinivattā. Kiṃ me jīvitenā”ti? Attano ābharaṇabhaṇḍaṃ bhañjāpetvā suvaṇṇiṭṭhakaṃ
atk-s0302a:725_6: kāresi ratanāyataṃ vidatthivitthataṃ caturaṅgulubbedhaṃ. Tato haritālamanosilāpiṇḍaṃ
atk-s0302a:725_7: gahetvā aṭṭha uppalahatthake ādāya kassapadasabalassa cetiyakaraṇaṭṭhānaṃ gatā. Tasmiñca
atk-s0302a:725_8: khaṇe ekā iṭṭhakapanti parikkhipitvā āgacchamānā ghaṭaniṭṭhakāya ūnā hoti. Seṭṭhidhītā
atk-s0302a:725_9: vaḍḍhakiṃ āha – “imaṃ iṭṭhakaṃ ettha ṭhapethā”ti. Amma, bhaddake kāle āgatāsi, sayameva
atk-s0302a:725_10: ṭhapehīti. Sā āruyha telena haritālamanosilaṃ yojetvā tena bandhanena iṭṭhakaṃ patiṭṭhapetvā
atk-s0302a:725_11: upari aṭṭhahi uppalahatthakehi pūjaṃ katvā vanditvā, “nibbattanibbattaṭṭhāne me kāyato
atk-s0302a:725_12: candanagandho vāyatu, mukhato uppalagandho”ti patthanaṃ katvā, cetiyaṃ vanditvā,
atk-s0302a:726_0: Atha tasmiṃyeva khaṇe yassa seṭṭhiputtassa paṭhamaṃ gehaṃ nītā, tassa taṃ ārabbha
atk-s0302a:726_1: sati udapādi. Nagarepi nakkhattaṃ saṃghuṭṭhaṃ hoti. So upaṭṭhāke āha – “tadā idha
atk-s0302a:726_2: ānītā seṭṭhidhītā atthi, kahaṃ sā”ti? “Kulagehe sāmī”ti. “Ānetha naṃ, nakkhattaṃ
atk-s0302a:726_3: kīḷissāmā”ti. Te gantvā, taṃ vanditvā ṭhitā “kiṃ, tātā, āgatatthā”ti? Tāya puṭṭhā
atk-s0302a:726_4: taṃ pavattiṃ ācikkhiṃsu. “Tātā, mayā ābharaṇabhaṇḍena cetiyaṃ pūjitaṃ, ābharaṇaṃ
atk-s0302a:726_5: me natthī”ti. Te gantvā seṭṭhiputtassa ārocesuṃ. “Ānetha naṃ, piḷandhanaṃ labhissāmā”ti.
atk-s0302a:726_6: Te ānayiṃsu. Tassā saha gharappavesena sakalagehaṃ candanagandhañceva nīluppalagandhañca vāyi.
atk-s0302a:727_0: Seṭṭhiputto taṃ pucchi – “paṭhamaṃ tava sarīrato duggandho vāyi, idāni pana te sarīrato
atk-s0302a:727_1: candanagandho, mukhato uppalagandho vāyati. Kiṃ eta”nti? Sā ādito paṭṭhāya attano
atk-s0302a:727_2: katakammaṃ ārocesi. Seṭṭhiputto “niyyānikaṃ vata buddhānaṃ sāsana”nti pasīditvā yojanikaṃ
atk-s0302a:727_3: suvaṇṇacetiyaṃ kambalakañcukena parikkhipitvā tattha tattha rathacakkappamāṇehi suvaṇṇapadumehi
atk-s0302a:727_4: alaṅkari. Tesaṃ dvādasahatthā olambakā honti. So tattha yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā sagge
atk-s0302a:727_5: nibbattitvā tato cuto bārāṇasito yojanamatte ṭhāne aññatarasmiṃ amaccakule nibbatti.
atk-s0302a:727_6: Seṭṭhikaññā devalokato cavitvā rājakule jeṭṭhadhītā hutvā nibbatti.
atk-s0302a:728_0: Tesu vayappattesu kumārassa vasanagāme nakkhattaṃ saṃghuṭṭhaṃ, so mātaraṃ āha – “sāṭakaṃ
atk-s0302a:728_1: me amma dehi, nakkhattaṃ kīḷissāmī”ti. Sā dhotavatthaṃ nīharitvā adāsi. “Amma thūlaṃ
atk-s0302a:728_2: ida”nti. Aññaṃ nīharitvā adāsi, tampi paṭikkhipi. Aññaṃ nīharitvā adāsi, tampi paṭikkhipi.
atk-s0302a:728_3: Atha naṃ mātā āha – “tāta, yādise gehe mayaṃ jātā, natthi no ito sukhumatarassa paṭilābhāya
atk-s0302a:728_4: puñña”nti. “Labhanaṭṭhānaṃ gacchāmi ammā”ti. “Putta ahaṃ ajjeva tuyhaṃ bārāṇasinagare
atk-s0302a:728_5: rajjapaṭilābhampi icchāmī”ti. So mātaraṃ vanditvā āha – “gacchāmi ammā”ti. “Gaccha,
atk-s0302a:728_6: tātā”ti. Evaṃ kirassā cittaṃ ahosi – “kahaṃ gamissati, idha vā ettha vā gehe nisīdissatī”ti?
atk-s0302a:728_7: So pana puññaniyāmena nikkhamitvā bārāṇasiṃ gantvā uyyāne maṅgalasilāpaṭṭe sasīsaṃ
atk-s0302a:728_8: pārupitvā nipajji. So cā bārāṇasirañño kālaṅkatassa sattamo divaso hoti.
atk-s0302a:729_0: Amaccā rañño sarīrakiccaṃ katvā rājaṅgaṇe nisīditvā mantayiṃsu – “rañño ekā dhītāva
atk-s0302a:729_1: atthi, putto natthi. Arājakaṃ rajjaṃ na tiṭṭhati. Ko rājā hotī”ti mantetvā, “tvaṃ
atk-s0302a:729_2: hohi, tvaṃ hohī”ti. Purohito āha – “bahuṃ oloketuṃ na vaṭṭati, phussarathaṃ vissajjemā”ti.
atk-s0302a:729_3: Te kumudavaṇṇe cattāro sindhave yojetvā, pañcavidhaṃ rājakakudhabhaṇḍaṃ setacchattañca
atk-s0302a:729_4: rathasmiṃyeva ṭhapetvā rathaṃ vissajjetvā pacchato tūriyāni paggaṇhāpesuṃ. Ratho
atk-s0302a:729_5: pācīnadvārena nikkhamitvā uyyānābhimukho ahosi, “paricayena uyyānābhimukho gacchati,
atk-s0302a:729_6: nivattemā”ti keci āhaṃsu. Purohito “mā nivattayitthā”ti āha. Ratho kumāraṃ padakkhiṇaṃ
atk-s0302a:729_7: katvā ārohanasajjo hutvā aṭṭhāsi. Purohito pārupanakaṇṇaṃ apanetvā pādatalāni olokento
atk-s0302a:729_8: “tiṭṭhatu ayaṃ dīpo, dvisahassadīpaparivāresu catūsu dīpesu esa rajjaṃ kātuṃ yutto”ti
atk-s0302a:729_9: vatvā, “punapi tūriyāni paggaṇhātha punapi paggaṇhāthā”ti tikkhattuṃ tūriyāni paggaṇhāpesi.
atk-s0302a:730_0: Atha kumāro mukhaṃ vivaritvā oloketvā, “kena kammena āgatatthā”ti? Āha. “Deva, tumhākaṃ
atk-s0302a:730_1: rajjaṃ pāpuṇātī”ti. “Rājā kaha”nti. “Devattaṃ gato sāmī”ti. “Kati divasā atikkantā”ti?
atk-s0302a:730_2: “Ajja sattamo divaso”ti. “Putto vā dhītā vā natthī”ti. “Dhītā atthi deva, putto natthī”ti.
atk-s0302a:730_3: “Tena hi karissāmi rajja”nti. Te tāvadeva abhisekamaṇḍapaṃ katvā rājadhītaraṃ sabbālaṅkārehi
atk-s0302a:730_4: alaṅkaritvā uyyānaṃ ānetvā kumārassa abhisekaṃ akaṃsu.
atk-s0302a:731_0: Athassa katābhisekassa satasahassagghanikaṃ vatthaṃ upahariṃsu. So “kimidaṃ, tātā”ti?
atk-s0302a:731_2: ito sukhumataraṃ natthi devā”ti. “Tumhākaṃ rājā evarūpaṃ nivāsesī”ti? “Āma, devā”ti.
atk-s0302a:731_3: “Na maññe puññavā tumhākaṃ rājā, suvaṇṇabhiṅgāraṃ āharatha, labhissāma vattha”nti.
atk-s0302a:731_4: Suvaṇṇabhiṅgāraṃ āhariṃsu. So uṭṭhāya hatthe dhovitvā, mukhaṃ vikkhāletvā, hatthena
atk-s0302a:731_5: udakaṃ ādāya, puratthimadisāya abbhukkiri, ghanapathaviṃ bhinditvā aṭṭha kapparukkhā
atk-s0302a:731_6: uṭṭhahiṃsu. Puna udakaṃ gahetvā dakkhiṇaṃ pacchimaṃ uttaranti evaṃ catasso disā abbhukkiri,
atk-s0302a:731_7: sabbadisāsu aṭṭha aṭṭha katvā dvattiṃsa kapparukkhā uṭṭhahiṃsu. So ekaṃ dibbadussaṃ
atk-s0302a:731_8: nivāsetvā ekaṃ pārupitvā “nandarañño vijite suttakantikā itthiyo mā suttaṃ kantiṃsūti
atk-s0302a:731_9: evaṃ bheriṃ cārāpethā”ti vatvā, chattaṃ ussāpetvā, alaṅkatapaṭiyatto hatthikkhandhavaragato
atk-s0302a:731_10: nagaraṃ pavisitvā, pāsādaṃ āruyha mahāsampattiṃ anubhavi.
atk-s0302a:732_0: Evaṃ kāle gacchante ekadivasaṃ devī rañño sampattiṃ disvā, “aho tapassī”ti kāruññākāraṃ
atk-s0302a:732_1: dassesi. “Kimidaṃ devī”ti? Ca puṭṭhā, “atimahatī, deva, sampatti, atīte buddhānaṃ
atk-s0302a:732_2: saddahitvā kalyāṇaṃ akattha, idāni anāgatassa paccayaṃ kusalaṃ na karothā”ti? Āha.
atk-s0302a:732_3: “Kassa dassāmi? Sīlavanto natthī”ti. “Asuñño, deva, jambudīpo arahantehi, tumhe dānameva
atk-s0302a:732_4: sajjetha, ahaṃ arahante lacchāmī”ti āha. Rājā punadivase pācīnadvāre dānaṃ sajjāpesi.
atk-s0302a:732_5: Devī pātova uposathaṅgāni adhiṭṭhāya uparipāsāde puratthābhimukhā urena nipajjitvā
atk-s0302a:732_6: – “sace etissā disāya arahanto atthi, āgacchantu amhākaṃ bhikkhaṃ gaṇhantū”ti āha.
atk-s0302a:732_7: Tassaṃ disāyaṃ arahanto nāhesuṃ. Taṃ sakkāraṃ kapaṇaddhikayācakānaṃ adaṃsu.
atk-s0302a:733_0: Punadivase dakkhiṇadvāre dānaṃ sajjetvā tatheva akāsi, punadivase pacchimadvāre.
atk-s0302a:733_1: Uttaradvāre sajjitadivase pana deviyā tatheva nimantentiyā himavante vasantānaṃ padumavatiyā
atk-s0302a:733_2: puttānaṃ pañcasatānaṃ paccekabuddhānaṃ jeṭṭhako mahāpadumapaccekabuddho bhātike āmantesi
atk-s0302a:733_3: “mārisā, nandarājā tumhe nimanteti, adhivāsetha tassā”ti. Te adhivāsetvā punadivase
atk-s0302a:733_4: anotattadahe mukhaṃ dhovitvā ākāsena āgantvā uttaradvāre otariṃsu. Manussā gantvā
atk-s0302a:733_5: “pañcasatā, deva, paccekabuddhā āgatā”ti rañño ārocesuṃ. Rājā saddhiṃ deviyā gantvā
atk-s0302a:733_6: vanditvā pattaṃ gahetvā paccekabuddhe pāsādaṃ āropetvā tesaṃ dānaṃ datvā bhattakiccāvasāne
atk-s0302a:733_7: rājā saṅghatherassa, devī saṅghanavakassa pādamūle nipajjitvā, “ayyā paccayehi na
atk-s0302a:733_8: kilamissanti, mayaṃ puññena na hāyissāma, amhākaṃ yāvajīvaṃ idha nivāsāya paṭiññaṃ
atk-s0302a:733_9: dethā”ti paṭiññaṃ kāretvā uyyāne pañca paṇṇasālāsatāni pañca caṅkamanasatānīti sabbākārena
atk-s0302a:734_0: Evaṃ kāle gacchante rañño paccanto kupito. “Ahaṃ paccantaṃ vūpasametuṃ gacchāmi,
atk-s0302a:734_1: tvaṃ paccekabuddhesu mā pamajjī”ti deviṃ ovaditvā gato. Tasmiṃ anāgateyeva paccekabuddhānaṃ
atk-s0302a:734_2: āyusaṅkhārā khīṇā. Mahāpadumapaccekabuddho tiyāmarattiṃ jhānakīḷaṃ kīḷitvā aruṇuggamane
atk-s0302a:734_3: ālambanaphalakaṃ ālambitvā ṭhitakova anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbāyi, etenupāyena
atk-s0302a:734_4: sesāpīti sabbepi parinibbutā. Punadivase devī paccekabuddhānaṃ nisīdanaṭṭhānaṃ haritūpalittaṃ
atk-s0302a:734_5: kāretvā pupphāni vikiritvā dhūpaṃ datvā tesaṃ āgamanaṃ olokayantī nisinnā āgamanaṃ
atk-s0302a:734_6: apassantī purisaṃ pesesi – “gaccha, tāta, jānāhi, kiṃ ayyānaṃ kiñci aphāsuka”nti?
atk-s0302a:734_7: So gantvā mahāpadumassa paṇṇasālāya dvāraṃ vivaritvā tattha apassanto caṅkamanaṃ
atk-s0302a:734_8: gantvā ālambanaphalakaṃ nissāya ṭhitaṃ disvā vanditvā, “kālo, bhante”ti āha. Parinibbutasarīraṃ
atk-s0302a:734_9: kiṃ kathessati? So “niddāyati maññe”ti gantvā piṭṭhipāde hatthena parāmasi. Pādānaṃ
atk-s0302a:734_10: sītalatāya ceva thaddhatāya ca parinibbutabhāvaṃ ñatvā dutiyassa santikaṃ agamāsi,
atk-s0302a:734_11: evaṃ tatiyassāti sabbesaṃ parinibbutabhāvaṃ ñatvā rājakulaṃ gato. “Kahaṃ, tāta, paccekabuddhā”ti?
atk-s0302a:734_12: Puṭṭho “parinibbutā, devī”ti āha. Devī kandantī rodantī nikkhamitvā nāgarehi saddhiṃ
atk-s0302a:734_13: tattha gantvā sādhukīḷitaṃ kāretvā paccekabuddhānaṃ sarīrakiccaṃ katvā dhātuyo gahetvā
atk-s0302a:735_0: Rājā paccantaṃ vūpasametvā āgato paccuggamanaṃ āgataṃ deviṃ pucchi “kiṃ, bhadde,
atk-s0302a:735_1: paccekabuddhesu nappamajji, nirogā ayyā”ti? “Parinibbutā devā”ti. Rājā cintesi –
atk-s0302a:735_2: “evarūpānampi paṇḍitānaṃ maraṇaṃ uppajjati, amhākaṃ kuto mokkho”ti? So nagaraṃ agantvā
atk-s0302a:735_3: uyyānameva pavisitvā jeṭṭhaputtaṃ pakkosāpetvā tassa rajjaṃ paṭiyādetvā sayaṃ samaṇakapabbajjaṃ
atk-s0302a:735_4: pabbaji, devīpi “imasmiṃ pabbajite ahaṃ kiṃ karissāmī”ti? Tattheva uyyāne pabbajitā.
atk-s0302a:735_5: Dvepi jhānaṃ bhāvetvā tato cutā brahmaloke nibbattiṃsu.
atk-s0302a:736_0: Tesu tattheva vasantesu amhākaṃ satthā loke uppajjitvā pavattitavaradhammacakko anupubbena
atk-s0302a:736_1: rājagahaṃ pāvisi. Ayaṃ pippalimāṇavo magadharaṭṭhe mahātitthabrāhmaṇagāme kapilabrāhmaṇassa
atk-s0302a:736_2: aggamahesiyā kucchimhi nibbatto, ayaṃ bhaddā kāpilānī maddaraṭṭhe sāgalanagare kosiyagottabrāhmaṇassa
atk-s0302a:736_3: aggamahesiyā kucchismiṃ nibbattā. Tesaṃ kho anukkamena vaḍḍhamānānaṃ pippalimāṇavassa
atk-s0302a:736_4: vīsatime vasse bhaddāya soḷasame vasse sampatte mātāpitaro puttaṃ oloketvā, “tāta,
atk-s0302a:736_5: tvaṃ vayappatto, kulavaṃso nāma patiṭṭhapetabbo”ti ativiya nippīḷayiṃsu. Māṇavo āha
atk-s0302a:736_6: – “mayhaṃ sotapathe evarūpaṃ kathaṃ mā kathetha. Ahaṃ yāva tumhe dharatha, tāva paṭijaggissāmi,
atk-s0302a:736_7: tumhākaṃ pacchato nikkhamitvā pabbajissāmī”ti. Te katipāhaṃ atikkamitvā puna kathayiṃsu,
atk-s0302a:736_8: sopi tatheva paṭikkhipi. Puna kathayiṃsu, punapi paṭikkhipi. Tato paṭṭhāya mātā nirantaraṃ kathetiyeva.
atk-s0302a:737_0: Māṇavo “mama mātaraṃ saññāpessāmī”ti rattasuvaṇṇassa nikkhasahassaṃ datvā suvaṇṇakārehi
atk-s0302a:737_1: ekaṃ itthirūpaṃ kārāpetvā tassa majjanaghaṭṭanādikammapariyosāne taṃ rattavatthaṃ
atk-s0302a:737_2: nivāsāpetvā vaṇṇasampannehi pupphehi ceva nānāalaṅkārehi ca alaṅkārāpetvā mātaraṃ
atk-s0302a:737_3: pakkosāpetvā āha – “amma evarūpaṃ ārammaṇaṃ labhanto gehe vasāmi, alabhanto na vasāmī”ti.
atk-s0302a:737_4: Paṇḍitā brāhmaṇī cintesi – “mayhaṃ putto puññavā dinnadāno katābhinīhāro, puññaṃ
atk-s0302a:737_5: karonto na ekakova akāsi, addhā etena saha katapuññā suvaṇṇarūpakapaṭibhāgā bhavissatī”ti
atk-s0302a:737_6: aṭṭha brāhmaṇe pakkosāpetvā sabbakāmehi santappetvā suvaṇṇarūpakaṃ rathaṃ āropetvā,
atk-s0302a:737_7: “gacchatha, tātā, yattha amhākaṃ jātigottabhogehi samānakule evarūpaṃ dārikaṃ passatha,
atk-s0302a:737_8: imameva suvaṇṇarūpakaṃ, paṇṇākāraṃ katvā dethā”ti uyyojesi.
atk-s0302a:738_0: Te “amhākaṃ nāma etaṃ kamma”nti nikkhamitvā, “kattha gamissāmā”ti? Cintetvā, “maddaraṭṭhaṃ
atk-s0302a:738_1: nāma itthākaro, maddaraṭṭhaṃ gamissāmā”ti maddaraṭṭhe sāgalanagaraṃ agamiṃsu. Tattha
atk-s0302a:738_2: taṃ suvaṇṇarūpakaṃ nhānatitthe ṭhapetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdiṃsu. Atha bhaddāya dhātī
atk-s0302a:738_3: bhaddaṃ nhāpetvā alaṅkaritvā sirigabbhe nisīdāpetvā nhāyituṃ āgacchantī taṃ rūpakaṃ
atk-s0302a:738_4: disvā, “ayyadhītā me idhāgatā”ti saññāya tajjetvā “dubbinite, kiṃ tvaṃ idhāgatā”ti?
atk-s0302a:738_5: Talasattikaṃ uggiritvā, “gaccha sīgha”nti gaṇḍapasse pahari. Hattho pāsāṇe paṭihato
atk-s0302a:738_6: viya kampittha. Sā paṭikkamitvā “evaṃ thaddhaṃ nāma mahāgīvaṃ disvā, ‘ayyadhītā me’ti
atk-s0302a:738_7: saññaṃ uppādesiṃ, ayyadhītāya hi me ayaṃ nivāsanapaṭiggāhikāpi ayuttā”ti āha. Atha
atk-s0302a:738_8: naṃ te manussā parivāretvā “evarūpā te sāmidhītā”ti pucchiṃsu. “Kiṃ esā, imāya sataguṇena
atk-s0302a:738_9: sahassaguṇena mayhaṃ ayyā abhirūpatarā, dvādasahatthe gabbhe nisinnāya padīpakiccaṃ
atk-s0302a:738_10: natthi, sarīrobhāseneva tamaṃ vidhamatī”ti. “Tena hi āgacchā”ti taṃ khujjaṃ gahetvā
atk-s0302a:738_11: suvaṇṇarūpakaṃ rathaṃ āropetvā kosiyagottassa gharadvāre ṭhatvā āgamanaṃ nivedayiṃsu.
atk-s0302a:739_0: Brāhmaṇo paṭisanthāraṃ katvā, “kuto āgatatthā”ti? Pucchi. “Magadharaṭṭhe mahātitthagāme
atk-s0302a:739_1: kapilabrāhmaṇassa gharato”ti. “Kiṃ kāraṇā āgatā”ti. “Iminā nāma kāraṇenā”ti. “Kalyāṇaṃ,
atk-s0302a:739_2: tātā, samajātigottavibhavo amhākaṃ brāhmaṇo, dassāmi dārika”nti paṇṇākāraṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0302a:739_3: Te kapilabrāhmaṇassa sāsanaṃ pahiṇiṃsu – “laddhā dārikā, kattabbaṃ karothā”ti. Taṃ
atk-s0302a:739_4: sāsanaṃ sutvā pippalimāṇavassa ārocayiṃsu – “laddhā kira dārikā”ti. Māṇavo “ahaṃ
atk-s0302a:739_5: na labhissāmīti cintesiṃ, ime laddhāti ca vadanti, anatthiko hutvā paṇṇaṃ pesissāmī”ti
atk-s0302a:739_6: rahogato paṇṇaṃ likhi, “bhaddā attano jātigottabhogānurūpaṃ gharāvāsaṃ labhatu, ahaṃ
atk-s0302a:739_7: nikkhamitvā pabbajissāmi, mā pacchā vippaṭisārinī ahosī”ti. Bhaddāpi “asukassa kira
atk-s0302a:739_8: maṃ dātukāmā”ti sutvā rahogatā paṇṇaṃ likhi, “ayyaputto attano jātigottabhogānurūpaṃ
atk-s0302a:739_9: gharāvāsaṃ labhatu. Ahaṃ nikkhamitvā pabbajissāmi, mā pacchā vippaṭisārī ahosī”ti.
atk-s0302a:739_10: Dvepi paṇṇāni antarāmagge samāgacchiṃsu. “Idaṃ kassa paṇṇa”nti? Pippalimāṇavena bhaddāya
atk-s0302a:739_11: pahitanti. “Idaṃ kassa paṇṇa”nti? Bhaddāya pippalimāṇavassa pahitanti ca vutte dvepi
atk-s0302a:739_12: vācetvā, “passatha dārakānaṃ kamma”nti phāletvā araññe chaḍḍetvā samānapaṇṇaṃ likhitvā
atk-s0302a:739_13: ito ca etto ca pesesuṃ. Iti tesaṃ anicchamānānaṃyeva samāgamo ahosi.
atk-s0302a:740_0: Taṃdivasaṃyeva ca māṇavopi ekaṃ pupphadāmaṃ ganthāpesi, bhaddāpi ekaṃ ganthāpesi.
atk-s0302a:740_1: Tāni āsanamajjhe ṭhapetvā bhuttasāyamāsā ubhopi “sayanaṃ āruhissāmā”ti samāgantvā
atk-s0302a:740_2: māṇavo dakkhiṇapassena sayanaṃ āruhi. Bhaddā vāmapassena āruhitvā āha – “yassa passe
atk-s0302a:740_3: pupphāni milāyanti, tassa rāgacittaṃ uppannanti vijānissāma, imaṃ pupphadāmaṃ na
atk-s0302a:740_4: allīyitabba”nti. Te pana aññamaññassa sarīrasamphassabhayena tiyāmarattiṃ niddaṃ
atk-s0302a:740_5: anokkamantāva vītināmenti, divā pana hasitamattampi na hoti. Te lokāmisena asaṃsaṭṭhā
atk-s0302a:740_6: yāva mātāpitaro dharanti, tāva kuṭumbaṃ avicāretvā tesu kālaṅkatesu vicārayiṃsu.
atk-s0302a:740_7: Mahatī māṇavassa sampatti, ekadivasaṃ sarīraṃ ubbaṭṭetvā chaḍḍetabbaṃ suvaṇṇacuṇṇameva
atk-s0302a:740_8: magadhanāḷiyā dvādasanāḷimattaṃ laddhuṃ vaṭṭati. Yantabaddhāni saṭṭhi mahātaḷākāni,
atk-s0302a:740_9: kammanto dvādasayojaniko, anurādhapurappamāṇā cuddasa dāsagāmā, cuddasa hatthānīkā,
atk-s0302a:741_0: So ekadivasaṃ alaṅkataṃ assaṃ āruyha mahājanaparivuto kammantaṃ gantvā khettakoṭiyaṃ
atk-s0302a:741_1: ṭhito naṅgalehi bhinnaṭṭhānato kākādayo sakuṇe gaṇḍuppādakādipāṇe uddharitvā khādante
atk-s0302a:741_2: disvā, “tātā, ime kiṃ khādantī”ti pucchi? “Gaṇḍuppādake ayyā”ti. “Etehi kataṃ pāpaṃ
atk-s0302a:741_3: kassa hotī”ti? “Tumhākaṃ, ayyā”ti. So cintesi – “sace etehi kataṃ pāpaṃ mayhaṃ hoti,
atk-s0302a:741_4: kiṃ me karissati sattaasītikoṭidhanaṃ? Kiṃ dvādasayojano kammanto, kiṃ yantabaddhāni
atk-s0302a:741_5: saṭṭhi mahātaḷākāni, kiṃ cuddasa gāmā? Sabbametaṃ bhaddāya kāpilāniyā niyyātetvā
atk-s0302a:742_0: Bhaddāpi kāpilānī tasmiṃ khaṇe abbhantaravatthumhi tayo tilakumbhe pattharāpetvā
atk-s0302a:742_1: dhātīhi parivutā nisinnā kāke tilapāṇake khādamāne disvā, “ammā kiṃ ime khādantī”ti?
atk-s0302a:742_2: Pucchi. “Pāṇake ayye”ti. “Akusalaṃ kassa hotī”ti? “Tumhākaṃ ayye”ti. Sā cintesi –
atk-s0302a:742_3: “mayhaṃ catuhatthavatthaṃ nāḷikodanamattañca laddhuṃ vaṭṭati, yadi ca panetaṃ ettakena
atk-s0302a:742_4: janena kataṃ akusalaṃ mayhaṃ hoti, bhavasahassenapi vaṭṭato sīsaṃ ukkhipituṃ na sakkā,
atk-s0302a:742_5: ayyaputte āgatamatteyeva sabbaṃ tassa niyyātetvā nikkhamma pabbajissāmī”ti.
atk-s0302a:743_0: Māṇavo āgantvā nhatvā pāsādaṃ āruyha mahārahe pallaṅke nisīdi, athassa cakkavattino
atk-s0302a:743_1: anucchavikaṃ bhojanaṃ sajjayiṃsu. Dvepi bhuñjitvā parijane nikkhante rahogatā phāsukaṭṭhāne
atk-s0302a:743_2: nisīdiṃsu. Tato māṇavo bhaddaṃ āha – “bhadde, tvaṃ imaṃ gharaṃ āgacchantī kittakaṃ
atk-s0302a:743_3: dhanaṃ āharī”ti? “Pañcapaṇṇāsa sakaṭasahassāni ayyā”ti. “Etaṃ sabbaṃ, yā ca imasmiṃ
atk-s0302a:743_4: ghare sattaasītikoṭiyo, yantabaddhā saṭṭhitaḷākādibhedā sampatti atthi, sabbaṃ tuyhaṃyeva
atk-s0302a:743_5: niyyātemī”ti. “Tumhe pana ayyā”ti. “Ahaṃ pabbajissāmī”ti. “Ayyā ahampi tumhākaṃyeva
atk-s0302a:743_6: āgamanaṃ olokayamānā nisinnā, ahampi pabbajissāmī”ti. Tesaṃ ādittapaṇṇakuṭi viya
atk-s0302a:743_7: tayo bhavā upaṭṭhahiṃsu. Te “pabbajissāmā”ti vatvā antarāpaṇato kasāyarasapītāni
atk-s0302a:743_8: vatthāni mattikāpatte ca āharāpetvā aññamaññaṃ kese ohāretvā, “ye loke arahanto,
atk-s0302a:743_9: te uddissa amhākaṃ pabbajjā”ti pabbajitvā thavikāsu patte osāpetvā aṃse laggetvā
atk-s0302a:743_10: pāsādato otariṃsu. Gehe dāsesu ca kammakāresu ca na koci sañjāni.
atk-s0302a:744_0: Atha ne brāhmaṇagāmato nikkhamma dāsagāmadvārena gacchante ākappakuttavasena dāsagāmavāsino
atk-s0302a:744_1: sañjāniṃsu. Te rudantā pādesu nipatitvā “kiṃ amhe anāthe karotha ayyā”ti? Āhaṃsu.
atk-s0302a:744_2: “Mayaṃ, bhaṇe ‘ādittapaṇṇasālā viya tayo bhavā’ti pabbajimhā, sace tumhesu ekekaṃ
atk-s0302a:744_3: bhujissaṃ karoma, vassasatampi nappahoti, tumheva tumhākaṃ sīsaṃ dhovitvā bhujissā
atk-s0302a:744_4: hutvā jīvathā”ti vatvā tesaṃ rodantānaṃyeva pakkamiṃsu. Thero purato gacchanto nivattitvā
atk-s0302a:744_5: olokento cintesi – “ayaṃ bhaddā kāpilānī sakalajambudīpagghanikā itthī mayhaṃ pacchato
atk-s0302a:744_6: āgacchati. Ṭhānaṃ kho panetaṃ vijjati, yaṃ kocideva evaṃ cinteyya ‘ime pabbajitvāpi
atk-s0302a:744_7: vinā bhavituṃ na sakkonti, ananucchavikaṃ karontī”ti. “Koci vā pana manaṃ padūsetvā
atk-s0302a:744_8: apāyapūrako bhaveyya. Imaṃ pahāya mayā gantuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti cittaṃ uppādesi.
atk-s0302a:745_0: So purato gacchanto dvedhāpathaṃ disvā tassa matthake aṭṭhāsi. Bhaddāpi āgantvā vanditvā
atk-s0302a:745_1: aṭṭhāsi. Atha naṃ āha – “bhadde, tādisiṃ itthiṃ mama pacchato āgacchantiṃ disvā,
atk-s0302a:745_2: ‘ime pabbajitvāpi vinā bhavituṃ na sakkontī’ti cintetvā amhesu paduṭṭhacitto mahājano
atk-s0302a:745_3: apāyapūrako bhaveyya. Imasmiṃ dvedhāpathe tvaṃ ekaṃ gaṇha, ahaṃ ekena gamissāmī”ti.
atk-s0302a:745_4: “Āma, ayya, pabbajitānaṃ mātugāmo nāma malaṃ, ‘pabbajitvāpi vinā na bhavantī’ti amhākaṃ
atk-s0302a:745_5: dosaṃ passanti, tumhe ekaṃ maggaṃ gaṇhatha, vinā bhavissāmā”ti tikkhattuṃ padakkhiṇaṃ
atk-s0302a:745_6: katvā catūsu ṭhānesu pañcapatiṭṭhitena vanditvā dasanakhasamodhānasamujjalaṃ añjaliṃ
atk-s0302a:745_7: paggayha, “satasahassakappappamāṇe addhāne kato mittasanthavo ajja bhijjatī”ti vatvā,
atk-s0302a:745_8: “tumhe dakkhiṇajātikā nāma, tumhākaṃ dakkhiṇamaggo vaṭṭati, mayaṃ mātugāmā nāma vāmajātikā,
atk-s0302a:745_9: amhākaṃ vāmamaggo vaṭṭatī”ti vanditvā maggaṃ paṭipannā. Tesaṃ dvedhābhūtakāle ayaṃ
atk-s0302a:745_10: mahāpathavī “ahaṃ cakkavāḷagirisinerupabbate dhāretuṃ sakkontīpi tumhākaṃ guṇe dhāretuṃ
atk-s0302a:745_11: na sakkomī”ti vadantī viya viravamānā akampi, ākāse asanisaddo viya pavatti, cakkavāḷapabbato unnadi.
atk-s0302a:746_0: Sammāsambuddho veḷuvanamahāvihāre gandhakuṭiyaṃ nisinno pathavīkampanasaddaṃ sutvā,
atk-s0302a:746_1: “kassa nu kho pathavī kampatī”ti? Āvajjento “pippalimāṇavo ca bhaddā ca kāpilānī
atk-s0302a:746_2: maṃ uddissa appameyyaṃ sampattiṃ pahāya pabbajitā, tesaṃ viyogaṭṭhāne ubhinnampi
atk-s0302a:746_3: guṇabalena ayaṃ pathavīkampo jāto, mayāpi etesaṃ saṅgahaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti gandhakuṭito
atk-s0302a:746_4: nikkhamma sayameva pattacīvaraṃ ādāya, asītimahātheresu kañci anāmantetvā tigāvutaṃ
atk-s0302a:746_5: maggaṃ paccuggamanaṃ katvā rājagahassa ca nāḷandāya ca antare bahuputtakanigrodharukkhamūle
atk-s0302a:746_6: pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā nisīdi. Nisīdanto pana aññataro paṃsukūliko viya anisīditvā buddhavesaṃ
atk-s0302a:746_7: gahetvā asītihatthā ghanabuddharasmiyo vissajjento nisīdi. Iti tasmiṃ khaṇe paṇṇachattasakaṭacakkakūṭāgārādippamāṇā
atk-s0302a:746_8: buddharasmiyo ito cito ca vipphandantiyo vidhāvantiyo candimasahassasūriyasahassauggamanakālo
atk-s0302a:746_9: viya kurumānā taṃ vanantaraṃ ekobhāsaṃ akaṃsu. Dvattiṃsamahāpurisalakkhaṇānaṃ siriyā
atk-s0302a:746_10: samujjalitatārāgaṇaṃ viya gaganaṃ, supupphitakamalakuvalayaṃ viya salilaṃ, vanantaraṃ
atk-s0302a:746_11: virocittha. Nigrodharukkhassa nāma khandho seto hoti, pattāni nīlāni pakkāni rattāni.
atk-s0302a:746_12: Tasmiṃ pana divase satasākho nigrodharukkho suvaṇṇavaṇṇo ahosi.
atk-s0302a:747_0: Iti yā sā addhānamaggappaṭipannoti padassa atthaṃ vatvā, “idāni yathā esa pabbajito,
atk-s0302a:747_1: yathā ca addhānamaggaṃ paṭipanno. Imassa atthassa āvibhāvatthaṃ abhinīhārato paṭṭhāya
atk-s0302a:747_2: ayaṃ anupubbikathā kathetabbā”ti vuttā, sā evaṃ veditabbā.
atk-s0302a:748_0: Antarā ca rājagahaṃ antarā ca nāḷandanti rājagahassa ca nāḷandāya ca antare. Satthārañca
atk-s0302a:748_1: vatāhaṃ passeyyaṃ bhagavantameva passeyyanti sace ahaṃ satthāraṃ passeyyaṃ, imaṃyeva
atk-s0302a:748_2: bhagavantaṃ passeyyaṃ. Na hi me ito aññena satthārā bhavituṃ sakkāti. Sugatañca vatāhaṃ
atk-s0302a:748_3: passeyyaṃ bhagavantameva passeyyanti sace ahaṃ sammāpaṭipattiyā suṭṭhu gatattā sugataṃ
atk-s0302a:748_4: nāma passeyyaṃ, imaṃyeva bhagavantaṃ passeyyaṃ. Na hi me ito aññena sugatena bhavituṃ
atk-s0302a:748_5: sakkāti. Sammāsambuddhañca vatāhaṃ passeyyaṃ bhagavantameva passeyyanti sace ahaṃ
atk-s0302a:748_6: sammā sāmañca saccāni buddhattā sammāsambuddhaṃ nāma passeyyaṃ, imaṃyeva bhagavantaṃ
atk-s0302a:748_7: passeyyaṃ. Na hi me ito aññena sammāsambuddhena bhavituṃ sakkāti ayamettha adhippāyo.
atk-s0302a:748_8: Evaṃ dassaneneva “bhagavati ‘ayaṃ satthā, ayaṃ sugato, ayaṃ sammāsambuddho’ti nikkaṅkho
atk-s0302a:748_9: ahaṃ, āvuso, ahosi”nti dīpeti. Satthā me, bhanteti idaṃ kiñcāpi dve vāre āgataṃ,
atk-s0302a:748_10: tikkhattuṃ pana vuttanti veditabbaṃ. Iminā hi so “evaṃ tikkhattuṃ sāvakattaṃ sāvesiṃ, āvuso”ti dīpeti.
atk-s0302a:749_0: Ajānaññevāti ajānamānova. Dutiyapadepi eseva nayo. Muddhāpi tassa vipateyyāti yassa
atk-s0302a:749_1: aññassa “ajānaṃyeva jānāmī”ti paṭiññassa bāhirakassa satthuno evaṃ sabbacetasā samannāgato
atk-s0302a:749_2: pasannacitto sāvako evarūpaṃ paramanipaccakāraṃ kareyya, tassa vaṇṭachinnatālapakkaṃ
atk-s0302a:749_3: viya gīvato muddhāpi vipateyya, sattadhā pana phaleyyāti attho. Kiṃ vā etena, sace
atk-s0302a:749_4: mahākassapatthero iminā cittappasādena imaṃ paramanipaccakāraṃ mahāsamuddassa kareyya,
atk-s0302a:749_5: tattakapāle pakkhittaudakabindu viya vilayaṃ gaccheyya. Sace cakkavāḷassa kareyya,
atk-s0302a:749_6: thusamuṭṭhi viya vikireyya. Sace sinerupabbatassa kareyya, kākatuṇḍena pahaṭapiṭṭhamuṭṭhi
atk-s0302a:749_7: viya viddhaṃseyya. Sace mahāpathaviyā kareyya, vātāhatabhasmapuñjo viya vikireyya.
atk-s0302a:749_8: Evarūpopi pana therassa nipaccākāro satthu suvaṇṇavaṇṇe pādapiṭṭhe lomamattampi vikopetuṃ
atk-s0302a:749_9: nāsakkhi. Tiṭṭhatu ca mahākassapo, mahākassapasadisānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ sahassampi satasahassampi
atk-s0302a:749_10: nipaccākāradassanena neva dasabalassa pādapiṭṭhe lomamattampi vikopetuṃ paṃsukūlacīvare
atk-s0302a:749_11: vā aṃsumattampi cāletuṃ sakkoti. Evaṃ mahānubhāvo hi satthā.
atk-s0302a:750_0: Tasmātiha te kassapāti yasmā ahaṃ jānanto eva “jānāmī”ti, passanto eva ca “passāmī”ti
atk-s0302a:750_1: vadāmi, tasmā, kassapa, tayā evaṃ sikkhitabbaṃ. Tibbanti bahalaṃ mahantaṃ. Hirottappanti
atk-s0302a:750_2: hirī ca ottappañca. Paccupaṭṭhitaṃ bhavissatīti paṭhamatarameva upaṭṭhitaṃ bhavissati.
atk-s0302a:750_3: Yo hi therādīsu hirottappaṃ upaṭṭhapetvā upasaṅkamati therādayopi taṃ sahirikā saottappā
atk-s0302a:750_4: ca hutvā upasaṅkamantīti ayamettha ānisaṃso. Kusalūpasaṃhitanti kusalasannissitaṃ.
atk-s0302a:750_5: Aṭṭhiṃ katvāti attānaṃ tena dhammena aṭṭhikaṃ katvā, taṃ vā dhammaṃ “esa mayhaṃ attho”ti
atk-s0302a:750_6: aṭṭhiṃ katvā. Manasi katvāti citte ṭhapetvā. Sabbacetasā samannāharitvāti cittassa
atk-s0302a:750_7: thokampi bahi gantuṃ adento sabbena samannāhāracittena samannāharitvā. Ohitasototi
atk-s0302a:750_8: ṭhapitasoto, ñāṇasotañca pasādasotañca odahitvā mayā desitaṃ dhammaṃ sakkaccameva
atk-s0302a:750_9: suṇissāmīti evañhi te sikkhitabbaṃ. Sātasahagatā ca me kāyagatāsatīti asubhesu ceva
atk-s0302a:750_10: ānāpāne ca paṭhamajjhānavasena sukhasampayuttā kāyagatāsati. Yo ca panāyaṃ tividho
atk-s0302a:750_11: ovādo, therassa ayameva pabbajjā ca upasampadā ca ahosi.
atk-s0302a:751_0: Saraṇoti sakileso saiṇo hutvā. Raṭṭhapiṇḍaṃ bhuñjinti saddhādeyyaṃ bhuñjiṃ. Cattāro
atk-s0302a:751_1: hi paribhogā theyyaparibhogo iṇaparibhogo dāyajjaparibhogo sāmiparibhogoti. Tattha
atk-s0302a:751_2: dussīlassa saṅghamajjhe nisīditvā bhuñjantassāpi paribhogo theyyaparibhogo nāma.
atk-s0302a:751_3: Kasmā? Catūsu paccayesu anissaratāya. Sīlavato apaccavekkhitaparibhogo iṇaparibhogo
atk-s0302a:751_4: nāma. Sattannaṃ sekhānaṃ paribhogo dāyajjaparibhogo nāma. Khīṇāsavassa paribhogo
atk-s0302a:751_5: sāmiparibhogo nāma. Iti khīṇāsavova sāmī hutvā anaṇo paribhuñjati. Thero attanā puthujjanena
atk-s0302a:751_6: hutvā paribhuttaparibhogaṃ iṇaparibhogaṃyeva karonto evamāha. Aṭṭhamiyā aññā udapādīti
atk-s0302a:752_0: Atha kho, āvuso, bhagavā maggā okkammāti maggato okkamanaṃ paṭhamataraṃ taṃdivaseyeva
atk-s0302a:752_1: ahosi, arahattādhigamo pacchā. Desanāvārassa pana evaṃ āgatattā arahattādhigamo paṭhamaṃ
atk-s0302a:752_2: dīpito. Kasmā pana bhagavā maggā okkantoti? Evaṃ kirassa ahosi “imaṃ bhikkhuṃ jātiāraññikaṃ
atk-s0302a:753_0: Mudukā kho tyāyanti mudukā kho te ayaṃ. Imañca pana vācaṃ bhagavā taṃ cīvaraṃ padumapupphavaṇṇena
atk-s0302a:753_1: pāṇinā antantena parāmasanto āha. Kasmā evamāhāti? Therena saha cīvaraṃ parivattetukāmatāya.
atk-s0302a:753_2: Kasmā parivattetukāmo jātoti? Theraṃ attano ṭhāne ṭhapetukāmatāya. Thero pana yasmā
atk-s0302a:753_3: cīvarassa vā pattassa vā vaṇṇe kathite “imaṃ tumhākaṃ gaṇhathā”tivacanaṃ cārittameva,
atk-s0302a:753_4: tasmā “paṭiggaṇhātu me, bhante, bhagavā”ti āha. Dhāressasi pana me tvaṃ, kassapa,
atk-s0302a:753_5: sāṇāni paṃsukūlāni nibbasanānīti, kassapa, tvaṃ imāni paribhogajiṇṇāni paṃsukūlāni
atk-s0302a:753_6: pārupituṃ sakkhissasīti vadati. Tañca kho na kāyabalaṃ sandhāya, paṭipattipūraṇaṃ
atk-s0302a:753_7: pana sandhāya evamāha. Ayañhettha adhippāyo – ahaṃ imaṃ cīvaraṃ puṇṇaṃ nāma dāsiṃ
atk-s0302a:753_8: pārupitvā āmakasusāne chaḍḍitaṃ taṃ susānaṃ pavisitvā tumbamattehi pāṇakehi samparikiṇṇaṃ
atk-s0302a:753_9: te pāṇake vidhunitvā mahāariyavaṃse ṭhatvā aggahesiṃ, tassa me imaṃ cīvaraṃ gahitadivase
atk-s0302a:753_10: dasasahassacakkavāḷe mahāpathavī mahāviravaṃ viravamānā kampittha, ākāso taṭataṭāyi,
atk-s0302a:753_11: cakkavāḷadevatā sādhukāramadaṃsu, “imaṃ cīvaraṃ gaṇhantena bhikkhunā jātipaṃsukūlikena
atk-s0302a:753_12: jātiāraññikena jātiekāsanikena jātisapadānacārikena bhavituṃ vaṭṭati, tvaṃ imassa
atk-s0302a:753_13: cīvarassa anucchavikaṃ kātuṃ sakkhissasī”ti. Theropi attanā pañcannaṃ hatthīnaṃ balaṃ
atk-s0302a:753_14: dhāreti, so taṃ atakkayitvā “ahametaṃ paṭipattiṃ pūressāmī”ti ussāhena sugatacīvarassa
atk-s0302a:753_15: anucchavikaṃ kātukāmo “dhāressāmahaṃ, bhante”ti āha. Paṭipajjinti paṭipannosmi. Evaṃ
atk-s0302a:753_16: pana cīvaraparivattanaṃ katvā ca therena pārutacīvaraṃ bhagavā pārupi, satthu cīvaraṃ
atk-s0302a:753_17: thero. Tasmiṃ samaye mahāpathavī udakapariyantaṃ katvā unnadantī kampittha.
atk-s0302a:754_0: Bhagavato puttotiādīsu thero bhagavantaṃ nissāya ariyāya jātiyā jātoti bhagavato
atk-s0302a:754_1: putto. Urena vasitvā mukhato nikkhantaovādavasena pabbajjāya ceva upasampadāya ca
atk-s0302a:754_2: patiṭṭhitattā oraso mukhato jāto. Ovādadhammato jātattā ovādadhammena ca nimmitattā
atk-s0302a:754_3: dhammajo dhammanimmito. Ovādadhammadāyādaṃ navalokuttaradhammadāyādameva vā arahatīti
atk-s0302a:754_4: dhammadāyādo. Paṭiggahitāni sāṇāni paṃsukūlānīti satthārā pārutaṃ paṃsukūlacīvaraṃ
atk-s0302a:755_0: Sammā vadamāno vadeyyāti yaṃ puggalaṃ “bhagavato putto”tiādīhi guṇehi sammā vadamāno
atk-s0302a:755_1: vadeyya, mamaṃ taṃ sammā vadamāno vadeyya, ahaṃ evarūpoti. Ettāvatā therena pabbajjā
atk-s0302a:755_2: ca parisodhitā hoti. Ayañhettha adhippāyo – āvuso, yassa na upajjhāyo paññāyati,
atk-s0302a:755_3: na ācariyo, kiṃ so anupajjhāyo anācariyo nhāpitamuṇḍako sayaṃgahitakāsāvo “titthiyapakkantako”ti
atk-s0302a:755_4: saṅkhaṃ gato evaṃ tigāvutaṃ maggaṃ paccuggamanaṃ labhati, tīhi ovādehi pabbajjaṃ
atk-s0302a:755_5: vā upasampadaṃ vā labhati, kāyena kāyaṃ cīvaraparivattanaṃ labhati? Passa yāva dubbhāsitaṃ
atk-s0302a:755_6: vacanaṃ thullanandāya bhikkhuniyāti. Evaṃ pabbajjaṃ sodhetvā idāni chahi abhiññāhi
atk-s0302a:755_7: sīhanādaṃ nadituṃ ahaṃ kho, āvusotiādimāha. Sesaṃ purimanayeneva veditabbaṃ. Ekādasamaṃ.
atk-s0302a:757_0: 155. Dvādasame tathāgatoti satto. Na hetaṃ, āvuso, atthasaṃhitanti, āvuso, etaṃ diṭṭhigataṃ
atk-s0302a:757_1: atthasannissitaṃ na hoti. Nādibrahmacariyakanti maggabrahmacariyassa pubbabhāgapaṭipadāpi
atk-s0302a:757_2: na hoti. Etañhi, āvuso, atthasaṃhitanti, āvuso, etaṃ catusaccakammaṭṭhānaṃ atthasannissitaṃ.
atk-s0302a:757_3: Etaṃ ādibrahmacariyakanti etaṃ maggabrahmacariyassa ādi pubbabhāgapaṭipadā. Dvādasamaṃ.
atk-s0302a:759_0: 156. Terasame aññāya saṇṭhahiṃsūti arahatte patiṭṭhahiṃsu. Saddhammappatirūpakanti
atk-s0302a:760: “Obhāse ceva ñāṇe ca, pītiyā ca vikampati;
atk-s0302a:761: Passaddhiyā sukhe ceva, yehi cittaṃ pavedhati.
atk-s0302a:765: Dhammuddhaccakusalo hoti, na ca sammoha gacchatī”ti. ; –
atk-s0302a:766_0: Idaṃ vipassanāñāṇassa upakkilesajātaṃ adhigamasaddhammappatirūpakaṃ nāma. Tisso pana
atk-s0302a:766_1: saṅgītiyo anāruḷhaṃ dhātukathā ārammaṇakathā asubhakathā ñāṇavatthukathā vijjākaraṇḍakoti
atk-s0302a:766_2: imehi pañcahi kathāvatthūhi paribāhiraṃ guḷhavinayaṃ guḷhavessantaraṃ guḷhamahosadhaṃ
atk-s0302a:767_1: Chaṇakālesu hi manussā “ābharaṇabhaṇḍakaṃ gaṇhissāmā”ti āpaṇaṃ gacchanti. Atha ne
atk-s0302a:767_2: āpaṇikā evaṃ vadanti, “sace tumhe ābharaṇatthikā, imāni gaṇhatha. Imāni hi ghanāni
atk-s0302a:767_3: ceva vaṇṇavantāni ca appagghāni cā”ti. Te tesaṃ sutvā, “kāraṇaṃ ime vadanti, imāni
atk-s0302a:767_4: piḷandhitvā sakkā nakkhattaṃ kīḷituṃ, sobhanti ceva appagghāni cā”ti tāni gahetvā
atk-s0302a:767_5: gacchanti. Suvaṇṇabhaṇḍaṃ avikkiyamānaṃ nidahitvā ṭhapetabbaṃ hoti. Evaṃ taṃ jātarūpappatirūpake
atk-s0302a:768_0: Atha saddhammassa antaradhānaṃ hotīti adhigamasaddhammassa paṭipattisaddhammassa
atk-s0302a:768_1: pariyattisaddhammassāti tividhassāpi saddhammassa antaradhānaṃ hoti. Paṭhamabodhiyañhi
atk-s0302a:768_2: bhikkhū paṭisambhidappattā ahesuṃ. Atha kāle gacchante paṭisambhidā pāpuṇituṃ na
atk-s0302a:768_3: sakkhiṃsu, chaḷabhiññā ahesuṃ. Tato cha abhiññā pāpuṇituṃ asakkontā tisso vijjā pāpuṇiṃsu.
atk-s0302a:768_4: Idāni kāle gacchante tisso vijjā pāpuṇituṃ asakkontā āsavakkhayamattaṃ pāpuṇissanti.
atk-s0302a:768_5: Tampi asakkontā anāgāmiphalaṃ, tampi asakkontā sakadāgāmiphalaṃ, tampi asakkontā
atk-s0302a:768_6: sotāpattiphalaṃ. Gacchante kāle sotāpattiphalampi pattuṃ na sakkhissanti. Atha nesaṃ
atk-s0302a:768_7: yadā vipassanā imehi upakkilesehi upakkiliṭṭhā āraddhamattāva ṭhassati, tadā adhigamasaddhammo
atk-s0302a:769_0: Paṭhamabodhiyañhi bhikkhū catunnaṃ paṭisambhidānaṃ anucchavikaṃ paṭipattiṃ pūrayiṃsu.
atk-s0302a:769_1: Gacchante kāle taṃ asakkontā channaṃ abhiññānaṃ, tampi asakkontā tissannaṃ vijjānaṃ,
atk-s0302a:769_2: tampi asakkontā arahattaphalamattassa. Gacchante pana kāle arahattassa anucchavikaṃ
atk-s0302a:769_3: paṭipattiṃ pūretuṃ asakkontā anāgāmiphalassa anucchavikaṃ paṭipattiṃ pūressanti,
atk-s0302a:769_4: tampi asakkontā sakadāgāmiphalassa, tampi asakkontā sotāpattiphalassa. Yadā pana
atk-s0302a:769_5: sotāpattiphalassapi anucchavikaṃ paṭipadaṃ pūretuṃ asakkontā sīlapārisuddhimatteva
atk-s0302a:769_6: ṭhassanti, tadā paṭipattisaddhammo antarahito nāma bhavissati.
atk-s0302a:770_0: Yāva pana tepiṭakaṃ buddhavacanaṃ vattati, na tāva sāsanaṃ antarahitanti vattuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-s0302a:770_1: Tiṭṭhantu tīṇi vā, abhidhammapiṭake antarahite itaresu dvīsu tiṭṭhantesupi antarahitanti
atk-s0302a:770_2: na vattabbameva. Dvīsu antarahitesu vinayapiṭakamatte ṭhitepi, tatrāpi khandhakaparivāresu
atk-s0302a:770_3: antarahitesu ubhatovibhaṅgamatte, mahāvinaye antarahite dvīsu pātimokkhesu vattamānesupi
atk-s0302a:770_4: sāsanaṃ anantarahitameva. Yadā pana dve pātimokkhā antaradhāyissanti, atha pariyattisaddhammassa
atk-s0302a:770_5: antaradhānaṃ bhavissati. Tasmiṃ antarahite sāsanaṃ antarahitaṃ nāma hoti. Pariyattiyā
atk-s0302a:770_6: hi antarahitāya paṭipatti antaradhāyati, paṭipattiyā antarahitāya adhigamo antaradhāyati.
atk-s0302a:770_7: Kiṃ kāraṇā? Ayañhi pariyatti paṭipattiyā paccayo hoti, paṭipatti adhigamassa. Iti
atk-s0302a:771_0: Nanu ca kassapasammāsambuddhakāle kapilo nāma anārādhakabhikkhu “pātimokkhaṃ uddisissāmī”ti
atk-s0302a:771_1: bījaniṃ gahetvā āsane nisinno “atthi imasmiṃ vattantā”ti pucchi, atha tassa bhayena
atk-s0302a:771_2: yesampi pātimokkho vattati, tepi “mayaṃ vattāmā”ti avatvā “na vattāmā”ti vadiṃsu,
atk-s0302a:771_3: so bījaniṃ ṭhapetvā uṭṭhāyāsanā gato, tadā sammāsambuddhassa sāsanaṃ osakkitanti?
atk-s0302a:771_4: Kiñcāpi osakkitaṃ, pariyatti pana ekanteneva pamāṇaṃ. Yathā hi mahato taḷākassa pāḷiyā
atk-s0302a:771_5: thirāya udakaṃ na ṭhassatīti na vattabbaṃ, udake sati padumādīni pupphāni na pupphissantīti
atk-s0302a:771_6: na vattabbaṃ, evameva mahātaḷākassa thirapāḷisadise tepiṭake buddhavacane sati mahātaḷāke
atk-s0302a:771_7: udakasadisā paṭipattipūrakā kulaputtā natthīti na vattabbā, tesu sati mahātaḷāke
atk-s0302a:771_8: padumādīni pupphāni viya sotāpannādayo ariyapuggalā natthīti na vattabbāti evaṃ ekantato
atk-s0302a:772_0: Pathavīdhātūti dve satasahassāni cattāri ca nahutāni bahalā mahāpathavī. Āpodhātūti
atk-s0302a:772_1: pathavito paṭṭhāya yāva subhakiṇhabrahmalokā uggataṃ kappavināsakaṃ udakaṃ. Tejodhātūti
atk-s0302a:772_2: pathavito paṭṭhāya yāva ābhassarabrahmalokā uggato kappavināsako aggi. Vāyodhātūti
atk-s0302a:772_3: pathavito paṭṭhāya yāva vehapphalabrahmalokā uggato kappavināsako vāyu. Etesu hi
atk-s0302a:772_4: ekadhammopi satthu sāsanaṃ antaradhāpetuṃ na sakkoti, tasmā evamāha. Idheva te uppajjantīti
atk-s0302a:772_5: lohato lohakhādakaṃ malaṃ viya imasmiṃ mayhaṃyeva sāsane te uppajjanti. Moghapurisāti tucchapurisā.
atk-s0302a:773_0: Ādikeneva opilavatīti ettha ādikenāti ādānena gahaṇena. Opilavatīti nimujjati. Idaṃ
atk-s0302a:773_1: vuttaṃ hoti – yathā udakacarā nāvā bhaṇḍaṃ gaṇhantī nimujjati, evaṃ pariyattiādīnaṃ
atk-s0302a:773_2: pūraṇena saddhammassa antaradhānaṃ na hoti. Pariyattiyā hi hāyamānāya paṭipatti hāyati,
atk-s0302a:773_3: paṭipattiyā hāyamānāya adhigamo hāyati. Pariyattiyā pūrayamānāya pariyattidharā puggalā
atk-s0302a:773_4: paṭipattiṃ pūrenti, paṭipattipūrakā adhigamaṃ pūrenti. Iti navacando viya pariyattiyādīsu
atk-s0302a:773_5: vaḍḍhamānāsu mayhaṃ sāsanaṃ vaḍḍhati yevāti dasseti.
atk-s0302a:774_0: Idāni yehi dhammehi saddhammassa antaradhānañceva ṭhiti ca hoti, te dassento pañca
atk-s0302a:774_1: khotiādimāha. Tattha okkamanīyāti avakkamanīyā, heṭṭhāgamanīyāti attho. Satthari
atk-s0302a:774_2: agāravātiādīsu agāravāti gāravarahitā. Appatissāti appatissayā anīcavuttikā. Tattha
atk-s0302a:774_3: yo cetiyaṅgaṇaṃ ārohanto chattaṃ dhāreti, upāhanaṃ dhāreti, aññato oloketvā kathaṃ
atk-s0302a:774_4: kathento gacchati, ayaṃ satthari agāravo nāma.
atk-s0302a:775_0: Yo dhammassavanassa kāle saṅghuṭṭhe daharasāmaṇerehi parivārito nisīdati, aññāni
atk-s0302a:775_1: vā navakammādīni karoti, dhammassavanagge nisinno niddāyati, vikkhitto vā aññaṃ kathento
atk-s0302a:776_0: Yo therupaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā, avanditvā nisīdati, hatthapallatthikaṃ dussapallatthikaṃ
atk-s0302a:776_1: karoti, aññaṃ vā pana hatthapādakukkuccaṃ karoti, vuḍḍhānaṃ santike anajjhiṭṭho katheti,
atk-s0302a:777_0: Tisso pana sikkhā apūrentova sikkhāya agāravo nāma hoti. Aṭṭha samāpattiyo anibbattento
atk-s0302a:777_1: tāsaṃ vā pana nibbattanatthāya payogaṃ akaronto samādhismiṃ agāravo nāma. Sukkapakkho
atk-s0302a:782_0: 157. Lābhasakkārasaṃyuttassa paṭhame dāruṇoti thaddho. Lābhasakkārasilokoti ettha
atk-s0302a:782_1: lābho nāma catupaccayalābho. Sakkāroti tesaṃyeva sukatānaṃ susaṅkhatānaṃ lābho. Silokoti
atk-s0302a:782_2: vaṇṇaghoso. Kaṭukoti tikhiṇo. Pharusoti kharo. Antarāyikoti antarāyakaro. Paṭhamaṃ.
atk-s0302a:784_0: 158. Dutiye bāḷisikoti baḷisaṃ gahetvā caramāno macchaghātako. Āmisagatanti āmisamakkhitaṃ.
atk-s0302a:784_1: Āmisacakkhūti āmise cakkhu dassanaṃ assāti āmisacakkhu. Gilabaḷisoti gilitabaḷiso.
atk-s0302a:784_2: Anayaṃ āpannoti dukkhaṃ patto. Byasanaṃ āpannoti vināsaṃ patto. Yathākāmakaraṇīyoti
atk-s0302a:784_3: yathākāmena yathāruciyā yatheva naṃ bāḷisiko icchati, tathevassa kattabboti attho.
atk-s0302a:784_4: Yathākāmakaraṇīyo pāpimatoti yathā kilesamārassa kāmo, evaṃ kattabbo, nirayaṃ vā
atk-s0302a:784_5: tiracchānayoniṃ vā pettivisayaṃ vā pāpetabbo. Dutiyaṃ.
atk-s0302a:786_0: 159-160. Tatiye mahākummakulanti mahantaṃ aṭṭhikacchapakulaṃ. Agamāsīti “ettha addhā
atk-s0302a:786_1: kiñci khāditabbaṃ atthi, taṃ maccharāyanto maṃ esa nivāretī”ti saññāya agamāsi. Papatāyāti
atk-s0302a:786_2: papatā vuccati dīgharajjukabaddho ayakantakosake daṇḍakaṃ pavesetvā gahito kaṇṇikasallasaṇṭhāno,
atk-s0302a:786_3: ayakaṇṭako, yasmiṃ vegena patitvā kaṭāhe laggamatte daṇḍako nikkhamati, rajjuko ekābaddho
atk-s0302a:786_4: gacchateva. So kummoti so viddhakummo. Yena so kummoti udakasaddaṃ sutvā sāsaṅkaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0302a:786_5: bhavissatīti nivattitvā yena so atthakāmo kummo. Na dāni tvaṃ amhākanti idāni tvaṃ
atk-s0302a:786_6: amittahatthaṃ gato, na amhākaṃ santakoti attho. Evaṃ sallapantānaṃyeva ca nesaṃ nāvāya
atk-s0302a:786_7: ṭhito luddo rajjukaṃ ākaḍḍhitvā kummaṃ gahetvā yathākāmaṃ akāsi. Sesamettha ito anantarasutte
atk-s0302a:788_0: 161. Pañcame mīḷhakāti gūthapāṇakā. Gūthādīti gūthabhakkhā. Gūthapūrāti anto gūthena
atk-s0302a:788_1: bharitā. Puṇṇā gūthassāti idaṃ purimasseva atthadīpanaṃ. Atimaññeyyāti pacchimapāde
atk-s0302a:788_2: bhūmiyaṃ ṭhapetvā purimapāde gūthassa upari āropetvā ṭhitā “ahamhi gūthādī”ti bhaṇantī
atk-s0302a:788_3: atimaññeyya. Piṇḍapāto cassa pūroti aparopissa pattapūro paṇītapiṇḍapāto bhaveyya. Pañcamaṃ.
atk-s0302a:790_0: 162. Chaṭṭhe kaṃ, bhikkhave, asanivicakkanti, bhikkhave, kaṃ puggalaṃ matthake patitvā
atk-s0302a:790_1: maddamānaṃ sukkāsanicakkaṃ āgacchatu. Appattamānasanti anadhigatārahattaṃ. Iti bhagavā
atk-s0302a:790_2: na sattānaṃ dukkhakāmatāya, ādīnavaṃ pana dassetuṃ evamāha. Asanicakkañhi matthake
atk-s0302a:790_3: patitaṃ ekameva attabhāvaṃ nāseti, lābhasakkārasilokena pariyādiṇṇacitto nirayādīsu
atk-s0302a:792: 163. Sattame diddhagatenāti gatadiddhena. Visallenāti visamakkhitena. Sallenāti sattiyā. Sattamaṃ.
atk-s0302a:794_0: 164. Aṭṭhame siṅgāloti jarasiṅgālo. Yathā hi suvaṇṇavaṇṇopi kāyo pūtikāyo tveva,
atk-s0302a:794_1: taṃkhaṇaṃ gaḷitampi ca muttaṃ pūtimuttantveva vuccati, evaṃ tadahujātopi siṅgālo
atk-s0302a:794_2: jarasiṅgālotveva vuccati. Ukkaṇṭakena nāmāti evaṃnāmakena rogena. So kira sītakāle
atk-s0302a:794_3: uppajjati. Tasmiṃ uppanne sakalasarīrato lomāni patanti, sakalasarīraṃ nillomaṃ hutvā,
atk-s0302a:794_4: samantato phuṭati, vātabbhāhatā vaṇā rujjanti. Yathā ummattakasunakhena daṭṭho puriso
atk-s0302a:794_5: anavaṭṭhitova bhamati, evaṃ tasmiṃ uppanne bhamitabbo hoti, asukaṭṭhāne sotthi bhavissatīti
atk-s0302a:796_0: 165. Navame verambhavātāti evaṃnāmakā mahāvātā. Kīdise pana ṭhāne te vātā vāyantīti?
atk-s0302a:796_1: Yattha ṭhitassa cattāro dīpā uppalinipattamattā hutvā paññāyanti. Yo pakkhī gacchatīti
atk-s0302a:796_2: navavuṭṭhe deve viravanto vātasakuṇo tattha gacchati, taṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ. Arakkhiteneva
atk-s0302a:796_3: kāyenātiādīsu hatthapāde kīḷāpento khandhaṭṭhiṃ vā nāmento kāyaṃ na rakkhati nāma,
atk-s0302a:796_4: nānāvidhaṃ duṭṭhullakathaṃ kathento vācaṃ na rakkhati nāma, kāmavitakkādayo vitakkento
atk-s0302a:796_5: cittaṃ na rakkhati nāma. Anupaṭṭhitāya satiyāti kāyagatāsatiṃ anupaṭṭhapetvā. Navamaṃ.
atk-s0302a:798_0: 166. Dasame asakkārena cūbhayanti asakkārena ca ubhayena. Samādhīti arahattaphalasamādhi.
atk-s0302a:798_1: So hi tena na vikampati. Appamāṇavihārinoti appamāṇena phalasamādhinā viharantassa.
atk-s0302a:798_3: vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā āgatattā vipassakaṃ. Upādānakkhayārāmanti upādānakkhayasaṅkhāte
atk-s0302a:798_4: nibbāne rataṃ. Āhu sappuriso itīti sappurisoti kathentīti. Dasamaṃ.
atk-s0302a:802_0: 167-168. Dutiyavaggassa paṭhame sampajānamusā bhāsantanti appamattakenapi kāraṇena
atk-s0302a:802_1: sampajānameva musā bhāsantaṃ. “Sīlaṃ pūressāmī”ti saṃvihitabhikkhuṃ sinerumattopi
atk-s0302a:802_2: paccayarāsi cāletuṃ na sakkoti. Yadā pana sīlaṃ pahāya sakkāranissito hoti, tadā
atk-s0302a:802_3: kuṇḍakamuṭṭhihetupi musā bhāsati, aññaṃ vā akiccaṃ karoti. Dutiyaṃ uttānamevāti. Paṭhamadutiyāni.
atk-s0302a:804_0: 169. Tatiyādīsu suvaṇṇanikkhassāti ekassa kañcananikkhassa. Siṅgīnikkhassāti siṅgīsuvaṇṇanikkhassa.
atk-s0302a:804_2: āmisassa hetu antamaso kuṇḍakamuṭṭhinopi. Jīvitahetūti aṭaviyaṃ corehi gahetvā jīvite
atk-s0302a:804_3: voropiyamāne tassapi hetu. Janapadakalyāṇiyāti janapade uttamitthiyā. Tatiyādīni.
atk-s0302a:808_0: 170-171. Tatiyavaggassa paṭhame na tassa, bhikkhave, mātugāmoti na tassa raho ekakassa
atk-s0302a:808_1: nisinnassa tena dhammena atthikopi mātugāmo cittaṃ pariyādātuṃ sakkoti, yassa lābhasakkārasiloko
atk-s0302a:808_2: cittaṃ pariyādātuṃ sakkotīti, attho. Dutiyaṃ uttānamevāti. Paṭhamadutiyāni.
atk-s0302a:810: 172-175. Tatiye saddhāti sotāpannā. Sesamettha uttānameva. Tathā catutthe pañcame chaṭṭhe ca. Tatiyādīni.
atk-s0302a:812_0: 176. Sattame samudayantiādīsu saha pubbakammena attabhāvo kolaputtiyaṃ vaṇṇapokkharatā
atk-s0302a:812_1: kalyāṇavākkaraṇatā dhutaguṇāvīkaraṇaṃ cīvaradhāraṇaṃ parivārasampattīti evamādi lābhasakkārassa
atk-s0302a:812_2: samudayo nāma, taṃ samudayasaccavasena nappajānāti, nirodho ca paṭipadā ca nirodhasaccamaggasaccavaseneva
atk-s0302a:814_0: 177. Aṭṭhame yasmā lābhasakkārasiloko narakādīsu, nibbattento sakalampi imaṃ attabhāvaṃ
atk-s0302a:814_1: nāseti, idhāpi maraṇampi maraṇamattampi dukkhaṃ āvahati, tasmā chaviṃ chindatītiādi vuttaṃ. Aṭṭhamaṃ.
atk-s0302a:816: 178. Navame vāḷarajjuyāti suttādimayā rajju mudukā hoti vāḷarajju kharā pharusā, tasmā ayameva gahitā. Navamaṃ.
atk-s0302a:818_1: ahaṃ assa. Khīṇāsavo hi lābhī puññasampanno yāgukhajjakādīni gahetvā āgatāgatānaṃ
atk-s0302a:818_2: anumodanaṃ karonto dhammaṃ desento pañhaṃ vissajjento phalasamāpattiṃ appetvā nisīdituṃ
atk-s0302a:818_3: okāsaṃ na labhati, taṃ sandhāya vuttanti. Dasamaṃ.
atk-s0302a:822_0: 180-183. Catutthavaggassa paṭhamaṃ uttānameva. Dutiyādīsu kusalamūlanti alobhāditividhakusaladhammo.
atk-s0302a:822_1: Sukko dhammoti tasseva pariyāyadesanā. Ayaṃ panettha saṅkhepattho – yassa kusalamūlādisaṅkhātassa
atk-s0302a:822_2: anavajjadhammassa asamucchinnattā devadatto sagge vā nibbatteyya, maggaphalāni vā
atk-s0302a:822_3: adhigaccheyya, svāssa samucchedamagamā sabbaso samucchinno vinaṭṭho. Paṭhamādīni.
atk-s0302a:824_0: 184. Pañcame parābhavāyāti avaḍḍhiyā vināsāya. Assatarīti vaḷavāya kucchismiṃ gadrabhassa
atk-s0302a:824_1: jātā. Attavadhāya gabbhaṃ gaṇhātīti taṃ assena saddhiṃ sampayojenti, sā gabbhaṃ gaṇhitvā
atk-s0302a:824_2: kāle sampatte vijāyituṃ na sakkoti, pādehi bhūmiyaṃ paharantī tiṭṭhati, athassā cattāro
atk-s0302a:824_3: pāde catūsu khāṇukesu bandhitvā kucchiṃ phāletvā potaṃ nīharanti, sā tattheva marati.
atk-s0302a:826_0: 185. Chaṭṭhe bhattābhihāroti abhiharitabbaṃ bhattaṃ. Tassa pana pamāṇaṃ dassetuṃ
atk-s0302a:826_1: pañca ca thālipākasatānīti vuttaṃ. Tattha eko thālipāko dasannaṃ purisānaṃ bhattaṃ
atk-s0302a:826_2: gaṇhāti. Nāsāya pittaṃ bhindeyyunti acchapittaṃ vā macchapittaṃ vāssa nāsapuṭe pakkhipeyyaṃ. Chaṭṭhaṃ.
atk-s0302a:828_0: 186-187. Sattame mātupi hetūti “sace musā bhaṇasi, mātaraṃ te vissajjessāma. No ce
atk-s0302a:828_1: bhaṇasi, na vissajjessāmā”ti evaṃ corehi aṭaviyaṃ pucchamāno tassā corahatthagatāya
atk-s0302a:828_2: mātuyāpi hetu sampajānamusā na bhāseyyāti attho. Ito paresupi eseva nayoti. Sattamādīni.
atk-s0302a:833_0: 188-195. Rāhulasaṃyuttassa paṭhame ekoti catūsu iriyāpathesu ekavihārī. Vūpakaṭṭhoti
atk-s0302a:833_1: vivekaṭṭho nissaddo. Appamattoti satiyā avippavasanto. Ātāpīti vīriyasampanno. Pahitatto
atk-s0302a:833_2: vihareyyanti visesādhigamatthāya pesitatto hutvā vihareyyaṃ. Aniccanti hutvā abhāvākārena
atk-s0302a:833_3: aniccaṃ. Atha vā uppādavayavantatāya tāvakālikatāya vipariṇāmakoṭiyā niccapaṭikkhepatoti
atk-s0302a:833_4: imehipi kāraṇehi aniccaṃ. Dukkhanti catūhi kāraṇehi dukkhaṃ dukkhamanaṭṭhena dukkhavatthukaṭṭhena
atk-s0302a:833_5: satatasampīḷanaṭṭhena sukhapaṭikkhepenāti. Kallanti yuttaṃ. Etaṃ mamāti taṇhāgāho.
atk-s0302a:833_6: Esohamasmīti mānagāho. Eso me attāti diṭṭhigāho. Taṇhāgāho cettha aṭṭhasatataṇhāvicaritavasena,
atk-s0302a:833_7: mānagāho navavidhamānavasena, diṭṭhigāho dvāsaṭṭhidiṭṭhivasena veditabbo. Nibbindaṃ
atk-s0302a:833_8: virajjatīti ettha virāgavasena cattāro maggā kathitā, virāgā vimuccatīti ettha vimuttivasena
atk-s0302a:834_0: Ettha ca pañcasu dvāresu pasādāva gahitā, manoti iminā tebhūmakaṃ sammasanacāracittaṃ.
atk-s0302a:834_1: Dutiye pañcasu dvāresu ārammaṇameva. Tatiye pañcasu dvāresu pasādavatthukacittameva,
atk-s0302a:834_2: manoviññāṇena tebhūmakaṃ sammasanacāracittaṃ gahitaṃ. Evaṃ sabbattha nayo netabbo.
atk-s0302a:834_3: Chaṭṭhe tebhūmakadhammā. Aṭṭhame pana taṇhāti tasmiṃ tasmiṃ dvāre javanappattāva
atk-s0302a:836: 196. Navame viññāṇadhātuvasena nāmaṃ, sesāhi rūpanti nāmarūpaṃ kathitaṃ. Navamaṃ.
atk-s0302a:838: 197. Dasame rūpakkhandho kāmāvacaro, sesā cattāro sabbasaṅgāhikaparicchedena catubhūmakā. Idha pana tebhūmakāti gahetabbā. Dasamaṃ.
atk-s0302a:844_0: 200. Ekādasame imasmiñca saviññāṇake kāyeti attano saviññāṇakakāyaṃ dasseti, bahiddhā
atk-s0302a:844_1: cāti parassa saviññāṇakaṃ vā aviññāṇakaṃ vā. Purimena vā attano ca parassa ca viññāṇameva
atk-s0302a:844_3: ahaṃkāradiṭṭhi ca mamaṃkārataṇhā ca mānānusayā ca. Na hontīti ete kilesā kathaṃ jānantassa
atk-s0302a:844_4: etesu vatthūsu na hontīti pucchati. Sammappaññāya passatīti saha vipassanāya maggapaññāya
atk-s0302a:846_0: 201. Dvādasame ahaṅkāramamaṅkāramānāpagatanti ahaṃkārato ca mamaṃkārato ca mānato
atk-s0302a:846_1: ca apagataṃ. Vidhā samatikkantanti mānakoṭṭhāse suṭṭhu atikkantaṃ. Santaṃ suvimuttanti
atk-s0302a:846_2: kilesavūpasamena santaṃ, kileseheva suṭṭhu vimuttaṃ. Sesaṃ uttānamevāti. Dvādasamaṃ.
atk-s0302a:848: Dvīsupi asekkhabhūmi kathitā. Paṭhamo panettha āyācantassa desito, dutiyo anāyācantassa. Sakalepi pana rāhulasaṃyutte therassa vimuttiparipācanīyadhammāva kathitāti.
atk-s0302a:853_0: 202. Lakkhaṇasaṃyutte yvāyaṃ āyasmā ca lakkhaṇoti lakkhaṇatthero vutto, esa jaṭilasahassabbhantare
atk-s0302a:853_1: ehibhikkhūpasampadāya upasampanno ādittapariyāyāvasāne arahattaṃ patto eko mahāsāvakoti
atk-s0302a:853_2: veditabbo. Yasmā panesa lakkhaṇasampannena sabbākāraparipūrena brahmasamena attabhāvena
atk-s0302a:853_3: samannāgato, tasmā “lakkhaṇo”ti saṅkhaṃ gato. Mahāmoggallāno pana pabbajitadivasato
atk-s0302a:853_4: sattame divase arahattaṃ patto dutiyo aggasāvako.
atk-s0302a:854_0: Sitaṃ pātvākāsīti mandahasitaṃ pātuakāsi, pakāsayi dassesīti vuttaṃ hoti. Kiṃ pana
atk-s0302a:854_1: disvā thero sitaṃ pātvākāsīti? Upari pāḷiyaṃ āgataṃ aṭṭhikasaṅkhalikaṃ ekaṃ petaloke
atk-s0302a:854_2: nibbattaṃ sattaṃ disvā. Tañca kho dibbena cakkhunā, na pasādacakkhunā. Pasādacakkhussa
atk-s0302a:854_3: hi ete attabhāvā na āpāthaṃ āgacchanti. Evarūpaṃ pana attabhāvaṃ disvā kāruññe kattabbe
atk-s0302a:854_4: kasmā sitaṃ pātvākāsīti? Attano ca buddhañāṇassa ca sampattiṃ samanussaraṇato. Tañhi
atk-s0302a:854_5: disvā thero “adiṭṭhasaccena nāma puggalena paṭilabhitabbā evarūpā attabhāvā mutto
atk-s0302a:854_6: ahaṃ, lābhā vata me, suladdhaṃ vata me”ti attano ca sampattiṃ anussaritvā – “aho
atk-s0302a:854_7: buddhassa bhagavato ñāṇasampatti, ‘yo kammavipāko, bhikkhave, acinteyyo na cintetabbo’ti
atk-s0302a:854_8: desesi, paccakkhaṃ vata katvā buddhā desenti, suppaṭividdhā buddhānaṃ dhammadhātū”ti
atk-s0302a:855_0: Atha lakkhaṇatthero kasmā na addasa, kimassa dibbacakkhu natthīti? No natthi, mahāmoggallāno
atk-s0302a:855_1: pana āvajjento addasa, itaro pana anāvajjanena na addasa. Yasmā pana khīṇāsavā nāma
atk-s0302a:855_2: na akāraṇā sitaṃ karonti, tasmā taṃ lakkhaṇatthero pucchi ko nu kho, āvuso moggallāna,
atk-s0302a:855_3: hetu, ko paccayo sitassa pātukammāyāti? Thero pana yasmā yehi ayaṃ upapatti sāmaṃ
atk-s0302a:855_4: adiṭṭhā, te dussaddhāpayā honti, tasmā bhagavantaṃ sakkhiṃ katvā byākātukāmatāya
atk-s0302a:855_5: akālo kho, āvusotiādimāha. Tato bhagavato santike puṭṭho idhāhaṃ, āvusotiādinā nayena byākāsi.
atk-s0302a:856_0: Tattha aṭṭhikasaṅkhalikanti setaṃ nimmaṃsalohitaṃ aṭṭhisaṅghātaṃ. Gijjhāpi kākāpi
atk-s0302a:856_1: kulalāpīti etepi yakkhagijjhā ceva yakkhakākā ca yakkhakulalā ca paccetabbā. Pākatikānaṃ
atk-s0302a:856_2: pana gijjhādīnaṃ āpāthampi etaṃ rūpaṃ nāgacchati. Anupatitvā anupatitvāti anubandhitvā
atk-s0302a:856_3: anubandhitvā. Vitudentīti asidhārūpamehi tikhiṇehi lohatuṇḍakehi vijjhitvā vijjhitvā
atk-s0302a:856_4: ito cito ca caranti gacchanti. Sā sudaṃ aṭṭassaraṃ karotīti ettha sudanti nipāto,
atk-s0302a:856_5: sā aṭṭhikasaṅkhalikā aṭṭassaraṃ āturassaraṃ karotīti attho. Akusalavipākānubhavanatthaṃ
atk-s0302a:856_6: kira yojanappamāṇāpi tādisā attabhāvā nibbattanti, pasādussadā ca honti pakkagaṇḍasadisā.
atk-s0302a:856_7: Tasmā sā aṭṭhikasaṅkhalikā balavavedanāturā tādisaṃ saddamakāsīti.
atk-s0302a:857_0: Evañca pana vatvā puna āyasmā mahāmoggallāno “vaṭṭagāmisattā nāma evarūpā attabhāvā
atk-s0302a:857_1: na muccantī”ti sattesu kāruññaṃ paṭicca uppannaṃ dhammasaṃvegaṃ dassento tassa mayhaṃ,
atk-s0302a:857_2: āvuso, etadahosi acchariyaṃ vata bhotiādimāha. Tato bhagavā therassa ānubhāvaṃ pakāsento
atk-s0302a:857_3: cakkhubhūtā vata, bhikkhave, sāvakā viharantītiādimāha. Tattha cakkhu bhūtaṃ jātaṃ
atk-s0302a:857_4: uppannaṃ etesanti cakkhubhūtā, bhūtacakkhukā uppannacakkhukā cakkhuṃ uppādetvā viharantīti
atk-s0302a:857_5: attho. Dutiyapadepi eseva nayo. Yatra hi nāmāti ettha yatrāti kāraṇavacanaṃ. Tatrāyaṃ
atk-s0302a:857_6: atthayojanā – yasmā nāma sāvakopi evarūpaṃ ñassati vā dakkhati vā sakkhiṃ vā karissati,
atk-s0302a:857_7: tasmā avocumha – “cakkhubhūtā vata, bhikkhave, sāvakā viharanti, ñāṇabhūtā vata,
atk-s0302a:857_8: bhikkhave, sāvakā viharantī”ti. Pubbeva me so, bhikkhave, satto diṭṭhoti bodhimaṇḍe
atk-s0302a:857_9: sabbaññutaññāṇapaṭivedhena appamāṇesu cakkavāḷesu appamāṇe sattanikāye bhavagatiyoniṭhitinivāse
atk-s0302a:857_10: ca paccakkhaṃ karontena mayā pubbeva so satto diṭṭhoti vadati.
atk-s0302a:858_0: Goghātakoti gāvo vadhitvā aṭṭhito maṃsaṃ mocetvā vikkiṇitvā jīvikaṃ kappanakasatto.
atk-s0302a:858_1: Tasseva kammassa vipākāvasesenāti tassa nānācetanāhi āyūhitassa aparāpariyakammassa.
atk-s0302a:858_2: Tatra hi yāya cetanāya narake paṭisandhi janitā, tassā vipāke parikkhīṇe avasesakammaṃ
atk-s0302a:858_3: vā kammanimittaṃ vā ārammaṇaṃ katvā puna petādīsu paṭisandhi nibbattati, tasmā sā
atk-s0302a:858_4: paṭisandhi kammasabhāgatāya ārammaṇasabhāgatāya vā “tasseva kammassa vipākāvaseso”ti
atk-s0302a:858_5: vuccati. Ayañca satto evaṃ uppanno. Tenāha – “tasseva kammassa vipākāvasesenā”ti.
atk-s0302a:858_6: Tassa kira narakā cavanakāle nimmaṃsakatānaṃ gunnaṃ aṭṭhirāsiyeva nimittaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0302a:858_7: So paṭicchannampi taṃ kammaṃ viññūnaṃ pākaṭaṃ viya karonto aṭṭhisaṅkhalikapeto jāto. Paṭhamaṃ.
atk-s0302a:860_0: 203. Maṃsapesivatthusmiṃ goghātakoti gomaṃsapesiyo katvā sukkhāpetvā vallūravikkayena
atk-s0302a:860_1: anekāni vassāni jīvikaṃ kappesi, tenassa narakā cavanakāle maṃsapesiyeva nimittaṃ
atk-s0302a:862_0: 204. Maṃsapiṇḍavatthusmiṃ sākuṇikoti sakuṇe gahetvā vikkiṇanakāle nippakkhacamme
atk-s0302a:862_1: maṃsapiṇḍamatte katvā vikkiṇanto jīvikaṃ kappesi, tenassa narakā cavanakāle maṃsapiṇḍova
atk-s0302a:862_2: nimittaṃ ahosi. So maṃsapiṇḍapeto jāto. Tatiyaṃ.
atk-s0302a:864_0: 205. Nicchavivatthusmiṃ tassa orabbhikassa eḷake vadhitvā vadhitvā niccamme katvā
atk-s0302a:864_1: kappitajīvikassa purimanayeneva niccammaṃ eḷakasarīraṃ nimittaṃ ahosi. So nicchavipeto jāto. Catutthaṃ.
atk-s0302a:866_0: 206. Asilomavatthusmiṃ so sūkariko dīgharattaṃ nivāpapuṭṭhe sūkare asinā vadhitvā
atk-s0302a:866_1: vadhitvā dīgharattaṃ jīvikaṃ kappesi, tassa ukkhittāsikabhāvova nimittaṃ ahosi. Tasmā
atk-s0302a:868_0: 207. Sattilomavatthusmiṃ so māgaviko ekaṃ migañca sattiñca gahetvā vanaṃ gantvā tassa
atk-s0302a:868_1: migassa samīpaṃ āgatāgate mige sattiyā vijjhitvā māresi, tassa sattiyā vijjhanakabhāvoyeva
atk-s0302a:868_2: nimittaṃ ahosi. Tasmā sattilomapeto jāto. Chaṭṭhaṃ.
atk-s0302a:870_0: 208. Usulomavatthusmiṃ kāraṇikoti rājāparādhike anekāhi kāraṇāhi pīḷetvā avasāne
atk-s0302a:870_1: kaṇḍena vijjhitvā māraṇakapuriso. So kira “amukasmiṃ padese viddho maratī”ti ñatvāva
atk-s0302a:870_2: vijjhati. Tassevaṃ jīvikaṃ kappetvā narake uppannassa tato pakkāvasesena idhūpapattikāle
atk-s0302a:870_3: usunā vijjhanabhāvoyeva nimittaṃ ahosi. Tasmā usulomapeto jāto. Sattamaṃ.
atk-s0302a:872: 209. Sūcilomavatthusmiṃ sūtoti assadamako. Godamakotipi vadantiyeva. Tassa patodasūciyā vijjhanabhāvoyeva nimittaṃ ahosi. Tasmā sūcilomapeto jāto. Aṭṭhamaṃ.
atk-s0302a:874_0: 210. Dutiye sūcilomavatthusmiṃ sūcakoti pesuññakārako. So kira manusse aññamaññañca
atk-s0302a:874_1: bhindi, rājakule ca “imassa imaṃ nāma atthi, iminā idaṃ nāma kata”nti sūcetvā sūcetvā
atk-s0302a:874_2: anayabyasanaṃ pāpesi. Tasmā yathā tena sūcetvā manussā bhinnā, tathā sūcīhi bhedanadukkhaṃ
atk-s0302a:874_3: paccanubhotuṃ kammameva nimittaṃ katvā sūcilomapeto jāto. Navamaṃ.
atk-s0302a:876_0: 211. Aṇḍabhārivatthusmiṃ gāmakūṭakoti vinicchayāmacco. Tassa kammasabhāgatāya kumbhamattā
atk-s0302a:876_1: mahāghaṭappamāṇā aṇḍā ahesuṃ. So hi yasmā raho paṭicchanne ṭhāne lañjaṃ gahetvā kūṭavinicchayena
atk-s0302a:876_2: pākaṭaṃ dosaṃ karonto sāmike assāmike akāsi, tasmāssa rahassaṃ aṅgaṃ pākaṭaṃ nibbattaṃ.
atk-s0302a:876_3: Yasmā daṇḍaṃ paṭṭhapento paresaṃ asayhaṃ bhāraṃ āropesi, tasmāssa rahassaṃ aṅgaṃ
atk-s0302a:876_4: asayhabhāro hutvā nibbattaṃ. Yasmā yasmiṃ ṭhāne ṭhitena samena bhavitabbaṃ, tasmiṃ
atk-s0302a:876_5: ṭhatvā visamo ahosi, tasmāssa rahassaṅge visamā nisajjāva ahosīti. Dasamaṃ.
atk-s0302a:880_0: 212. Pāradārikavatthusmiṃ so satto parassa rakkhitagopitaṃ sassāmikaṃ phassaṃ phusanto
atk-s0302a:880_1: mīḷhasukhena kāmasukhena cittaṃ ramayitvā kammasabhāgatāya gūthaphassaṃ phusanto
atk-s0302a:884_0: 214. Nicchavitthivatthusmiṃ yasmā mātugāmo nāma attano phasse anissaro, sā ca taṃ
atk-s0302a:884_1: sāmikassa santakaṃ phassaṃ thenetvā paresaṃ abhiratiṃ uppādesi, tasmā kammasabhāgatāya
atk-s0302a:884_2: sukhasamphassā vaṭṭitvā dukkhasamphassaṃ anubhavituṃ nicchavitthī hutvā uppannā. Tatiyaṃ.
atk-s0302a:886_0: 215. Maṅgulitthivatthusmiṃ maṅgulinti virūpaṃ duddasikaṃ bībhacchaṃ. Sā kira yakkhadāsikammaṃ
atk-s0302a:886_1: karontī “iminā ca iminā ca evaṃ balikamme kate ayaṃ nāma tumhākaṃ vaḍḍhi bhavissatī”ti
atk-s0302a:886_2: mahājanassa gandhapupphādīni vañcanāya gahetvā mahājanaṃ duddiṭṭhiṃ micchādiṭṭhiṃ
atk-s0302a:886_3: gaṇhāpesi, tasmā tāya kammasabhāgatāya gandhapupphādīnaṃ thenitattā duggandhā, duddassanassa
atk-s0302a:886_4: gāhitattā duddasikā virūpā bībhacchā hutvā nibbattā. Catutthaṃ.
atk-s0302a:888_0: 216. Okilinīvatthusmiṃ uppakkaṃ okiliniṃ okirininti sā kira aṅgāracitake nipannā
atk-s0302a:888_1: vipphandamānā viparivattamānā paccati, tasmā uppakkā ceva hoti uṇhena agginā pakkasarīrā,
atk-s0302a:888_2: okilinī ca kilinnasarīrā, bindūnissā sarīrato paggharanti, okirinī ca aṅgārasamparikiṇṇā.
atk-s0302a:888_3: Tassā hi heṭṭhatopi kiṃsukapupphavaṇṇā aṅgārā, ubhayapassesupi, ākāsatopissā upari
atk-s0302a:888_4: patanti. Tena vuttaṃ – “uppakkaṃ okiliniṃ okirini”nti. Sā issāpakatā sapattiṃ aṅgārakaṭāhena
atk-s0302a:888_5: okirīti tassa kira rañño ekā nāṭakinī aṅgārakaṭāhaṃ samīpe ṭhapetvā gattato udakaṃ
atk-s0302a:888_6: puñchati, pāṇinā ca sedaṃ karoti. Rājāpi tāya saddhiṃ kathañca karoti, parituṭṭhākārañca
atk-s0302a:888_7: dasseti. Aggamahesī taṃ asahamānā issāpakatā hutvā acirapakkantassa rañño taṃ aṅgārakaṭāhaṃ
atk-s0302a:888_8: gahetvā tassā upari aṅgāre okiri. Sā taṃ kammaṃ katvā tādisaṃyeva vipākaṃ paccanubhavituṃ
atk-s0302a:890: 217. Coraghātavatthusmiṃ so rañño āṇāya dīgharattaṃ corānaṃ sīsāni chinditvā petaloke nibbattanto asīsakaṃ kabandhaṃ hutvā nibbatti. Chaṭṭhaṃ.
atk-s0302a:892_0: 218-222. Bhikkhuvatthusmiṃ pāpabhikkhūti lāmakabhikkhu. So kira lokassa saddhādeyye
atk-s0302a:892_1: cattāro paccaye paribhuñjitvā kāyavacīdvārehi asaṃyato bhinnājīvo cittakeḷiṃ kīḷanto
atk-s0302a:892_2: vicari. Tato ekaṃ buddhantaraṃ niraye paccitvā petaloke nibbattanto bhikkhusadiseneva
atk-s0302a:896_0: 223. Opammasaṃyuttassa paṭhame kūṭaṃ gacchantīti kūṭaṅgamā. Kūṭaṃ samosarantīti kūṭasamosaraṇā.
atk-s0302a:896_1: Kūṭasamugghātāti kūṭassa samugghātena. Avijjāsamugghātāti arahattamaggena avijjāya
atk-s0302a:896_2: samugghātena. Appamattāti satiyā avippavāse ṭhitā hutvā. Paṭhamaṃ.
atk-s0302a:898_0: 224. Dutiye manussesu paccājāyantīti ye manussalokato cutā manussesu jāyanti, te
atk-s0302a:898_1: evaṃ appakāti adhippāyo. Aññatra manussehīti ye pana manussalokato cutā ṭhapetvā
atk-s0302a:898_2: manussalokaṃ catūsu apāyesu paccājāyanti, te mahāpathaviyaṃ paṃsu viya bahutarā.
atk-s0302a:898_3: Imasmiñca sutte devāpi manusseheva saṅgahitā. Tasmā yathā manussesu jāyantā appakā,
atk-s0302a:900_0: 225. Tatiye suppadhaṃsiyānīti suviheṭhiyāni. Kumbhatthenakehīti ye paragharaṃ pavisitvā
atk-s0302a:900_1: dīpālokena oloketvā parabhaṇḍaṃ haritukāmā ghaṭe dīpaṃ katvā pavisanti, te kumbhatthenakā
atk-s0302a:900_2: nāma, tehi kumbhatthenakehi. Suppadhaṃsiyo hoti amanussehīti mettābhāvanārahitaṃ
atk-s0302a:900_3: paṃsupisācakā vidhaṃsayanti, pageva uḷārā amanussā. Bhāvitāti vaḍḍhitā. Bahulīkatāti
atk-s0302a:900_4: punappunaṃ katā. Yānīkatāti yuttayānaṃ viya katā. Vatthukatāti patiṭṭhānaṭṭhena vatthu
atk-s0302a:900_5: viya katā. Anuṭṭhitāti adhiṭṭhitā. Paricitāti samantato citā suvaḍḍhitā. Susamāraddhāti
atk-s0302a:902_0: 226. Catutthe okkhāsatanti mahāmukhaukkhalīnaṃ sataṃ. Dānaṃ dadeyyāti paṇītabhojanabharitānaṃ
atk-s0302a:902_1: mahāukkhalīnaṃ sataṃ dānaṃ dadeyya. “Ukkāsata”ntipi pāṭho, tassa daṇḍadīpikāsatanti
atk-s0302a:902_2: attho. Ekāya pana dīpikāya yattake ṭhāne āloko hoti, tato sataguṇaṃ ṭhānaṃ sattahi
atk-s0302a:902_3: ratanehi pūretvā dānaṃ dadeyyāti attho. Gadduhanamattanti goduhanamattaṃ, gāviyā
atk-s0302a:902_4: ekavāraṃ aggathanākaḍḍhanamattanti attho. Gandhaūhanamattaṃ vā, dvīhi aṅgulīhi gandhapiṇḍaṃ
atk-s0302a:902_5: gahetvā ekavāraṃ ghāyanamattanti attho. Ettakampi hi kālaṃ yo pana gabbhapariveṇavihārūpacāra
atk-s0302a:902_6: paricchedena vā cakkavāḷaparicchedena vā aparimāṇāsu lokadhātūsu vā sabbasattesu
atk-s0302a:902_7: hitapharaṇaṃ mettacittaṃ bhāvetuṃ sakkoti, idaṃ tato ekadivasaṃ tikkhattuṃ dinnadānato
atk-s0302a:904_0: 227. Pañcame paṭileṇissāmītiādīsu agge paharitvā kappāsavaṭṭiṃ viya nāmento niyyāsavaṭṭiṃ
atk-s0302a:904_1: viya ca ekato katvā alliyāpento paṭileṇeti nāma. Majjhe paharitvā nāmetvā dhārāya
atk-s0302a:904_2: vā paharitvā dvepi dhārā ekato alliyāpento paṭikoṭṭeti nāma. Kappāsavaṭṭanakaraṇīyaṃ
atk-s0302a:904_3: viya pavattento cirakālaṃ saṃvellitakilañjaṃ pasāretvā puna saṃvellento viya ca paṭivaṭṭeti nāma. Pañcamaṃ.
atk-s0302a:906_0: 228. Chaṭṭhe daḷhadhammā dhanuggahāti daḷhadhanuno issāsā. Daḷhadhanu nāma dvisahassathāmaṃ
atk-s0302a:906_1: vuccati, dvisahassathāmaṃ nāma yassa āropitassa jiyābaddho lohasīsādīnaṃ bhāro daṇḍe
atk-s0302a:906_2: gahetvā yāva kaṇḍappamāṇā ukkhittassa pathavito muccati. Susikkhitāti dasadvādasavassāni
atk-s0302a:906_3: ācariyakule uggahitasippā. Katahatthāti yo sippameva uggaṇhāti, so katahattho na
atk-s0302a:906_4: hoti, ime pana katahatthā ciṇṇavasībhāvā. Katūpāsanāti rājakulādīsu dassitasippā.
atk-s0302a:907_0: Tassa purisassa javoti evarūpo añño puriso nāma na bhūtapubbo, bodhisattasseva pana
atk-s0302a:907_1: javanahaṃsakālo nāma āsi. Tadā bodhisatto cattāri kaṇḍāni āhari. Tadā kirassa kaniṭṭhabhātaro
atk-s0302a:907_2: “mayaṃ, bhātika, sūriyena saddhiṃ javissāmā”ti ārocesuṃ. Bodhisatto āha – “sūriyo
atk-s0302a:907_3: sīghajavo, na sakkhissatha tumhe tena saddhiṃ javitu”nti. Te dutiyaṃ tatiyampi tatheva
atk-s0302a:907_4: vatvā ekadivasaṃ “gacchāmā”ti yugandharapabbataṃ āruhitvā nisīdiṃsu. Bodhisatto “kahaṃ
atk-s0302a:907_5: me bhātaro”ti? Pucchitvā, “sūriyena saddhiṃ javituṃ gatā”ti vutte, “vinassissanti
atk-s0302a:907_6: tapassino”ti te anukampamāno sayampi gantvā tesaṃ santike nisīdi. Atha sūriye uggacchante
atk-s0302a:907_7: dvepi bhātaro sūriyena saddhiṃyeva ākāsaṃ pakkhantā, bodhisattopi tehi saddhiṃyeva
atk-s0302a:907_8: pakkhanto. Tesu ekassa apatteyeva antarabhattasamaye pakkhantaresu aggi uṭṭhahi,
atk-s0302a:907_9: so bhātaraṃ pakkositvā “na sakkomī”ti āha. Tamenaṃ bodhisatto “mā bhāyī”ti samassāsetvā
atk-s0302a:908_0: Dutiyo yāva antarabhattā javitvā pakkhantaresu aggimhi uṭṭhahite tathevāha. Tampi
atk-s0302a:908_1: so tatheva katvā “gacchā”ti pesesi. Sayaṃ pana yāva majjhanhikā javitvā, “ete bālāti
atk-s0302a:908_2: mayāpi bālena na bhavitabba”nti nivattitvā – “adiṭṭhasahāyakaṃ bārāṇasirājaṃ passissāmī”ti
atk-s0302a:908_3: bārāṇasiṃ agamāsi. Tasmiṃ nagaramatthake paribbhamante dvādasayojanaṃ nagaraṃ pattakaṭāhena
atk-s0302a:908_4: otthaṭapatto viya ahosi. Atha paribbhamantassa paribbhamantassa tattha tattha chiddāni
atk-s0302a:908_5: paññāyiṃsu. Sayampi anekahaṃsasahassasadiso paññāyi. So vegaṃ paṭisaṃharitvā rājagehābhimukho
atk-s0302a:908_6: ahosi. Rājā oloketvā – “āgato kira me piyasahāyo javanahaṃso”ti vātapānaṃ vivaritvā
atk-s0302a:908_7: ratanapīṭhaṃ paññāpetvā olokento aṭṭhāsi. Bodhisatto ratanapīṭhe nisīdi.
atk-s0302a:909_0: Athassa rājā sahassapākena telena pakkhantarāni makkhetvā, madhulāje ceva madhurapānakañca
atk-s0302a:909_1: adāsi. Tato naṃ kataparibhogaṃ “samma, kahaṃ agamāsī”ti? Pucchi. So taṃ pavattiṃ
atk-s0302a:909_2: ārocetvā “athāhaṃ, mahārāja, yāva majjhanhikā javitvā – ‘natthi javitena attho’ti
atk-s0302a:909_3: nivatto”ti ācikkhi. Atha rājā āha – “ahaṃ, sāmi, tumhākaṃ sūriyena saddhiṃ javanavegaṃ
atk-s0302a:909_4: passitukāmo”ti. Dukkaraṃ, mahārāja, na sakkā tayā passitunti. Tena hi, sāmi, sarikkhakamattampi
atk-s0302a:909_5: dassehīti. Āma, mahārāja, dhanuggahe sannipātehīti. Rājā sannipātesi. Haṃso tato
atk-s0302a:909_6: cattāro gahetvā nagaramajjhe toraṇaṃ kāretvā attano gīvāya ghaṇḍaṃ piḷandhāpetvā
atk-s0302a:909_7: toraṇassa upari nisīditvā – “cattāro janā toraṇaṃ nissāya catudisābhimukhā ekekaṃ
atk-s0302a:909_8: kaṇḍaṃ khipantū”ti vatvā, sayaṃ paṭhamakaṇḍeneva saddhiṃ uppatitvā, taṃ kaṇḍaṃ aggahetvāva,
atk-s0302a:909_9: dakkhiṇābhimukhaṃ gatakaṇḍaṃ dhanuto ratanamattāpagataṃ gaṇhi. Dutiyaṃ dviratanamattāpagataṃ,
atk-s0302a:909_10: tatiyaṃ tiratanamattāpagataṃ, catutthaṃ bhūmiṃ appattameva gaṇhi. Atha naṃ cattāri
atk-s0302a:909_11: kaṇḍāni gahetvā toraṇe nisinnakāleyeva addasaṃsu. So rājānaṃ āha – “passa, mahārāja,
atk-s0302a:909_12: evaṃsīgho amhākaṃ javo”ti. Evaṃ bodhisatteneva javanahaṃsakāle tāni kaṇḍāni āharitānīti veditabbāni.
atk-s0302a:910_0: Purato dhāvantīti aggato javanti. Na panetā sabbakālaṃ puratova honti, kadāci purato,
atk-s0302a:910_1: kadāci pacchato honti. Ākāsaṭṭhakavimānesu hi uyyānānipi honti pokkharaṇiyopi, tā
atk-s0302a:910_2: tattha nahāyanti, udakakīḷaṃ kīḷamānā pacchatopi honti, vegena pana gantvā puna puratova
atk-s0302a:910_3: dhāvanti. Āyusaṅkhārāti rūpajīvitindriyaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Tañhi tato sīghataraṃ
atk-s0302a:910_4: khīyati. Arūpadhammānaṃ pana bhedo na sakkā paññāpetuṃ. Chaṭṭhaṃ.
atk-s0302a:912_0: 229. Sattame dasārahānanti evaṃnāmakānaṃ khattiyānaṃ. Te kira satato dasabhāgaṃ gaṇhiṃsu,
atk-s0302a:912_1: tasmā “dasārahā”ti paññāyiṃsu. Ānakoti evaṃladdhanāmo mudiṅgo. Himavante kira mahākuḷīradaho
atk-s0302a:912_2: ahosi. Tattha mahanto kuḷīro otiṇṇotiṇṇaṃ hatthiṃ khādati. Atha hatthī upaddutā ekaṃ
atk-s0302a:912_3: kareṇuṃ sakkariṃsu “imissā puttaṃ nissāya amhākaṃ sotthi bhavissatī”ti. Sāpi mahesakkhaṃ
atk-s0302a:912_4: puttaṃ vijāyi. Te tampi sakkariṃsu. So vuddhippatto mātaraṃ pucchi, “kasmā maṃ ete
atk-s0302a:912_5: sakkarontī”ti? Sā taṃ pavattimācikkhi. So “kiṃ mayhaṃ kuḷīro pahoti? Etha gacchāmā”ti
atk-s0302a:912_6: mahāhatthiparivāro tattha gantvā paṭhamameva otari. Kuḷīro udakasaddeneva āgantvā
atk-s0302a:912_7: taṃ aggahesi. Mahanto kuḷīrassa aḷo, so taṃ ito vā etto vā cāletuṃ asakkonto mukhe
atk-s0302a:912_8: soṇḍaṃ pakkhipitvā viravi. Hatthino “yaṃnissāya mayaṃ ‘sotthi bhavissatī’ti amaññimhā,
atk-s0302a:912_9: so paṭhamataraṃ gahito”ti tato tato palāyiṃsu.
atk-s0302a:913: Athassa mātā avidūre ṭhatvā “mayaṃ thalanāgā, tumhe udakanāgā nāma, nāgehi nāgo na viheṭhetabbo”ti kuḷīraṃ piyavacanena vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0302a:915: Tesaṃ tvaṃ vārijo seṭṭho, muñca rodantiyā paja”nti.
atk-s0302a:916_0: Mātugāmasaddo nāma purise khobhetvā tiṭṭhati, tasmā so gahaṇaṃ sithilamakāsi. Hatthipoto
atk-s0302a:916_1: vegena ubho pāde ukkhipitvā taṃ piṭṭhiyaṃ akkami. Saha akkamanā piṭṭhi mattikabhājanaṃ
atk-s0302a:916_2: viya bhijji. Atha naṃ dantehi vijjhitvā ukkhipitvā thale chaḍḍetvā tuṭṭharavaṃ ravi.
atk-s0302a:916_3: Atha naṃ hatthī ito cito ca āgantvā maddiṃsu. Tassa eko aḷo paṭikkamitvā pati, taṃ
atk-s0302a:917_0: Itaro pana aḷo vātātapena sukkhitvā pakkalākhārasavaṇṇo ahosi, so deve vuṭṭhe udakoghena
atk-s0302a:917_1: vuyhanto dasabhātikānaṃ rājūnaṃ uparisote jālaṃ pasārāpetvā gaṅgāya kīḷantānaṃ āgantvā
atk-s0302a:917_2: jāle laggi. Te kīḷāpariyosāne jālamhi ukkhipiyamāne taṃ disvā pucchiṃsu “kiṃ eta”nti?
atk-s0302a:917_3: “Kuḷīraaḷo sāmī”ti. “Na sakkā esa ābharaṇatthāya upanetuṃ, pariyonandhāpetvā bheriṃ
atk-s0302a:917_4: karissāmā”ti? Pariyonandhāpetvā pahariṃsu. Saddo dvādasayojanaṃ nagaraṃ avatthari.
atk-s0302a:917_5: Tato āhaṃsu – “na sakkā idaṃ divase divase vādetuṃ, chaṇadivasatthāya maṅgalabherī
atk-s0302a:917_6: hotū”ti maṅgalabheriṃ akaṃsu. Tasmiṃ vādite mahājano anhāyitvā apiḷandhitvā hatthiyānādīni
atk-s0302a:917_7: āruyha sīghaṃ sannipatanti. Iti mahājanaṃ pakkositvā viya ānetīti ānako tvevassa nāmaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0302a:918_0: Aññaṃ āṇiṃ odahiṃsūti aññaṃ suvaṇṇarajatādimayaṃ āṇiṃ ghaṭayiṃsu. Āṇisaṅghāṭova avasissīti
atk-s0302a:918_1: suvaṇṇādimayānaṃ āṇīnaṃ saṅghāṭamattameva avasesaṃ ahosi. Athassa dvādasayojanappamāṇo
atk-s0302a:919_0: Gambhīrāti pāḷivasena gambhīrā sallasuttasadisā. Gambhīratthāti atthavasena gambhīrā
atk-s0302a:919_3: uggahetabbe ca pariyāpuṇitabbe ca. Kavikatāti kavīhi katā. Itaraṃ tasseva vevacanaṃ.
atk-s0302a:919_4: Cittakkharāti vicitraakkharā. Itaraṃ tasseva vevacanaṃ. Bāhirakāti sāsanato bahibhūtā.
atk-s0302a:919_5: Sāvakabhāsitāti tesaṃ tesaṃ sāvakehi bhāsitā. Sussūsissantīti akkharacittatāya ceva
atk-s0302a:919_7: “esa dhammakathiko”ti sannipatitvā sotukāmā bhavissanti. Tasmāti yasmā tathāgatabhāsitā
atk-s0302a:921_1: katvā. Appamattāti sippuggahaṇe appamattā. Ātāpinoti uṭṭhānavīriyātāpena yuttā. Upāsanasminti
atk-s0302a:921_2: sippānaṃ abhiyoge ācariyānañca payirupāsane. Te kira tadā pātova uṭṭhāya sippasālaṃ
atk-s0302a:921_3: gacchanti, tattha sippaṃ uggahetvā sajjhāyādīhi abhiyogaṃ katvā mukhaṃ dhovitvā yāgupānāya
atk-s0302a:921_4: gacchanti. Yāguṃ pivitvā puna sippasālaṃ gantvā sippaṃ gaṇhitvā sajjhāyaṃ karontā
atk-s0302a:921_5: pātarāsāya gacchanti. Katapātarāsā samānā “mā pamādena ciraṃ niddokkamanaṃ ahosī”ti
atk-s0302a:921_6: khadiraghaṭikāsu sīse ca pāde ca upadahitvā thokaṃ nipajjitvā puna sippasālaṃ gantvā
atk-s0302a:921_7: sippaṃ gahetvā sajjhāyanti. Sāyaṃ sajjhāyaṃ karontā ca gehaṃ gantvā bhuttasāyamāsā
atk-s0302a:921_8: paṭhamayāmaṃ sajjhāyaṃ katvā sayanakāle tatheva kaliṅgaraṃ upadhānaṃ katvā sayanti.
atk-s0302a:921_9: Evaṃ te akkhaṇavedhino vālavedhino ca ahesuṃ. Idaṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0302a:922_0: Otāranti vivaraṃ. Ārammaṇanti paccayaṃ. Padhānasminti padhānabhūmiyaṃ vīriyaṃ kurumānā.
atk-s0302a:922_1: Paṭhamabodhiyaṃ kira bhikkhū bhattakiccaṃ katvāva kammaṭṭhānaṃ manasi karonti. Tesaṃ
atk-s0302a:922_2: manasikarontānaṃyeva sūriyo atthaṃ gacchati. Te nhāyitvā puna caṅkamaṃ otaritvā paṭhamayāmaṃ
atk-s0302a:922_3: caṅkamanti. Tato “mā ciraṃ niddāyimhā”ti sarīradarathavinodanatthaṃ nipajjantā kaṭṭhakhaṇḍaṃ
atk-s0302a:922_4: upadahitvā nipajjanti, te puna pacchimayāme vuṭṭhāya caṅkamaṃ otaranti. Te sandhāya
atk-s0302a:922_5: idaṃ vuttaṃ. Ayampi dīpo tiṇṇaṃ rājūnaṃ kāle ekaghaṇḍinigghoso ekapadhānabhūmi ahosi.
atk-s0302a:922_6: Nānāmukhe pahaṭaghaṇḍi pilicchikoḷiyaṃ osarati, kalyāṇiyaṃ pahaṭaghaṇḍi nāgadīpe
atk-s0302a:922_7: osarati. “Ayaṃ bhikkhu puthujjano, ayaṃ puthujjano”ti aṅguliṃ pasāretvā dassetabbo
