atk-s0302a:922_8: ahosi. Ekadivasaṃ sabbe arahantova ahesuṃ. Tasmāti yasmā kaliṅgarūpadhānānaṃ māro
atk-s0302a:924_0: 231. Navame ativelanti atikkantavelaṃ kālaṃ atikkantappamāṇaṃ kālaṃ. Kimaṅgaṃ panāhanti
atk-s0302a:924_1: ahaṃ pana kiṃkāraṇā na upasaṅkamissāmi? Bhisamuḷālanti bhisañceva muḷālañca. Abbuhetvāti
atk-s0302a:924_2: uddharitvā. Bhiṅkacchāpāti hatthipotakā. Te kira abhiṇhaṃ bhiṅkārasaddaṃ karonti,
atk-s0302a:924_3: tasmā bhiṅkacchāpāti vuccanti. Pasannākāraṃ karontīti pasannehi kattabbākāraṃ karonti,
atk-s0302a:924_4: cattāro paccaye denti. Dhammaṃ bhāsantīti ekaṃ dve jātakāni vā suttante vā uggaṇhitvā
atk-s0302a:924_5: asambhinnena sarena dhammaṃ desenti. Pasannākāraṃ karontīti tesaṃ tāya desanāya pasannā
atk-s0302a:924_6: gihī paccaye denti. Neva vaṇṇāya hoti na balāyāti neva guṇavaṇṇāya, na ñāṇabalāya
atk-s0302a:924_7: hoti, guṇavaṇṇe pana parihāyante sarīravaṇṇopi sarīrabalampi parihāyati, tasmā sarīrassa
atk-s0302a:924_8: neva vaṇṇāya na balāya hoti. Navamaṃ.
atk-s0302a:926_0: 232. Dasame sandhisamalasaṃkaṭīreti ettha sandhīti bhinnagharānaṃ sandhi, samaloti
atk-s0302a:926_1: gāmato gūthanikkhamanamaggo, saṃkaṭīranti saṅkāraṭṭhānaṃ. Mudumūsinti mudukaṃ mūsikaṃ.
atk-s0302a:928_0: 233. Ekādasame yena yena icchatīti so jarasiṅgālo icchiticchitaṭṭhāne iriyāpathakappanena
atk-s0302a:928_1: sītavātūpavāyanena ca antarantarā cittassādampi labhatīti dasseti. Sakyaputtiyapaṭiññoti
atk-s0302a:928_2: idaṃ devadattaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. So hi ettakampi cittassādaṃ anāgate attabhāve na
atk-s0302a:930_0: 234. Dvādasame kataññutāti katajānanaṃ. Kataveditāti katavisesajānanaṃ. Tatridaṃ
atk-s0302a:930_1: jarasiṅgālassa kataññutāya vatthu – satta kira bhātaro khettaṃ kasanti. Tesaṃ sabbakaniṭṭho
atk-s0302a:930_2: khettapariyante ṭhatvā gāvo rakkhati. Athekaṃ jarasiṅgālaṃ ajagaro gaṇhi, so taṃ
atk-s0302a:930_3: disvā yaṭṭhiyā pothetvā vissajjāpesi. Ajagaro siṅgālaṃ vissajjetvā tameva gaṇhi.
atk-s0302a:930_4: Siṅgālo cintesi – “mayhaṃ iminā jīvitaṃ dinnaṃ, ahampi imassa dassāmī”ti yāgughaṭassa
atk-s0302a:930_5: upari ṭhapitaṃ vāsiṃ mukhena ḍaṃsitvā tassa santikaṃ agamāsi. Itare bhātaro disvā,
atk-s0302a:930_6: “siṅgālo vāsiṃ haratī”ti anubandhiṃsu. So tehi diṭṭhabhāvaṃ ñatvā vāsiṃ tassa santike
atk-s0302a:930_7: chaḍḍetvā palāyi. Itare āgantvā kaniṭṭhaṃ ajagarena gahitaṃ disvā vāsiyā ajagaraṃ
atk-s0302a:930_8: chinditvā taṃ gahetvā agamaṃsu. Evaṃ jarasiṅgāle siyā yā kāci kataññutā kataveditā.
atk-s0302a:930_9: Sakyaputtiyapaṭiññeti idampi devadattassa ācārameva sandhāya vuttanti. Dvādasamaṃ.
atk-s0302a:934_0: 235. Bhikkhusaṃyuttassa paṭhame, āvusoti sāvakānaṃ ālāpo. Buddhā hi bhagavanto sāvake
atk-s0302a:934_1: ālapantā, “bhikkhave”ti ālapanti, sāvakā pana “buddhehi sadisā mā homā”ti, “āvuso”ti
atk-s0302a:934_2: paṭhamaṃ vatvā pacchā, “bhikkhave”ti bhaṇanti. Buddhehi ca ālapite bhikkhusaṅgho,
atk-s0302a:934_3: “bhante”ti paṭivacanaṃ deti sāvakehi, “āvuso”ti. Ayaṃ vuccatīti yasmā dutiyajjhāne
atk-s0302a:934_4: vitakkavicārā nirujjhanti, yesaṃ nirodhā saddāyatanaṃ appavattiṃ gacchati, tasmā
atk-s0302a:934_5: yadetaṃ dutiyaṃ jhānaṃ nāma, ayaṃ vuccati “ariyānaṃ tuṇhībhāvo”ti. Ayamettha yojanā.
atk-s0302a:934_6: “Dhammī vā kathā ariyo vā tuṇhībhāvo”ti ettha pana kammaṭṭhānamanasikāropi paṭhamajjhānādīnipi
atk-s0302a:935_0: Vitakkasahagatāti vitakkārammaṇā. Saññāmanasikārāti saññā ca manasikāro ca. Samudācarantīti
atk-s0302a:935_1: pavattanti. Therassa kira dutiyajjhānaṃ na paguṇaṃ. Athassa tato vuṭṭhitassa vitakkavicārā
atk-s0302a:935_2: na santato upaṭṭhahiṃsu. Iccassa dutiyajjhānampi saññāmanasikārāpi hānabhāgiyāva
atk-s0302a:935_3: ahesuṃ, taṃ dassento evamāha. Saṇṭhapehīti sammā ṭhapehi. Ekodibhāvaṃ karohīti ekaggaṃ
atk-s0302a:935_4: karohi. Samādahāti sammā ādaha āropehi. Mahābhiññatanti chaḷabhiññataṃ. Satthā kira
atk-s0302a:935_5: iminā upāyena satta divase therassa hānabhāgiyaṃ samādhiṃ vaḍḍhetvā theraṃ chaḷabhiññataṃ pāpesi. Paṭhamaṃ.
atk-s0302a:937_0: 236. Dutiye atthi nu kho taṃ kiñci lokasminti idaṃ atiuḷārampi sattaṃ vā saṅkhāraṃ
atk-s0302a:937_1: vā sandhāya vuttaṃ. Satthupi khoti idaṃ yasmā ānandattherassa satthari adhimatto
atk-s0302a:937_2: chando ca pemañca, tasmā “kiṃ nu kho imassa therassa satthu vipariṇāmenapi sokādayo
atk-s0302a:937_3: nuppajjeyyu”nti jānanatthaṃ pucchati? Dīgharattanti sūkarakhataleṇadvāre dīghanakhaparibbājakassa
atk-s0302a:937_4: vedanāpariggahasuttantaṃ desitadivasato paṭṭhāya atikkantakālaṃ sandhāyāha. Tasmiñhi
atk-s0302a:937_5: divase therassa ime vaṭṭānugatakilesā samūhatāti. Dutiyaṃ.
atk-s0302a:939_0: 237. Tatiye ekavihāreti ekasmiṃ gabbhe. Tadā kira bahū āgantukā bhikkhū sannipatiṃsu.
atk-s0302a:939_1: Tasmiṃ pariveṇaggena vā vihāraggena vā senāsanesu apāpuṇantesu dvinnaṃ therānaṃ eko
atk-s0302a:939_2: gabbho sampatto. Te divā pāṭiyekkesu ṭhānesu nisīdanti, rattiṃ pana nesaṃ antare
atk-s0302a:939_3: cīvarasāṇiṃ pasārenti. Te attano attano pattapattaṭṭhāneyeva nisīdanti. Tena vuttaṃ
atk-s0302a:939_4: “ekavihāre”ti. Oḷārikenāti idaṃ oḷārikārammaṇataṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Dibbacakkhudibbasotadhātuvihārena
atk-s0302a:939_5: hi so vihāsi, tesañca rūpāyatanasaddāyatanasaṅkhātaṃ oḷārikaṃ ārammaṇaṃ. Iti dibbacakkhunā
atk-s0302a:939_6: rūpassa diṭṭhattā dibbāya ca sotadhātuyā saddassa sutattā so vihāro oḷāriko nāma
atk-s0302a:939_7: jāto. Dibbacakkhu visujjhīti bhagavato rūpadassanatthāya visuddhaṃ ahosi. Dibbā ca
atk-s0302a:939_8: sotadhātūti sāpi bhagavato saddasuṇanatthaṃ visujjhi. Bhagavatopi therassa rūpadassanatthañceva
atk-s0302a:939_9: saddasuṇanatthañca tadubhayaṃ visujjhi. Tadā kira thero “kathaṃ nu kho etarahi satthā
atk-s0302a:939_10: viharatī”ti ālokaṃ vaḍḍhetvā dibbena cakkhunā satthāraṃ jetavane vihāre gandhakuṭiyaṃ
atk-s0302a:939_11: nisinnaṃ disvā tassa dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṃ suṇi. Satthāpi tatheva akāsi. Evaṃ
atk-s0302a:939_12: te aññamaññaṃ passiṃsu ceva, saddañca assosuṃ.
atk-s0302a:940_1: tiyojanasahassavitthārassa himavato santike ṭhapitā sāsapamattā pāsāṇasakkharā “himavā
atk-s0302a:940_2: nu kho mahā, ayaṃ nu kho pāsāṇasakkharā”ti evaṃ yāva upanikkhepanamattasseva atthāya
atk-s0302a:940_3: bhaveyyāti vuttaṃ hoti. Paratopi eseva nayo. Kappanti āyukappaṃ. Loṇaghaṭāyāti cakkavāḷamukhavaṭṭiyā
atk-s0302a:940_4: ādhārakaṃ katvā mukhavaṭṭiyā brahmalokaṃ āhacca ṭhitāya loṇacāṭiyāti dasseti.
atk-s0302a:941_0: Ime pana therā upamaṃ āharantā sarikkhakeneva ca vijjamānaguṇena ca āhariṃsu. Kathaṃ?
atk-s0302a:941_1: Ayañhi iddhi nāma accuggataṭṭhena ceva vipulaṭṭhena ca himavantasadisā, paññā catubhūmakadhamme
atk-s0302a:941_2: anupavisitvā ṭhitaṭṭhena sabbabyañjanesu anupaviṭṭhaloṇarasasadisā. Evaṃ tāva sarikkhakaṭṭhena
atk-s0302a:941_3: āhariṃsu. Samādhilakkhaṇaṃ pana mahāmoggallānattherassa vibhūtaṃ pākaṭaṃ. Kiñcāpi
atk-s0302a:941_4: sāriputtattherassa avijjamānaiddhi nāma natthi, bhagavatā pana “etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave,
atk-s0302a:941_5: mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ iddhimantānaṃ yadidaṃ mahāmoggallāno”ti ayameva etadagge
atk-s0302a:941_6: ṭhapito. Vipassanālakkhaṇaṃ pana sāriputtattherassa vibhūtaṃ pākaṭaṃ. Kiñcāpi mahāmoggallānattherassāpi
atk-s0302a:941_7: paññā atthi, bhagavatā pana “etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave, mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ mahāpaññānaṃ
atk-s0302a:941_8: yadidaṃ sāriputto”ti ayameva etadagge ṭhapito. Tasmā yathā ete aññamaññassa dhuraṃ
atk-s0302a:941_9: na pāpuṇanti, evaṃ vijjamānaguṇena āhariṃsu. Samādhilakkhaṇasmiñhi mahāmoggallāno
atk-s0302a:941_10: nipphattiṃ gato, vipassanālakkhaṇe sāriputtatthero, dvīsupi etesu sammāsambuddhoti. Tatiyaṃ.
atk-s0302a:943_0: 238. Catutthe appossukkoti nirussukko. Saṅkasāyatīti viharati. Veyyāvaccanti cīvare
atk-s0302a:943_1: kattabbakiccaṃ. Ābhicetasikānanti abhicittaṃ uttamacittaṃ nissitānaṃ. Nikāmalābhīti
atk-s0302a:943_3: sukhena vikkhambhetvā samāpajjanasamatthatāya adukkhalābhī. Akasiralābhīti yathāparicchedena
atk-s0302a:943_4: vuṭṭhānasamatthatāya vipulalābhī, paguṇajjhānoti attho. Sithilamārabbhāti sithilavīriyaṃ
atk-s0302a:945_0: 239. Pañcame abhirūpoti aññāni rūpāni atikkantarūpo. Dassanīyoti daṭṭhabbayutto.
atk-s0302a:945_1: Pāsādikoti dassanena cittaṃ pasādetuṃ samattho. Vaṇṇapokkharatāyāti chavivaṇṇasundaratāya. Pañcamaṃ.
atk-s0302a:947_0: 240. Chaṭṭhe dubbaṇṇanti virūpasarīravaṇṇaṃ. Okoṭimakanti rassaṃ. Paribhūtarūpanti
atk-s0302a:947_1: pamāṇavasena paribhūtajātikaṃ. Taṃ kira chabbaggiyā bhikkhū, “āvuso bhaddiya, āvuso,
atk-s0302a:947_2: bhaddiyā”ti tattha tattha parāmasitvā nānappakāraṃ kīḷanti ākaḍḍhanti parikaḍḍhanti.
atk-s0302a:947_3: Tena vuttaṃ “paribhūtarūpa”nti. Kasmā panesa evarūpo jāto? Ayaṃ kira atīte eko mahārājā
atk-s0302a:947_4: ahosi, tassa mahallakā ca mahallakitthiyo ca paṭikūlā honti. So sace mahallake passati,
atk-s0302a:947_5: tesaṃ cūḷaṃ ṭhapāpetvā kacchaṃ bandhāpetvā yathāruci kīḷāpeti. Mahallakitthiyopi
atk-s0302a:947_6: disvā tāsampi icchiticchitaṃ vippakāraṃ katvā yathāruci kīḷāpeti. Tesaṃ puttadhītādīnaṃ
atk-s0302a:947_7: santike mahāsārajjaṃ uppajjati. Tassa pāpakiriyā pathavito paṭṭhāya chadevaloke ekakolāhalaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0302a:948_0: Atha sakko cintesi – “ayaṃ andhabālo mahājanaṃ viheṭheti, karissāmissa niggaha”nti.
atk-s0302a:948_1: So mahallakagāmiyavaṇṇaṃ katvā yānake ekaṃ takkacāṭiṃ āropetvā yānaṃ pesento nagaraṃ
atk-s0302a:948_2: pavisati. Rājāpi hatthiṃ āruyha nagarato nikkhanto taṃ disvā – “ayaṃ mahallako takkayānakena
atk-s0302a:948_3: amhākaṃ abhimukho āgacchati, vāretha vārethā”ti āha. Manussā ito cito ca pakkhandantāpi
atk-s0302a:948_4: na passanti. Sakko hi “rājāva maṃ passatu, mā aññe”ti evaṃ adhiṭṭhahi. Atha tesu
atk-s0302a:948_5: manussesu “kahaṃ, deva, kahaṃ devā”ti vadantesu eva rājā saha hatthinā vaccho viya
atk-s0302a:948_6: dhenuyā yānassa heṭṭhā pāvisi. Sakko takkacāṭiṃ bhindi.
atk-s0302a:949_0: Rājā sīsato paṭṭhāya takkena kilinnasarīro ahosi. So sarīraṃ ubbaṭṭāpetvā uyyānapokkharaṇiyaṃ
atk-s0302a:949_1: nhatvā alaṅkatasarīro nagaraṃ pavisanto puna taṃ addasa. Disvā “ayaṃ so amhehi diṭṭhamahallako
atk-s0302a:949_2: puna dissati. Vāretha vāretha na”nti āha. Manussā “kahaṃ, deva, kahaṃ, devā”ti ito
atk-s0302a:949_3: cito ca vidhāviṃsu. So paṭhamavippakārameva puna pāpuṇi. Tasmiṃ khaṇe sakko goṇe
atk-s0302a:949_4: ca yānañca antaradhāpetvā ākāse ṭhatvā āha, “andhabāla, tvaṃ mayi takkavāṇijako eso”ti
atk-s0302a:949_5: saññaṃ karosi, sakkohaṃ devarājā, “tavetaṃ pāpakiriyaṃ nivāressāmī”ti āgato, “mā
atk-s0302a:949_6: puna evarūpaṃ akāsī”ti santajjetvā agamāsi. Iminā kammena so dubbaṇṇo ahosi.
atk-s0302a:950_0: Vipassīsammāsambuddhakāle panesa cittapattakokilo nāma hutvā kheme migadāye vasanto
atk-s0302a:950_1: ekadivasaṃ himavantaṃ gantvā madhuraṃ ambaphalaṃ tuṇḍena gahetvā āgacchanto bhikkhusaṅghaparivāraṃ
atk-s0302a:950_2: satthāraṃ disvā cintesi – “ahaṃ aññesu divasesu rittako tathāgataṃ passāmi. Ajja
atk-s0302a:950_3: pana me imaṃ ambapakkaṃ atthi, dasabalassa taṃ dassāmī”ti otaritvā ākāse carati.
atk-s0302a:950_4: Satthā tassa cittaṃ ñatvā upaṭṭhākaṃ olokesi. So pattaṃ nīharitvā dasabalaṃ vanditvā
atk-s0302a:950_5: satthu hatthe ṭhapesi. Kokilo dasabalassa patte ambapakkaṃ patiṭṭhāpesi. Satthā tattheva
atk-s0302a:950_6: nisīditvā taṃ paribhuñji. Kokilo pasannacitto punappunaṃ dasabalassa guṇe āvajjetvā
atk-s0302a:950_7: dasabalaṃ vanditvā attano kulāvakaṃ gantvā sattāhaṃ pītisukheneva vītināmesi. Iminā
atk-s0302a:951_0: Kassapasammāsambuddhakāle pana cetiye āraddhe “kiṃpamāṇaṃ karoma? Sattayojanappamāṇaṃ.
atk-s0302a:951_1: Atimahantaṃ etaṃ, chayojanappamāṇaṃ karoma. Idampi atimahantaṃ, pañcayojanaṃ karoma,
atk-s0302a:951_2: catuyojanaṃ, tiyojanaṃ, dviyojana”nti. Ayaṃ tadā jeṭṭhakavaḍḍhakī hutvā, “evaṃ, bho,
atk-s0302a:951_3: anāgate sukhapaṭijaggitaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vatvā rajjuṃ ādāya parikkhipanto gāvutamattake
atk-s0302a:951_4: ṭhatvā, “ekekaṃ mukhaṃ gāvutaṃ hotu, cetiyaṃ yojanāvaṭṭaṃ yojanubbedhaṃ bhavissatī”ti
atk-s0302a:951_5: āha. Te tassa vacane aṭṭhaṃsu. Cetiyaṃ sattadivasasattamāsādhikehi sattahi saṃvaccharehi
atk-s0302a:951_6: niṭṭhitaṃ. Iti appamāṇassa buddhassa pamāṇaṃ akāsīti. Tena kammena okoṭimako jāto.
atk-s0302a:952: Hatthayo pasadā migāti hatthino ca pasadamigā ca. Natthi kāyasmiṃ tulyatāti kāyasmiṃ pamāṇaṃ nāma natthi, akāraṇaṃ kāyapamāṇanti attho. Chaṭṭhaṃ.
atk-s0302a:954_0: 241. Sattame poriyā vācāyāti puravāsīnaṃ nagaramanussānaṃ vācāsadisāya aparihīnakkharapadāya
atk-s0302a:954_1: madhuravācāya. Vissaṭṭhāyāti asandiddhāya apalibuddhāya, pittasemhehi anupahatāyāti
atk-s0302a:954_2: attho. Anelagalāyāti yathā dandhamanussā mukhena kheḷaṃ gaḷantena vācaṃ bhāsanti,
atk-s0302a:954_3: na evarūpāya, atha kho niddosāya visadavācāya. Pariyāpannāyāti catusaccapariyāpannāya
atk-s0302a:954_4: cattāri saccāni amuñcitvā pavattāya. Anissitāyāti vaṭṭanissitaṃ katvā akathitāya.
atk-s0302a:954_5: Dhammo hi isinaṃ dhajoti navavidhalokuttaradhammo isīnaṃ dhajo nāmāti. Sattamaṃ.
atk-s0302a:956_0: 242. Aṭṭhame ākoṭitapaccākoṭitānīti ekasmiṃ passe pāṇinā vā muggarena vā ākoṭanena
atk-s0302a:956_1: ākoṭitāni, parivattetvā ākoṭanena paccākoṭitāni. Añjetvāti añjanena pūretvā. Acchaṃ
atk-s0302a:956_2: pattanti vippasannavaṇṇaṃ mattikāpattaṃ. Kasmā pana thero evamakāsīti? Satthu ajjhāsayajānanatthaṃ.
atk-s0302a:956_3: Evaṃ kirassa ahosi “sace satthā ‘sobhati vata me ayaṃ kaniṭṭhabhātiko’ti vakkhati,
atk-s0302a:956_4: yāvajīvaṃ iminā vākārena carissāmi. Sace ettha dosaṃ dassati, imaṃ ākāraṃ pahāya
atk-s0302a:956_5: saṅkāracoḷaṃ gahetvā cīvaraṃ katvā dhārento pariyantasenāsane vasanto carissāmī”ti.
atk-s0302a:957_0: Aññātuñchenāti abhilakkhitesu issarajanagehesu kaṭukabhaṇḍasambhāraṃ sugandhaṃ bhojanaṃ
atk-s0302a:957_1: pariyesantassa uñcho ñātuñcho nāma. Gharapaṭipāṭiyā pana dvāre ṭhitena laddhaṃ missakabhojanaṃ
atk-s0302a:957_2: aññātuñcho nāma. Ayamidha adhippeto. Kāmesu anapekkhinanti vatthukāmakilesakāmesu
atk-s0302a:957_3: nirapekkhaṃ. Āraññiko cātiādi sabbaṃ samādānavaseneva vuttaṃ. Kāmesu ca anapekkhoti
atk-s0302a:957_4: idaṃ suttaṃ devaloke accharāyo dassetvā āgatena aparabhāge kathitaṃ. Imassa kathitadivasato
atk-s0302a:957_5: paṭṭhāya thero ghaṭento vāyamanto katipāheneva arahatte patiṭṭhāya sadevake loke
atk-s0302a:959_0: 243. Navame dummanoti uppannadomanasso. Kasmā panāyaṃ evaṃ dukkhī dummano jātoti?
atk-s0302a:959_1: Khattiyapabbajito hesa, tena naṃ pabbājetvā dupaṭṭasāṭakaṃ nivāsāpetvā varacīvaraṃ
atk-s0302a:959_2: pārupetvā akkhīni añjetvā manosilātelena sīsaṃ makkhesuṃ. So bhikkhūsu rattiṭṭhānadivāṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0302a:959_3: gatesu “bhikkhunā nāma vivittokāse nisīditabba”nti ajānanto bhojanasālaṃ gantvā mahāpīṭhaṃ
atk-s0302a:959_4: āruhitvā nisīdi. Disāvacarā āgantukā paṃsukūlikā bhikkhū āgantvā, “imināva nīhārena
atk-s0302a:959_5: rajokiṇṇehi gattehi na sakkā dasabalaṃ passituṃ. Bhaṇḍakaṃ tāva ṭhapessāmā”ti bhojanasālaṃ
atk-s0302a:959_6: agamaṃsu. So tesu mahātheresu āgacchantesu niccalo nisīdiyeva. Aññe bhikkhū “pādavattaṃ
atk-s0302a:959_7: karoma, tālavaṇṭena bījāmā”ti āpucchanti. Ayaṃ pana nisinnakova “kativassatthā”ti?
atk-s0302a:959_8: Pucchitvā, “mayaṃ avassikā. Tumhe pana kativassatthā”ti? Vutte, “mayaṃ ajja pabbajitā”ti
atk-s0302a:959_9: āha. Atha naṃ bhikkhū, “āvuso, adhunā chinnacūḷosi, ajjāpi te sīsamūle ūkāgandho
atk-s0302a:959_10: vāyatiyeva, tvaṃ nāma ettakesu vuḍḍhataresu vattaṃ āpucchantesu nissaddo niccalo
atk-s0302a:959_11: nisinno, apacitimattampi te natthi, kassa sāsane pabbajitosī”ti? Parivāretvā taṃ
atk-s0302a:959_12: vācāsattīhi paharantā “kiṃ tvaṃ iṇaṭṭo vā bhayaṭṭo vā jīvituṃ asakkonto pabbajito”ti?
atk-s0302a:959_13: Āhaṃsu. So ekampi theraṃ olokesi, tena “kiṃ maṃ olokesi mahallakā”ti? Vutte aññaṃ
atk-s0302a:959_14: olokesi, tenapi tatheva vutte athassa “ime maṃ parivāretvā vācāsattīhi vijjhantī”ti
atk-s0302a:959_15: khattiyamāno uppajji. Akkhīsu maṇivaṇṇāni assūni sañcariṃsu. Tato ne āha – “kassa
atk-s0302a:959_16: santikaṃ āgatatthā”ti. Te “kiṃ pana tvaṃ ‘mayhaṃ santikaṃ āgatā’ti? Amhe maññasi
atk-s0302a:959_17: gihibyañjanabhaṭṭhakā”ti vatvā, “sadevake loke aggapuggalassa satthu santikaṃ āgatamhā”ti
atk-s0302a:959_18: āhaṃsu. So “mayhaṃ bhātu santike āgatā tumhe, yadi evaṃ idāni vo āgatamaggeneva gamanaṃ
atk-s0302a:959_19: karissāmī”ti kujjhitvā nikkhanto antarāmagge cintesi – “mayi imināva nīhārena gate
atk-s0302a:959_20: satthā ete na nīharāpessatī”ti dukkhī dummano assūni pavattayamāno agamāsi. Iminā
atk-s0302a:960_1: phuṭaṃ akaṃsu, upari vijjhiṃsūti vuttaṃ hoti. Vattāti pare yadicchakaṃ vadatiyeva.
atk-s0302a:960_2: No ca vacanakkhamoti paresaṃ vacanaṃ khamituṃ na sakkoti. Idāni tāva tvaṃ iminā kopena
atk-s0302a:960_3: iminā vuttavācāsannitodakena viddho. Atīte pana raṭṭhato ca pabbājitoti. Evaṃ vutte,
atk-s0302a:961_0: Satthā āha – atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ bārāṇasirājā rajjaṃ kāresi. Atheko jātimā, eko mātaṅgoti
atk-s0302a:961_1: dve isayo bārāṇasiṃ agamaṃsu. Tesu jātimā puretaraṃ gantvā kumbhakārasālāyaṃ nisīdi.
atk-s0302a:961_2: Mātaṅgo tāpaso pacchā gantvā tattha okāsaṃ yāci kumbhakāro “atthettha paṭhamataraṃ
atk-s0302a:961_3: paviṭṭho pabbajito, taṃ pucchā”ti āha. So attano parikkhāraṃ gahetvā sālāya dvāramūle
atk-s0302a:961_4: ṭhatvā, “amhākampi ācariya ekarattivāsāya okāsaṃ dethā”ti āha. “Pavisa, bho”ti. Pavisitvā
atk-s0302a:961_5: nisinnaṃ, “bho, kiṃ gottosī”ti? Pucchi. “Caṇḍālagottomhī”ti. “Na sakkā tayā saddhiṃ
atk-s0302a:961_6: ekaṭṭhāne nisīdituṃ, ekamantaṃ gacchā”ti. So ca tattheva tiṇasanthārakaṃ pattharitvā
atk-s0302a:961_7: nipajji, jātimā dvāraṃ nissāya nipajji. Itaro passāvatthāya nikkhamanto taṃ urasmiṃ
atk-s0302a:961_8: akkami. “Ko eso”ti ca vutte? “Ahaṃ ācariyā”ti āha. “Re caṇḍāla, kiṃ aññato maggaṃ
atk-s0302a:961_9: na passasi? Atha me āgantvā akkamasī”ti. “Ācariya, adisvā me akkantosi, khama mayha”nti.
atk-s0302a:961_10: So mahāpurise bahi nikkhante cintesi – “ayaṃ paccāgacchantopi itova āgamissatī”ti
atk-s0302a:961_11: parivattetvā nipajji. Mahāpurisopi “ācariyo ito sīsaṃ katvā nipanno, pādasamīpena
atk-s0302a:961_12: gamissāmī”ti pavisanto puna urasmiṃyeva akkami. “Ko eso”ti ca vutte? “Ahaṃ ācariyā”ti
atk-s0302a:961_13: āha. “Paṭhamaṃ tāva te ajānantena kataṃ, idāni maṃ ghaṭentova akāsi, sūriye te uggacchante
atk-s0302a:961_14: sattadhā muddhā phalatū”ti sapi. Mahāpuriso kiñci avatvā purearuṇeyeva sūriyaṃ gaṇhi,
atk-s0302a:961_15: nāssa uggantuṃ adāsi. Manussā ca hatthiassādayo ca pabujjhiṃsu.
atk-s0302a:962_0: Manussā rājakulaṃ gantvā, “deva, sakalanagare appabuddho nāma natthi, na ca aruṇuggaṃ
atk-s0302a:962_1: paññāyati, kinnu kho eta”nti? Tena hi nagaraṃ parivīmaṃsathāti. Te parivīmaṃsantā
atk-s0302a:962_2: kumbhakārasālāyaṃ dve tāpase disvā, “imesaṃ etaṃ kammaṃ bhavissatī”ti gantvā rañño
atk-s0302a:962_3: ārocesuṃ. Raññā ca “pucchatha ne”ti vuttā āgantvā jātimantaṃ pucchiṃsu – “tumhehi
atk-s0302a:962_4: andhakāraṃ kata”nti. “Na mayā kataṃ, esa pana kūṭajaṭilo chavo anantamāyo, taṃ pucchathā”ti.
atk-s0302a:962_5: Te āgantvā mahāpurisaṃ pucchiṃsu – “tumhehi, bhante, andhakāraṃ kata”nti. “Āma ayaṃ
atk-s0302a:962_6: ācariyo maṃ abhisapi, tasmā mayā kata”nti. Te gantvā rañño ārocesuṃ. Rājāpi āgantvā
atk-s0302a:962_7: mahāpurisaṃ “tumhehi kataṃ, bhante”ti? Pucchi. “Āma, mahārājā”ti. “Kasmā bhante”ti?
atk-s0302a:962_8: “Iminā abhisapitomhi, sace maṃ eso khamāpessati, sūriyaṃ vissajjessāmī”ti. Rājā “khamāpetha,
atk-s0302a:962_9: bhante, eta”nti āha. Itaro “mādiso jātimā kiṃ evarūpaṃ caṇḍālaṃ khamāpessati? Na khamāpemī”ti.
atk-s0302a:963_0: Atha naṃ manussā “na kiṃ tvaṃ attano ruciyā khamāpessasī”ti? Vatvā hatthesu ca pādesu
atk-s0302a:963_1: ca gahetvā pādamūle nipajjāpetvā “khamāpehī”ti āhaṃsu. So nissaddo nipajji. Punapi
atk-s0302a:963_2: naṃ “khamāpehī”ti āhaṃsu. Tato “khama mayhaṃ, ācariyā”ti āha. Mahāpuriso “ahaṃ tāva
atk-s0302a:963_3: tuyhaṃ khamitvā sūriyaṃ vissajjessāmi, sūriye pana uggate tava sīsaṃ sattadhā phalissatī”ti
atk-s0302a:963_4: vatvā, “imassa sīsappamāṇaṃ mattikāpiṇḍaṃ matthake ṭhapetvā etaṃ nadiyā galappamāṇe
atk-s0302a:963_5: udake ṭhapethā”ti āha. Manussā tathā akaṃsu. Ettāvatā saraṭṭhakaṃ rājabalaṃ sannipati.
atk-s0302a:963_6: Mahāpuriso sūriyaṃ muñci. Sūriyarasmi āgantvā mattikāpiṇḍaṃ pahari. So sattadhā bhijji.
atk-s0302a:963_7: Tāvadeva so nimujjitvā ekena titthena uttaritvā palāyi. Satthā imaṃ vatthuṃ āharitvā,
atk-s0302a:963_8: “idāni tāva tvaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ santike paribhāsaṃ labhasi, pubbepi imaṃ kodhaṃ nissāya
atk-s0302a:963_9: raṭṭhato pabbājito”ti anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā atha naṃ ovadanto na kho te taṃ tissa patirūpantiādimāha. Navamaṃ.
atk-s0302a:965_0: 244. Dasame vaṇṇavādīti ānisaṃsavādī. Yaṃ atītaṃ taṃ pahīnanti atīte khandhapañcake
atk-s0302a:965_1: chandarāgappahānena taṃ pahīnaṃ nāma hoti. Anāgatanti anāgatampi khandhapañcakaṃ
atk-s0302a:965_2: tattha chandarāgapaṭinissaggena paṭinissaṭṭhaṃ nāma hoti. Sabbābhibhunti sabbā khandhāyatanadhātuyo
atk-s0302a:965_3: ca tayo bhave ca abhibhavitvā ṭhitaṃ. Sabbavidunti taṃ vuttappakāraṃ sabbaṃ viditaṃ
atk-s0302a:965_4: pākaṭaṃ katvā ṭhitaṃ. Sabbesu dhammesūti tesveva dhammesu taṇhādiṭṭhilepehi anupalittaṃ.
atk-s0302a:965_5: Sabbañjahanti tadeva sabbaṃ tattha chandarāgappahānena jahitvā ṭhitaṃ. Taṇhakkhaye
atk-s0302a:965_6: vimuttanti taṇhakkhayasaṅkhāte nibbāne tadārammaṇāya vimuttiyā vimuttaṃ. Dasamaṃ.
atk-s0302a:967_0: 245. Ekādasame mahākappinoti evaṃnāmako abhiññābalappatto asītimahāsāvakānaṃ abbhantaro
atk-s0302a:967_1: mahāthero. So kira gihikāle kukkuṭavatīnagare tiyojanasatikaṃ rajjaṃ akāsi. Pacchimabhavikattā
atk-s0302a:967_2: pana tathārūpaṃ sāsanaṃ sotuṃ ohitasoto vicarati. Athekadivasaṃ amaccasahassaparivuto
atk-s0302a:967_3: uyyānakīḷikaṃ agamāsi. Tadā ca majjhimadesato jaṅghavāṇijā taṃ nagaraṃ gantvā, bhaṇḍaṃ
atk-s0302a:967_5: uyyānaṃ gato”ti sutvā, uyyānaṃ gantvā, dvāre ṭhitā, paṭihārassa ārocayiṃsu. Atha
atk-s0302a:967_6: rañño nivedite rājā pakkosāpetvā niyyātitapaṇṇākāre vanditvā ṭhite, “tātā, kuto āgatatthā”ti?
atk-s0302a:967_7: Pucchi. “Sāvatthito devā”ti. “Kacci vo raṭṭhaṃ subhikkhaṃ, dhammiko rājā”ti? “Āma,
atk-s0302a:967_8: devā”ti. “Atthi pana tumhākaṃ dese kiñci sāsana”nti? “Atthi, deva, na pana sakkā
atk-s0302a:967_9: ucchiṭṭhamukhehi kathetu”nti. Rājā suvaṇṇabhiṅgārena udakaṃ dāpesi. Te mukhaṃ vikkhāletvā
atk-s0302a:967_10: dasabalābhimukhā añjaliṃ paggaṇhitvā, “deva, amhākaṃ dese buddharatanaṃ nāma uppanna”nti
atk-s0302a:967_11: āhaṃsu. Rañño “buddho”ti vacane sutamatte sakalasarīraṃ pharamānā pīti uppajji. Tato
atk-s0302a:967_12: “buddhoti, tātā, vadathā”ti? Āha. “Buddhoti deva vadāmā”ti. Evaṃ tikkhattuṃ vadāpetvā,
atk-s0302a:967_13: “buddhoti padaṃ aparimāṇaṃ, nāssa sakkā parimāṇaṃ kātu”nti tasmiṃyeva pasanno satasahassaṃ
atk-s0302a:967_14: datvā puna “aññaṃ kiṃ sāsana”nti? Pucchi. “Deva dhammaratanaṃ nāma uppanna”nti. Tampi
atk-s0302a:967_15: sutvā tatheva tikkhattuṃ paṭiññaṃ gahetvā aparampi satasahassaṃ datvā puna “aññaṃ
atk-s0302a:967_16: kiṃ sāsana”nti? Pucchi. “Saṅgharatanaṃ deva uppanna”nti. Tampi sutvā tatheva tikkhattuṃ
atk-s0302a:967_17: paṭiññaṃ gahetvā aparampi satasahassaṃ datvā dinnabhāvaṃ paṇṇe likhitvā, “tātā, deviyā
atk-s0302a:967_18: santikaṃ gacchathā”ti pesesi. Tesu gatesu amacce pucchi, “tātā, buddho loke uppanno,
atk-s0302a:967_19: tumhe kiṃ karissathā”ti? “Deva tumhe kiṃ kattukāmā”ti? “Ahaṃ pabbajissāmī”ti. “Mayampi
atk-s0302a:967_20: pabbajissāmā”ti. Te sabbepi gharaṃ vā kuṭumbaṃ vā anapaloketvā ye asse āruyha gatā, teheva nikkhamiṃsu.
atk-s0302a:968_0: Vāṇijā anojādeviyā santikaṃ gantvā paṇṇaṃ dassesuṃ. Sā vācetvā “raññā tumhākaṃ bahū
atk-s0302a:968_1: kahāpaṇā dinnā, kiṃ tumhehi kataṃ, tātā”ti? Pucchi. “Piyasāsanaṃ devi ānīta”nti.
atk-s0302a:968_2: “Amhepi sakkā, tātā, suṇāpetu”nti. “Sakkā devi, ucchiṭṭhamukhehi pana vattuṃ na sakkā”ti.
atk-s0302a:968_3: Sā suvaṇṇabhiṅgārena udakaṃ dāpesi. Te mukhaṃ vikkhāletvā rañño ārocitanayeneva ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0302a:968_4: Sāpi sutvā uppannapāmojjā teneva nayena ekekasmiṃ pade tikkhattuṃ paṭiññaṃ gahetvā
atk-s0302a:968_5: paṭiññāgaṇanāya tīṇi tīṇi katvā navasatasahassāni adāsi. Vāṇijā sabbānipi dvādasasatasahassāni
atk-s0302a:968_6: labhiṃsu. Atha ne “rājā kahaṃ, tātā”ti, pucchi. “Pabbajissāmīti nikkhanto devī”ti.
atk-s0302a:968_7: “Tena hi, tātā, tumhe gacchathā”ti te uyyojetvā raññā saddhiṃ gatānaṃ amaccānaṃ mātugāme
atk-s0302a:968_8: pakkosāpetvā, “tumhe attano sāmikānaṃ gataṭṭhānaṃ jānātha ammā”ti pucchi. “Jānāma
atk-s0302a:968_9: ayye, raññā saddhiṃ uyyānakīḷikaṃ gatā”ti. Āma gatā, tattha pana gantvā, “buddho
atk-s0302a:968_10: uppanno, dhammo uppanno, saṅgho uppanno”ti sutvā, “dasabalassa santike pabbajissāmā”ti
atk-s0302a:968_11: gatā. “Tumhe kiṃ karissathā”ti? “Tumhe pana ayye kiṃ kattukāmā”ti? “Ahaṃ pabbajissāmi,
atk-s0302a:968_12: na tehi vantavamanaṃ jivhagge ṭhapeyya”nti. “Yadi evaṃ, mayampi pabbajissāmā”ti sabbā
atk-s0302a:969_0: Rājāpi amaccasahassena saddhiṃ gaṅgāya tīraṃ pāpuṇi. Tasmiñca samaye gaṅgā pūrā hoti.
atk-s0302a:969_1: Atha naṃ disvā, “ayaṃ gaṅgā pūrā caṇḍamacchākiṇṇā, amhehi saddhiṃ āgatā dāsā vā manussā
atk-s0302a:969_2: vā natthi, ye no nāvaṃ vā uḷumpaṃ vā katvā dadeyyuṃ, etassa pana satthu guṇā nāma
atk-s0302a:969_3: heṭṭhā avīcito upari yāva bhavaggā patthaṭā, sace esa satthā sammāsambuddho, imesaṃ
atk-s0302a:969_4: assānaṃ khurapiṭṭhāni mā tementū”ti udakapiṭṭhena asse pakkhandāpesuṃ. Ekaassassāpi
atk-s0302a:969_5: khurapiṭṭhamattaṃ na temi, rājamaggena gacchantā viya paratīraṃ patvā purato aññaṃ
atk-s0302a:969_6: mahānadiṃ pāpuṇiṃsu. Tattha aññā saccakiriyā natthi, tāya eva saccakiriyāya tampi
atk-s0302a:969_7: aḍḍhayojanavitthāraṃ nadiṃ atikkamiṃsu. Atha tatiyaṃ candabhāgaṃ nāma mahānadiṃ patvā
atk-s0302a:970_0: Satthāpi taṃdivasaṃ paccūsasamaye mahākaruṇāsamāpattito vuṭṭhāya lokaṃ olokento “ajja
atk-s0302a:970_1: mahākappino tiyojanasatikaṃ rajjaṃ pahāya amaccasahassaparivāro mama santike pabbajituṃ
atk-s0302a:970_2: āgacchatī”ti disvā, “mayā tesaṃ paccuggamanaṃ kātuṃ yutta”nti pātova sarīrapaṭijagganaṃ
atk-s0302a:970_3: katvā, bhikkhusaṅghaparivāro sāvatthiyaṃ piṇḍāya caritvā, pacchābhattaṃ piṇḍapātapaṭikkanto
atk-s0302a:970_4: sayameva pattacīvaraṃ gahetvā, ākāse uppatitvā candabhāgāya nadiyā tīre tesaṃ uttaraṇatitthassa
atk-s0302a:970_5: abhimukhe ṭhāne mahānigrodharukkho atthi, tattha pallaṅkena nisīditvā parimukhaṃ
atk-s0302a:970_6: satiṃ upaṭṭhapetvā chabbaṇṇabuddharasmiyo vissajjesi. Te tena titthena uttarantā
atk-s0302a:970_7: ca chabbaṇṇabuddharasmiyo ito cito ca vidhāvantiyo olokentā dasabalassa puṇṇacandasassirikaṃ
atk-s0302a:970_8: mukhaṃ disvā, “yaṃ satthāraṃ uddissa mayaṃ pabbajitā, addhā so eso”ti dassaneneva
atk-s0302a:970_9: niṭṭhaṃ gantvā diṭṭhaṭṭhānato paṭṭhāya onatā vandamānā āgamma satthāraṃ vandiṃsu.
atk-s0302a:970_10: Rājā gopphakesu gahetvā satthāraṃ vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi saddhiṃ amaccasahassena.
atk-s0302a:970_11: Satthā tesaṃ dhammaṃ kathesi. Desanāpariyosāne sabbe arahatte patiṭṭhāya satthāraṃ
atk-s0302a:970_12: pabbajjaṃ yāciṃsu. Satthā “pubbe ime cīvaradānassa dinnattā attano cīvarāni gahetvāva
atk-s0302a:970_13: āgatā”ti suvaṇṇavaṇṇaṃ hatthaṃ pasāretvā, “etha bhikkhavo svākkhāto dhammo, caratha
atk-s0302a:970_14: brahmacariyaṃ sammā dukkhassa antakiriyāyā”ti āha. Sāva tesaṃ āyasmantānaṃ pabbajjā
atk-s0302a:970_15: ca upasampadā ca ahosi, vassasaṭṭhikattherā viya satthāraṃ parivārayiṃsu.
atk-s0302a:971_0: Anojāpi devī rathasahassaparivārā gaṅgātīraṃ patvā rañño atthāya ābhataṃ nāvaṃ vā
atk-s0302a:971_1: uḷumpaṃ vā adisvā attano byattatāya cintesi – “rājā saccakiriyaṃ katvā gato bhavissati,
atk-s0302a:971_2: so pana satthā na kevalaṃ tesaṃyeva atthāya nibbatto, sace so satthā sammāsambuddho,
atk-s0302a:971_3: amhākaṃ rathā mā udake nimujjiṃsū”ti udakapiṭṭhe rathe pakkhandāpesi. Rathānaṃ nemivaṭṭimattampi
atk-s0302a:971_4: na temi. Dutiyatatiyanadīpi teneva saccakārena uttaramānāyeva nigrodharukkhamūle
atk-s0302a:971_5: satthāraṃ addasa. Satthā “imāsaṃ attano sāmike passantīnaṃ chandarāgo uppajjitvā
atk-s0302a:971_6: maggaphalānaṃ antarāyaṃ kareyya, so evaṃ kātuṃ na sakkhissatī”ti yathā aññamaññe
atk-s0302a:971_7: na passanti, tathā akāsi. Tā sabbāpi titthato uttaritvā dasabalaṃ vanditvā nisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0302a:971_8: Satthā tāsaṃ dhammaṃ kathesi, desanāpariyosāne sabbāpi sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāya
atk-s0302a:971_9: aññamaññe passiṃsu. Satthā “uppalavaṇṇā āgacchatū”ti cintesi. Therī āgantvā sabbā
atk-s0302a:971_10: pabbājetvā ādāya bhikkhunīnaṃ upassayaṃ gatā. Satthā bhikkhusahassaṃ gahetvā ākāsena
atk-s0302a:971_11: jetavanaṃ agamāsi. Imaṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ – “mahākappinoti evaṃ nāmako abhiññābalappatto
atk-s0302a:972_0: Janetasminti janite pajāyāti attho. Ye gottapaṭisārinoti ye “mayaṃ vāseṭṭhā gotamā”ti
atk-s0302a:972_1: gottaṃ paṭisaranti paṭijānanti, tesaṃ khattiyo seṭṭhoti attho. Vijjācaraṇasampannoti
atk-s0302a:972_2: aṭṭhahi vijjāhi ceva pannarasadhammabhedena caraṇena ca samannāgato. Tapatīti virocati.
atk-s0302a:972_3: Jhāyī tapati brāhmaṇoti khīṇāsavabrāhmaṇo duvidhena jhānena jhāyamāno tapati virocati.
atk-s0302a:972_4: Tasmiṃ pana khaṇe kāludāyitthero duvidhena jhānena jhāyamāno avidūre nisinno hoti.
atk-s0302a:972_5: Buddho tapatīti sabbaññubuddho virocati. Sabbamaṅgalagāthā kiresā. Bhātikarājā kira
atk-s0302a:972_6: ekaṃ pūjaṃ kāretvā ācariyakaṃ āha – “tīhi ratanehi amuttaṃ ekaṃ jayamaṅgalaṃ vadathā”ti.
atk-s0302a:972_7: So tepiṭakaṃ buddhavacanaṃ sammasitvā imaṃ gāthaṃ vadanto “divā tapati ādicco”ti
atk-s0302a:972_8: vatvā atthaṅgamentassa sūriyassa añjaliṃ paggaṇhi. “Rattimābhāti candimā”ti, uṭṭhahantassa
atk-s0302a:972_9: candassa añjaliṃ paggaṇhi. “Sannaddho khattiyo tapatī”ti rañño añjaliṃ paggaṇhi.
atk-s0302a:972_10: “Jhāyī tapati brāhmaṇo”ti bhikkhusaṅghassa añjaliṃ paggaṇhi. “Buddho tapati tejasā”ti
atk-s0302a:972_11: vatvā pana mahācetiyassa añjaliṃ paggaṇhi. Atha naṃ rājā “mā hatthaṃ otārehī”ti ukkhittasmiṃyeva
atk-s0302a:974_0: 246. Dvādasame cirarattaṃsametikāti dīgharattaṃ saṃsanditvā sametvā ṭhitaladdhino.
atk-s0302a:974_1: Te kira pañcajātisatāni ekatova vicariṃsu. Sameti nesaṃ saddhammoti idāni imesaṃ
atk-s0302a:974_2: ayaṃ sāsanadhammo saṃsandati sameti. Dhamme buddhappavediteti buddhena pavedite dhamme
atk-s0302a:974_3: etesaṃ sāsanadhammo sobhatīti attho. Suvinītā kappinenāti attano upajjhāyena ariyappavedite
atk-s0302a:974_4: dhamme suṭṭhu vinītā. Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānamevāti. Dvādasamaṃ.
